61a6(mdo sde): bzhin du rim gro dang btsun par byas pas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / theg pa chen po'i chos bstan pa la mos pas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par
61a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / stan dang / gos dang / khong bzang gnas bzang po byin pas gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi gtam tshogs te smra ba spangs pas sku/
61b1(mdo sde): chenas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dge pa'i bshes gnyen dang / mkhan po dAng / tha ma rnams kyis bzhan pa'i tshog sang dag par gras pa pa bzung
61b2(mdo sde): mngon du spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas/ yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yon tan dpag tu med par bsrubs pas zhabs legs par thob pa'i mtshan
61b3(mdo sde): dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bskul bas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
61b4(mdo sde): dpa' chen pos de ltar dpag tu med pa'i yon tan bsgrubs na/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis de lta bu dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// zhes de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i
61b5(mdo sde): snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag gis brtags na gang yang dngos po dang mtshan mar ma grub ste/ ma mchis la de bzhin gshegs pa
61b6(mdo sde): la brtags na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam de ma lags na/ ci'i srid du spyod lam rgya cher bsgrub ces gsungs/ dkon mchog gsum dang / bden pa bzhi dang / phung po lnga dang / skye mched dang /
61b7(mdo sde): khams dang / rten 'brel bcu gnyis dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos rnams la bdag gis brtags na'ang phyi nang gi rgyu 'bras kun stong pa nyid de/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ smon pa ma mchis/ skye zhing
62a1(mdo sde): 'byung ba'ang ma mthong / 'gag cing nub pa'ang ma mthong / sbru ma dang 'dra ba/ sprul pa dang 'dra ba/ 'bar bu dang 'dra ba/ drag cha dang 'dra ga/ rab kyi zla ba dang 'drag/
62a2(mdo sde): rus sbal gyi spu dang 'dra ba/ ri bong ga rI dang 'dra ba/ nam mkha'i me tog dang 'dra ba/ me gsham gyi bu dang 'dra ba/ gzugs brnyan gyi gos gyon zhing / sgyu ma'i glang po che la 'tshal ba dang 'dra ba
62a3(mdo sde): mchis pa'ang 'dra/ ma mchis pa'ang 'dra ba/ de dag ni mchis pa dang ma mchis pa/ mchis pa'ang ma lags/ ma mchis pa'ang ma lags/ rtags pa ma lags/ chad pa ma lags/ skye ba ma
62a4(mdo sde): lags/ 'gag pa ma lags/ nang du mi lags/ slad rol ma lags/ mthong ba ma lags/ shes pa ma lags/ dper na nam mkha' dang 'dra ba la/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ngas ni spyod lam
62a5(mdo sde): de dag spyad ces gsungs/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gis brtags na/ bdag ma lags// sems can ma lags// srog ma lags/ gso ba ma lags/ skyes bu ma lags// gang zag ma lags/ shed
62a6(mdo sde): bdag ma lags/ byed pa po la sogs pa ma lags/ mig ma lags/ gzugs ma lags/ mig dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ rna ba ma lags/ sgra ma lags/ rna ba dang sgra'i mam/
62a7(mdo sde): kyi skyong sum ma legs// rna ma lags/ drim lags/ snga dang dri ma ci krung yul la lags/ snyim lags/ rlo ma gas/ srer mo dzim na nyid kyi rlung bral mi lags/ lus ma lams
62b1(mdo sde): rig bya ma lags/ lus dang reg bya'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ yid ma lags/ chos ma lags/ yid dang chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/ rnam par shes pa ma lags
62b2(mdo sde): gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/ gzugs ma lags/ sdug bsngal ma lags/ gzugs dang sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/ bdag ma lags/ bdag
62b3(mdo sde): gi ma lags/ 'gro ba ma legs/ gzugs can ma lags/ phung po ma lags/ bden pa ma lags/ brdzun pa me lags/ bsdus pa ma lags/ gtor ba ma lags/ 'byung ba ma lags
62b4(mdo sde): 'jug pa ma lags te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin te/ par bzhud pa ma lags/ tshur byon pa ma lags/ bzhugs pa'i gnas
62b5(mdo sde): kyang mi mnga'/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'ang mi mnga'/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyang mi mnga'/ gcig pa'ang ma lags/ tha dad pa'ang ma lags/
62b6(mdo sde): 'das pa'ang ma lags ma byon pa ma lags/ da ltar byung ba ma lags/ dri ma can ma lags/ yongs su dag pa ma lags/ bdag ma lags/ sems can ma lags/ srob dang
62b7(mdo sde): skyes bu dang gang zag la sogs pa'ang ma lags rtag pa ma lags/ chad pa ma lags/ skye ba ma mchis/ 'gag pa ma mchis/ bzhom du ma mchis/ snod du ma mchis
63a1(mdo sde): dor dum ma / drang ngam mchis/ mtha' las 'das pa sun du grags pAl/ gang gis du na bgrubs nas gsus sa sa dag
63a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ legs sa legs so// rigs kyi bu sno sngon 'das pa'i dus na/ s+yA
63a3(mdo sde): rgyus grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams la bya ba byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ sun ring po nas theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i don nub par shes te/ chos so cog kun kyang stong pa nyid du mngon pa
63a4(mdo sde): shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i mtha' las 'das te/ yun du gnas par yang shes pas/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po ni bai DUR+Ya'i nor bu shin tu dang ba/
63a5(mdo sde): gsal ba/ 'dam rdzab kyi nang du lo stong gi bar du bzhag kyang / rang bzhin yong gis dag pas phyir phyung na'ang snga mkho bzhin te/ khyod kyang de dang 'dra bar chos kyi mtshan nyid mngon par rtogs la rang
63a6(mdo sde): bzhin rnam par dag pas khyed rnams da ltar khams gsum na/ snyigs ma can lnga'i 'dam rdzab tu gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang sems can gyi don byas kyis kyang 'dam rtsub kyis ma gos pas
63a7(mdo sde): nadon 'di lta bu dag 'dri nus pa yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod yang nyon cig/ 'di lta ste/ chos so cog thams cad yang dag par na dngos po med de/ yi ge yod pa'i phyir chos yod ces bshad
63b1(mdo sde): chos kyi nang du yi ge med la yi ge'i nang du'ang chos med do// kun tu spel ba'i phyir yi ger bstan to// yi ger nang du ni byang chub kyang med/ byang chub kyi nang du ni yi ge'ang med mod kyi/ don
63b2(mdo sde): dam par ni yi ge med kyang kun rdzob tu yi ge yod par bshad pas/ sems can la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang yi ge las gud na mi rnyed do// rigs kyi bu khyod
63b3(mdo sde): ba'ang bden te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zad pa med/ skye ba med/ mi sgom/ mi spyod/ sgom spyod rnams dang bral ba/ yang dag pa'i chos la mi 'jug/ de las ldog cing 'gyur ba'ang ma yin/
63b4(mdo sde): skye ba gcig gis dga' ldan gyi gnas su'ang ma skyes/ de las babs te yum gyi lhums su 'ang ma gnas/ chos thams cad la sems mi gnas pas/ nga ni skye rga na 'chi las 'das so//
63b5(mdo sde): zhes kyang ma byas/ phyogs bzhir gom pa bdun bdun yang ma bor/ nga ni 'jig rten na bla na med pa btsun pa yin no zhes kyang ma brjod/ grong khyer mchog tu na'ang bzang mo dang yang ma rtsen/
63b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten bya ba yig rtsis la sogs pa'ang ma bsgrubs/ stobs dang 'bong ma la yang ma bskrun to// sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/ rgan po mngon sum du bstan pa ni lus
63b7(mdo sde): la chags pa rnams bkag pa'o// nang ba mngon sum du bstan pa ni tshel chags pa rnams bkag pa'o// shi ba'i mtshan ma mngon sum du bstan pa ni/ 'dod chags dang dang ngar 'dzin pa rnams
64a1(mdo sde): pa// sa sa smyan na/ rnams sa sa 'di na gyu/ sgyu /
64a2(mdo sde): par bsrub pa bya ba'o// grong khyer mchog nas byung ste gshegs pa ni khams gsum kyi brtson ralas thar pa dang / 'bras bum yin pa rnams bstan pa'o// sra gzigs pan byams sna ma
64a3(mdo sde): bar bstan pa'o// de'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku rnam par brgyan cing / sems can gyi bsod nams kyi zhing du bya ba'o// dbu skra bregs pa dang / rgyan rnams spangs pa dang / rta tsan ta ka
64a4(mdo sde): zhabs 'bring dad pa can la slar bskur ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar bstan pa'o// kha spu bregs pa ni chos thams cad la mi chags rnam par bstan pa'o// ka sha ngur smrig gyon pa ni sems
64a5(mdo sde): can gdul bar bstan pa'o// drang srong u ta ka dang a ran da la tshes 'dri rtog bya ba ni rang gi nga rgyal gyi sems 'jom par bstan pa'o// lo drug gi bar du dka' thub spyad pa ni mu stegs 'dul
64a6(mdo sde): ba'o// zhal zas blangs pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o// rtswa swa ti blangs pa ni chog shes par bstan pa'o// rtswa bting ba'i steng du bzhugs pa ni nyim rangs dang g.yel
64a7(mdo sde): rnams 'joms par bstan pa'o// wa gu kun gyis bstod cing bsngags pa dang bsnyen bku bye ba ni yon tan gyi 'bras bul bkod par bstan pa'o// bdud rnams 'dul ba ni dpa' ba'i mthu bstan pa'o// byas
64b1(mdo sde): la smyan sa dzu na pa'o// rgyam sa da rjo kyi yang ga sa / [ऽ] sa
64b2(mdo sde): lamathob pa yin no// 'di sa chos thams cad kyi mtsham tshang mngon dumakhyen nas/ chos kun marnam pa nyid du bstan pas ni sangs rgyas seMs na'o/ sangasaHsa kyi la shes 'thug pa maud
64b3(mdo sde): chos bstan to cog la sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i don bstan pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// dus gsum gyi b+ha ba dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos mngon du gsal bar gzigs shing mdzin
64b4(mdo sde): bas na thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o// bden pa dang yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir/ lha dang mi'i mkhan po zhes bya'o// gang zhig de ltar thob cing rtogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// des
64b5(mdo sde): log par rtogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bsrub can zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas thams cad ni mi 'byung / mi 'dug/ mi ste/ mi 'gog ste/
64b6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'da' 'o zhes brjod pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa'
64b7(mdo sde): nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang yang dag par na chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni stong pa nyid du rtogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'byung ba'am/ nub pa'ang mi ma
65a1(mdo sde): bas/ rgyal po'i pho brang du'ang ma bltam/ byang chub kyi shing drung du'ang mya ngan las ma 'das/ mtha' las 'das te/ lun du gnas pa sems can yongs su bsgral/
65a2(mdo sde): bar mdzad pa'i slad du/ dka' thub spyad cing mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan kyang / yang dag par na 'gyur ba 'am/ spros pa mi mnga'/ de de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul du gnas te/ khams
65a3(mdo sde): gsum na sku 'byung ba'am chos kyi rnam pa lnga 'byung ngo // lnga po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sku yon tan can dang / sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes pa 'am/ sku sprul
65a4(mdo sde): cing 'byung ba dang / sku nam mkha' lta bu deng lnga ste/ de la sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyi ba ni/ yang dag pa'i 'bras bu'i mchog/ mtshan ma thams cad las 'das pa / rang gi dbyings
65a5(mdo sde): la yun du gnas pa na/ sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyi'o// sku yon tan can zhes bgyi ba ni sems can mya ngan las zla ba'i slad du/ spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad cing dge
65a6(mdo sde): ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par mdzad pas na/ sku yon tan na ne zhes bgyi'o// sku chos kyi ngo bo las skyes zhes bgyi ba ni/ chos kyi mtshan nyid thams cad thugs su chud de
65a7(mdo sde): mimakhyen pa mi mnga' spyod yul del yang dag par mkhyen pa'i stong pa nyid las smras / yang dag par rdzogs pas na su chos kyi ba nyid las skyes zhes kyi'o/
65b1(mdo sde): skul cing 'byung ba zhes bgyi ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung yang lam chung lngar dge jig kun la mngon par bstan cing / skyabs su ma mdzad pa
65b2(mdo sde): mchis te/ sprul pa'i rdzas las mtshan nyid du 'gyur bas na/ sku sprul cing 'byung ba zhes bgyi'o// sku nam mkha' lta bu zhes daN+DI ni nam mkha' mtha'i yas pas na/ chos
65b3(mdo sde): kyi su yang mtha' yas so// nam mkha' la dpag pa dang gzhal du ma mchos pas ni/ chos kyi sku yang dpag cing gzhal du ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang nam
65b4(mdo sde): mkha' chen po dang 'dra'o// sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du su rnam pa sngar ston pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skye ba mi mnga'/ 'gag pa mi mnga' bar mngon
65b5(mdo sde): no// chos thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas mngon du sprul cing / chos rnam par spel ba lags so zhes gsol pa dang /
65b6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar chos kyi
65b7(mdo sde): mtshan nyid la mkhas pas/ spyod yul thams cad la rab tu chod pa 'am/ thogs pa med de/ rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa stong rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba dang /
66a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'das stong cam shes bya brnyed du du chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na shAg ga zug+sa pa can po 'ang la zhig spyod de/ nyan thos dang nga spangs rgyas
66a2(mdo sde): kyi theg pa'i ming rna ba'i thog mar yang mi grag na/ ngan song lta zhig ci smos/ khyod bskal pa de dang 'jig rten der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
66a3(mdo sde): rgyas rgyan rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'jig rten gzhan nas skyes bu chen po dag kyang der phyin cing / theg pa chen po thar pa phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde mnyan pa dang
66a4(mdo sde): blangs pa dang bcangs par 'gyur ro// de bas na sems can gang la las byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos te/ phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byas na/ 'jig
66a5(mdo sde): rten longs spyod can gyi khams der yang skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can gang la las theg pa chen po'i chos sgrub na'ang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur/ gang chos kyi rnam
66a6(mdo sde): grangs 'di blang zhing bcangs pa des ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba bcu ma 'das par lung bstan pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la byang chub sems
66a7(mdo sde): dpa' mtshan nyid dadakyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir zhus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang / mdo sde cu ga cis
66b1(mdo sde): mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun rnams kyi mtshan bstan nas yang seng ge'i sgra chen po sngogs te/ seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i tshig bstan pa'o// des/
66b2(mdo sde): pa'i chog bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag par 'tshe stong zhing gzhes te/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar rig pa'o// yang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do zhes bstan
66b3(mdo sde): pa dang / lha'i bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa spa gong ste/ skyabs kyi dbang du gyur pas na seng ge'i sgra zhes bya'o// de ltar bstan nas ljags kyi mtshan rgya chen pos stong gsum gyi stong chen
66b4(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun khebs par g.yogs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// rnam pa drug tu g.yos zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs mthon nub
66b5(mdo sde): phyogs dma'// nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mthon byang phyogs dma'// byang phyogs mthon lho phyogs dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/ mtha' mthon
66b6(mdo sde): dbus dma' ba ni sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos zhes bya'o// ljags kyi drung nas 'od zer chen po btang ste/ phyogs bcur snang ba chen po byas so// snang ba chen po des mi rtag pa ni rtag par bya/
66b7(mdo sde): mngag pa ni dag par byas/ sdug bsngal can ni bde bar byas/ mi rig pa ni rig par byas/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg cing snang de cog la ringang / nags tshal dang yul/
67a1(mdo sde): sadang chub rji dang / da / lugs / mags pa rnams sa
67a2(mdo sde): tshal khyi la dang ldan ljin med de kun kyang yongs su dag par gyur nas 'di lta ste/ dbyer nA shar phyogs na 'jig rten tha krung rnam dag yongs su brtan dang 'dra'o// de'i tsho de'i dus
67a3(mdo sde): nabacom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku sprul pa ni/ nam mkha' nas babya ba ni me tog gi cha bab pa dang 'dra'o// bog nas byung ba ni sprin dang na bun byung ba dang 'dra bar nam mkha' yongs su ga /
67a4(mdo sde): nam mkha' stong par cung zad kyang med do// sprul pa'i zhal so so nas tshig 'thun par de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag par 'tsho skyong gzhes te/ mya ngan las mi 'dra'a'o// sems can thams
67a5(mdo sde): da la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid do zhes gsungs yang chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid do zhes gsungs so// spyod lam de dag gi rgyu 'bras ni theg pa gcig tu zad pa las sems can
67a6(mdo sde): gyis theg pa rnam pa gsum du mthong zhes bshad nas/ de ma thag tu kun mi snang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das gadran la bzhugs pa nyi tshe snang ste/ de'i tshe tshogs mang po thams cad kyis su sprul
67a7(mdo sde): pa de dag mthong ba ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu ste/ shAkya thub pa yab byams pas/ 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang gzi brjid mngon par sprul pa de'i tshe/ tshigs kyi
67b1(mdo sde): nang nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// nyan thos brgyad khri zhig ni theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do// dge slong stong drag brgya ga/
67b2(mdo sde): gis ni dgra bcom pa'i lam thob bo// dge slong ma khri brgyad stong zhig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i lam thob bo// dge bsnyen khri phragru bzhi bcus ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i lam thob bo// dge
67b3(mdo sde): bsnyen ma 'bum phrag bcus ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i lam thob bo// lha dang mi grangs med pa zhig ni chos kyi mig rdul med pa/ dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa thob ste/ rang gi tshe snga phyi shes
67b4(mdo sde): pa dang 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad mi rtag par mthong ngo // de nas tshogs kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i sgra stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag
67b5(mdo sde): pa gcig tu bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gong du
67b6(mdo sde): bstan pa bzhin na ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos na'ang sdig 'byung / chos kyi mtshan thos na'ang sdig 'byung dge 'dun gyi mtshan thos na'ang sdig 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung na
67b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags sam/ chos kyi mthu lags sam/ dge 'dun gyi mthu lags som/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags ni ni sangs rgyas la gsol ba bgyi/ chos
68a1(mdo sde): kyi mthul gas na ni chos la gsol bar gyi/ dbye 'dun gyimathu lags na ni dge 'dun la gsol bkyi lags na/ sum ma /
68a2(mdo sde): gong du gsungs pa'i theg pa gcig la so so'i skye bos rnam pa gsum du mthong ngo zhes 'byung na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang gsum du bshad na sems can ma TIg ci spos zhes
68a3(mdo sde): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i sgral 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// legs so legs so// rigs kyi bus ma
68a4(mdo sde): can la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir don de lta bu 'dra ba'ang shin tu legs te/ nyon cig/ ngas khyod la bye brag phyed par bshad do// sangs rgyas kyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin/ chos kyi mthu
68a5(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin/ dge 'dun gyi mthu 'ba' shig kyang ma yin te/ kun tshogs pa'i mthu bas sangs rgyas ni sems can gyi mgon skyabs kyi pha ma byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i
68a6(mdo sde): bshes nyan yin no// sems can bsrad pa can sems stor ba slar rnyed de 'khor ba la skyo nas/ 'dran pa'i mthu mang po sa khams gsum na nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar 'dod na/ phyos/
68a7(mdo sde): su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'dis bskal ba'i gru chen po byed do// debs na rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyang chos so// chos kyang dge 'dun mo// dge 'dun ni 'dus ma byas pa'o// 'dus ma byas pa ni stong gi
68b1(mdo sde): da dang / 'dus rnas rgya rdzung ba tshad dang / rang sa pa nyid dang / 'astong ba tshan dang / pa stong ba nyid dang / rlung ngu'i snong pa sgyid spyo nga su sa /
68b2(mdo sde): med do// rigs kyi bu khyod zer bstanA pa rnam pa gcig tu bsgrub pa'i rigs kyi bus rnam pa gsum du bsgrub cing dgos zhes byu ni/ rigs kyi bu 'dis sa/ dper na mi gcig cig
68b3(mdo sde): nam mkha' stong pas srag te/ gar phyin dgur gab kyang nam mkha' dang yongs ma bral lo// rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dang ngas bshad do cog
68b4(mdo sde): dge ba thams cad kyi rgyu dang / rkyen dang / dkon mchog gsum dang / theg pa gsum yang gcig las mi 'da'a'o// byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgras gsol pa/ legs
68b5(mdo sde): so legs so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pas bstan pa ltar ni bdag snga nas 'tshal te/ sems can rnams kyi slad du don de zhu ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
68b6(mdo sde): bzhin du mi gnyis mi gsum mo// thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shul chen po// rnal byor pa
68b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi mig ste/ lta ba log pa rnams sdud pa dang sems sbyor ba rnams myong ba dang / ngan song gsum gyi sgo gcod pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sgo 'byed pa dang
69a1(mdo sde): nyan thos rnams bzlog ste/ theb pa chen por 'dzud pa'i slad du bdag gis gzungs chen po'i sngags kyis bsrung zhing bskyab par brtsi'o// sdom pa mnyams
69a2(mdo sde): ba dang mdo sde 'di la sgom zhing bslab par bgyid pa de la'ang bsrung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o// gal te gang brag la las mde sde 'di la brnyan bkur bgyid cing dgung bdun gyi bar du spyad/
69a3(mdo sde): ba skyong la bdud sdig can gyis 'khrug cing 'tshe ba'i glags lta ba mchis na bdud sdig can gyis glags kyi skabs mi rnyed par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag mdo sde 'di la rim gro/
69a4(mdo sde): bgyis te/ yun ring por gnas par bgyi ba'ang / byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu khyod mdo sde
69a5(mdo sde): 'di la rim gro bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum la rim gro bya ba dang 'dra'o// ston pa la'ang rim gro bya ba dang 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgrasra bcom ldan 'das kyi
69a6(mdo sde): spyan sngar gzungs sngags 'di skad ces smras so// na ma~M bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsatwA ya/ a dan d+hi d+ha ra ni tad+ya thA A kA sha ni bi b+he sarba d+hamA ni pa/
69a7(mdo sde): oM sha ma d+ha ra/ bi ba sha na / bi ma la su pa ri dar ma ni Sha na ba ru ni tsa ya ta ma le tsa le hu lu hu lu shi ba de man tra man tra swA hA/ sngags 'di dus gcig la lan \u0f7f
69b1(mdo sde): brgyad bzlas shing mchod rten la lan bdun bskor ba bgyi de ltar gdugs bdun gyi bar du mdo sde gzhan la mi bsam par gdugs gcig kyang dus gsum du phyogs su rgyas
69b2(mdo sde): pa'i mdo sde 'di la sems rtse gcig tu bgyis te/ sems gzhan du mig yang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas khri phrag brgyad brgyas gsungs pa ste
69b3(mdo sde): deng 'dir bdag gis kyang brjod pa lags so// gal te 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di la smod pa mchis na/ sangs rgyas de dag la smod par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di la smod pa ni
69b4(mdo sde): rabs du ma'i bar du byang chub tu bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ srid pa gsum las kyang mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sngags 'di ni sems dran pa nyams pa rnams sems
69b5(mdo sde): slar rnyed pa dang / gzungs 'di lan cig tsam rna bar thos sam thos nas yi ger bris te/ sha dang chang mi 'tshal bar sdom pa la gnas shing bdag nyid rtse 'jo la sogs
69b6(mdo sde): ba spangs te/ 'du 'dzi'i nang du mi 'jug la/ rgyun du byams pa chen po spyod cing bsam gtan la gces par 'dzin na gang zag de dpag tu ma mchis pa'i sgrib pa gsum gyi sdig
69b7(mdo sde): lci ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di thos ma thags tu sems thag pa nas blang ba dang / bcang ba dang / nyin re zhing klog pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang
70a1(mdo sde): yi dam du mi bskyeskyud par bgyid na/ gang zag de mngon par byang ma chub kyi bar du ngan song gsum du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/
70a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgra la bka' stsal pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod dkon mchog gsum gyi rim gro bya ba dang byams pa'i sems kyi sems can
70a3(mdo sde): rnams srid pa gsum las gdon pa dang / bslab pa mang po grangs med pa la phan pa dang bde ba chen po bya ba'i phyir/ ston pa'i sgro 'byed cing log par lta ba rnams bzlog ste
70a4(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i lta ba la 'dzud pa'i phyir/ gzungs sngags 'di bshad pa ni shin tu'ang legs so// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag khyod kyi ming dang / sngags kyi sgra thos nas
70a5(mdo sde): da pa dang gus pa bskyed de mi smon na/ gang zag de tshe 'di nyid la'ang bde la/ 'chi 'phos na'ang rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong zhing nga'ang mthong la khyed la sogs pa byang
70a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// mngon par tshang rgya bar yang nges par rang gis rig ste/ the tshom med do// kun nas nyon mongs spungs pa dang // dge ba kun gyis
70a7(mdo sde): lam bsgrubs te// sangs rgyas rang bzhin mthong ba yang // rnam dag dad pa'i dbang gis so// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nga mya ngan las 'das
70b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'og tu/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las nyin gcig gum dus gcig gam/ mtshan gcig gam/ skad cig ma cig la phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshe/
70b2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing theg pa chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / don dam pa'i
70b3(mdo sde): bden pa la bsams na/ gang zag de ni skad cig ma se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la bskur pa dang / kun nas nyon
70b4(mdo sde): mongs pa'i las thams cad yongs su ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gal te dge slong ngem dge slong ma 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge
70b5(mdo sde): sbyong mas sems kyi rang bzhin stor nas/ rtsa ba bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad nyams pa dang / mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga byas pa dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur
70b6(mdo sde): rnams phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la dad pa bskyed de phyag 'tshal na/ 'di lta bu'i las ngan pa kun ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro// de gad ba
70b7(mdo sde): sku la ma thag tu sngon sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur gyi dus na/ rgyal bu dge mthong zhes bya ba de'i tshe mi sum stong dang lhan cig tu skad cig mar der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
71a1(mdo sde): la mgo bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa nas
71a2(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las bgyis pa lta zhig bshad kyis mi rdzogs te/ mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur pa'i sdig grangs ma mchis par bgyis
71a3(mdo sde): par de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis la brten nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams d+d+hi spyan sngar 'azlos te/ brjod tshangs su gsol zhing mchis na/ bas/
71a4(mdo sde): dbye bar ciganang zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' tshul pa/ legs so legs so// ky-i rje 'jigs pa'i sems bskyed pa'ang dkyu' sa/ dge pa'is pa pa
71a5(mdo sde): ngadaka' ste/ mi dge ba d+ma dang / marnams med pa lnga 'grol zhing 'chags par 'dod pa ni/ log stong la sogs pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi bdag cing mthong du nams/ y-i sa
71a6(mdo sde): bzhin dul shegs shi// nas rgyas du dge ma tha la segs pa ma sam song gis ma 'dis sabs dbye ba babyams pa rnamams thas no/ sa sa
71a7(mdo sde): ngapa mas rnaMmam pa mamam ma sa sa pams @
71b1(mdo sde): 'das bdag cag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o// phyogs bcu'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o// phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun la skyabs su maN+Da'o// yang 'di lta ste/
71b2(mdo sde): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal zhing sbubs su gsol lo// nub
71b3(mdo sde): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas don yod grub pa li phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// bla ma phyog kyis
71b4(mdo sde): rgyas dri brtsegs la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// 'og ma phyogs kyi sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'bum la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// yang shar phyogs na skyes bu chen po
71b5(mdo sde): kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// lho phyogs na skyes bu chen po 'jig rten 'dzin la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// nub phyogs na kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang
71b6(mdo sde): phyug la drug 'tshal zhing skabs su gsol lo// byang phyogs na zla gang la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsil lo// zlum phyogs na nam ma'a'i snying ba la phyog 'a mas sugasal lo// ma
71b7(mdo sde): phyogs ni rgyas du chen po yin pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skabs su gsil lo// yang sadag cag gi ma khan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'od mi 'gyur b.la'ang byag tshal 'di skyabs sug sol la/
72a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// phyogs gzhan na sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// da ltar
72a2(mdo sde): bdag cag gi mkhan po bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// skyes bu chen po dri ma med par grags pa dang 'jam dpal gzhon nu la'ang phyag 'tshal
72a3(mdo sde): zhing skyabs su gsol lo// 'phags pa dga' bo dang 'od srungs la'ang skyabs su gsol lo// 'phags pa'i 'bras bu rnam bzhi mngon par byung ba rnams la'ang skyabs su gsol lo//
72a4(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la'ang skyabs su gsol lo// sde snod chen po gsung rab mdo sde bcu gnyis dang mnyam pa nyid yang dag pa'i mdo sde gzhon bzhugs so 'tshal
72a5(mdo sde): la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// chu brgyad du bgos pa'i sku gdung ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// da ltar na sku
72a6(mdo sde): gzugs bzhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhan
72a7(mdo sde): dbang phyug dang / bar snang na gnas pa'i lha dang / sa'i lce dang / ri dang / na gas tshal dang / shing drung gi lha dang / drang srong dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i
72b1(mdo sde): spyan mnga' ba rnams dang / lha'i snyan mnga' ba thams cad kyi sman gyis gsan cing mkhyen par mdzod cig/ kun dbang du gsol te/ sems can thams cad la ma mthol ma bshags pa zhig
72b2(mdo sde): michis na'ang / sdig pa thams cad byang bar gyur cig/ yang 'di skad ces smras te/ bdag cag thog ma ma mchis pa nas/ da lhur gyi lus ngan pa 'di thob kyi bar du nor cing 'khrul pa'i sems kyis/
72b3(mdo sde): phyin ci log tu lta ba dpag tu ma mchis/ nyon mongs pa dang / mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa brjod kyis mi lang ste/ sdig pa'i tshogs bgyis so 'tshal rang gis ma tsher ma rig pas ngan sems rab
72b4(mdo sde): tu rgyus te/ tshe phyi ma ma mthong zhing tshe 'di 'ba' zhig mthong bas/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags la mos te dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ring du gyur cing / las ngan pas bar du chod nas
72b5(mdo sde): ldog pa'i grogs po dang bsten cing / dge slong dang / dge slong ma la mi rigs mi tshul ba'i las bgyis pa dang / pha dang ma la mi rigs mi tshul ba'i las bgyis pa dang / yang bdag
72b6(mdo sde): nyam rangs kyi dbang gis dge 'dun gyi dkor nor thugs thub tu spyad pa dang / dge 'dun sde lnga la mi rigs mi tshul bar bgyis pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu
72b7(mdo sde): dpag tu ma mchis par bshags pa 'am/ byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sems can bkum pa 'am/ chos kyi slob dpon la skur te/ chos la chos ma lags zhes skur
73a1(mdo sde): chos ma lags pa la chos lags zhes brjod/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mi rtag ces bgyis dam pa'i chos la'ang mi rtag go zhes bgyis/ dge 'dun dkon/
73a2(mdo sde): mchog kyang mi rtag go zhes bgyis sbyin pa dang shes rab la ni ma mos log pa'i chos la dad cing 'dzin pa de dag gi slad du/ deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis khrel
73a3(mdo sde): zhing ngo tsha ba'ang dpag tu ma mchis te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje mnga' ste/ phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab
73a4(mdo sde): yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag gis sdig pa bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa 'thol zhing bshags
73a5(mdo sde): par 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol zhing slan chad kyang mi bgyid par smon to// yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun chad
73a6(mdo sde): mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang / sangs rgyas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i bslab pa zhig par bgyis pa dang / log spyod kyi spyod pa spyad pa dang ngag rtsub mo gtong ba dang /
73a7(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos la skur pa 'debs pa'i las ngan pa de dag 'gyod cing 'thol ma myong ste/ sems la gnong pa'am/ ngo tshab ma mchis pa'i mi dag ba bcu dang mchims ma mchis pa lnga/
73b1(mdo sde): la sogs pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las lji ba nges par bgyis par rang gis 'tshal ljang nongs pa bcabs nas// 'jigs shing skrag pa dang gnod zhing ngo tsha ba'i sems thog ma nas /
73b2(mdo sde): mchis paradad pa can gyi mchod pa blangs nas 'thol zhing bshags ma myong ste/ dam pa'i chos yun du btsugs te/ rim gro bgyi ba'i sems ma mchis par rtag tu smod cing ba ras
73b3(mdo sde): pa dang / ngag gi sgo nas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nongs pa mang po bgyis pa dang / ched na dkon mchog gsum yang med do zhes brjod pa dang / mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma mchis pa'i sdig
73b4(mdo sde): de dag bgyis pa'i slad du/ deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis gnong zhing khrel ba dpag tu ma mchis te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo// sangs rgyas
73b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje mnga' ste/ phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na bdag cag gi sdig pa
73b6(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis 'thol zhing bshags par 'tshal na/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ slan chud kyang mi bgyid par
73b7(mdo sde): smon to// yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pazang ma mchis pa tshun chad phyin ci log tu lnga lta ste/ rtsa ba bzhi ni sbom por bshad/ sbom po ni rtsa ba bzhir bshad/
74a1(mdo sde): zhig pa rnams ni ma zhig par bshad/ ma zhig pa rnams ni zhig par bshad/ lci ba rnams ni yang bar bshad/ yang ba rnams ni lci bar bshad/ dag pa
74a2(mdo sde): rnams ni ma dag par bshad/ mdag pa rnams ni dag par bshad pa dang / yang log par skabs 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag la bstod cing bsngags nas/ na sa dang ma sde la ni mgus te/
74a3(mdo sde): sme ngan gyi gtam rtag tu gleng zhing brjod pa dang ma brtags pa'i nor rnam pa brgyad po 'chang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa ni bdud kyi tshig go zhes bgyis pa dang / bdud
74a4(mdo sde): kyi tshig yang dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' zhes bgyis pa dang / mu stegs mkhan gyi tshig la'ang yid ches par 'dzin pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa mthar mya ngan las 'das te
74a5(mdo sde): med pas dkon mchog gsum yang mi rtag go zhes bgyis nas lus dang sems 'khrul cing phyin ci log tu lta ba dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du deng 'jigs shing sgrags pa'ang dpag tu ma
74a6(mdo sde): mchis gnong zhing ngo tsha ba'ang dpag tu ma mchis te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje mngar ste/ phyogs
74a7(mdo sde): su snyoms pa'i yab yum la byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na bdag cag gis sdig pa bskal ba grangs ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa de dag
74b1(mdo sde): mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis 'thol zhing bshags par 'tshal na/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ snyun chad par mi bgyid par smon to// yang 'di ltaste bcom ldan
74b2(mdo sde): 'das bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas tshe lus 'di la thug gi bar du dge 'dun gyi spyi'i nor ram phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor ram da ltar bzhugs
74b3(mdo sde): pa'i dge 'dun gyi nor ram dge 'dun sde lnga'i nor ram dge slong gang zag gi nor rim yon bdag thams cad kyi nor rdzas la brkus pa'am/ rang nyam du smad pa dang yang
74b4(mdo sde): rang smos te/ bdag gis dam pa'i chos bsam gtan bzhi 'am 'bras bu bzhi ma thob par thob bo zhes smras pa la sogs pa rkye ni de lta bu'i las ngan pa mi dge ba'i rgyu rkyen du gyur te/ khyim nas
74b5(mdo sde): khyim med par rab tu byung na'ang pham pa bzhi dang sdom pa brgyad dang drug dang dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum dang / ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang / spang ba'i
74b6(mdo sde): ltung ba sum cu dang ltung ba dgu bcu dang so sor bshags pa bzhi dang / bslab pa mang po dang bdun shin tu zhi ba'i chos rnams te/ tshul khrims de dag re re la nyes byas nas//
74b7(mdo sde): pham pa la thug gi bar du nyams pa dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang / dam pa'i chos dang mdo sde zab mo la skur pa dang log spyod kyi spyod pa spyad nas nos
75a1(mdo sde): pa bcabs te/ 'gyod cing 'thol ma myong bas nyin mtshan du 'phel zhing skye ba sngon rgyal bdag gis bshad pa las thos pa ni/ dam pa'i chos la skur pa'am/
75a2(mdo sde): mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa'am/ rtsa ba bzhi pham par gyur pa rnams ma bshags ma 'thol na/ sems can dmyal bar nges par ltung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub
75a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang skyabs mdzad par mi 'gyur/ dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang lha rnams dang mi rnams kyis kyang skyabs
75a4(mdo sde): dang 'or ba bgyid mi nus so zhes 'byung bas na de'i slad du dang 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis gnod zhing ngo tsha ba dpag tu ma mchis te/ de'i slad du deng dkon mchog gsum dang /
75a5(mdo sde): 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mdza dang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas stong dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas sprul pa'i su shAkya thub pa la sbubs su gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
75a6(mdo sde): 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje'i mnga' bdag ste/ phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshis gnyen lags na bdag cag bsapa
75a7(mdo sde): pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tsun chad kyi na mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang las kyi slob pa dang shes bya'i slob pa dang pham pa bzhi dang mtshams ma mchis pa dang
75b1(mdo sde): mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i sdig lci ba rnams 'thol zhing bshags par 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol yang 'di lta sa/ bcom ldan 'das deng bdag gis sems
75b2(mdo sde): can rnams dang / bdag cag gis rang rang gi slad du/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i spyan sngar 'thol zhing bshags par 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad kyis bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa
75b3(mdo sde): tshun chad de bzhin gshegs rnams dang / pha ma'i drin gle bar ma chud pa dang rnam par byang ba'i chos ma 'tshal te/ mi dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa dang / rang gi rigs
75b4(mdo sde): bsams te/ dregs shing rgyags pa'i tshe kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las nyam bag tu bgyis kyang nongs par ma mthong bas skye bo blon po'i las bgyis pa dang
75b5(mdo sde): sdig pa'i bshes gnyen la brten cing / nyon mongs pas sems 'khrug pa drang 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan la chog ma 'tshal te mi dge ba'i las rnams bgyis pa dang
75b6(mdo sde): 'gro ba bzang mos bslus te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pas gzir cing sems 'khrug te/ spros pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang /
75b7(mdo sde): yid gsum gyi sgo nas bsags pa'i las mi dge ba bdag rang gis bgyis pa dang / gzhan bgyid du stsal ba dang / bgyi pal rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad deng so sor 'chags so//
76a1(mdo sde): 'thol lo// mi 'chab po// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa'ang deng so sor 'chags so//
76a2(mdo sde): 'thol lo// mi 'chab bo// byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas la'ang bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa'ang deng so sor 'chags so// 'thol lo// mi 'chab bo//
76a3(mdo sde): ma rig pa'i dbang gis dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa dang / pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi droni glo bar ma nud pa'i slad du// bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa de
76a4(mdo sde): dag kyang deng so sor bshags so// 'thol lo// mi 'chab bo// blun zhing rmongs pas bsgribs te/ nyam rangs dang rgyags pas mi dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dag
76a5(mdo sde): kyang dang so sor 'chags so// 'thol lo// mi 'chab bo// slan chad kyang mi bgyid do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bdag cag gis yon phul zhing mchod pas ni//
76a6(mdo sde): ma lus pa'i sems can de dag kun sa bcu la 'khod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ de nas
76a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu dge mthong la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// legs so// skyes bu chen po rang gi las legs nyes kyi rtog pa la mkhas te/ kun nas nyon
76b1(mdo sde): mongs pa'i las la 'jigs pa dang skrag pa skyes nas/ nyes pa rnams mngon par 'thol ba'i srad du/ sems can gyi sdig pa mang po'ang khyod kyis 'thol zhing bshags pa'i phyir khyod na
76b2(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bgyi'o// rang gi nyon mongs pa'ang spong ba'i steng du/ sems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang ring du dpral bar byas pas/ de'i phyir khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag
76b3(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba yin te/ rang gi don du smos pa yin gyi thog mar sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar smon lam
76b4(mdo sde): btab pa'i phyir/ khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o// de nas rgyal bu dge mthong la sogs pa mi sum stong gis 'gyod tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das la tshogs
76b5(mdo sde): su bcad de 'di skad ces bstod do// bcom ldan nyag gcig gtso bo'i mchog/ khams gsum pha ma thams cad mkhyen// thams cad mi mnyam mnyam pa nyid// bcom ldan dkon la phyag
76b6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// skye bo sbyin gtong rang gi phyir// nor rdzas byin cing lan yang re// byams chen rgyal ba de min te// dgra gnyen byams sdang phan snyoms mdzad// rkang gnyis nang na rgyal ba
76b7(mdo sde): btsun// shes rab spyan gyis mkhyen gzigs la// brtson 'grus che bdag skyabs su mchi// lha rnams shes rab de ma 'tshal// 'das dang ma byon da ltar bzhugs// rgyal ba kun la bdag
77a1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal// de bzhin rgyal la skyabs gsol ba'ang // dus gsum rgyal ba mchod pa bzhin// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rgyal bu dge
77a2(mdo sde): mthong dang / mi sum stong la tshigs su bcad de bstod pa/ gang zhig sangs rgyas 'grub 'dod pa// mang du thos la 'brang bar byos// slob dpon dge la bkur byas na// sangs rgyas grub pa ya/
77a3(mdo sde): mi ring // gang zhig tshul khrims rnam dag spyod// de ni dge slong yang dag yin// gang zhig stong par sgom nus pa// de ni ting 'dzin thob ces bya// gang zhig brtson 'grus spyod nus pa// de ni
77a4(mdo sde): byang chub spyad pa'o// gang zhig mya ngan 'da' 'gyur ba// de ni dga' ba yang dag pa'o// tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang // rnam dag khrims 'dzin dge slong ma// zla ba phyed cing gso sbyong byos// /
77a5(mdo sde): chos gos rnam pa lus gyon te// lhung bzed gseg shang thogs nas su// rnam dag bsod snyoms 'gro byas na// lha rnams kun kyang dgar 'gyur bas// thal mo sbyar cing gus phyag 'tshal//
77a6(mdo sde): ngas kyang lha dang mi rnams kun// de yi bya ba byed du gzhug/ dper na lha bran thams cad kyis// lha yi dbang po brgya byin la// rim gro gus par byed pa bzhin// da ltar 'phrul du'ang lan thob ste/
77a7(mdo sde): phyi ma'i dus su'ang dpag tu med// rab tu byung zhing khrims 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// nga dang sems pa ma gtogs par/
77b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten pa yi mi kun gyis// rnam dag dad pa'i sems bskyed do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag kun/ mya ngan mi 'da' rtag tu bzhugs/ chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin na/
77b2(mdo sde): de ltar mngon par shes pa ni// sangs rgyas drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// 'jig rten pa yi mi dag kun// rnam par 'byed pa'i sems med cing // theg pa
77b3(mdo sde): gcig lam mngon par shes// 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa// phyogs bcu dang ni da lha'i rnams// sangs rgyas theg pa gcig pu la// gnyis sam gsum zhes bya med par/
77b4(mdo sde): de ltar yid la bskyed nas su// sems kyis rnam par mi rtog na// de lta bu yi mi rnams ni// rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// gang zag la la 'ga'
77b5(mdo sde): zhig gis// sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das phyin// rtag tu dad pa'i sems bskyed de// sems can kun la sangs rgyas kyi// bdag nyid yod par bshad pa ni// de lta bu yi gang zag rnams//
77b6(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// gang zhig skad cig dge spyod cing // lha yi 'bras bu mi re ste// cig car bla med lam bsgrubs na// rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mtho/
77b7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste// sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das phyi ni// gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig gis// yud tsam mdo sde 'di bklags te// dkon mchog gsum la gus byas shing // mkhan la sri zhu mchod
78a1(mdo sde): byas nas// de lta bu yi gang zag rnams// rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// gang zhig nor rdzas sna 'ga' 'am// kha zas dang ni gos kyi rnams// kun la khyab/
78a2(mdo sde): par sbyin byas na// rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// nga yi chos rnams 'jig pa na// gang zhig 'ga' la blo bstan nas// yud tsam mdo sde 'di mnyan na/
78a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'bum brgyal// mchod pa phul bas de lhag go// theg chen mdo sde 'di dag kyang // sangs rgyas byang chub kun gyi lum// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /
78a4(mdo sde): sde 'di la dran byas te// snyoms sems pan tshun gnyis med na// rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes b+ha// rgyal bu dag mthong 'di la ste// gang zhig chos 'di 'jig pa'i tshe// rgyal ba'i
78a5(mdo sde): drin lan bla na 'dod pas// skad cig yud tsam sgom byed pas// stong khams gang ba'i sems can gyi// srog gi sbyin pa byin pa pas// bsam gtan bsgom pa yon tan me// gang zhig bsgom
78a6(mdo sde): la skur ba dang // dgra 'dun 'khrugs par byed pa ni// stong khams gsum po gang ba yi// mi rnams kyi ni srog btsod dang // srog chags thams cad bsad dang 'dra// bsgom dang dge 'dun
78a7(mdo sde): grags spar na// de mi sdig kyang di bzhin no// gang zhig dge sbyong mthong ba la// skur pa 'debs shing ma dad pa// dkon mchogs sum kyi 'ogs gtsang pas// dem ni rgyal pa'i lan mi rjo na/
78b1(mdo sde): de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan par gnang ba/ dga' ba'i tshom nas bstan pa nyid spyi bos blangs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/
78b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la// gang mad lags shing gang mi med// mad dang mi mad gnyis ka yang // dngos por dmigs su yong ma mchis// yang dag mtshan nyid de lta bu// chos
78b3(mdo sde): rnams kun dang ma 'gal lo// sems can kun la byams slad du// thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'phags pa gang nas byon pa nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de nas byon/
78b4(mdo sde): yang dag mtshan nyid ji lta ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhin no// 'phags pa kun gyi bden tshig ltar// de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhin bshad// de yi slad du rgyal ba'i
78b5(mdo sde): mtshan// de bzhin gshegs zhes bgyi ba lags// bzod pa'i go cha btan pa'i sems// sra ba'i gzhu stobs brtson 'grus che// no ba'i mda' ni shes rab mgyogs// ye
78b6(mdo sde): lo'i dgra rnams 'joms mdzad cing // 'jig rten lha dang mi rnams kyi// mchod yon phul ba zhes pas na// de'i slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba lags//
78b7(mdo sde): rab tu sdug bsngal mtshan nyid mkhyen// sdug bsngal rgyu yang shin tu mkhyen// sdug bsngal zhi ba'i mtshan nyid dang // zhi ba'i tshul yang rab tu mkhyen// 'phags pa'i bden pazhi mi khye/
79a1(mdo sde): bas na// 'gyur ba ma mchis bden par nges// de bas phyogs bcu'i nang na yang / mtshan ni yang dag rdzogs zhes bgyis// rig pa gsum po mchog brnyes
79a2(mdo sde): pas// spyod lam rnam dag yang dag ldan// de slad mtshan ni bcom ldan 'das// mkhyen dang zhabs su ldan zhes bgyi// chos rnams thams cad kun mkhyen cing // dam pa'i
79a3(mdo sde): chos nyid rab ba rnyes pas// thams cad kun la byams slad du// dus skabs sbyar ba thabs kyis bshad// skye man 'chi rab bsal cing // de bas gnas su phyin par mdzad// de yi slad du rdu la
79a4(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan// bde bar gshegs zhes bgyi ba lags// 'jig rten gang nas mchis pa dang // 'jig rten bas pa'i mtha' yang mkhyen// de yi srad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// 'jig rten mkhyen ce
79a5(mdo sde): bgyi ba lags// thugs rje chen pos sems can bsgral// mtshan des dge ba bstan cing btul// de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur// tshul khrims ting 'dzin
79a6(mdo sde): shes rab can// thub cing bla ru 'da' ba med// de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// bla na med ces bgyi ba lags// nyon mongs mi mnga' shes rab ldan// rnam grol dam pa mchog bshad pas/
79a7(mdo sde): de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// lha dang mi yi ston ces bgyi// dus gsum g.yo'am mi g.yol// bas sam mabs chos kun kyang // byang chub shing drung kun mkhyen pas// de'i slad du
79b1(mdo sde): mtshan sangs rgyas// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams rdzu 'phrul chen po'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas su nam mkha' la 'phags te/ zhal so so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces bka'/
79b2(mdo sde): stsal to// kye rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong po khyed rnams kyi sdig gi rang bzhin ni nang na'ang mi gnas phyi rol na'ang mi gnas bar na'ang mi gnas so// sems brtan pa'i phyir
79b3(mdo sde): dge ba'i mthu yang brtan no// sems rnam par grol ba'i phyir/ sdig gi rang bzhin yang rnam par grol lo// shes rab stong pa nyid kyi phyir sdig gi rang bzhin kyang stong pa nyid do//
79b4(mdo sde): dad pa'i mthu che ba'i bsod nams kyi mthu yang che'o// de bzhin du mthol bshags te 'gyod tshangs nus pa ni nged rnams mthong ba'i steng du sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang sprul pa'i sku
79b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs pas rgyun dunga'ang mthong la/ de byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan bcos pa dang 'dra bar de bzhin du 'argyod
79b6(mdo sde): tshangs byas pa ni nga dang sprul pa'i sku rnams dang / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang la sogs pa thams cad kyang dgyes par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba
79b7(mdo sde): dang mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur te/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di'i rjes su byang chub tu chu de par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'a
80a1(mdo sde): zhabs 'bring ba rnams la bka' stsal pa sdig can rnams kyis sdig bshags par 'dod na rgyal bu dge mthong bzhin du dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang
80a2(mdo sde): mdo sde bcu gnyis dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la re re nas dmigs te phyag 'tshal ba nga dang phrad pa dang 'dra ba 'am mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed de/
80a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gcig gam sangs rgyas gnyis sam sangs rgyas bcu 'am sangs rgyas brgya 'am sangs rgyas stong ngam sangs rgyas khri'am sangs rgyas grangs
80a4(mdo sde): med pa'i 'du shes bskyed de/ mthong ba dang 'dra bar dmigs la de bzhin du re re nas kyang dmigs te/ sems kyis phyag 'tshal na de dag gis bsod nams dpag tu med pa'ang thob
80a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur lo/ 'khor ba'i sdig ljib thams cad kyang sel bar byed do// bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du ngan song gsum du lhung bar mi 'gyurasangs rgyas kyi chos la bde bar gnas par
80a6(mdo sde): 'gyur bar yang nges te/ the tsho mi med do// de'i phyir sdig pa rnams 'thol zhing bshags par byas la/ sems zag pa nas dad pa bskyed na/ gdon mi za bar sdig 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
80a7(mdo sde): de nas rgyal bu dag mthong dang mi sum stong gis cig car du sang bskyed de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad ri bstod pa 'di med ces gsom to// bcom ldan
80b1(mdo sde): byams shing thugs rje n+te/ shAkya'i gdung rigs chos kyi je/ tshogs kyi nang naseng ge'i smras/ khyab par sems can bsdus pa ni/ pal gzigs pa zla gcig bzhin// /
80b2(mdo sde): par 'byed pa yongs ma mchis// de lta bu yi bla med pa// mthong nas de slad gus phyag 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi gsum stong rnams la 'di
80b3(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed rnams 'di ltar 'gyod tshangs byas te/ mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis 'thol zhing bshags pas/ da ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// khyed
80b4(mdo sde): rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas su 'grub bo// rigs kyi bu yang 'di lta ste/ nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gang zhig sems theg pa nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
80b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams dang mdo sde bcu gnyis dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal bar nus pa ni dkon mchog gsum gyi drin gyi lan lon zhes bya ste/ dem
80b6(mdo sde): thag tu mi dge ba bcu dang mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur pa'i sdig 'byung bar gyur nas rgyun du zhugs par 'os pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no//
80b7(mdo sde): lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'os pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no// phyir mi 'ong bar 'os pa ni phyir mi 'o bo'i 'bras bu sbyin no// dgra bcom par 'os pa ni dab po
81a1(mdo sde): pa ngos pa ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no// sangs rgyas su 'os pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras du sbyin no// byang chub sems dpar 'os
81a2(mdo sde): pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu sbyin no// da ltar mdo sde 'di'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams skye ba gcig gis yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa'ang
81a3(mdo sde): phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gnyis kyis chos kyi dbyings thob pa'ang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la ye
81a4(mdo sde): no// byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes thob pa'ing dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// byang chub sems dpa' la las don/
81a5(mdo sde): dam pa'i 'dzin pa khong du chud ba'ang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// byang chub sems dpa' la la dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'ang
81a6(mdo sde): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// byang chub sems dpa' la las nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'ang /
81a7(mdo sde): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// byang chub sems dpa' la la phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa dang / chos sbyin gyi bzod pa dang / chos sbyin gyi dbyings dang ldan
81b1(mdo sde): pa'ang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// byang chub sems dpa' la la gzungs dran pa chen po'i sems dang rang gis rig pa'i ye shes dang
81b2(mdo sde): ldan pa'ang dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// byang chub sems dpa' yu la seng ge'i sgra'i ting nge 'dzin dang rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
81b3(mdo sde): ye shes lnga'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'ang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// byang chub sems dpa' la la mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge
81b4(mdo sde): 'dzin dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam dang ldan pa'ang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs
81b5(mdo sde): rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rje 'jam dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
81b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das sems can thams cad nor cing 'khrul pas sems 'khrugs te/ mi dge ba dang mtshams ma mchis pa bgyis pa rnams ji ltar bgyis na sdig 'byung bar 'gyur zhes gsol
81b7(mdo sde): pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa gong du bstan pa yin te/ gang la las phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / phyogs
82a1(mdo sde): bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang mdo sde bcu gnyis dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan thos nas dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba
82a2(mdo sde): bskyed la dad pa dang gus pa dpag tu med pas blangs sam 'chang ngam klog gam 'don tam/ yi ger bris sam kun chub par byas te/ dben
82a3(mdo sde): pa'i gnas khang pa gcig gi nang du dkyil 'khor byas la dri nus chag chag btab ste/ 'phan gdugs bzang pos brgyan cing pog spos nim po bsregs nas rgyal ba rnams spyan
82a4(mdo sde): drang zhing gshegs su gsol ba mang yang rung nyung yang rung spyan drangs nas bdag khrus dag par byas la gos gtsang ma gyon cing lan cig phyir rol che chung ngu 'thon/
82a5(mdo sde): khrus lan cig byas te seng ge'i khri btsugs nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du bsgoms la/ chos kyi mtshan nyid la bdag dang / gang zag dang / sems can la
82a6(mdo sde): sogs pa'i lta ba med par mngon par rtogs par byas te/ dang po pas bye brag phyed cing gsal bar brjod par bya'o// de nas dri spos zhim po bsregs la 'khrugs sems bsal cing
82a7(mdo sde): dran pa yang dag pa dang bsam pa yang dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa la sems rtse gcig tu bsam mo// de ltar spyod pa rnams 'thun zhing 'dum pa ni mchog ste/ de la mi
82b1(mdo sde): mthun zhing rtsod pa ni 'thol tshangs su mi 'gyur ro// khro ba des kun 'jigs par byed de spyod lam dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po dran zhing don dam pa bsams la nyin
82b2(mdo sde): mtshan bdun gyi bar du nyal zhing gnyid log tu mi rung ngo // nyin gcig kyang dus gsum du medo sde 'di kha ton tam klog pa nyin mtshan dus drug tu byas la dri bsung gis mchod cing phyag 'tshal
82b3(mdo sde): nas 'thol tshangs su byas te/ mido sde 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan brjod cing sems thag pa nas mi 'jug pa
82b4(mdo sde): dang sems thag pa nas mi nor ba dang / sems thag pa nas migayeng ba dang / sems zag pa nas dus kyis 'grus pa dang / sems thag pa nas nyin gcig pas nyin gcig 'grus pa
82b5(mdo sde): dang sems thag pa nas dad pa bskyed pa dang sems thag pa nas dga' ba skyed pa dang sems thag pa nas rim pa bskyed pa dang / sems thag pa nas rgyun mi gcad pa dang
82b6(mdo sde): sems thag pa nas gza' ba dang / sems thag pa nas mi 'bral ba dang / sems thag pa nas sdig pa mi bsam pa dang / sems thag pa nas sangs rgyas dran pa dang sems thag
82b7(mdo sde): pa nas chos dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas dge 'dun dran pa dang sems thag pa nas tshul khrims dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas gtong ba dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas
83a1(mdo sde): don dam pa'i lha dran pa ste/ de dag de bzhin du klog pa dang de bzhin du phyag bya ba dang / de bzhin du sems thag pa nas so sor 'chags shing 'thol pa
83a2(mdo sde): thog ma'i nyin par nas zhag drug tu lon pa'i nang par dri ru sa yang chag chag btab ste/ lus la'ang spos chu sa bkru bar bya'o// pog spos bzang po bsregs cing sems thag
83a3(mdo sde): pa nas mchod pa byas pa de dag de lta bur sems thag pa nas so sor 'thol zhing bshags pa phyogs bcur skul bar 'gyur te/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i
83a4(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed dang byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang 'grogs te/ sgra dbyangs kyi rjes su khang bu de'i nang du phyin cing mngon du 'grub pa'i dbang du bya'o//
83a5(mdo sde): de bzhin du nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du byas na gdon mi za bar sdig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar sdig 'byung bar shes she na/ seM sa'i skye bo rnams kyis do ni dam par dung ma grub pas/
83a6(mdo sde): rmi ltas kyi mtshan ma la brtags su byas te/ rmi lam rnams gcig rmis na/ mtshams med pa rnams gcig 'byung ngo // rmi lam rnam lnga rmis na mtshams med pa rnam lnga 'byang ste
83a7(mdo sde): des nub mi mi laman du krung chen po rgal bar 'dod / zam pa chen pa'i steng du 'gro bar rmis na de ni nges par rnam par grol ba thob pa yin no// gal te na'i mi laman gzhan
83b1(mdo sde): gyis bdag la khrus byas pa dang lus la mar bab par rmis na de nges par rnam par dag pa thob pa yin no// gal te de'i rmi lam na bdag dge 'dun mang po'i nang du zhugs te gral/
83b2(mdo sde): du 'dug par rmis na de ni nges par sangs rgyas kyi slob ma yang dag par gyur to// gal te de'i rmi lam na bdag mchod rten nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang
83b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i gzugs bar na mthong bar rmis na de ni chos kyi sgo mo dam par zhugs par gyur to// gal te rang gis shing thog rnyed cing za bar mis nA de ni tshe 'di nyid la yon
83b4(mdo sde): tan gyi 'bras bu 'grub par mngon no// yang bcom ldan 'das kyisa'ajam dpal la bka' stsal pa gal te dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/
83b5(mdo sde): dge sbyong ma 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' dad pa can gang la la dran pa nyams te/ nor cing 'khrul pas sdom pa'i tshul khrims re re nas zhig pa'am/ nyams pa de bzhin du so sor 'a
83b6(mdo sde): shing 'thol na/ sdig mi'i byang mi srid de/ sems thag pa nas ma byas pa ni ma gtogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gyis 'di skad ces zhus so// bcom
83b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das cho ga 'di ltar bgyi ba'i tshe/ mi mngan rung ngam mi rung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi gcig yan chad nyi shu man chad rung ngo // cho ga 'di ltar spyod pa'i tshe/
84a1(mdo sde): mdo sde gzhan mi bsam mo// de ltar 'thol tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu phyin chad nyes pa mi byed na/ de ni 'thol tshangs zhes bya'o// de ltar dran par gyis shig/ bdag
84a2(mdo sde): cag rnams da ltar 'chi ba las slar 'tsho ba dang 'dra bas da ni bdag tshul khrims srung ngo // da ni bdag brtson 'grus su spyod do// da ni bdag theg pa chen po'i mdo sde klog pa dang kha ton bgyi'o/
84a3(mdo sde): zhes de'i tshe de'i dus na dran pa de ltar gyis shig/ bdag deng nas sdom pa bzung ba ni rdo rje dang 'dra bar sran thub par smon to// des de ltar dran pa'i tsheskyes bu dam pa dri ma med par grags pa'ang byang
84a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang lhan cig tu de'i mdun du 'greng ste/ dbang du byed do// 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'ang 'gyod tshangs kyi mkhan po byed do// 'phags pa 'od srung
84a5(mdo sde): kyang zhu gnas kyi rten byed do// 'jam dpal 'dzi ni sdig sbyangs pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni gnas thob pa zhes
84a6(mdo sde): bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang la la zhig gis rtsa ba bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad
84a7(mdo sde): dang sdom pa phyed can dang / tshul khrims bcu dang / gsum la skyabs su song ba dang / khrims lnga dang / dge ba bcu dang / tshul khrims dang / 'dul ba re re nas zhig pa 'am
84b1(mdo sde): nyams pa 'am/ mtshams med pa lbu byas pa'am/ mnyam pa nyid la skur pa'i sdig byas pa zhig yod pa de log spyod ma gtogs par so sor ma bshags ma 'thol na/ mi de tshe 'bos/
84b2(mdo sde): ma thag tu gdon mi za bar mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis gsol po bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ mnar ma mchis pa'i dmyal
84b3(mdo sde): ba zhes bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du/ de ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis ltung ba dang / dmyal ba'i dbyibs che chung dang / rnam par smin pa'i sdug
84b4(mdo sde): bsngal bskal pa'i grangs ji tsam gyi bar du gnas par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal shin tu'ang mkhas so//
84b5(mdo sde): shin tu'ang mkhas so// don 'di lta bu'i 'dri ba'ang shin tu mkhas te/ legs par nyon la phal mang po rnams kyang legs par soms shig/ ngas bye brag phyed par bshad do// ji ltar/
84b6(mdo sde): na mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya zhe na/ skad cig kyang mnar zhing bstir med pa'i phyir/ mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o// gcig tu na 'gag pa 'am/ 'ong bar bya ba'ang
84b7(mdo sde): med/ 'gyur ba'ang med de/ tsha ba ni rab tu tsha/ sdug bsngal ba ni shin tu 'ang mi bzad pa/ skad cig kyang mi dal/ skad cig kyang mi sdod cing bar skabs med pa'i phyir/
85a1(mdo sde): mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o// yang rnam pa gcig tu na mchen po 'bar ba/ rab tu tshab/ kun tu 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar zhing mched pa
85a2(mdo sde): khong du zhugs pa'i phyir/ mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i dbyibs
85a3(mdo sde): ni gru bzhi lham pa/ dpag tshad brgyad khri yod de/ lcags kyi rab rim pa bdun gyis bskor cing / steng du'ang lcags kyi dra ba rim pa bdun gyis g.yogs te/ 'og tu bar chad bco brgyad
85a4(mdo sde): yod do// de'i kho ra khor yug tu ral gri'i tshal rim pa bdun gyis bskor to// lcags kyi dra ba rim pa bdun gyi nang logs su nags tshal ral gri'i lo ma can yod do// lcags kyi khang pa
85a5(mdo sde): bar chad bco brgyad po rtseg mar 'dug ste/ rim pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do// de'i grwa bzhir zangs kyi khyi chen po bzhi 'dug pa/ lus kyi bong tshad ni 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi bcu la/ mig ni
85a6(mdo sde): glog gi 'od bzhin/ mche ba ni ral gri sdong po dang 'dra/ so ni spu gri so gtams pa'i ri dang mtshungs lce ni lcags kyi mchil pa bzhin/ sder mo ni lcags kyi gsal shing dang mtshungs/
85a7(mdo sde): mjug ma ni lugs kyi sbrul dang 'dra/ spu'i bu gu re re nas 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched cing kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ste/ de'i dud pa mnam pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi
85b1(mdo sde): rdzas mnam pa gang dang yang bskrun du med do// dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhi la/ sgo re re na dmyal ba'i srungs ma bco brgyad 'dug go// mgo ni srin po'i mgo/ kha ni srin po'i kha dang 'dra ste
85b2(mdo sde): mgo la ra bco brgyad yod pa/ lag na lcags kyi gsal shing thogs so// rab rim pa bdun gyi nang logs su/ lcags kyi rgyal mtshan grangs med pa zhig yod de/ rgyal mtshan gyi mgor
85b3(mdo sde): me 'byung ba ni/ chu mig 'byung ba dang 'dra bar 'byung ngo // lcags 'ju ba'i khu ba 'bab pa ni/ kun tu khyab par 'bab ste/ dmyal ba'i sgo bzhir sgo re re'i sten/ zangs mome che tse
85b4(mdo sde): brgya de yod pa'i nang na/ lugs khol ba'i khu ba khar ldud cing / sgo bzhir 'bab pa/ dmyal ba'i nang du gang bar bab bo// khang pa bar chad re re'i nang du'ang lcags kyi sbrul chen po brgyad
85b5(mdo sde): dri bzhi stong yod pas/ khar gdug pa'i me skyug cing rab kun tu gang bar gtong ngo // sbrul gyi sgra sgrogs pa ni 'jug sgra chen po zer ba bzhin no// lcags kyi thu lum chen po'i tsher bab pa'ang mnas
85b6(mdo sde): med pa kun tu gang ngo // der sdug bsngal mi bzod pa ni 'bum phrag brgyad khri ste/ sdug bsngal gyi nang na sdug bsngal/ mi bzad pa'i nang na mi bzad pa/ kun kyang der 'dus pas dpe zla
85b7(mdo sde): med do// mnar med pa'i dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhir/ sgo re re'i phyi rol tu 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched cing 'bar ba/ lho byang shar nub bsnol zhir phyed par rgyu'o// 'bar ba'ang lcags kyi
86a1(mdo sde): dag kho ma / g+sa sa das sa kyu / sa smra sa
86a2(mdo sde): rab tu'abar bar gyur te/ sdug bsngal cig cam dzang na gong du smos pa bzhin no// bzhi nga / thom pa brtad 'jig pa dang / mtshams med pa rje dang / bam pa'i
86a3(mdo sde): kha'u pa 'debs pa rnams padi'i 'di las 'byung ba bzhin 'dol tshangasam byas la/ gnong kur ba'am/ khrel ba med na med ce 'bos mthag tu/ stobs mnan pa che'i dpas
86a4(mdo sde): g.yas pa brgya pa shing bskum pa tsam gyis man med pa'i dmyal par ltung bar 'gyur ro// sus byung de na du gang / ra bya'i gzing bas 'phongs nas gdangs mig bcums
86a5(mdo sde): mig gdangs kha be tsums kyang kha 'thabs pas sbam nus so// de TIg mang ba'i phyir ral gri 'khor la grangs med pa du ma zhig nam mkha' nas ma bzhin 'bab ste klad par pog cing klung
86a6(mdo sde): par byung ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni sngar gong du bshad pa bzhin brgya stong khri phrag tu bsgyur ba'o// gang la la rtsa ba bzhi po tshang bar zhig par gyur na/ sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong ba ni
86a7(mdo sde): bskal pa chen po lnga rdzogs kyi bar du'o// sdom pa brgyad 'jig pa ni de las gyur cig gis mang ngo // mtshams me dpa lnga yang gyur cig gis mang ngo // mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde la skur pa 'debs
86b1(mdo sde): pa'ang gyur cig gis mang ngo // dkon mchog gsum la smod pa dang / dge 'dun gyi ner brkus pa dang / dge slong dang dge slong mtshangs par spyod pa la/ drim can du spod pa dang / mkhan po
86b2(mdo sde): dang slob dpon la dbang za ba dang / ma la g.yem pa rnam pa gong ma dag las kyang gyur cig gis bskyed do// log spyod kyi rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gtan chad pas/ rnams kyang mnar med pa'i
86b3(mdo sde): dmyal ba nas mi thar pa ni der ma gtogs so// de la sogs pa'i sdig can rnams sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i tshe/ 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched pa khong du zhugs te rmugs nas 'chi'o//
86b4(mdo sde): de nas srin po dmyal ba'i srungs mas lcags kyi gsal shing sa la brdabs te/ so so sos zhes bos pa dang / bos pa'i sgra bzhin du yang sos yang sos nas/ nyin mtshan gcig la lan khri
86b5(mdo sde): ni'achi lan khri ni 'tsho ste/ sdug bsngal mi zad pa chen po nyams su myong ba ni gong du bstan pa bzhin no// nam zhig mnar med pa'i dmyal ba nas slar phyin nabang tshul khrims bshig pa
86b6(mdo sde): dang / yod bdag dad pa can gyi yon blangs pa'i las kyis/ yang dmyal ba chung ngu rnams kyi nang du 'jug ste/ de la dmyal bgrang sbrebs pa dang / dmyal ba mun nag pa dang / dmyal ba rab
86b7(mdo sde): tshab dang / dmyal ba spu gris bsnams pa dang / dmyal ba ral gri 'khor lo dang / dmyal ba me'i shing rta can dang / dmyal ba phyi sa'i 'dam dang / dmyal ba rgya chen dang / dmyal ba mi mur
87a1(mdo sde): bya/ klung dang dmyal ba nags tshal ral gri lo ma can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi shal ma li ka ba can dang
87a2(mdo sde): dmyal ba lcags kyi khri can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi 'khor lo can dang / dmyal ba ljags kyi thu lum dang / dmyal ba bsdus 'joms thug ri dang dmyal ba grangs khu lud dang / 'di
87a3(mdo sde): rnams so so re re'i nang du'ang lo khri phrag brgyad brgya'i bar du nyon mongs nas gdod thar tre/ 'on kyang rtag tu ma rabs su skyes la/ tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du dkon mchog gsum gyi sgra mi thos so//
87a4(mdo sde): brgya la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa na ni/ byang chub tu sems bskyed kyang srid/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma phrad na ni/ slar yang dmyal bar ltung ngo // nyes byas kyi sdig pa rnams
87a5(mdo sde): ma mthol ma bshags na/ dmyal bar sdug bsngal myong ba'ang rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha'i lo grangs lta bur/ lo khri phrag brgyad brgya'i bar du nyams su myongs par 'gyur ro// de la ltung ba
87a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi sdig pa ni de las nyis 'gyur du bskyed do// dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'ang de las rjes 'gyur du bskyed do// sdig can de dag gis sdug bsngal la nyams su myong ba'i tshe/ tshig gzhan mi phyin te
87a7(mdo sde): a pa pa a ta ta a la la/ a ba ba 'ba' zhig zer zhing 'dug go/ de bas na sdig can rnams rings par so sor 'thol zhing bshags la dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs su so/
87b1(mdo sde): bar gyis shig/ 'jam dpal yang 'di lta ste/ sdig pa myur du bsal cing byung bar 'dod na/ mdo sde 'di'i nang nas 'byung ba bzhin du so sor 'thol bshags te 'gyod tshangs byos shig
87b2(mdo sde): cho gnyin zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin gcig zag cig tu byas la yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas su grub pa'i tshe/ mi chen po'i mtshan dang /
87b3(mdo sde): mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i mtshan dang mi g.yo ba'i mtshan dang / rnam par grol ba'i mtshan dang / 'od zer can gyi mtshan dang / ye shes yongs su rgyas pa'i mtshan dang pha rol tu
87b4(mdo sde): phyin pa rnams dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i mtshan nams bsam par bya'o// yang gcig tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems
87b5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po byams pa'i yid dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ yid 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o// yid 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ slar dpa' bar 'gro
87b6(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ shes rab sgron ma las langs te/ chos rnams
87b7(mdo sde): kyi mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid las langs te/ mtshan ma 'od zer can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ mtshan ma 'od zer can las langs te/ seng ge'i
88a1(mdo sde): bya bya/ nga ro'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ seng ge'i nga ro las langs te/ seng ge sprug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ seng ge sprug pa las langs te/ rgya mtsho yid kyi tig
88a2(mdo sde): nge 'dzin la 'jug/ rgya mtsho yid las langs te/ kun tu ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ kun tu ye shes las langs te/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ gzungs kyi phyag
88a3(mdo sde): rgyu las langs te/ kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can las lang+ga te/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ chos kyi dbying
88a4(mdo sde): nyid las langs te/ seng ge'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ seng ge'i rgyal po las langs te/ chos kyi rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ chos kyi rgyal po las langs te/ bdud rnams
88a5(mdo sde): kyi mtshan ma 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ bdud rnams kyi mtshan ma 'gog pa las langs te/ stong pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ stong pa nyid kyi shes rab las langs te//
88a6(mdo sde): stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa'i ting nge'i dzin la 'jug/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa las langs te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ chen po stong pa nyid
88a7(mdo sde): kyi ye shes las langs te/ gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus kyi gzugs can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus gzugs can las langs te/ sems
88b1(mdo sde): kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ sems kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug
88b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ rdo rje gtsug tor gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ rdo rje gtsug tor las langs te/ rgya mtsho thams
88b3(mdo sde): cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ rgya mtsho thams cad las langs te/ gzungs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ gzungs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho las langs te/ sangs rgyas
88b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul rgya mtsho las langs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol
88b5(mdo sde): ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes la gzigs pa'i rgya mtsho las langs te/ gdod
88b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mtha' med/ mu med pa'i rgya mtsho'i sgor 'jug par bya'o// mtha' med mu med pa'i rgya mtsho'i sgo nas langs te/ yid 'gog pa dang / zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
88b7(mdo sde): 'jug/ yid 'gog pa dang zhi ba las langs te/ rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i rnam par grol ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o// 'jam dpal ngamya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ rigs kyi bu 'am/
89a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gang la las dad pa skad cig ma'i sems bskyed de/ mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri ba 'am/ klog pa'am/ kha ton du skad cig mar dran te/ bsam pa'i 'du/
89a2(mdo sde): shes dang / dran pa'i 'du shes dang / rtog pa'i 'du shes su dad pa'i sems grub na/ skad cig mar bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu'i gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi 'khor ba'i sdig phyir skyil
89a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// ma rig pa'i sgrib pa'ang gtan bral bar 'gyur ro// de bas na de zhin gshegs pa'i rtag tu 'tsho skyong zhing gzhes te/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar mngon no// de nas bcom
89a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor mang po rnams la tshogs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ yi dgas mthu chen thams cad dang // dud 'gro glang po ma rungs dang // bud med ga yeng dang ma rungs su/
89a5(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa'i marungs rnams// bsu dang ni ma skyes dgra/ sa sbyin dang ni sor mo'i 'bring // lus dang sems kyi sdig spyad pas// dmyal ba mnar med gung 'os kyang /
89a6(mdo sde): phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la// dad pa bskyed de phyag 'tshal phyir// thub pa mya ngan 'da' ba'i khar// bskal pa grangs med phyi ri bshol lo// mag d+hA li skye bo dag/ kun kyang byang chub
89a7(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa'ang // phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la// gus par phyag byas dbang gis so// ko'u di n+ya la sogs pa// nyan thos lnga brgya dag gis ni// ma 'ongs dus su 'tsha
89b1(mdo sde): rgya ba'ang // phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la// gus par phyag byas dbang gis so// mu stegs dang ni bram ze dang // sngags 'chang chen po drang srong bcu// dasar dgra bcom grub pa/
89b2(mdo sde): yang / 'das pa'i phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi// rgyal ba rnams la phyag byas yon// dam pa'i don la chud pa dang // phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i zhing rnams na// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
89b3(mdo sde): thams cad// tshe dpag med par skyes pa yang // phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la// gus par phyag byas dbang gis so// rgyal du dge mthong 'di lta ste// sngon nga rgyal po byed pa na// drang srong
89b4(mdo sde): chen po sprin zhes bya// de tshe sangs rgyas ma byung ste// bram ze lnga brgya rnams shig la// kha zas dang ni gos rnams dang // khang khyim dang ni mal cha'i drar// lo grangs nyi shu tsha bar du/
89b5(mdo sde): rab tu bying ba'i mchod pa phul// ngas ni de tshe sgo ba la// khyed rnams byang chub sems skyed cig/ bram ze lnga brgya de dag gis// mchod pa phul ba blangs kyis kyang // dkon mchog gsum la
89b6(mdo sde): ma dad pas// mod bzhin nga la slar sbas pas// 'jog rten nang na byang chub dang // rnam par grol ba med do zhes// de skad smras pa ngas thos nas// mnyam nyid mdo sde bsrungs
89b7(mdo sde): par phyir// bram ze lnga brgya'i srog bcad do// bram ze de dag tshe 'phos nas// dmyal ba mnar med lhung bar 'gyur// sems can dmyal bar lhung nas su// dran pa rnam gsum g.yos
90a1(mdo sde): nus pa/ dus gsum N+Dal la phyag byas so// mnyam pa nyid kyi yang rje pa byung chu dge 'du dud bsnyed pa/ nan rnam gsus byas pas mu yod
90a2(mdo sde): dmyal nas byung ste dong // 'jig rten zil pa meng du gyes// rkyen bskal pa chubacu thog/ de yang gus pa'i sems kyis su// phyogs bcu'i rgyu la b+hab d+ha stsa// b+ha bA me dag \u0f7f/
90a3(mdo sde): cad kyis// thog mar skur pas dmyal lhung yang // phyis ni dad pas mod la thar// byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams ni// khrel dang ldan pa smos ci dgos// sdig gi rang bzhin thog ma nas//
90a4(mdo sde): med pas sems can rnams kyi phyir// rtsa ba bzhi po'i sdom pa dang // mtshams med lnga po'i sdig rnams kyang // log spyod bar du 'thol bshags so// so so'i skye bo la la zhig/ de lta bu
90a5(mdo sde): yi sdig byas pa// de bzhin 'thol tshangs byed nus na// rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshams med lnga// log spyod par du sdig 'byung ste// sangs rgyas 'grub pa'ang gdon mi za// ma dad pa
90a6(mdo sde): ni der ma gtogs// gang zhig dad pa'i sems skyes te/ rgyal ba rnams la phyag byas na// chos lom mi 'grib mi srid do// de nas rgyal bu dag mthong dang // mi sum stong po'i mi
90a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshig 'thun par// 'di sa gsil te bdig cig rnams// sangs rgyas grub nas skye shi las// bai khor po'i rnam dag bskal bar rdzon// rgya mi nas
90b1(mdo sde): nabatsun bzhugs pa// bye brag byed par ba shad du gsol/ de la gzungs su bzung ba dang // yi ger zlos shing klog 'chang gA/ de'i bsod nams ji tsam mchis/ som ldan 'das kyis
90b2(mdo sde): bka' stsa la pa/ bye brag phyed par ngas bshad kyis// rgyal bu dge mthong legs par tshon// gang khrig rin chen sna bdun gyis// song khams gang ba'i sems can la// sbyin pa byas shing
90b3(mdo sde): yon phul nas// de yi steng du chos bshad kyis// dgra bcom 'bras bu thob byas pas// la la zhig gis rgyal ba'i mtshan// zos nas dad pa'i sems bskyed de// skad cig dus su phyag byas
90b4(mdo sde): na// de yi bsod nams bde ba'i 'da'// yi ger bris shing kloga' nang dang // dad pas phyag 'tshal smos ci dgos// de yi bsod nams dpag tu med// gang gis yi ger bri ba dang // chog
90b5(mdo sde): pa dang ni 'don pa dang // dus su phyag 'tshal sems bskyed na// mchod rten stong khams nub pa ru// brtsigs pa'i bsod nams pas ni me// de nas 'od srungs chen po dang // shA ri du dang
90b6(mdo sde): kun dga' bo// mcho de rten srung ba mthu bo che// tshangs lha rnams dang lha dbang po// 'kho lo sgyur dang rgyal chen gzhis// bcom ldan zhabs la 'gros btung ras// mda'athud par ni
90b7(mdo sde): 'dzin gsos// bcom ldar mya na 'angs spang nga// bdag cag dmas kyis selas can la/ khyab par spe la zhing bsan par gyis/ sum sems can tu de pa'i phyir/
91a1(mdo sde): / phyag 'tshal rnams la bsrung bar bgyi// gang zhig sdom pa zhig pa dang // mtshams med lnga yi sdig pa dang // mnyam pa nyid la skur ba'i rnams// sangs rgyas de
91a2(mdo sde): dag mtshan thos pas// rnam dag sa ru bde bar gnas// dper na rgyal bu dge mthong bzhin// da dung ma khongs phyi dus na// sangs rgyas rang bzhin mthong bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das #/
91a3(mdo sde): thub pas/ tshogs chen po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed rnams legs par nyon cig/ khyed rnams la sngon byung ba'i las kyi rgyu rkyen bshad par bya'o// nga sngon bskal pa
91a4(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa 'das pa'i sngon rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mdzes pa'i 'od ces bya ba las/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi
91a5(mdo sde): mtshan thos nas/ shin tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed de/ thal mo sbyar zhing spyi bor blangs so// blangs nas kyang sems can gang nas gang du gnas pa de dang der dpag tu med pa mtha' yas
91a6(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams la rgya cher spel zhing bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos par byas so// de'i tshe de'i dus na tshogs rnams kyi nang du mi sum stong ci che zhing nga'i chos kyi don
91a7(mdo sde): dang 'thun te/ dad pa'i sems dpag tu med pa skyes nas/ nga'i thad du sangs rgyas de rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod cing phyag byas pas/ da ltar phyogs bcur snang zhing mngon par sangs rgyas
