120b5(mdo sde): bdag gis 'di skad du brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ stam b+ha b+hu dza bir tu b+hu dza/ go bA/ bi re drA b+hu dza/ me ru b+hu dza/ ga du ba b+hu dza/ hung hrung / a ne ba b+huM dza/ sA ra b+hudza
120b6(mdo sde): sma ra a brta b+hu dzaHnim ba b+hu swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gang kha cig klu khro bo de dag gis rgyus gnod pa dag gis gnod pa bgyis par gyur pa de lta bu de dag gis bdag gi
120b7(mdo sde): ming nas brjod par bgyi zhing / klu khro bo nga rgyal can dregs pa/ brag dog dang 'dod chags kyi sems zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ gsang sngags 'den pa na/ bdag gis lha'i rna ba
121a1(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas thos nas/ skye gnas bzhi pa'i klu dang / klu chen po dang / klu rgan po dang / klu'i bu dang / klu'i 'khor rnams dad par ma
121a2(mdo sde): bgyis sam/ dus ma lags par don ched yang ba la zhugs pa dag ma bzlog gam/ de'i tshe dus ma lags pa'i char mo che dang / than chen dang / dus ma legs pa'i lhags pa dang
121a3(mdo sde): tsha ba dang / rlung dang sprin dang / 'khrug pa dag rab tu zhi bar ma bgyis sam bdag gis bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sems can de dag gi bsam pa dag yongs su rdzogs par
121a4(mdo sde): ma bgyis na/ bdag gis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bslus par gyur cig/ bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
121a5(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngon 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad 'khor tshogs pa dang bcas pa'i spyan sngar sems can yongs su smin
121a6(mdo sde): par bgyi ba'i slad du/ smon lam brtan por btab ste/ shin tu gnas par gyur lags so// de'i 'og tu'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag snyed 'tshe
121a7(mdo sde): shing ga zhes pa 'khor tshogs pa dang bcas pa'i spyan sngar smon lam brtan po 'di lta bu dag btab ste/ bdag gis der rtag par sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ pha rol gnon
121b1(mdo sde): pa'i brtson 'grus chen pos shin tu brtan par gnas par bgyi'o zhes brtson par bgyis lags so// da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar klu khro bo rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du
121b2(mdo sde): rtsol ba brtan par bgyis la bdag gis de lta bu'i rtsol ba brtan pos brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni/ bskal pa grangs ma mchis par skad cig tsam yang btang ma myong lags so// bdag
121b3(mdo sde): gis rtag par pha rol gnon pa'i rtsol ba dang / brtson pa brtan pos sems can yongs su smin par bgyis lags pa rnams kyang / yang yongs su smin par bgyi lags so// gzhan la
121b4(mdo sde): bdag gis klu'i dbang po dag theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la brtson par bgyis lags te/ klu glang po che rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po shin tu rab gnas 'di dang / klu sbrul rnams kyi bdag
121b5(mdo sde): bo klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo 'di gnyis dang / klurta rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa 'di dang / klun rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po chu lga dang / klu sngal pa
121b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po yid bzangs 'di lta ste/ klu de lta bu dag ni sems can rnams la gnod pa bgyid rngo thogs pa dag go/ klu'i rgyal po gzhan lta bu de dag kyang / rang rang gi mthus
121b7(mdo sde): sems can rnams la de lta bur gnod pa bgyid rngo thogs pa dag go// 'di ltar theg pa chen po la rab tu zhugs pa'i rgyal po chen po de dag thams cad kyis kyang / so so rang rang gi 'khor
122a1(mdo sde): dang dpung gi tshogs rnams dus ma lags par de lta bur yang ba bsgrubs pas rang rang gi 'khor rnams skyong bar bgyid lags so// 'di ltar 'dir bcom ldan
122a2(mdo sde): 'das kyi bstan pa chos sgron ma dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung myur du mi 'chad par bgyi po'i slad du 'khor der mchis pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ra'i snying
122a3(mdo sde): po klu'i drang srong la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsal to// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po shin tu rab gnas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas
122a4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la rten pa'i klu dang / klu'i bdag po gang dag sgong las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba dang / drod ka shir las skye ba dang /
122a5(mdo sde): rdzus te skye ba'i klu de dag gang na bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor can thos rnams dang / 'khar byang chub sems dpa' de dag la phan tshun thams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / yul 'khor der sha/
122a6(mdo sde): nam mchis pa'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur lags so// gnod sems ma mchis po dang // sems mnyam pas gnas par 'gyur lags so// gang dag yul 'khor de'i rgyal por
122a7(mdo sde): dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sems shin tu dad par 'gyur lags so// de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa'ang 'dzin par 'gyur lags so// dbang phyug gis rgyags
122b1(mdo sde): pa dang / dregs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig par mi 'gyur lags so// dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur lags sa/
122b2(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du rab tu byung nas/ skra dregs te gos ngur smrig bgos pa/ snod du gyur pa dang / snod du ma gyur pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi
122b3(mdo sde): bstan pa 'dzin pa bgyid lags so// gzhan yang yul 'khor de na/ gang dag mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa de'i tsher mar gyur pa de dag chos dang ldan pas skrod par bgyid lags so//
122b4(mdo sde): de nas yul 'khor der dge sbyong dang / bram ze bsod snyoms pa rnams la sngon gyi rgyal po dag gis sngon pa lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyin pas phul ba rnams rgyal rigs dge bas 'phrog par mi bgyid la
122b5(mdo sde): rgyal rigs dge ba blon po dang / mdun na 'don dang / skye bo dmag mi rnams dang bcas pas tshogs sbyor ba ni don ched la brtson pa lags so// snying po blangs pa lags so// lag brkyang
122b6(mdo sde): nas lkug par gtong ba lags te/ rgyal rigs dge ba de yul 'khor dang bcas par bsrung bar bgyi lags so// yongs su bskyang bar dgyi lags so// de'i yul phyogs na/ rtsod pa'i
122b7(mdo sde): rnyog pa thams cad dang / so so'i 'khor dag sngar ji skad bstan pa bzhin bskrad par bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos gos ngur smrig kha bsgyur ba 'di ni/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom
123a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyal mtshan lags so// mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba rnams kyi lam
123a2(mdo sde): lags so// rten mongs pa rnams kyi ral gri lags sa~M/ m+b+ha ngan las 'das pa bris pan legs sa// lam las rab tu nyams pa rnams kyi sman ma lags so// srang po rnams kyi
123a3(mdo sde): lags so// mi rig pa'i mun pa'i rlung lags so// ngan 'gro rnams kyi srog shing lags so// nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis nyams par gyur pa rnams kyi sgyug sman lags so// dgra
123a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi rdo rje lags so// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi gter lags so// sdig pas gos pa rnams kyi chab legs so// nongs par bgyis pa rnams kyi me long lags so// sems
123a5(mdo sde): g.yengs pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin lags so// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi za ma tog lags so// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi sa gzhi lags so// gzungs rnams kyi nor bu lags so//
123a6(mdo sde): bzod pa rnams kyi khyim lags so// sa rnams kyi snod lags so// pas kyi rgol ba rnams kyi mkhar lags so// nad pa rnams kyi sman pa lags so// bslab pa rnams kyi ri lags
123a7(mdo sde): so// nyon mongs pas kun nas gdungs pa rnams kyi zla ba lags so// lta ba ngan par ltung ba rnams kyi nyi ma lags so// ye shes kyi rgya mtsho lags so// byang chub kyi phyogs pa rnams
123b1(mdo sde): kyi 'phreng bar gyur pa lags so// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi dum pa bzang po lags so// chos gos ngur smrig 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ba lags so// tshod/
123b2(mdo sde): gos ngur smrig 'di ni sems can rnams la chos kyi char bab pa'i don gyi slad du/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gang
123b3(mdo sde): dag rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig par bgyid cing / dge slong dag la mtho 'tsham par bgyid pa nasabacom ldan 'das kyi srad du rab tu byung ba sdod
123b4(mdo sde): du gyur pa dang / snod du ma gyur pa'i lus la gnod pa bgyid pa dang / nor 'phrog pa dang / srog gi bar chad dag bgyid pa'i bar du'o// yul 'khor der gang dag sangs rgyas mi dad pa'i
123b5(mdo sde): lho dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas mthu be che de dag thams cad kyang rgyal rigs gdol pa lag shes par 'gyur te
123b6(mdo sde): de dag gis de'i yul 'khor du 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / lo nyes dang / nad dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dag 'byung bar bgyid lags so// dus ma lags pa'i cher mo che dang
123b7(mdo sde): than chen dang / lhags pa dang / tsha ba dang rlung dang / nyi mas gdungs pa dag gis sa bon dang myu gu dang / 'dab ma dang me tog dang / 'bras bu dang 'bru dang /
124a1(mdo sde): sman dang / ro rnams mi rung bar bgyid kyang / de na klu rnams la skyon ni ma mchis lags te/ de na klu rnams rgyu des na grags pa ma lags pas ni gos pa
124a2(mdo sde): 'gyur lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ yul gyi bud med bzang mos zas ngan pa 'tshal na/ dbugs dri mi bda' bar 'gyur lags so// de bzhin du rgyal
124a3(mdo sde): rigs gdol pas kyang rgyal rigs kyi chos rnams spangs nas/ dmangs rigs kyi chos rnams spyod par bgyid na yul phyogs thams cad srung ba'i lha nas/ yi dgas mthu bo che dag gi
124a4(mdo sde): bar du khros par 'gyur te/ de dag gi yul 'khor ma rung bar bgyid la/ klu dang / klu chen po rnams grags pa ma lags pas kyang gos par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
124a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po rgyal po rnams rgyal po'i sla pa'i gzhi gnas par bstan pa de dang de dag mtho ris dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la brtson pa yin no// gang dag
124a6(mdo sde): rgyal rigs gdol pa rgyal rigs kyi bslab pa la mi gnas pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa'i ba rol gzhol ba yin no// klu'i bdag po nga rang gi 'khor bslab pa las mi 'da'/
124a7(mdo sde): bar bstan pa des na/ de dag da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus su nga'i bstan pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung med par mi byed par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan
124b1(mdo sde): 'das de lta lags so// btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yul 'khor gang dang gang dag na/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdam
124b2(mdo sde): dang ljongs dang / ri brags kyi gnas yul 'khor de na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos tshul khrims dang ldan zhing thos pa mang po sbyin gnas de lta bu dag gnas shing mchis pa der
124b3(mdo sde): bdag gi 'khor gang dag klu dang / klu mo dang / klu rgan po dang / klu rgan mo dang / klu'i bu dang / klu'i bu mo dang / klu'i 'khor dang / klu'i 'khor mo rnams dang / dus ma
124b4(mdo sde): lags par rdzi mar dang / ser drag dang / char mo che dang / zan chen dag gtong bar bgyid dam/ lhag mo che dang / shin tu tsha ba dang / nyi mas gdungs pa dag 'byung bar bgyid
124b5(mdo sde): dam sems can rnams kyi lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman gyi ro dang / longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag chab 'tshal bar bgyid na/ klu
124b6(mdo sde): dag gis bdag cag bslus pas/ de'i lus thams cad 'khums par gyur cig/ de dag rdzu 'phrul dang bral nas 'gro mi nus par gyur cig/ rims nad kyis gdungs par gyur cig
124b7(mdo sde): longs spyod thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ spobs pa med par gyur cig/ don byed mi nus par gyur cig ces mnas bsgag par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ nA ga dz+nyA du she nA ga me ne/
125a1(mdo sde): nA ga d+ha ra gU g+hA/ dza la gU gA/ A bi mu rage/ sa ha sra mu khe ka la tim bu se nA ga stam b+hI/ dza ya ba pa le bi mu sha ga kr-i swA hA / thams cad dang
125a2(mdo sde): ldan pa'i 'khor gyis de nyid du legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nyid kyi tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams shugs drag por 'khrugs shing spangs par gyur to// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po
125a3(mdo sde): dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo gnyis stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
125a4(mdo sde): da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag gzhan la sbyin par ma dad cing bdag nyid longs spyod par 'tshal la 'jungs pa longs spyod la sems kun tu 'dzin cing lag mi
125a5(mdo sde): sbyong bas ka dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / 'phongs pa dang / 'gron po spong ba rnams kun nas tshim par mi bgyid lags so// pho zang 'a khor dang / ljongs kyi mi dang /
125a6(mdo sde): 'khor rnams yang dag pa'i bde bas nim par mi bgyid lags so// rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag pa yul phyogs srung ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin/
125a7(mdo sde): dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas mthu bo che de dag thams cad kyang khros par gyur te/ de dag gi yul 'khor ba thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ke dang nad dang pha rol gyi dmag
125b1(mdo sde): tshogs dag kun tu 'byung bar bgyid lags so// 'bru dang sman gyi bar gyi ro rnams ma rung bar bgyid kyang / de na klu dang / klu chen po rnams la skyon ni ma mchis lags te/ de na klu rnams
125b2(mdo sde): rgyu des na grags pa mi lags pas ni gos par 'gyur lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dper gyi ni/ phyis l+r-ing gi dri mi bda' ba ba sems 'tshal na// dri mi bdab par 'gyur/
125b3(mdo sde): de bzhin du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyal rigs gdol pa brnab mos kyang yul phyogs thams cad srung ba dag khros par 'gyur te/ yul 'khor de ma rung bar bgyid lags so// klu rnams
125b4(mdo sde): kyang grags pa ma lags pas gos par 'gyur lags so// / bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// // yang na klu thams cad bdag gis bslab pa
125b5(mdo sde): las mi bda' bar bdag gis lung dbrog par bgyi ste/ yul 'khor gang dang gang dag na grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brags kyi gnas yul 'khor de na
125b6(mdo sde): da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos tshul khrims dang ldan zhing / thos pa mang po sbyin gnas de lta bu dag gnas shing mchis pa der/ bdag gi 'khor gang dag klu
125b7(mdo sde): dang klu mo dang / klu rgan po dang / klu rgan mo dang / klu'i bu dang klu'i bu mo dang / klu'i 'khor dang / klu'i 'khor mo sgo nga las skye ba dang mngal nas skye ba dang / drod
126a1(mdo sde): gsher las skye ba dang / rdzus te skye ba dag dus ma lags par rdzi char dang / ser drag dang / char mo che dang than chen dag gtong bar bgyid dam/ lhags mo che/
126a2(mdo sde): dang / shin tu tsha ba dang / nyi mas gdungs pa dga' byung bar bgyid dam/ sems can rnams kyi lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro dang /
126a3(mdo sde): longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dga'achab 'tshal bar bgyid na klu de dag gis bdag bslus pas/ de'i lus thams cad 'khums par gyur cig/ de dag rdzu 'phrul dang bral
126a4(mdo sde): nas 'gro mi nus par gyur cig/ rims nad kyis gdungs par gyur cig/ longs spyod thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ spobs pa med par gyur cig/ don byed mi nus par gyur cig/
126a5(mdo sde): ces mnas bsgag par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ka ra Na gU me/ kun b+ha rak+She/ bar ma gu N+DaM/ A ka la kre/ be sha ne/ bi ram gakre/ na bi ri/ a ta sa le/ na yan tum b+he/ kA la ku
126a6(mdo sde): nang gu pra be/ gan d+ha ra pa se swA hA/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bgyi ba stsal lags so// de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa zhes bya ba nas/ sngar ji skad
126a7(mdo sde): gsungs pa'i bar du'o// tad+ya thA/ nA ma b+hi she/ A no kre/ na ba kun dzA b+hi kle/ kha ga be'i kha/ sa ra tron Tu/ pA pA ya si le/ na rA ya na gu Ne/ bi na ste le/ da sha kra mai/ a kU
126b1(mdo sde): d+hA te se/ a na sa be swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po chu lha zhes bya ba nas/ sngar ji skad gsungs pa'i bar du'o// tad+ya thA/ hi ma be me/ ba li kri Na gu Ne/ ru Na bin du tri naM ka tsa rak+Sha d+ha re/ me gAsang
126b2(mdo sde): kri med/ prA pu Tu ke she/ dru med/ mA ye tur ku se/ tsa ra ma hi ke/ tsa lang g+ha/ nA nA dad te/ ka Tu tU le swA hA/ sngar ji skad gsungs pa'i bar du'o// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po lid bzangs snyan
126b3(mdo sde): las yangs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la rten pa'i klu dang / klu chen po de dag ni rgong
126b4(mdo sde): las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba dang / drod gsher las skye ba dang / rdzus te skye ba dag lags so// btsun bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus su rgyal rigs gdol pa de
126b5(mdo sde): dag gi sa rgyal rigs kyi chos spangs nas/ dmangs rigs kyi chos rnams smon par bgyid de/ sems can dmyal ba mnar ma mchis pa'i bar dag la gzhol ba lags so// rgyal rigs gdo /
126b6(mdo sde): pa de dag gi skyon gyis klu rnams ma nongs bzhin du grags pa ma lags pas gos par 'gyur lags so// rgyu des na klu rnams las kyi sgrib pa dag par bgyid par 'gyur lags so// de lta lags
126b7(mdo sde): pas bdag cag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la bkur sti bgyi zhing gzung bar bgyi ste/ dper bgyi na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des yul gyi bud med bzang mo khrus legs par bgyis te/
127a1(mdo sde): spos kyis byugs nas/ gos mchog tu bzang ba bskon te/ yan lag gi dam pa mgo la rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i 'breng ba mang po dag btags shing dpung
127a2(mdo sde): rgyan dang / ser spyad dang / sorag tu ba dang / lag rgyan dang / rkang rkyen dag gis brtan nas/ glang po 'i bzhon pa la zhanaH/ 'khor pas min dang rgyan pag zin pa de bzhin du// das pa
127a3(mdo sde): sbyar ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag cag klu rnams dud 'gro'i skye gnas su bsdus pa'i lus ma snad ma nyams la/ mchog tu khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang
127a4(mdo sde): dregs pa'i dri mas bsgos pa bdag cag klu thams cad rgyags pas myos pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi chus bkrus lags so// bdag cag la ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i gos bskon/
127a5(mdo sde): lags so// byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi 'breng bas bcings lags so// bdag cag gi sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dag bzod pa dang ka gzungs dang / sa nam/
127a6(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan lags so// theg pa chen po'i shing rta dag gis bteg lags so// gang na sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang bral ba shin tu yongs su dag par sangs
127a7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs yongs su dag pas bskor nas/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyi gtam dag pa dag ston pa der bdag cag mchi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
127b1(mdo sde): da ltar bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la bkur stibagyid cing 'dzin par bgyid lags so// de lta lags pas bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la shin tu gnas pa/
127b2(mdo sde): bgyid lags so// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri zags kyi gnas gang dang gang na/ sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / theg pa
127b3(mdo sde): chen po padag khyim na gnas pa'am/ rab tu 'byung ba 'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am/ tshul khrims 'chal pa ba ma/ thos pa mang ba 'am/ thos pa nyung ba 'am/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa'am/
127b4(mdo sde): le lo can nam/ mnyam par gzhag pa'am/ mnyam par ma gzhag pa'am/ dran pa dang ldan pa dang / dran pa nyams pa rnams bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang
127b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims dag la dgag zhing / dad pa dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar bgyid pa dang / ri mo bgyid pa dang / byang chub rnams gsum gang yang rung ba dag la rab tu zhugs
127b6(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos sbyin gnas de lta bu dag gnas shing mchis pa de dang der bdag cag yid kyis dga' zhing dad pa dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar bgyi ba dang / ri mo dag gis
127b7(mdo sde): gnas par bgyi lags so// yul 'khor de dang / de'i grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brag der bdag gi 'khor klu dang / klu mo dang / klu rgan po
128a1(mdo sde): dang / klu rgan mo dang / klu'i bu dang / klu'i bu mo dang / klu'i 'khor dang / klu'i 'khor mo dag dus ma lags par rdzi char dang / ser drag dang / char mo
128a2(mdo sde): dang zan chen dgra gtong bar bgyid dam/ lpags mchi dang / shin tu tsha bdag 'byung bar bgyid dam/ sems can rnams la me tog dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang /
128a3(mdo sde): 'bru dang / sman gyi ro dang / longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag chab 'tshal bar bgyid na/ klu de dag gis bdag bslus pas// de dag thams cad kyi lus 'khums par gyur cig/ de dag
128a4(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul nyams nas 'gro mi nus par gyur cig/ rims nad kyis kun tu gdungs par gyur cig/ dbang po thams cad tshang bar ma gyur cig/ longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa thams cad dang
128a5(mdo sde): bral bar gyur cig/ las byed mi nus par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ bud d+hi dza ye/ bA lA kle/ a ma ni me b+hu ta sa li le/ a na mad d+he/ prad t+ya ni le/ a ba ni la me/ kha~M la sho me/ na su pi dA
128a6(mdo sde): dzaM si dza~M \u0f7f/ sman d+ha pA le/ b+ha Na na/ kre ye swA hA/ der thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams bzhin dang / mig yid du 'ongs pas shin tu dgod cing thal mo sbyar nas/ le
128a7(mdo sde): so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad du/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa yin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar bya ba ni legs so legs so zhes smras nas
128b1(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i klu'i 'khor de dag shugs drag pos 'khrugs shing sngangs la kun tu 'gul zhing mngon par mi dga' ba dang / kun tu 'khor bar 'gyur to// de'i tshe dri za'i drang srongs dga' ba/
128b2(mdo sde): 'byung ba zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas ka 'di skad ces gsol to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa bdag la dpo
128b3(mdo sde): sregasol/ de ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su gang dag rgyal rigs gdol pa thun po mkhas so snyam pa'i nga rgyal can/ ngargyal dang rgyags pas nyams pa/ 'jig rten pa rol la mis payo
128b4(mdo sde): rgyu can/ snying rje ma mchis pa / dge slong la mtho 'tsham par bgyid pa nas/ tha na bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du skyabs su mchis nas nye bar gnas pa skra bregs te gos ngur smrig dgos pa la
128b5(mdo sde): midze 'tsham pa dag 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du rab tu byung ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung babar bar bgyid pa dag la mtho 'tsham pa'i
128b6(mdo sde): rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis mnas bsgag par bgyi ba na/ longs spyod kyis 'khrugs par gyur cig/ rgyal phran gyis 'khrugs par gyur cig/ rgyal pos 'khrugs
128b7(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ nang dmag dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dag gis 'khrugs par gyur cig/ chu mid pas 'khrugs par gyur cig/ nad kyis 'khrugs par 'gyur cig/ gzas
129a1(mdo sde): 'khrugs par gyur cig/ bya ma rtas 'khrugs par gyur cig rtse dgas 'khrugs par gyur cig ba tshan gyis 'khrugs par gyur cig/ 'khor gyis 'khrugs par
129a2(mdo sde): gyur cig/ 'byung ba chen pos 'khrugs par gyur cig/ yi dwags mthu bo ches 'khrugs par gyur cig ces brtse ba nas ka/ rgyal rigs gzugs par gyur cig/ bram ze dang / dmangs rigs
129a3(mdo sde): dang / bud med dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / spyang ki dag gis 'khrugs par gyur cig ces bgyi ba'i bar du rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag menas bsgrag par bgyi lags so// tad+ya thA/ ba nel
129a4(mdo sde): ban pa le/ ma hA brtan traM/ dru ma tsa te/ ku su ma/ ba ra Te/ yug te/ sam b+hI kleb+hI ma dri bA kre/ sa la~M ba nA ya/ pa ri bA re/ b+h+yA ma dru / kra me/ ne'i ran tan/ dza si la/ men tre'i/
129a5(mdo sde): po'i mab ta/ ma grAShAdze/ na ye na/ ti gu ye/ bi bad tsha/ shrI sa/ d+han mu tse/ sang ga bye kle/ pa la min d+ha da ye/ b+hu mi paSh+Ti/ ro ma ye/ ba na ga dze/ d+hu rba pa rbe/ ab ken+da/
129a6(mdo sde): na ya rbiSh+T+rI/ dzi hwA krane/ At+ta ru Te/ gan naraH/ si mi swAt+ma/ gang dag rgyal rigs gdol nga 'jig rten pha rol la mi lta zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi can thos rnams la mtho 'tsham pa
129a7(mdo sde): dag de lngar gyur cig/ de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i dri ba'i 'khor rnams kyis 'di naskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mtho' tsham par bgyid pa'i rgyal rigs gdol la
129b1(mdo sde): de dag la/ bdag cag ci dgar bgyid du sbrul du gsol/ bdag cag rang rang gi gnas na rtsed mol chags shing yongs su spyod par bgyid dam/ dga' sbyid rnams su myong bar bgyid na/ bdag/
129b2(mdo sde): cag kyang mna'i khongs su gtogs par gyur cig/ de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba sbyin no// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
129b3(mdo sde): chen po sa'i snying po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam
129b4(mdo sde): par rtse ba mngon par shes pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi srog shing zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi ske chen po bshad par bgyi ste/ rgyal mtshan gyi srog shing zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po'i sgo gang gi rna lam du grags pa
129b5(mdo sde): de'i rna ba'i nad dag rab tu zhi bar bgyid do// de'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid do// gal te na pa srabs par 'gyur ro//
129b6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i shun pa man dza na lagasang sngags kyi tshig 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na gargyal rigs rda la bskus nas/ rnga de'i sgra gang dang gang gi rnga rna lam du grags pa de deng de'i 'dod chags
129b7(mdo sde): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams srabs par 'gyur ro// de dang de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la shin tu dga' zhing dkur sti dang / bla mar byed pa
130a1(mdo sde): dang / ri mor byed pa dag rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// chos kyi rjes su 'brang bas 'jug par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pha rol lnga ba dang / longs spyod dang / yongs su
130a2(mdo sde): spyod pa dang mi bral la/ sems can thams cad kyi mig tu 'ong ba dang / sbring du sdug par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ pUrba mag+na/ A ma lo ma ti/ kr-id ti ya/ b+hu bai/ pa na khan Do'i dur ma khi le'i/
130a3(mdo sde): mod sa tU le'i/ go'u ra san d+he'i na klu bar me'i/ bud+d+ha rash+mi'i ping ga ye'i gI me/ la hi ta ra bai/ nang ga sur+ye/ b+ha ga ba ri Ne/ a na d+ha ra pa u re/ ka ra d+hu dzaM/ ke sha lo hi/ sa ma d+hi sh+tsa
130a4(mdo sde): d+ha swA hA/ de nas de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs kyi so zhes bya ba gnang ngo // thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa
130a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung dbyangs dang sgra rjod par bgyid pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan
130a6(mdo sde): gyi smon lam gyi tshul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po de bshad par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bdag la rjes su yi rang bar mdzad du
130a7(mdo sde): gsol/ de na mthu che zhing stobs che la pha rol gnon pa snang bar bgyid pa chen po lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyi thos pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gter dang
130b1(mdo sde): ye shes yongs su rdzogs bumed pa'i gter du 'gyur ba lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du/ ji srid batsho'i bar du sdom pas gnas pa 'dun te/
130b2(mdo sde): dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang / dge sbyong gi sdom pa dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa snod du gyur pa dang / snod du ma gyur pa dag gi gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul
130b3(mdo sde): zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po 'di lhag mthong gi sbyor bas nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du klog na/ phyir zhing nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la rtogs par 'gyur ro// ljin mtshan bdun 'das
130b4(mdo sde): nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po lan 'bum snyed du yang dang yang dran par bgyid pa de ni/ rgyal rigs rnams dang / bram ze'i rigs rnams dang /
130b5(mdo sde): rje'u rigs rnams dang / dmangs rigs rnams dad par bgyid pa nas/ sems can thams cad kyi bar du shin tu mngon par dad par bgyid pa lags so// thams cad longs spyod pa dang
130b6(mdo sde): yongs su spyod pa rgya chen po mchog dang mi bral zhing / mtho ris la gzhol bar 'gyur pa lags so// de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur/
130b7(mdo sde): lags so// tad+ya thA/ tri Na sang nyi ke/ bai tri Na bi ma be/ ka ra prAkle/ b+hu ta sU me tsa pa ra dzi me/ a \u0f7fkle/ a kra ya lo be/ ad+ha dam/ ni mi re/ shrI ta bistAr
131a1(mdo sde): ang gu dzaHdate/ dza dza ra no so'i a nas shud d+he/ mr-ig g+h+r-i kre/ ku la ba te/ ma ga bA bA/ kre zo'u ba sA re/ a b+hI ti ma thu re/ swa ra khA dze/ s+t+r-i ti mon
131a2(mdo sde): sUhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul
131a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di bshad pas/ sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi thos pa'i mog kun tu ston par byed la/ nga'i bstan pa'ang ston par byed pa ni legs so legs so//
131a4(mdo sde): de nas de nyid du thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te 'di skad du/ skyes bu dam pa khyod
131a5(mdo sde): kyis gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di rdzogs par bshad pas da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems
131a6(mdo sde): can de dag thams cad kyi thos pa mang po'i tshigs rgyas par byed pa dang / rton pa ni skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan/
131a7(mdo sde): 'dis ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gling bzhi pa 'di'i me tog dang / 'bras bu dang shing dang
131b1(mdo sde): babru dang / sman dang / me tog dag bsrung bar 'tshal lo// sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dang / rtswa dang / bdab ma dang / loms marten pa rnams bsrung
131b2(mdo sde): bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das nang gu dpal rdul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po de da ltar 'dir gling bzhi pa de dag gis sngon ma thos ma mthong bas 'di ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar gyur te/
131b3(mdo sde): 'dus pa chen po de lta bu dag byung bar bgyis lags so// nang gu dpal rdul zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di ni mthu che bas lo tog thams cad 'phel bar bgyid pa lags so// sa bon dang
131b4(mdo sde): myu gu dang / sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / shing dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro rnams skyed par bgyid pa dang / 'phel bar bgyid pa dang / snum mchis
131b5(mdo sde): par bgyid pa dang / 'jam par bgyid pa dang / mang por bgyid pa lags so// sems can thams cad dad par bgyid pa dang / tshul khrims can du bgyid pa dang / thos par bgyid pa dang
131b6(mdo sde): par bgyid pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje can du bgyid pa dang / thabs dang ldan par bgyid pa nas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du ston par bgyid pa lags so// ta
131b7(mdo sde): thA a na n+ya b+hu mi gA bA kra b+h+r-i dze/ gu lo tsa lo mephaT kra lo me shri yA kra/ ku su me ka na ba ku mun De/ rA dza bar metsA rban pa ba ma Te/ bi Shu lang ge/ a ba b+ha su ne/
132a1(mdo sde): hA sa ga b+hA kle/ lo ma b+hu dza kle/ gam b+ha rab su me a no ma ya sa no ma ya/ sa re ka pA ma sha to la swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nang gu dpal
132a2(mdo sde): rdul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te sgreng bar bgyid dam/ skad chen por klog gam/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di tshu la lan stong gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis
132a3(mdo sde): nasazhing dang / shing dang / lo tog sna tshogs la gtor tam/ rnga dang / rdza rnga dang / dung dag la bsngags nas/ de dag gi sgra gang du thos pa'i lo ma dang / me tog dang / bzas
132a4(mdo sde): bu dang / 'bru dang / sman gyi ro dang / sa la rten pa'i lo tog thams cad sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyu las ma gtogs par/ lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin
132a5(mdo sde): dang / yi dgas mthu bo che dang / bdud dang / bdud kyi bu dang / bdud kyi 'khor gyi tshogs gang gis kyang gnod par bgyi ba 'am/ chud gsan pa 'am/ tshig par bgyi ba 'am/ bskul
132a6(mdo sde): pa'am/ mdangs 'brog pa'am/ mthu chung bar bgyi ba 'am/ ma mchis par bgyi badrug tu rngo ma thogs na/ sems can dang / sems can gyi grangs su gtogs pa gzhan dag gis
132a7(mdo sde): lha smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan pa des kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod gling bzhi pa 'dir sbyin pa chen po'i dpal gyi shing
132b1(mdo sde): rtal zhon nas/ rigs kyi bu 'dir bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam du sems can dpag tu med pa rnams rton par byed pa ni/ rigs kyi bu khyod legs so legs so// de nas de nyid du byang chub
132b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad kyis kyang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bya ba ni legs so legs so// de'i tshe byang chub
132b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so// byams pa khyod la bdag gis dpal me tog gsar
132b4(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po sbyin gyis/ gzungs chen po des ni rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byams pa chen po'i go bgos nas/ 'dir sems can rnams la tshig gis chos ston na/ ting nge 'dzin
132b5(mdo sde): gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i chos de dag sems can gang dag gis thos pa'i sdig pa'i sems dang / sdig pa'i lta ba dag spong bar byed do// sdig pa'i grogs po dang
132b6(mdo sde): sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dag spong bar byed do// sems kyis byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yid la byed par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang
132b7(mdo sde): sems 'jig rten pha rol la lta ba can du 'gyur ro// sems mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag las ldog par 'gyur ro// sems dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la rnam par gnas par 'gyu
133a1(mdo sde): ro// sems can thams cad la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// gzungs chen po 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i/
133a2(mdo sde): phyir/ chos kyi char babebs par byed pa'o// dgra bcom pa thams cad rab tu dad par byed cing / bshes gtan thams cad mngon par baphel par byed pa'o// tat+ya thA/ lib ta sa re/ kag+sa
133a3(mdo sde): par me/ sa me bag k+She/ dwA rang ga dza le/ su to k+She/ su ma hA s+yA kle re/ su ha dung kau/ go'u a ba lo ka da le/ sid+d+hi b+hI ba kle/ d+hA na na pI ba re/ a ba nid+ha lung bi/ so tsa ra tsa la/ a ba d+has
133a4(mdo sde): re ba rA ha/ shad tre e ka hA da to le/ sa mA d+hi ka ra Ne/ bA dza bi ti/ ma hA dA pU ta ku se/ a ra Na ni le/ mA lA ma sha me ni la kuM su me swA hA/ dpal me tog ga sar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
133a5(mdo sde): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis byams pa chen po'i go bgos nas sems can rnams la chos ston na// de'i sgra tha na sems can srog chags su gyur pa phra mo chu
133a6(mdo sde): du gang dag gi rna lam du grag pa de dag gi sems kyi rnyog pa nye bar zhi bar byed pa dang / de dag gi sems dge ba'i rtsa ba la gnas par 'gyur na/ mir gyur pa rnams la lta ci smos kyang ci dgos
133a7(mdo sde): sems can la la dag gis char dbab pa'i phyir/ dri za dang klu'i gnas dag tu gzungs chen po pa'i bzlas brjod byas te/ nas shim gyi phye ma dang / e ran da'i mang du bsres pa la des lan
133b1(mdo sde): song dung sngags nas/ gos kyi mtha' mar bur ma byas te khron par bcug na/ des na de la klu rnams dga' bar 'gyur te/ char gyi rgyun chen po'ang 'bebs par byed do// de'i tshe yul der
133b2(mdo sde): 'dus pa'i klu dang / klu chen po rnams kyis dpal me tog gsar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di thos nas/ sems rangs pa dang / sdang sems med pa dang / sems rab tu dga' ba
133b3(mdo sde): dang / sems byams pa dang ldan pa dang / sems 'jig rten pha rol la lta bar gnas par gyur to// sems dkon mchog gsum la dad cing / bkur sti dang / bla mar byed pa dang /
133b4(mdo sde): ri mor byed pa dag thob par gyur to// sems dud 'gror skye ba'i rang gi sdig pa'i las dag rab tu 'chags pa dang / sems theg pa chen po bla na med pa la 'jug par gnas par gyur to// klu dang
133b5(mdo sde): klu chen po de dag thams cad kyi nang nas mthu ci yod pa dang / ci nus pa dag gis/ de na bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ kha cig ni gser mang po'i char mngon par 'bebs so//
133b6(mdo sde): kha cig ni dngul dang / a ka ru dang / rgya spos dang / gor shir she dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i char dag mngon par 'bebs pa nas kha cig ni ut+pa la
133b7(mdo sde): dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs dang / gser skud dang / mu tig gi do shal gyi bar dag gi char
134a1(mdo sde): mngon par 'bebs so// de nas klu dang / klu chen po de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ tshig 'thun par 'di
134a2(mdo sde): ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar bdag cag ni dkon mchog gsum la sems shin tu legs par rab tu zhugs pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/
134a3(mdo sde): bdag cag 'di rnams kyis dam bca' bar bgyi ba ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs gang dang gang dag na/ dpal me tog gsar pa zhes bgyi
134a4(mdo sde): ba'i gzungs chen po 'di rab tu sgrogs pa dang / de bzhin du gzungs lhag ma chu khyim snying po zhes bgyi ba dang / mtshon cha'i stobs zhes bgyi ba dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi
134a5(mdo sde): tshul zhes bgyi ba dang / nang gu dpal rdul zhes bgyi ba dang / dpal me tog gsar pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis bshad pa'i gzungs de dag dang
134a6(mdo sde): klu'i snying po bzhi po dag/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brags kyi gnas gang dang gang dag tu re re tsam yang ston tam/ 'chad dam/ rab tu sgrogs pas
134a7(mdo sde): dran par bgyid pa de dang de dag tu bdag cag gis dus dus su char dbab pa dang / gdugs dang bser ma dag gtang bar bgyi/ dus ma lags par ni ma lags so// de dang der bdag cag
134b1(mdo sde): gis phyi dgra dang / nang 'khrug dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / gnod sems dang / nad dang / mi ngas dang / mu ge dag rab tu zhi bar bgyi lags so// de dang der bdag cag gis
134b2(mdo sde): skyid pa dang / lo legs pa dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba dag bsgrub par bgyi lags so// de dang der sems can rnams kyi sa bon dang / myu gu dang / sdong bu dang / 'dab ma
134b3(mdo sde): dang me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / shing dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro dag mi nyams par 'phel bar bgyi lags so// longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa ngal che zhing
134b4(mdo sde): dri zhim pa dang / ro zhim pa dang / sdum pa dang / 'jam pa dag tu bsgrub par bgyi lags so// bdag cag gis 'dzam bu gling 'di'i rgyal po rnams kyang gcig le gcig byams pa'i
134b5(mdo sde): sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / kho na ma mchis pa'i sems dang / rtsod pa ma mchis pa'i sems su bsgrub par bgyi lags so// de bzhin du bram ze'i rigs dang / rde'u/
134b6(mdo sde): rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / gnod sbyin rnams nas/ dge bsnyen dag gi bar dag tu byams pa'i sems dang ldan par bsgrub par bgyi lags so// gang na gzungs chen po
134b7(mdo sde): 'di rab tu sgrogs pa der ni phan tshun sems 'thun par bsgrub par bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu de dag thams cad la legs so legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo //
135a1(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de na byang chub sems dpa' ri'i snying pos kyang legs so zhes/
135a2(mdo sde): bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dpal lha mo chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dpal chog shes khyod la snying brtse ba'i grogs 'di dag yod na/ 'dir samra
135a3(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ da dung du ci'i phyir gdul ba'i tshogs rnams gzhug par mi nus/ dpal lha mo chen mos gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni//
135a4(mdo sde): smon lam gyi khyad par gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i tha chad du de lta bur skye ba len cing / grogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'thun pa de lta bu dag dang phrad pa thob lags so// da
135a5(mdo sde): ltar bdag kyang grogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'thun pa khyod lta bu dang phrad pa lags so// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang de'i lag tu thob ste/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug/
135a6(mdo sde): kyang brjod par bgyi lags so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin
135a7(mdo sde): tu gnas par blta bar bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpal cho ga shes khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de ltar yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
135b1(mdo sde): chen po de ni/ smon lam gyi khyad par gyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa thams cad du de lta bur skye ba ldan pa bsdu ba'i dngos po
135b2(mdo sde): bani po dag la brtson zhing / der brtson pa brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no// grogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen de lta bus yongs su zin po yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
135b3(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes de'i lag tu thob pa yin te/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par yang brjed par bya'o// des rnam par gnon pa'ang brjod par bya'o// mngal gyi skyon las thar par yang
135b4(mdo sde): brjod par bya'o// mi slob pa'i sa la gnas pas zag pa zad par yang brjod par bya'o// de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis dgongs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs par yang
135b5(mdo sde): brjod par bya'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la shin tu gnas par yang brjod par bya'o// de nas brgya byin gzi brjid dri ma med pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
135b6(mdo sde): btud nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir klu dang / klu chen po rnams sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su
135b7(mdo sde): spyod pa dag la gnod par bgyid lags bka' stsal pa lha'i dbang po rgyu dang rkyen gnyis kyis 'tshe ba'i 'jig rten 'dir klu dang / klu chen po rnams sems can rnams kyi longs
136a1(mdo sde): sh+ya bya/ spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag la gnod par byed do// gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dod chags kyi dbang dang khro ba'i dbang gis dus ma yin pa'i sprin dag 'byung
136a2(mdo sde): bar byed cing rdzi char dang ser drag dag 'bebs par byed do// lhags pa dang tsha ba dag 'byung bar byed do// des na 'dir sems can rnams sa bon dang / myu gu dang / 'dab ma dang /
136a3(mdo sde): me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang sman dang / ro dag tshig par byed do// skems par byed do// 'brul bar byed do// ma rung bar byed do// des na sems can rnams
136a4(mdo sde): longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dang mi ldan pas lus dang / ngag dang / yod kyi sdig pa'i las mi bzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag kun tu spyod par byed do// las kyi sgribs pa mi
136a5(mdo sde): ba zad pa des na sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed thams cad kyang sreg par byed do// skems par byed do// thal bar rlog par byed do// dge ba'i bshos gnyen dag spong zhing ngan song gsum
136a6(mdo sde): po dag la gzhol bar byed do// kha cig gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba tsam gyi phyir tshe gcig gis de lta bur sdig pa'i las mtshams med pa dag gi bar du kun tu spyod par byed de/
136a7(mdo sde): dag bskal pa mang po zhig gi bar du phyir mir skye ba thob par mi 'gyur ro// gal te de dag yun ring po 'das nas brgya la brgya lam na mi'i lus thob na'ang kha cig no yan lag nyams par 'gyur
136b1(mdo sde): ro// kha cig dran pa nyams par 'gyur ro// gdol pa'i rigs su'ang skye bar 'gyur ro// g.yung po'i rigs dang / smig ma mkhan gyi rigs dang / bkren pa dbul po'i rigs rnams
136b2(mdo sde): su'ang skye bar 'gyur ro// bza' ba dang / btung ba'i longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag dang yang bral bral bar 'gyur la/ yang rgyu des na dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral nas/ lus
136b3(mdo sde): dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa dag kun tu spyod par byed do// yang kha cig ngan song gsum po dang / mnar med pa dag tu'ang gzhol bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar
136b4(mdo sde): longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa dang mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'khor bar yun ring du nyam thag par 'gyur ro// ngan song gsum po dag tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa sna tshogs dag nyams su myod
136b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// gsol pa sdug bsngal gang cung zad ci byung ba thams cad ni zas kyi rkyen las gyur pa lags te/ zas ma mchis na sdug bsngal 'byung ba'ang ma mchis lags so//
136b6(mdo sde): nas de'i tshe brgya byin gzi brjid dri mo med pas tshigs su bcad de 'di skad ces gsol to// sred pa'i dug gis bsgyur bas na// du ba dang ni dgod par bgyid// nye bar gnas shing ltung bar
136b7(mdo sde): bgyid// kun tu spyod cing rnam par rgyug/ sa gzhi dag la til brdungs ltar// sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor gnod par bgyid// lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad la// de ltar sred
137a1(mdo sde): pas gnod par bgyid// kye ma sred pa'i zhags pa li// srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar gtugs pas// de ltar zhags 'di rgya che ba// khazas dag kyi rgyu las byung /
137a2(mdo sde): so so'i skye bo rgyu gnyis kyis// sred pa'i rdul gyis yan lag bcings// ri dgas zhags pas bcings pa ltar// 'bros pa dag tu nus ma lags// lhar bcas 'jig rten sems can dag /
137a3(mdo sde): sred pas gar bgyid rtsol ba ltar// gar zhung dag la gar mkhan rgyas// de ni gar bgyid rtsol mi nus// sred pa'i dug gis bsgyur bas na// ji ltar skye bo myos pa ltar// btung ba myos
137a4(mdo sde): bgyid bslad pa yis// myos pa dag tu mi bgyid do// srid pa'i gnod sbyin gdon dag gis// skye bo brlams nas 'khyal pa ltar// 'byung po'i gdon gyis myos pa dag/ 'khyal pa
137a5(mdo sde): dag tu mi bgyid do// nor 'dzin de dag 'dzin pa btang // sred pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par spangs// gang gis sred pa bskams nas kyang // de dag 'khor bar mi gnas so// byang chub sems
137a6(mdo sde): dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// zhe sdang khro bas skye dgu brlams// sems kyang g.yengs 'gyur de yis na// dge ba thams cad mi 'tshal zhing /
137a7(mdo sde): bzod brlag la sa la spyod par bgyid// mi dge ba la gnas bgyid pa// pa ma dag la rim gro chung / gang dag mtshams ma mchis bgyis pa// dkon mchog gsum la brnyas par bgyid//
137b1(mdo sde): snying brtse snying rje ma mchis pa// 'jigs bgyid gtum po drag shul can// khro sems dbang gis de dag ni// sems dmyal mnar ma mchis par gnas// sems can 'di dag dra ba
137b2(mdo sde): rgyus// gcig la gcig ni za bar bgyid// yang dang yang ni ngan song du// sdug bsngal du mas rab tu gzir// sdig pa'i sems kyis bring gyur cing // dge ba'i bshes gnyen spangs
137b3(mdo sde): nis kyang // srid pa'i mtshor ni lbu ba ste// mun pa mun nag gzhol ba po// de 'dra'o sems can don slad du// byang chub sems dpa'i snying brtse ba'i// bsam pas bdag bde btang nas
137b4(mdo sde): kyang // sems can sdig pa bsal slad du// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na// bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos gsum gyis// sdig pa'i sems can grol bgyid cing // chos kyi rgyal
137b5(mdo sde): mtshan sgreng bar bgyid// sems can 'ga' yi don slad du// lus dang srog dag btang nas kyang // dka' thub brtul zhugs spyod ldan pa// dka' bdag ni mang du spyad//
137b6(mdo sde): tshe sems can 'ga' slad du// bskal brgyar sdug bsngal sel bgyid na// dka' thub brtul zhugs bzod par bgyi// sems can yongs su smin sdad gnas// de 'dra'i bsam
137b7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa yis// sems can sred pa'i bsam pa can// sems ni byang chub sngon bgyid stsal// de nas dpal lha mo chen mos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngun
138a1(mdo sde): ras gzigs dbang phyug la bre bo lo tog gis bkang ba de phul nas smras pa/ gling bzhi pa 'di'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang ga yongs su spyod pa dag
138a2(mdo sde): gis rgyur sa bon dang / lo tog thams cad 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / grub par bgyi ba'i slad du skyes bu dam pa khyod la lhung bzed dbul lo// des na dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par chad pa/
138a3(mdo sde): ma rungs pa/ gtum po/ drag shul can kun sdug bsngal thams cad las bsgral pa dang / byang chub kyi sa bon la bzhag par rngo thog go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
138a4(mdo sde): chen po 'phags pa sma na ra sa gzigs dbang phyug gis bre bo lo tog gis bkang ba de blangs nas phyogs brgyar bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub
138a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dgongs su gsol/ gang gis gling 'dir sa bon dang / myu gu dang / 'drab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras
138a6(mdo sde): bu dang / 'bru dang sman dang / ro dang / sa'i bcud dang / gzi byin dang / sems can gyi gzi byin dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'o dang / snying ku dang / gzi byin dag mi rnams
138a7(mdo sde): ba phel bar bgyid pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun migacad par bgyid pa dang / gang gi de longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa thams cad
138b1(mdo sde): kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / sdig pa las klog par bgyid pa dang / byang chub kyi sems la dgod par rngo thogs pa dang / gang gis 'dir sems can de
138b2(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyis ngan song rnams yongs su spangs nas/ mtho ris la gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis dpal lha mo chen mo de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de
138b3(mdo sde): lngar phyogs bcu na gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes pa thams cad 'dir dgongs su gsol/ tad+ya thA mu ni shi ba/ mu ni na tre/ mu ni ba la/
138b4(mdo sde): mu nau sa li/ san ta u sa kri ti/ kra nu pra NA nI la/ ba ya ba sar+b+ba bi dza ba/ stil le swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba gnang nas dpal lha mo chen
138b5(mdo sde): mos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dpal cho ga shes khyod kyis gling bzhi pa 'di sa bon dang / myu gu dang / lo tog 'phel bar bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
138b6(mdo sde): phyir/ khyod ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor tshogs pa dang bcas pa ma lus pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin ko'u shi kas
138b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan pa das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnams grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ chos kyi rnams grangs 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi legs
139a1(mdo sde): shA kya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig ces bya'o// ri'i snying pos zhus pa zhes bya'o// gzungs kyi za ma tog/
139a2(mdo sde): ces bya'o// sa'i bcud 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor sems can yongs su smin par byed pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
139a3(mdo sde): dpal lha mo chen mo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i snying po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon
139a4(mdo sde): par bstod do// 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// // rgya gar
139a5(mdo sde): gyi mkhan po sarba dzA de ba dang zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban rnyed pa la brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa bya ba'i rgyud du gtogs//
139a6(mdo sde): rgyu gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na/ satwa A mo kaM na/ bud+d+ha kle tra san dang sha na b+hu ta nA ma many+dzu yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gsheg
139a7(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
139b1(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri thu 'dzin na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas/ grwa'i nor bu/
139b2(mdo sde): rin po me dpal gyi snying po dang / me tog rgyas pa dang / lha'i seng ge'i khri bkod pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zang pa/
139b3(mdo sde): sems kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang snying rje chen po shes pa la gnas pa thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang /
139b4(mdo sde): skye ba gnyis dang / skye ba gsum dang / skye ba bcu dang / skye ba nyi shu dang / skye ba sum cu dang / skye ba brgya'i bar dag gis thogs pa thams cad kyang sa brgyad pa dang / sa bcu pa
139b5(mdo sde): la gnas pa sha stag stau/ 'alags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / dri me tog dang nor dpal dang glog gi tog dang dri med bod dang
139b6(mdo sde): tsan dan dang / bdud rtsi'i tog la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun brgya dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma thams cad kyang lung bstan pa
139b7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa ting nge 'dzin thob pa bajig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa lnga stong dang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za thams cad kyang sngon gyi sangs
140a1(mdo sde): rgyu sa la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul mthong ba brgyad song dang / gnod sbyin mo chen mo thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes
140a2(mdo sde): thob pa/ lung bstan pa thob pa phyir mi ldog pa dpe med ma dang dri med 'od dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / 'phrog ma dang / dung can ma la sogs pa gnod
140a3(mdo sde): sbyin mo chen mo brgyad cu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / nor bu bzang po
140a4(mdo sde): bu dang / gang pa bzang po la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi bar dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khri
140a5(mdo sde): la bzhugs par rig nas/ rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i rgyan dang / na bza' dang / me tog dang / me tog 'phreng dang / spos dang byug pa dang /
140a6(mdo sde): rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod par byas ri mor byas so// kha cig gis ni lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te bstod do// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la
140a7(mdo sde): dmigs pa/ snying rje chen po'i shes pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'od
140b1(mdo sde): kyis sna bar gyur cing // gzugs thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur nas/ sems can dmus long gang yin pa de dag gis ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong bar gyur to// 'on pa rnams
140b2(mdo sde): kyis ni rna bas sgra dag thos par gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad dag dang bral bar gyur to// gos med pa rnams ni gos dag thob par gyur to// smon pa rnams ni dran pa thob par gyur to//
140b3(mdo sde): lus nyams pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni lus dang dbang po yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// dngul po rnams kyis ni nor dag thob par gyur to// sems can gang dag nor dang /
140b4(mdo sde): byad dang / longs spyod med pa de dag ni/ nor dang / yo byad dang / longs spyod dag dang ldan par gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang bde ba thams cad dang ldan zhing bsam pa thams cad yong
140b5(mdo sde): su rdzogs par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad la'ang skul nasathams cad chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga
140b6(mdo sde): la bde der lhags te/ sems can gang dag lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag thams cad kyis ni lha'i bde ba yongs su spangs nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byas te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir
140b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// sems can gang dag mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag gis kyang mi'i bde ba yongs su spangs nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
141a1(mdo sde): lhags so// sems can gang dag klu dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas rjes
141a2(mdo sde): su dran pa so sor thob nas/ sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa dang / lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so//
141a3(mdo sde): sems can gang dgag shin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su mun pa mun nag gi nang na skyes pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus yud tsam zhig dran pa so sor thob nas/ gcig gis gcig kun tu shes
141a4(mdo sde): par gyur te/ de dag mun pa chen po de nas yongs su thar par gyur ro// sems can thams cad gcig la gcig gis byams par gnas shing nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bar gyur to//
141a5(mdo sde): de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ mtho ba dang dma' bar yang gyur to// de nas 'khor 'dus pa der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dus te 'dug par gyur nas/ des bya ba
141a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po kun tu snang zhing / 'dus pa
141a7(mdo sde): chen po'i snga ltas kyang kun tu snang la/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag lung ston pa'ang kun tu snang zhing chos kyi 'brel pa'i gtam chen po'i snga ltas kyang kun
141b1(mdo sde): tu snang ba las na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gi rab thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / ye shes chen po'a'athob par 'gyur gyis
141b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyed kyis sems can thams cad la snying rje bskyed la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/ de bzhin
141b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa la yongs su zhus shig/ rigs kyi bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/ sems can sdig pa byed pa/ dbul ba/ nyam chung ba/ lus mdog ngan pa rga ba dang na bas yongs su gzi
141b4(mdo sde): ba longs spyod chung ba/ lus yongs su ma bsgoms pa/ tshe thung ba/ blo chung ba/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis yongs su gzir ba dag 'byung ba de/ rigs kyi bu de
141b5(mdo sde): dag gi don du chos bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob cig dang / rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis yun ring por sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang
141b6(mdo sde): bde ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sdig pa thams cad bzlog par bya ba dang / sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
141b7(mdo sde): bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar dag byas par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs
142a1(mdo sde): bcur rnam par bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag yid la byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de//
142a2(mdo sde): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na/ sems can rga ba dang / na ba
142a3(mdo sde): dang 'chi ba dang / mya ngan gyis non par gyur pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pas yongs su gzir ba nyam chung ba/ mdog ngan pa tshe thung ba longs spyod chung ba lus yongs su
142a4(mdo sde): ma bsgoms pa dag 'byung bar mchis te/ de dag ni ser sna dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis sems kyis gcig la gcig 'gum par 'gyur la gcig gi sa gcig nor dang
142a5(mdo sde): longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dag 'phrog par 'gyur zhing gad mo dang / 'jo sgeg dang / bro gar dang / rtsed mo dag gis mngon par rtse ba dang / mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang
142a6(mdo sde): mi sdug po la sdug par 'du shes par bgyid lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de dag rgyu de dang gzhi des sems can rnams la mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis gtses nas sems
142a7(mdo sde): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur lags pas bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag de dag gi don dang / sman pa dang / 8de
142b1(mdo sde): ba dang / rab thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par bgyi ba'i bar dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa thams
142b2(mdo sde): cad bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du / de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba bdebs par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mi mkhyen pa dang / ma rtogs pa dang /
142b3(mdo sde): gzigs pa dang / ma gsan pa dang / rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci'ang mi mnga' bas/ chos kyi 'brel ba'i gtam nyan par 'tshal ba dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkun dgyis pa dang /
142b4(mdo sde): shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang
142b5(mdo sde): lnga ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang lpags pa 'di dag re ba ma mchis par gyur cing slar mchi bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol
142b6(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag gis kyang yan lag lngas phyag byas te/ tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to//
142b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'ad sa legs par bshad du gsol bde bar gshegs pa legs par bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis la dgasul du gso ba btab par thugs su chud nas//
143a1(mdo sde): phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs te/ snyan cing 'jebs la yid du 'ong ba'i gsungs dbyangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
143a2(mdo sde): ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi bkod pa
143a3(mdo sde): kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ nges sngon dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog snang ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i spyan sngar de thos so//
143a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin de'i des ming thos ma thag tu sems can bye ba phrag dgu bcus de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par gyur nas thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas
143a5(mdo sde): kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung bstan te/ ngas kyang lung bstan pa thob bo// rigs kyi bungs de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mkhyen pas sngon de bzhin gshegs pa sum khris sems can thams
143a6(mdo sde): cad kyi don du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad de/ thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa ni/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod nyid dang / 'jam
143a7(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rnams dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor ji rtsal
143b1(mdo sde): lpags pa 'di dag gis kyang thos nas/ ri mo dang mchod pa dag byas te/ de'i 'og tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis lung bstan pa thob cing / byang chub sems dpa'/
143b2(mdo sde): ting nge badzin dag kyang thob par gyur nas/ 'dod pa thams cad du 'gro ba dang / re ba thams cad grub pa dang / nad thams cad dang bral bar yang gyur la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin
143b3(mdo sde): pa dang / sgrub pa thams cad spangs pa/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba rnams 'byor pa dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal
143b4(mdo sde): bu dang / blon po rnams kyis mngon par bstod par 'os pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa dang / sangs
143b5(mdo sde): rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa dang / tshe dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / mthu stobs dang ldan zhing rnam pa
143b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par 'gyur te/ nam yang sdug pa dang bral bar ma gyur cing / sdug pa'i sdug bsngal med par gyur pa de dran te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ rigs kyi bu'am/
143b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos smra ba de la mchog tu gus pa'i sems bskyed de/ chos rnam grangs 'di la yan lag lngas phyag byas shing / me tog dang / bdug spos dang spos dang /
144a1(mdo sde): me tog 'greng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis legs par brgyan nas/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes
144a2(mdo sde): brjod cing phyag 'tshal bar byed pa dang / legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par byed pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa
144a3(mdo sde): de dag ni yon tan mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la'ang yon tan mang po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la/ blta na sdug pa dang / nad
144a4(mdo sde): rnams dang bral ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / blo brtan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / brtan pa dang ldan pa dang / rgyal po thams cad dang rgyal po'i btsun mo thams cad dang /
144a5(mdo sde): rgyal bu thams cad dang / blon po thams cad dang / dgra thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bstod par 'os pa dang / phyag bya bar bos pa dang
144a6(mdo sde): bsnyen bkun bya bar 'os par yang 'gyur ro// nor dang yo byad mang por yang 'gyur ro// de dag gi kha nas tsan dan gyi dri 'i ngad 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro// mig ut+pal sngon po
144a7(mdo sde): 'dab ma 'dra bar yang 'gyur ro// de dag gis nyin mtshan du sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag mthong bar yang 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa byas pa
144b1(mdo sde): sgrib pa thams cad zad par ya' 'gyur ro// de dag la lha rnams srung bar yang 'gyur ro// de dag 'chi ba'i dus na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag mthong bar yang /
144b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// phrag dog med pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa med par 'chi ba'i dus byed par yang 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du/
144b3(mdo sde): ba'i bar du 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas te/ yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang /
144b4(mdo sde): mchod par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / ming tsam thos par gyur pa de dag ni ngas mngon sum du lung bstan pas lung bstan pa yin te/ de dag gis mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byas
144b5(mdo sde): ri mor byas/ mchod par byas pa'ang yin pas/ de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la the tsom bskyed par mi bya'o// gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa de dag kyang
144b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yin par yid la byas la bsnyen bkur bya'o// de'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gzugs mi mdzes pa dang / longs spyod med pa dang / blo med pa
144b7(mdo sde): dang sred pa che ba dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang / rgyal srid 'khrugs par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag dang / klad pa na ba gang yin pa dang / zan chad pa gang yin pa dang / gos
145a1(mdo sde): ngan par gyur pa gang yin pa dang lus dang sems la gnod pa gang yin pa dang / reg na mi ba pa'i mam bcas pa gang min pa dang / smyo ba gang yin pa sa/
145a2(mdo sde): sgrib pa de dag thams cad kyang / ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pa'i mthus yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// des kyang 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/
145a3(mdo sde): sems can rnams la sdig pa mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pa de dag so sor bshags par bya'o// bsal bar bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang
145a4(mdo sde): dge 'dun la dad pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i longs spyod kyi 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang / sangs rgyas
145a5(mdo sde): dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / pha mdag la sdig pa'i las byos shing bsags par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zad pa
145a6(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing / dbang phyug chen po dag kyang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib/
145a7(mdo sde): pa dang / sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / dmus yong du 'gyur ba dang / bud med kyi dngos por 'gyur pa dang / mtshan gnyis par 'gyur ba dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal
145b1(mdo sde): dang / khro ba'i dbang gis gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'grob skye gnas su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ rigs/
145b2(mdo sde): kyi bu de ltar na ting nge 'dzin 'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin no// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yun ring du gnas par byed pa dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi
145b3(mdo sde): bu mo de dag la srung ba dang / skyobs pa dang / sbed par byed pa dang / de dag thams cad kyi yon tan dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / longs spyod dang / dbang
145b4(mdo sde): phyag dang / bde ba chen po byed pa dang / bsams pa dang / 'dod pa thams cad yang dag par 'grub par byed pa dang / las thams cad zad par byed pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba
145b5(mdo sde): dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / g.yul thams cad las rgyal bar byed pa dang / tshe dang / mdog dang / stobs dang / brtson
145b6(mdo sde): 'grus dang / mthu che bar byed pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du byed pa dang / rims dang / dug dang / me dang / nub ma/
145b7(mdo sde): cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / lung bstan pa'i bar dag thob par byed pa'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag yod de/ de dag mnyan cing bzung ste/ bsnyen bkur byed pa dang
146a1(mdo sde): klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni yon tan de dag thams cad thob par 'gyur ro//
146a2(mdo sde): de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos pa dang / ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag nyid kyis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la me tog dang bdug spos dang
146a3(mdo sde): spos dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / ras bcos bu zung dag gsol te/ legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das logs so legs so// /
146a4(mdo sde): gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi de dag gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa na ma/ sarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ ta d+yA thA bud+d+he su bud+d+he/ bud+d+ha ma te/ lo ke bi lo ke
146a5(mdo sde): yo ka/ a ti krAn te/ satwa a ba lo ka ni/ sarba ta thA ga ha a d+hiSh+Tha ti/ sarba A sha pa ri pU ra ne/ t+yu ti na d+hi re nar dai ba pU dza ni/ ta thA ga tadat+ta nad de/ ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA ne na
146a6(mdo sde): sarba lo ka ma su khI b+ha ba tu pUrba karma kA pa ya tu ra kra b+ha ba tu sarba ye b+huste thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Tha te na swA hA/ kye rigs kyi bu dag gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi ba di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa sum
146a7(mdo sde): khris gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// ngas kyang da ltar sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bsrung ba dang / bskyabs pa dang sba ba
146b1(mdo sde): dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar bya ba'i phyir bshad de/ grogs po dag gang la la zhig 'di snyam du bdag gis ji ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs
146b2(mdo sde): pas gsungs pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur snyam du sems pa des/ nang par sngar langs te/ sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang / snying rje ba'i sems
146b3(mdo sde): dang / byams pa'i sems dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal dang / 'chab pa dang / khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang / rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
146b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa shin tu rgya cher byas la/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te/ gang 'dod pa yid la byas nas/ me tog la bzlas brjod lan
146b5(mdo sde): brgya rtsa brgyad bya zhing de bzhin gshegs pa la re re nAs dbul bar bya'o// de nas de'i re ba thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar yang
146b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// dam pa gang 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar yang 'gyur ro// shi'i bos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur
146b7(mdo sde): ro// tshe dang / stobs dang / mdog dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad kyang de'i dbang du 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags drug
147a1(mdo sde): khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol zhing bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
147a2(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem
147a3(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi dam 'chab ba/ mi 'jigs pa'i gzi brjid ces bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis te/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med bkod pa gzi brjid rgyal po'i spyan sngar der gzung lagra
147a4(mdo sde): so// bzung nas kyang sems can thams cad la bshad lags so// bcom ldan 'das de slan chad bdag gis mngon par 'tshal te/ gang gi rna lam du gzungs de grag par gyur tam/ glo bar
147a5(mdo sde): chud par gyur pa de'i lus la nyam chung ba'am/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs sam/ bro nad dam/ rims sam/ lus bro 'tshal ba 'am/ sems gdung ba'am dus ma lags par 'gum pa
147a6(mdo sde): 'am/ chab kyis 'jigs pa'am mtshon gyis 'jigs pa'am/ dug gis 'jigs pa'am/ dug sbyar mas 'jigs pa 'a ma/ mkha' 'gro ma dang 'byung pos 'jigs pa 'am
147a7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin nam dgra rnams sam/ mi dang mi ma lags pa dag gis mtho ba tsam pa'am/ rnam par gartse ba'am/ gnod par bgyid par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma mchis lags so//
147b1(mdo sde): de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang ba stsol cig dang / bdag gi chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa de dag gis don du nyan pa rnams dang / ri mor bgyid pa rnams dang
147b2(mdo sde): mchod par bgyid pa rnams dang / 'dzin par bgyid pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dam bcas pa'i phyag rgya dag par bgyi'o//
147b3(mdo sde): na maH/ sarba ta thA ga tA nAnA/ sarba bo d+hi satA nAn/ A ri hA tAn tad tA thA oM/ badz+ra d+ha ra/ badz+ra kA ya/ badz+ra ba la/ badz+ra tidza/ hUM hUM/ badz+ra pA ni ta thA ga ta ad tsam pa pA ya
147b4(mdo sde): sma ra pra tid l+h+wam/ sarbaM b+ha d+hin sarba pA pA ni nA sha ya/ di tsi me/ la the bi si ta ma pa ram/ ya na ya me bi ta b+hi prA yA tsa mi tan ta ma pa sa mr-id d+h+ya~M ts+tsha/ 9/ tu ru tre ru A gad
147b5(mdo sde): A gad tsa mA bi lam pa/ da ri sha ya badz+ra kA ya ma/ da ri sha ya badz+ra ka la ma/ bud+d+ha d+hiSh+Thi te na swAny+dza/ gzungs 'di brjod pa na sa chen po 'di mtho ba dang dma' bar gyur to// gnod sbyin/
147b6(mdo sde): dang srin po thams cad kyang rab tu sngangs so// lha thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar dag kyang ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ sems can chen po rab tu grub par byed pa'i gzungs kyi
147b7(mdo sde): gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag bshad pa ni legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces
148a1(mdo sde): gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sa bam/ nor dang / 'bru dang / longs spyod kyi dbang phyug gam/ rgyal rigra/
148a2(mdo sde): kyi dbang phyug gam/ rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/ tshe dang / stobs dang / mdog dang / brtson 'grus dang / tshe ring po nyid 'tshal des snga nas bsnyon pa bgyis la dgung zla yar gyi ngo
148a3(mdo sde): tshes brgyad la tsan dan dkar po las rdo rje 'dzin pa rta gad du dgod cing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa snying kar sku gdung stsal ba sku gdung dang bcas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa rig
148a4(mdo sde): sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa bgyis la gtsang mas bdug spos kyis bdug cing / gdugs mtshan gcig tu bsnyung ba bgyis la de nas tshes brgyad nas
148a5(mdo sde): tshes bco lnga'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bzhugs pa'i gnas gtsang mar tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ bu ma gang ba bzhing yang gzhag par bgyi/ phyogs
148a6(mdo sde): babazhir yang ro dang ldan pa dang / dri dang ldan pa dang / skyems dang / po thug gi gtor ma dag stsal la/ rad pa dkar po bgos te sems rtse gcig tu bgyis nas/ dus gsum du bdug spos
148a7(mdo sde): dang me tog dang spos dang / mar me dag gis mchod pa chen po bgyi zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa la yang mchod pa bgyis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bgyis nas
148b1(mdo sde): sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing ka re re nas lag na rdo rje la bsnun par bgyi'o// de nas sgra skad chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dogs g.yo
148b2(mdo sde): ba dang / 'od zer kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de nas dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis las thams cad dang / dgos pa thams cad kyang yang
148b3(mdo sde): dag par 'grub par 'gyur lags so// kro nad ma mchis pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / sdigs pa thams cad dang bral bar yang 'gyur zhing yon tan stong yang bathob par 'gyur lags so//
148b4(mdo sde): 'gum pa'i tshe na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong mthong bar 'gyur lags so// bdag mthong ba'ang stsal bar gyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la
148b5(mdo sde): legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so// phyag rgya 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'da' bar ma yin te/ 'di la som nyi med pa dang / yid gnyis med/
148b6(mdo sde): pa dang the tsom med par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin 'di
148b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
149a1(mdo sde): bya/ bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs de las ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo
149a2(mdo sde): thams cad 'thob par 'gyur pa dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / mi rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / yi dgas rnams dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas
149a3(mdo sde): su skyes pa rnams dang / ka shin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba lhag par g.yo ba dang / bral bar g.yo ba dag rab tu shes shing sems
149a4(mdo sde): can 'di dag ni bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba ste/ legs par spyod pa'i las byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos da/ dge 'dun dag la dad pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni
149a5(mdo sde): sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba ste/ nyes par spyod pa'i los byed pa/ sdig pa spyod par byed par shes nas/ sdig pa'i lta bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston par byed cing
149a6(mdo sde): sdig pa thams cad las zlog par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la 'god par byed pa dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal
149a7(mdo sde): dang khro ba dang / ser sna dag sel bar byed pa dang / sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la dad pa rab tu thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
149b1(mdo sde): rnams su skye zhing nam du'ang sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur la/ yid mi bde bar 'gyur bas na/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
149b2(mdo sde): byin gyi rlab sa sems can la gzigs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ste/ 'di thos pa'i sems can rnams ni phyir mi ldog par nges pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur
149b3(mdo sde): ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag lung bstan par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa nyid kyang dka' ba lags
149b4(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta smos kyang mi 'tshal lags na/ de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po dang dge ba spyod pa ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur lags bcom ldan 'das
149b5(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ngas dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
149b6(mdo sde): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa gang yin pa dang
149b7(mdo sde): mgo dang lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / lus dang / sdug pa'i bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dang / bran dang bran mo dag yongs su btang bar
150a1(mdo sde): gyur pa gang yin pa bsod nams mngon par du bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par du bya ba snga ma 'di ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang / bsten
150a2(mdo sde): bkur byed pa dang / yi ger 'dra ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / gzhan dag la yang dag par ston par byed bsod
150a3(mdo sde): nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la'ang mchod pa byed pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba'ang gang yin pa de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar
150a4(mdo sde): mi 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu ngas kun chub par byas shing bshad pa'i chos de dag thams cad la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang mchod pa byed pa dang //
150a5(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byas te/ yi ger ba dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa gang yin pa de bas ni/ gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang
