150a6(mdo sde): klog pa dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / yang dag par ston par byed pa dang nyan par byed na/ de nas mngon par 'du bya ba ches mang du yongs su sdud par gyur te/ des na de bzhin
150a7(mdo sde): gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stato// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa
150b1(mdo sde): dang mchod pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'i bsod nams ni de ltar dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag sdig pa kun du spyod pa dang
150b2(mdo sde): bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bro gar la mngon par dga' ba dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa dang / 'dod pa dang khro ba dang / sems mang ba dang
150b3(mdo sde): mi bde ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang / mtshon tshwa dang / spro ba dang sdigs pa dang / rdeg pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / shes pa mi 'gyur ba dang yid la byed par mi
150b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de dag dang / sdig pa'i las kyi gzhi de dang / mau ges pa des mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin cing / rga ba dang / na ba dang / mya ngan dang / 'chi bas
150b5(mdo sde): yongs su zin pas 'chi ba'i tshe/ yongs su gdung bar 'gyur te/ dmigs pa na so so nas dur khrod dang 'dra bar mthong zhing / dge ba'i sems bskyed par yang mi 'gyur la/ dad pa mi
150b6(mdo sde): byed pa thob par mi 'gyur te/ de dag de nas shi 'phos nas kyang yang sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas na/ lung bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs/
150b7(mdo sde): pa ma mthong ba dang / lung bstan pa thob pa dag gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / gzung ba dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang
151a1(mdo sde): yi ker 'drir gzhug pa dang / dad par yang mi nus la chos smra ba de'ang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / tha mar bya ba dang ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya/
151a2(mdo sde): bar yang mi nus so// rigs kyi bu gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i yul der ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas ji ltar lhags pa'i
151a3(mdo sde): 'khor de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/ bcom ldan pa das legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos smra ba de dang / chos
151a4(mdo sde): tan pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pas bsnyen bkur bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi zhing bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang nye bar sgrub par bgyi lags
151a5(mdo sde): so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang rgyas par bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi ste/ des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par yang 'gyur lags so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
151a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor rnams la rnam par gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ kye rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so// khyed cag gis de bzhin du gyis shig/ gnod pa
151a7(mdo sde): byed pa dang / brnyas pa dang / gshe ba dang / sdigs pa dang / mtshon 'byin pa dang / rgyal bar byed na yang lus dang / srog la mi lta bar byas la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par bya//
151b1(mdo sde): yi ger bri bar bya/ yi ger 'drir gzhug par bya/ bklag par bya'o// chos smra ba de la'ang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro bya'o// yul phyogs de dang gling de dang grong
151b2(mdo sde): khyer de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa dag las bsrung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la'ang rtag par rgyun du bsam
151b3(mdo sde): bsams par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bskal pa grangs med stong phrag bye snyed du/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba lan
151b4(mdo sde): 'ga' rnyed pa la// phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod par mi 'gyur bar// rigs kyi bu rnams bag yod chos nyon cig/ yon tan nyan cing mngon par dad byed pa// de dag gis ni ting nge 'dzin rnyed
151b5(mdo sde): mi dka'// gang gis rkang gnyis gtso bo rnams la ni// bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du// nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos dang rgyan// spos dang 'phreng ba byug pa phul ba bas//
151b6(mdo sde): gang gis mdo sde 'di la dad byas te// nyan cing klog la yi ger 'dri byed pa// de la bsod nams tshad ni yod min te// bde bar gshegs pas de snyed tshad ma gsungs// rtag tu
151b7(mdo sde): bag yod dgon par sten byed cing // sems gzhan med par bsam gtan rtag sgom dang // sdug pa'i bu dang bu mo sbyin byed cing // mgo dang lag pa yongs su gtong ba bas//
152a1(mdo sde): gang su mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin byed pa// de ni depas bsod nams mang po 'thob// mdo mchog 'di na nor sbyin byed pa ste// de'i ngan song kun kyang rtag tu spa/
152a2(mdo sde): 'di ni nor dang 'bru sbyin byed pa ste// gang zhig mdo sde rnam dga' di 'dzin pa// de la yon tan kun kyang mi dkon zhing // de la tshe stobs brtson 'grus mod pa yin// 'dren pa sangs
152a3(mdo sde): rgyas 'od dpag med mthong zhing // ngas de sangs rgyas byang chub lung yang bstan// de lan ma yang sdig pa yod min zhing // bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams kyang mthong // de la
152a4(mdo sde): rtag tu las gang 'byung 'gyur ba// sems gdung sus napa' ma de bzhin du// klad pa nabs thams cad zad dumyal zhing // de ni rnams kyang rnam par mi gyur// des ni mthong ba
152a5(mdo sde): chos la'ang yon tan kun// ji ltar bsams shing bdod pas pa thob par 'gyur// de ltar rtag tu dge slong po ma dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal po se rtag tu ni// ma yi dbang ban
152a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ltar// chos smrab la rjes su gus byas te// ma do sde 'di ni rtag tu gzung bya zhing // 'dzin pa la yang rtag tu bsnyen bku bya// spos dang 'phreng ba byug pa rnams
152a7(mdo sde): dag gis// bsnyen bkur bas te yi gal 'drir yang gzhug/ phyi ma'i dus la rga nas gdung 'gyur la// 'khrug pa stong zag du mas g.yen spyi zhing // sems dmyam yi dgas rnams /
152b1(mdo sde): yongs pa khyam dang // za ma ma ning sman par bya ba dang // dmus long nyid dang ro dang khyi yi dri// rigs dma' bud med rnams su skye ma bye// phrag dog che zhing rtag tu sdig byed la// khro bas zil
152b2(mdo sde): non rtag tu ser sna can// sangs rgyas chos la gus par ma byas pas// de ni de 'dra'i rigs kyi bu 'gyur la// der yang sdug bsngal tshor ba myong 'gyur zhing // de ni phyi ma'i dus na gdung bar 'gyur/
152b3(mdo sde): de phyir gang 'dzin cing ston byed pa// de dag gis ni rtag tu mchod par byas// gang gis de la yongs su spro ba dang // smad cinga'i brdegs la bcing ba byas gyur pa// des ning yang yongs su spros pa
152b4(mdo sde): yin// 'dzin la phu dud byas nang la'ang byas// de phyir de dag gis ni chos smra dang // gang zhig 'di 'dzin 'dri zhing klog byed pa// de dag la ni rtag tu bsnyen bkur zhing // tshig 'jam snyan/
152b5(mdo sde): pa'ang rgyun du brjod par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te
152b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rnam par lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i gzung mchis par rjes su dran te/ bdag gis sngon de bzhin
152b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'od mdzad ye shes tog ces bgyi ba'i spyan sngan de thos shing bzung lags so// de mnyan cing bzung la/ bcangs shing blags te/ gzhan dag la'ang bsgrags shing bsnyen
153a1(mdo sde): bkur bgyis nas/ yi ger bris sam/ yi ger 'drir stsal na/ phyir mi ldog pa'is 'thob par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yan
153a2(mdo sde): das pams ba sa mams mas pa sa na gru sa pa thams da kya
153a3(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur/ bro nad rnams dang bral bar yang 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang mthong bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
153a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod la de
153a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs zin gyis shod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcu'o de bzhin
153a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te/ gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag smras so// nam/ sarba ta thA kra tA nAn/ sarba A~M shU pa ri pU ra ka nan/ nam/ An+d+ra ba mo ki te shar
153a7(mdo sde): ba d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA la/ 6haha ha/ ma ma ma/ d+hi ro d+hi ri d+hi ra/ shin te pra shA nite/ sarba pA pa kA yang kara~M/ a mr-i
153b1(mdo sde): kA ya kA ru ni ka bo d+hi tsid tam ma na si ku ru/ byA ba lo kA ya/ mA ma s+phar sbyar yanad+ha pA prA r+the/ sad t+ya a d+hi shU na kun nu te na sa daN+Te sa rtse
153b2(mdo sde): ba tsa ne na/ sarba A shA me pa ri pU rA ya / bud+d+ha kr-i tra ma pa r-i go d+ha ya ma me ka shId+hi be he thang ka ro tu bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi ti ne sA hA/ tad+ya thA te dze te dze/ mahA h+ye
153b3(mdo sde): yan ma ma kA ya dus shU ri tam bA/ bA ga dus sh+tsa ri tam bA ma mdu shu ri ta ma bA dA rid druM bA tad sarba da kA pA ya a lo kA la bi lo kA ya ta thA ga tad ri sha nan
153b4(mdo sde): tsa.a ha ma d+hi kar/ kA mi bo d+hi satwa dir sha na ma/ d+hu d+hu ma/ da da sa swa med ri sha na ma/ sarba me ku sha lA/ A b+hi ba ra dz+nyAn tu na ma/ sarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ na ma/
153b5(mdo sde): Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ sma ra pra tid nA ma ma hA satwA/ sid d+han tu man tra pa dA sAhA/ gzungs 'di brjod pa na sa chen po rab tu g.yos shing gzha'i sgra chen po
153b6(mdo sde): dang / lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur to// thams dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so//
153b7(mdo sde): sems can chen po khyod kyis sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar byed pa/ las
154a1(mdo sde): thams cad byang bar byed pa snang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs 'di legs par smras so// bdag
154a2(mdo sde): cag thams cad kyis kyang gzung bar bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa rigs kyi bu dag gang la la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas
154a3(mdo sde): yongs su bsgrags pa'i yon tan dag mngon par 'dod cing lung bstan pa dang / kho bo'ang mngon sum du mthong ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
154a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' mthong ba dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug 'thob pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'dod pa des zla ba yar gyi ngol lus legs par khrus byas shing gtsang la
154a5(mdo sde): bsten te gnas/ 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par byas la chos brgyad nas brtsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa phyogs su spos dang /
154a6(mdo sde): tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / bum pa kang ba dag gis sa phyogs de dang / chos smra ba de la'ang mchod pa byas nas/ lus legs par khrus byas pa gtsang mas
154a7(mdo sde): gos dkar po gos te/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ yi ger bri bar bya'o// 'dri ba'i tshe na nyin
154b1(mdo sde): gcig bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bla ma dang / gus pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas/ sems can thams cad la
154b2(mdo sde): byams pa'i sems dang / sring brtse ba'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems kyis nyi ma byed tshun chad kyi bar de tsam du bri bar bya'o// tshe sa brgyad nas brtsams te/ tshes bco lnga'i bar du nyin gcig
154b3(mdo sde): bzhin du mchod pa'ang de bzhin bya'o// cho ga 'di kho na bzhin du byas te bris na/ de ma thag tu mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur
154b4(mdo sde): zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang 'phel bar 'gyur/ brtson 'grus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// tshe de nyid la'ang lus bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang
154b5(mdo sde): gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dag srab mor 'gyur ro// des yi ger 'drir bcug nas kyang sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi gnas su
154b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sku gdung dang bcas pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs sku gdung dang bcas pa zhal shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la me tog dang /
154b7(mdo sde): bdug spos dang / spos dang / mar me dag gis mchod pa shin tu rgya cher byas la/ tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ chos bco lnga'i bar du sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i
155a1(mdo sde): sems bskyed par bya zhing gtsang ma kha zas dkar po za ba bsten te gnas pa/ 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa/ grogs po yid gzugs pa dang /
155a2(mdo sde): ldan pa nga rgyal dang / khro bo dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna yongs su spangs pas/ nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ dus gsum du bzlas brjod lan brgya
155a3(mdo sde): rtsa brgyad bya'o// me tog dang / bdug spos dang spos dang / mar me dag kyang phul la dus gsum du snga ma'i me tog brgyad rtsa brgyad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
155a4(mdo sde): gi gzugs la dor bar bya'o// lag na rdo rje la'ang bdug par bya'o// phyogs bcur phyag byas la/ nub phyogs kyi lha mo 'jigs byed ma dang shar phyogs kyi dpe med ma dang
155a5(mdo sde): steng gi phyogs kyi dung tsan ma la sogs pa phyogs bzhir gtor ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / bo thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chen dag kyang gtong bar bya'o// des na de la rnam
155a6(mdo sde): par g.yong ba dang 'jigs pa 'ga' yab dbyung bar mi 'gyur zhing sems 'khrul bar yang mi 'gyur ro// sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad po thams cad la bzlas brjod pargyas
155a7(mdo sde): brgyad byas la bskul bar bya'o// cho ga la di kho na bzhin du sngar bsnyen pa byas la/ de nas tshes bco lnga'i nang par sa phyogs der bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag la/ bdug spos dang
155b1(mdo sde): tsan dan dang pog dkar po dang ka pur dag kyang bzhag la mar me kha bzhi dang me tog dang bdug spos dang spos dang gdugs dang rgyal
155b2(mdo sde): mtshan dang dar dang ba dan sna tshogs dag dang gser dngul gyi snod dag gis legs par brgyan la sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i 'o thug dang / zho dang 'bras nan
155b3(mdo sde): dang gzhan yang ci 'byor pa'i lha bshos dang / gtor ma dag kyang phyogs bzhir bzhag go// sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la snga mo bzhin du bzlas brjod lan re bya sa la phyogs bzhir
155b4(mdo sde): bzhag go/ de nas sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod lan re ba sa la/ re re nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs la bsnun par bya'o// de nas
155b5(mdo sde): gzugs de 'gul bar 'gyur zhing sgra skad chen po 'bang byung bar 'gyur ro// 'od zer dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ sa'ang g.yo bar 'gyur ro// de nas la sa thams cad 'grub par
155b6(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par yang 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su'ang 'gyur/ nor dang 'bru
155b7(mdo sde): dang mdzod dang / bang ba rnams 'byor par yang 'gyur/ nad thams cad yongs su spangs pa dang / tshe ring bar yang 'gyur/ dgra thams cad dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po rnam
156a1(mdo sde): kyang de la lha 'dod cing gces spras byed par yang 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spangs par yang 'gyur//
156a2(mdo sde): nam du'ang sdug pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// brtan pa dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / dbang po rno ba dang / bro dang ldan pa
156a3(mdo sde): dang sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / chos shes pa dang / 'chi ba'i tshe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba dang / 'phags pa spyan
156a4(mdo sde): ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba dang / byams pa la gnas shing chos ston bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'i bar du'ang 'a gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu 'dod pa dag gam 'khor
156a5(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rigs chen po 'am/ gang du rjes su dran par byed pa der skye ba dang / gzhan yang yon tan stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
156a6(mdo sde): de ltar ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni yon tan mang po'i 'byung gnas lags te/ chos kyi rnams grangs 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyi
156a7(mdo sde): rlabs ma mchis par mnyan rngo mi thog la / gzung bar yang rngo mi thog/ klog par yang rngo mi thog/ mchod par yang rngo mi thog/ yi ger bri bar yang rngo mi thog/ yi ger 'drir stsal
156b1(mdo sde): bar yang rngo mi thog/ dad par yang rngo mi thogs lags so// gal te mthong bar gyur na'ang nyan par mi 'gyur la/ gal te nyan par gyur na'ang de sems rnam par g.yengs par nyan par
156b2(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing dad par mi 'gyur/ bsnyen bkur bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so// gal te bsnyen bkur bgyid par gyur na'ang nyon mongs pa dang / gnod sems dang bcas pa'i sems kyis
156b3(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur lags so// gal tre yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir stsol bar 'gyur na'ang de gzhan dag yid la bgyid par 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di
156b4(mdo sde): ltar de'i sngon gyi las kyi' bras bu lags pa'i slad du ste/ de ni las de nyams su myong bar bgyid cing / the tsom skye bar 'gyur lags so// mtshoms ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pas kyang lan gsum
156b5(mdo sde): bsgrub na re ba thams cad yang dga' grub par 'gyur lags te/ de la nem nu ra ma mchis pa dang / yid gnyis ma mchis pa dang / the tsom mi skyed par bgyid lags so// de nas
156b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so//
156b7(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin chen mo dpe med ma bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/
157a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang spos dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / ras bcos bu zung dag gis mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
157a2(mdo sde): la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'a das bdag gis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das lul ko'u sham+bi na dbyangs can gyi kun dga' rab na bdugs
157a3(mdo sde): pa'i spyan sngar sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du dam bcas pa brjod par rjes su dran lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rig sngags 'chang
157a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi snying po dag 'tshal lags so// de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis spyi bo mang po la sman pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
157a5(mdo sde): 'gyur pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi don du bdag rjes su gzung du gsol/ nam sarba ta thA ga tA nAnA smad la the dan
157a6(mdo sde): hAsnih+ni hU hU/ sar sa ra/ la hUM la nU shIk+ShA shIn+sa/ ma hA bid d+ye sarbe bid t+ye/ d+ha ra na ma sl-i te/ ta sa ha sa kin tiSh+Tha si kaung kin tiSh+Tha si
157a7(mdo sde): ka bi tsi tra/ A ba ra ni bai d+hu Shi tang ge/ pa Ta pa Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ro d+hi ri b+hu ru b+hu ru/ sarba ar+tha na me sA d+ha ya/ tu ru tu ru/ ar+tha na sA ha ya/ ar+tha na de hi me
157b1(mdo sde): sarba satwAnAn sid d+hin/ hAH/ pad+ma par+the/ mahA pad+de/ zi sha de/ ba sha de/ ma hA bi sha de/ b+ha ba tha ba/ b+ha bod thA bA ya/ tam ha g+ho ra/ tam nya k+ko ra tan ma/
157b2(mdo sde): bid t+ya ma pre yo tsA ya/ sid d+hing ku ru sarba A shA me pa ri pU ra ya bud d+ha a d+hiShA na na sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la yon tan 'tshal ba dang / nor dang 'bru 'tshal ba dang / sems
157b3(mdo sde): can thams cad dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal ba dang / nor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal srid dang / rig sngags 'chang chen po nyid dang / bdag kyang mngon sum du mthong bar 'tshal ba des
157b4(mdo sde): tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar po gsar pa kha tshar ma bskum pa sbra ma stsal ba la ri mo mkhan gtsang ma bsten te gnas pa/ 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pas tshon rtsi sbyin
157b5(mdo sde): dang ma 'bags pa snod gsar pa'i nang du stsal bas dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du zhugs pa bri bar bgyi'o// g.yas phyogs su 'phags
157b6(mdo sde): pa rdo rje khro bo rad pa dkar po 'tshal brgyan thams cad dang me tog 'phreng dang / zla ga ma dngas mdos brgyan pa rdo rje gsor zhing mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o// g.yon phyogs
157b7(mdo sde): su gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma 'a dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/ rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sug pa na pad+ma thogs
158a1(mdo sde): shing / yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa 'phags pa yan
158a2(mdo sde): lag brgyad pa la gnas pa/ rang pa dkar po 'tshal ba/ grogs dang ldan pa/ nas chen 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'tshal bas sngar bsnyen pa bgyis la/ chos brgyad kyi gdugs la/ de bzhin
158a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang bcas pa'i gnas gtsang mar dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / lag na rdo rje la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dag la gsol bar bgyi zhing
158a4(mdo sde): phyog bzhir 'o zug dang / zho dang / 'bras chan dang / ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / chang sna tshogs kyi gtor ma dag gtor la/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang /
158a5(mdo sde): mar me sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa bgyis nas/ dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum bgyi zhing / re re nas gnod sbyin
158a6(mdo sde): mo chen mo dpe med ma'i gzugs de la bsnyen par bgyi'o// de nas zla ba nya ba'i tshes bco lnga'i gdugs la'ang cho ga 'di nyid dang gzhan yang ci 'byor pa dag dang / bdug spos dang / ga
158a7(mdo sde): pur dang pog dkar po dang / tsan dan dang shing mu sa dag kyang bul 'a bru mar dri bda' ba'i zhugs mar kha gnyis kyang dbul bar bgyi'o// des na bdag der rang gis gzugs kyis
158b1(mdo sde): gnas par bgyi zhing dam pa 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi ste/ ting nge 'dzin pa thob pa dang / nam mkha' la mchi ba dang / lus mi snang bar bgyi ba dang / rgyal srid dang / stobs kyi 'kho/
158b2(mdo sde): mos sgyur ba nyid dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / gter lha 'tshal ba dang / nor rgyur 'tshal ba dang / pha rol gyi sems 'tshal ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal
158b3(mdo sde): bar bgyid lags so// des kyang sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / nga rgyal dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna yongs su spangs pa'i sems su bgyi'o// mchod/
158b4(mdo sde): rten dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi nor 'phrog pa yongs su spangs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dad pa mi phyed par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'a das gal te mtshams ma mchis
158b5(mdo sde): par bgyid pa zhig gis kyang lan gsum bsgrubs te/ bdag gis kyang ma bsams par gyur na/ bcom ldan pa das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
158b6(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gal te sangs rgyas la dad par ma gyur pa dang / yid gnyis su gyur pa gang lags pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bgyis nas/ 'gyod par mi bgyid pa dang
158b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag la'ang bdag mthong ba stsal bar bgyi zhing thob par yang bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
159a1(mdo sde): kyis gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo legs so legs so// sri mo khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du sdig pa
159a2(mdo sde): kun tu spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gsang sngags gzhi 'di lta bu 'di dag smras shing dam bca' ba'ang khyod legs so// khyod snying rje chen po 'di lta bu 'dis sems can thams
159a3(mdo sde): cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu dgod nus par 'gyur gyis/ de bzhin du gyis shig/ de nas lha mo chen mo rung can mas bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs
159a4(mdo sde): dang spos sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas te/ bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
159a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dngachos smra ba de dag kyang bsrung ba'i slad du dam
159a6(mdo sde): bca' bar bgyi zhing re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i gsang sngags gzhi rnams stsal bar bgyi lags kyis de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar
159a7(mdo sde): mdzad du gsol/ nam/ sarba ta thA gA tA na/ d+ya thA/ oM shang khi ni de bi A gad tsha.A gad tsha tiSh+Tha d+ha ne/ d+hA dza yai/ pri bri brid d+hi ka ri/ d+hINI/
159b1(mdo sde): d+hUd+hI ti ka ri/ nan bi'iH/ / A saH8/ lu sa A su la ne/ tra thAkatAn/ s+phAr ba d+ha tsi g+sa/ ma kI lam pa ma par na shing kha~M
159b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag lus la gnas par bgyis na de'i snyan pa 'phel bar 'gyur zhing gzi brjid 'phel ba dang / longs spyod 'bel ba dang / dbang phyug
159b3(mdo sde): 'phel ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / dgra rnams dbang du bgyi ba'ang 'phel bar 'gyur lags so// sa phyogs gtsang ma 'am/ lha'i gnas su ci 'byor pa'i gtor ma phyogs bzhir stsa la la/
159b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la bdug spos dang bog dkar po dag gis mchod pa rgya cher bgyi zhing / dugs mar dag kyang phul la dgung nyi shu rtsa gcig tu byams pa la gnas pa dang nges
159b5(mdo sde): par gnas shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis na dam pa'i chos spong ba ma gtogs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lags so// de nas bcom
159b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das dang / ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis lha mo chen mo dung can ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo legs so// yon tan mang po ldan pa'i dam bca' ba
159b7(mdo sde): 'di ni lags par smras so// sring mo khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin du gyis shig/ de nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed mas bcom ldan 'das la gser gyi me
160a1(mdo sde): tog dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom/
160a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos smra ba de dag dang / chos nyan pa de dag dang / yi ger 'dri ba de dag dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa bgyi ba de dag gi don du//
160a3(mdo sde): reb thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / dbyig dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / rgyal srid dang / tshe ring bar
160a4(mdo sde): bgyid pa dgra thams cad dbang du bgyid pa'i gsang sngags gzhi rnams stsal bar bgyi ste/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i btsun mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am
160a5(mdo sde): dge bstan nam/ dge bsnyen mga' la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ bsnyen bkur bgyid dam/ yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir stsol tam mchog tu gus
160a6(mdo sde): pas ji skad gsung ba'i bsgrub pa la sgrub par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de srung bar bgyi yongs su bskyang bar bgyi zhing / dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar ba
160a7(mdo sde): ste longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dag gis mi brel bar bgyi/ 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa dang / khrag drug dang / 'khrug klong dag las rgyal bar bgyi
160b1(mdo sde): tshe phun sum tshogs pa che bar sgrub par bgyi/ de'i yul dang grong khyer dag kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi lags kyis/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du
160b2(mdo sde): gsol/ namasarba ta thAg tA nAn/ sarba ba~M d+hi satwa nAn/ nam/ Ar+yA ba~M mo ki ti shwar+ya/ badz+ra pA Ni pra b+hitI nAnA/ d+ya thA/ oM ma nabra ma gyims
160b3(mdo sde): ye dza yA ba tse ya sha ba ti/ yaM sha dza baM/ te dza dza be/ bya ka ra Na prA ba te/ sarbe satwa a ba lo ka Ne/ kr-ipa te dza ba tsu le/ ta thA ga te a nudany+dzatam pA la/ sA ra pra tid nyam
160b4(mdo sde): bud+d+ha ar+thaSh+Ta nen/ de se me par na/ si d+hi ku ru/ de bi ma hA de bi sade t+ya ba tsan de bi b+hI ma~M/ sad tra ba tsa na pra tiSh+Thi te gud+ha ni bA sI ni sAny+dzi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can
160b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi don du/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs shing / de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su gnang ba'i gsang sngags gzhi dag smras te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar
160b6(mdo sde): me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / mar me dag gis mchod pa bgyis la/ phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang / ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma dag stsal to/
160b7(mdo sde): ci dang ci 'tshal ba yid la bgyis shing / bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mchod pa bgyid na/ re ba de dang de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so// gang la
161a1(mdo sde): la bdag gis gzugs mthong bar 'tshal ba des/ tshe sa brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar po gsar pa kha tshar ma bskum pa skra ma mchis pa la ri mo mkhan
161a2(mdo sde): gtsang ma 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad yongs su bzung ba/ tshon rtsi sprin dang ma 'bags pa snod gsar pa'i nang du stsal pas/ dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos
161a3(mdo sde): ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bgyid/ g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos kyi 'brel ba'i gtam ston pa bri bar bgyi'o// g.yon phyogs su ni lha ma/
161a4(mdo sde): chen mo 'jigs byed ma 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis lo// rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ril ba dang bgrang 'phreng thogs shing
161a5(mdo sde): yang dag par 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas sngar bsnyen pa bgyis la/ tshes brgyad nas bco lnga'i bar mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa'i
161a6(mdo sde): gnas su me tog dang bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dag gis mchod pa bgyi zhing / phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chan gyi gtor ma
161a7(mdo sde): dag gtor la me tog dang bdug spos dang / spos dang / mar me sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa rgya cher bgyi zhing / lha bshos dkar po dag kyang phul la gtor ma ro sna tshogs dang /
161b1(mdo sde): ldan pa dang gzhan yang ci 'byor pa dag stsal nas/ sems cad thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems kyis sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la bzlas brjod lan brgya
161b2(mdo sde): rtsa brgyad bgyi zhing re re nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma'i gzugs de 'phang bar bgyi'o// de nas bdag der rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi zhing / dam pa ci'i tshal ba'ang stsal bar/
161b3(mdo sde): bgyi ste/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang / nam mkha' la mchi ba dang / gter lta 'tshal ba dang / nor rgyur 'tshal ba dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa
161b4(mdo sde): bzlog pa dang / bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang / pha rol gyi dmigs tshogs rab tu gzhom pa dang / bu mchis par bgyi ba dang / nor 'du bar bgyi ba dang / sems can
161b5(mdo sde): thams cad la byams pa skye ba dang / gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba'i las dag kyang bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang
161b6(mdo sde): dge 'dun dag la the tsom du gyur pa gang lags pa ma tog par mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pa zhig lags na yang / bdag gis re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis par gyur
161b7(mdo sde): na/ bcom ldan 'a das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sring mo legs/
162a1(mdo sde): so legs so// sring mo khyod sems can gyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing chos kyi nam grangs 'di'ang yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/
162a2(mdo sde): zhugs pa ni yang khyod legs so// sring mo de'i phyir khyod kyis rtag tu dam bcas pa 'di dran par gyis shig/ de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos shing / lha'i me tog gi char dag
162a3(mdo sde): kyang mngon par rab tu bab pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo legs so legs so// khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi
162a4(mdo sde): re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i dam bca' ba 'di ni legs par smras so// de nas bcom ldan pa das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
162a5(mdo sde): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci rigs kyi bu 'a ma/ rigs kyi bu mo de cho skra rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir
162a6(mdo sde): stsol ba dang / klog pa dang / yang drag par ston pa dang / 'don pa dang / mchid thon du bgyid pa des bsod nams 'thob par gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
162a7(mdo sde): stsal pa// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i phyir de khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol
162b1(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la ni ma gzigs pa 'am/ ma gsan pa 'am/ ma dgongs pa'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa mi mnga' bas/ bcom ldan 'das ning/
162b2(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos rnam grangs 'di ni yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa
162b3(mdo sde): dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / 'don pa dang / kha ton du byed pa las bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dpes brjod par yang mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gos
162b4(mdo sde): dang / rgyan dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dag gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byas te rtser bcug kyang
162b5(mdo sde): sems can de dag skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa dag las yongs
162b6(mdo sde): su thar par mi 'gyur ba nyid yid zhing / lo 'bum du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtser bcug kyang sems can de dag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
162b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul dag las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur ba nyid de/ sems can rnams kyi phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan bcing mchod pa byed pa dang / yang dag par
163a1(mdo sde): bstan te/ de'i don kyang mnyan cing nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don/
163a2(mdo sde): pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud pa gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su
163a3(mdo sde): thar par kho nar 'gyur pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'di'i bsod nams kyi tshad kyi dpe mi mdzad do// rigs kyi bu gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / chos smra ba dang
163a4(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag gi phyi dbyig lungs 'bru tsam yongs su gtong bar byed dam/ me tog gcig gam/ 'bras bu gcig
163a5(mdo sde): gam ba dan nam/ rol mo'i sgra bam/ spos sam/ gaus sam/ rgyun gcig tsam zhig yongs su gtong bar byed dam/ yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/
163a6(mdo sde): 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ mchod pa byed dam/ yang dag par ston tam/ bsnyen bkur byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed pa gang yin pa dang / gang gis
163a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa la lo 'bum du me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang
163b1(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mchod pas mchod par byed/ rjed par byed cing / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / gtsug lag khang
163b2(mdo sde): dang 'chags dang / skyed mos 'tshal dag byed du bcug gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyi rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad byed pa brgya 'am/ stong byed du
163b3(mdo sde): bcug ste/ de dag la lo 'bum du mchod pa dag gis mchod par byed pa bas/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ge ra 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa
163b4(mdo sde): dang 'don pa dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa de ni de bas bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba ches mang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon sum du
163b5(mdo sde): mchod pa byed pa de ni de lta ma yin pa/ sems can thams cad la sbyin pa byin zhing / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse rabacug pa'ang de lta ma yin no// de lta bas na rigs kyi bu
163b6(mdo sde): dang rigs kyi bu mo dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po dang / blon po de dag gis rtag par rgyun du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par bya'o// gang
163b7(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs bde sgrog par byed pa dang / brjod par byed pa dang / don kyang nye bar sgrub par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'du shes bskyed
164a1(mdo sde): par bya zhing / de dag gis bsnyen bkur byas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya bklag par bya/ yid la
164a2(mdo sde): bya zhing 'di ltar sems bskyed par yang bya ste/ bdag cag don med pa la don du shes pa dang / mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes shing //
164a3(mdo sde): lam ma yin par zhugs pa la lamanye bar ston pa gang yin pa dang / bdag cag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su
164a4(mdo sde): thar par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam du sems bskyed par yang bya'o// spyan ras gzigs dbang
164a5(mdo sde): phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa mdzad pa chen pos yang dag par bshad lags
164a6(mdo sde): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs padin phyi ma'i tshe phyim na/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/ der yang dge slong dang
164a7(mdo sde): dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po dang / blon pa snod du 'gyur ba/ mchod pa byed pa
164b1(mdo sde): 'jig par byed pa 'dzin par byed pa klog par byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / dad par 'gyur/ yid ches par 'gyur ro// gal te byang dang shar dang nub
164b2(mdo sde): phyogs kyi rgyud dag na spyod par 'gyur na yang / de na gang dag nyan par mi byed pa dang / dad par mi byed pa dang / yid ches par mi byed pa dang mchod par mi byed pa dang brtson
164b3(mdo sde): 'grus zhan pa dang / brjed nges pa dang / bu smad dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / bzhad gad dang / 'jo sgeg dang
164b4(mdo sde): bro dang / gar dang / klu sna tshogs kyis rnam par g.yengs shing brag dog dang / ser sna'i dran pas nyan par mi byed/ yid ches par mi byed pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi
164b5(mdo sde): las la mngon par brtson pa yin te/ de dag ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid
164b6(mdo sde): mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul rnams las yongs su mi
164b7(mdo sde): thar pa kho nar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo bdag nyid ngan song thams cad las yongs su thar par 'dod pa de dag gis bsnyen bkur byas te/ chos kyi rnam
165a1(mdo sde): grangs 'di mchod pa bya zhing gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par bstan par bya/ yid la'ang gzung bar bya'o// khrag khrug dang 'khrug klong dang rmi
165a2(mdo sde): lam ngan pa dang / lngas ngan pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / kanag nad dang / phyugs nad dang / mi nad dag dang / nid dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa sna tshogs
165a3(mdo sde): dag la yang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa byas te bklag par bya'o// rgyal mtshan la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / ma mo sgra sna tshogs dag gis mchod cing /
165a4(mdo sde): phyogs bzhir gtor ma gtor la me tog dang / dadug spos dang / spos dag gis phyag byas te/ 'jug par byas na der lams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad thams
165a5(mdo sde): cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sngon gyi srid par 'dren pas gang gsungs shing / sems
165a6(mdo sde): can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// de ltar ngas kyang khyod la bshad pa yi// ting 'dzin 'di ni zung zhig/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog la// gang gis kham
165a7(mdo sde): gsum sbyin par byed pa bas// mdo sde 'di la mchod pa byas na ni// sbyin pas de yi dper yang mi bod do// sangs rgyas la ni dang byas te// tshad med gtsugs lag khang dag brtsigs
165b1(mdo sde): pa bas// gang zhig mdo sde 'dzin pa gang yin pa// de ni de bas bsod nams mang por 'gyur// gang zhig me tog gcig tsam 'dor byed cing // gos dang 'phreng ba byug pa de bzhin te//
165b2(mdo sde): ting 'dzin 'di la bsnyen bkur byed gyur na// bsod nams tshogs char snga ma de mi 'gyur// gleng gis mdo sde 'di la mchod pa'i phyir// kar sha pa NI'i sbyin pa sbyin byed cing // byang chub
165b3(mdo sde): phyir ni byams pa'i sems bskyed na// de ni de bas bsod nams mang po 'thob// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sems can la// ting 'dzin 'di bshad lung phog de bzhin du//
165b4(mdo sde): bla med byang chub phyir ni dkod gyur na// de yi bsod nams dper yang de mi 'gyur// de ltas phan yon padi dag zos nas kyang // sems can kun la de bzhin byams byas te// mdo ni
165b5(mdo sde): gzung zhing yi gor bri bar bya// bklag par bya zhing de bzhin bshad par bya// rga dang de bzhin ma mchis gnod gyur cing // sdug bsngal rab dag brgya yis yongs gdungs la//
165b6(mdo sde): sems dmyal yi dgas rnams su skye ba na// phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod par gyur ta re// 'chi ba'i dus na yid skrag 'jigs gyur la// yang dang yang du sdam pa 'don byed cing
165b7(mdo sde): bdag gis dpung bsnyen skyabs su 'gyur zhes pa// byis pa'i blo can phan tshun tog ga re// gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchod cing // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun
166a1(mdo sde): / nor phyogs pa// mi bzadag shin rje'i 'dzag rten khrid 'gyur zhing / byin chad rtag tu skyabs 'gyur 'gal yang med// bu smad mod min na du rtsa las med/
166a2(mdo sde): yul 'khor mo min bzhad gang 'jo sgeg med// nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos dang rgyun// kun spangs sdug bsngal yang dang yang mi bzad// ting 'dzin padi la dad par ma byas pa/
166a3(mdo sde): de 'dra'i sdug bsngal mi bzad myong 'gyur bas// sdug bsngal 'di dang phan yon de thos na// byis pa'i khri yang su zhig dang mi spyad// de phyir rtag tu dge slong po mo dang // dag brtson
166a4(mdo sde): rnams dang rgyal po khor drug tu// mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu gzung ba zhing // 'dzin pa la yang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya// dran so bcom ldan 'dus la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ma na/
166a5(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs padi gzung lags te/ ston pa'i 'du shes kyis bcang bar bgyi zhing / sems can thams cad la'ang
166a6(mdo sde): yang dag par bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis ngas chos gang bstan pa mnyan te/ kun gzung ba de dag thams cad
166a7(mdo sde): 'chang bar mi byed/ klog par mi byed/ rgyas par mi byed kyang / des ni khyod kyis ngal mnyes pa byas par mi 'gyur zhing / gus par ma mtshan par yang mi 'gyur la nyan thos
166b1(mdo sde): nyid mi yin par yang mi 'gyur gyis/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang bar mi byed/ klog par mi byed/ mchod par mi byed/ yang dag par ston par mi byed/ yid la mi byed na ni
166b2(mdo sde): des na khyod kyis ngal nyes par byas par 'gyur zhing / gus par ma mnyan par yang 'gyur la/ nyan thos nyid yin par yang mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis phud
166b3(mdo sde): dudud byas te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcang bar bya'o// 'di ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/ sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
166b4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags drug khri len pa med par zag pa
166b5(mdo sde): rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' bdun brgyas ni ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// lnga brgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par skye bar lung bstan pa thob
166b6(mdo sde): par gyur to// srog chags dgu khri ni nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te/ mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro thams cad spangs so// de nas bcom
166b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam
167a1(mdo sde): grangs 'di ni slad ma'i dus srad ma'i tshe na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo nyan par bgyid pa dang / 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / re mor bgyid pa dang
167a2(mdo sde): mchod par bgyid pa de dag dang / yi ger 'dri bar bgyid pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bgyid par 'a gyur te/ de dag kyang ji lta bur 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung
167a3(mdo sde): bstan pa lags so// srad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na/ sems can gang bzhad gad dang / 'jo sgeg dang / gar dang / bro dang / klu dang / rol mo'i sgra dag la sna tshogs
167a4(mdo sde): su g.yengs pa 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mun pa che ba/ rtsed mo la dga' bar 'du shes pa/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa/ phrag dog dang ser snas yongs
167a5(mdo sde): su zin cing mchod par mi bgyid/ ri mo mi bgyid/ dad par mi bgyid/ glob ches par mi bgyid/ 'chang bar mi bgyid/ klog par mi bgyid/ nyan par mi bgyid
167a6(mdo sde): nan tan gyi sgrub par mi bgyid pa de dag ni/ dal ba 'di yid byung bar bgyis shing / sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu de yongs su bas par bgyis nas/ sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba sna tshogs
167a7(mdo sde): dang / sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing / der yang bskal pa bye ba phrag du mar sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas/ yang slar sems can dmyal ba
167b1(mdo sde): dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur lags te/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang gis yun ring por rjes su 'gyod par 'gyur lags so//
167b2(mdo sde): de lta lags pas na lus dang / ngag dang / yid legs par bsdam par bgyi zhing / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la'ang dad pa mi phyed par bgyid/
167b3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang / khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i
167b4(mdo sde): sems su bgyi lags so// de nas ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gi bsod nams mngon 'du bya ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la/ lha'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang
167b5(mdo sde): spos dang / me tog dang 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / na bza' ba dang / rgyan dag dang / a la la zhes caco dang / ga na'i sgra dag dang / lha'i sil snyan dang
167b6(mdo sde): pheg rdob pa dang / klu dbyangs dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// sems can thams cad kyi don dang
167b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i srad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs chen po 'di shin tu legs par bka' stsal lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
168a1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnams grangs 'anis mang ci lags 'di ji ltar gzung bar brtsa
168a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnams grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su gnang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
168a3(mdo sde): sa gnon pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'a dus pa chen po zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can
168a4(mdo sde): gzigs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dpa
168a5(mdo sde): phyag dang 'jam dpal dang / lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang / nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang brgya byin
168a6(mdo sde): dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin mo chen mod pe med pa dang / dri med 'od dang / 'od can ma dang /
168a7(mdo sde): 'jigs byed ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / dung can ma dang / 'phrog ma la sogs pa de dag dang / lha dang / bu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
168b1(mdo sde): min dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ltar lhags pa de dag dang dge slong dang
168b2(mdo sde): dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnams yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa
168b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya kar
168b4(mdo sde): gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa/ ban+d+he klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur/ bya ba'i rgyud sder gtogs so//
168b5(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bud+d+ho ma hA sho d+ha ya pu sa ti sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i mdo
168b6(mdo sde): las phyag 'tshal ba'i cho ga dang / mtshan nas brjod pa'i yon tan gyi gleng bzhi dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang mdo sde bcu gnyis dang
168b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod cing phyag 'tshal ba dang / bshags pa'i le'u rnams 'byung ba nyi tshe bcos shing bsgyur ba/ de nas phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i
169a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lhan cig tu thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams phyogs bcu'i sangs
169a2(mdo sde): rgyas de dag gi mthu dang byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong la theg pa chen po'i chos thos nas bdag cag dang lha dang mis
169a3(mdo sde): mdo sde'i gsung rab 'di len cing 'dzin pa dang 'chang bar gsol gnang na bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na/ yul khams 'di dang phyogs
169a4(mdo sde): gzhan du ri dang / tshal dang / shing drung gi rig sngags 'chang ba'i gnas dang / grong dang !/ grong khyer dang / gnas dang / khyim dang dgon pa'i gnas dang /
169a5(mdo sde): dur khrod dang shing drung dang bla gab med pa dang / mchod rten dang gtsug lag khang dang / dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang mi mang po 'du ba chos bshad pa'i
169a6(mdo sde): gnas dang mi phal gyi gnas dang / mir gyur pa thams cad la rgya cher khyab par bstan te rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas/
169a7(mdo sde): na ngan 'gro rnams kyang gtan du bkag pa'i slad du'o// de ji lta zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pas sems can dmyal pa'i sgob sum zhes thos te/ chos kyisazung
169b1(mdo sde): 'di las tshig 'bru gcig tsam kha ton du 'don na lha rnams kyang dga' zhing mgu nas rtag tu bsnyen cing mchis te/ rang yang dge ba spyod par bgyid lags so// mi la la dag kyang rtogs
169b2(mdo sde): pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi gzhung bdi thos nas dga' zhing mgul mos shing gus te/ yi ger 'dril 'don cing klog pa dang / 'dzin cing 'chung la phyag 'tshal te
169b3(mdo sde): chos kyi gzung 'di las bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'ga'i mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'ga'i ming nas brjod na yang mi des da ltar gyi tshe 'di bde zhing skyid pa dang
169b4(mdo sde): sdig pa mi dge ba mi 'byung la/ nam 'gum pa'i tshe na'ang bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lha rnams kyis de'i sngon du shul 'dren cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag/
169b5(mdo sde): pa dag mthong la dad nas gcig tu skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na chos kyi gdung 'di yin cing yongs su gzung ba'i slad du'o// mdo sde 'di len cing yongs su 'dzin pa
169b6(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su 'dzin pa lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su 'dzin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' lags te/ de bas na bdag cag dang slob pa gcig ste/
169b7(mdo sde): rgyu de'i slad du chos kyi gzhung 'di yongs su bzung bas gnas gcig tu skye zhing gcig gis gcig mi spong zhing mi 'bral bas smon lam gcig pa lags so// de nas yang
170a1(mdo sde): bya/ ma srin rnams kyi rgyal po dang / tshangs pa chen po'i rgyal po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi
170a2(mdo sde): dang / phyag brnyan la glan rdo rje dag dang / sde dpon chen po la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang wa ma yin gyi rgyal po dang nam mkha' rdzing mi rgyal
170a3(mdo sde): bo dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po dang bu dgu ma'i lga dang / ri'i lha dang / shing gi lha dang / 'bab chu'i lha dang / mtsho'i lha dang sa bi lha dang / chu'i lha dang / me'i lha dang /
170a4(mdo sde): rlung gi lha la sogs pa'i rgyal po dang / de dag la sogs pa tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang / lha chen po rnams 'khod pa las langs te/ gdong dang spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas thal
170a5(mdo sde): me sbar te/ rjes dang gus par bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan pa das bdag cag la sogs pas slan chad rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i
170a6(mdo sde): rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi gzhung 'di yongs su bzung ste/ mdo sde 'di gang na gnas par bdag cag lha'i rgyal po rnams rtag tu de'i mdun du mchis te/ gtsang zhing
170a7(mdo sde): dag par bgyis la mchod rten gyi nang ngam/ mi phal gyi gnas sam/ dben pa'i phyogs gang na gnas sam/ yang na mdo sde 'di sbra ma phyed pa'i yan lag gis 'dzin kyang rung / bdag
170b1(mdo sde): cag gis mi de la mi rigs pa'i gnod pas mi tshugs par bgyi'o// de mchis pa'i gnas kyi khyim gyi rim gro yang bgyi'o// bdag cag lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa thams cad kyis/
170b2(mdo sde): de phan tshun mchin yang de'i mdun du 'dren cing shul sel ba dang / ci 'tshal ba bsgrub par par bgyi'o// de phyogs bzhi dag tu mchis na yang sgrib cing chags pa ma mchis la/ rtag tu dge
170b3(mdo sde): pa'i chos thos pa dang / tshe brjes na lha'i nang du skye ba dang / de'i bsod nams kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mjal cing / theg pa chen po las mi nyams par bgyi'o// de nas
170b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha ma srin rnams kyi rgyal po la sogs pa de dag la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// de
170b5(mdo sde): bzhin te/ khyed kyis smras pa de bzhin te/ chos kyi gzung 'di lta bu 'di thos par yang bka' na/ rtogs par lta smos kyang ci dgos/ chos kyi gdung 'di len cing 'dzin pa
170b6(mdo sde): 'don cing klog par byed ni/ gtsang sbra dang khrus kyis dag cing dad par byas la/ gos gtsang ma bgos te gnas gtsang mar byas la dar gyi bla re dang ba dan la sogs pas gnas kyi nang
170b7(mdo sde): bzang por byas te brgyan la/ spos mchog tu dri zhim pa/ tsan dan dang phye ma dag gis byug pa dang / spos rnam pa mang po bsregs nas phyag 'tshal te/ nyin zhag gcig la nyin
171a1(mdo sde): lan gsum mtshan lan gsum de lta bur nyin mtshan gyi bar du chos kyi gzhung 'di klog cing 'don te/ sems mi g.yengs pa dang / dran pa mi g.yel zhing gcig tu
171a2(mdo sde): rtag pa dang / bsam pa drang ba dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag cing 'gro ba dang len cing 'dzin pa ma 'khrul pa dang / spyod pa brtan pa dang / 'don cing zlos pa/ phyin ci ma log
171a3(mdo sde): pa de lta bu'i tshul du mdo sde 'di las bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod cing bklags la/
171a4(mdo sde): mos shing gus pas de ltar phyag 'a tshal zhing 'chang ba ni mdo sde 'di las bshad pa bzhin du sdig pa thams cad yang dag par bsal bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rtogs
171a5(mdo sde): pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi gzhung 'di ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang spyod cing sbyangs la byin gyis brlabs nas yongs su gzung ste/ sangs
171a6(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi yum mo// mdo sde rnams kyi rgyal po'o// mchog gi gzung gi ni mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni lam mo// rtogs pa chen pos yongs su
171a7(mdo sde): rgyas pa 'di mchog tu zab pa'i chos kyi gzhung gi snying po'o// gcig tu dper na 'jig rten na chen po bzhi la sogs pa rnam pa drug dang mtshungs shing bsam gyi mi khyab ste/ drug/
171b1(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ sa chen po dang / chu chen po dang / me chen po dang / rlung chen po ste/ chen po bzhi dang / nyi ma dang / stong pa ste drug go// de la mdo sde 'di ni dper na
171b2(mdo sde): sa chen po dang 'dra bar gtsang sme dang / che chung dang / bzang ngan theg pa yin no// yang mdo sde 'di ni dper na chu chen po dang 'dra bar mi gtsang ba'i ldan ljin dang dri ma thams cad dag
171b3(mdo sde): par khru ba yin no// yang mdo sde 'di ni dper na ma chen po dang 'dra bar las dang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma mi gtsang ba'i slar sbur thams cad sreg pa yin no// yang mdo sde 'di ni dper na rlung chen/
171b4(mdo sde): po dang 'dra bar las dang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma mi gtsang ba'i phyag dar thams cad 'thor zhing 'bud pa yin no// yang mdo sde 'di ni dper na nyi ma dang 'dra bar ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad kun
171b5(mdo sde): tu snang bar byed pa yin no// yang mdo sde 'di ni dper na nam mkha' stong pa dang 'dra bar dngos po ma lus pa thams cad go byed cing shong bar byed pa yin no// theg pa chen po mdo sde rtogs
171b6(mdo sde): pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di rgya che ba ni bla med pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' man chad/ nyan thos drang / 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs
171b7(mdo sde): med pa la thug pa thams cad shong bar byed do// de bas na khyed kyis mdo sde 'di long la yongs su gzung ba dang rgya cher spel zhing khyab par gyis shig/ mdo sde 'di la mos shing gus par
172a1(mdo sde): gyis te/ khyed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis rtag par sangs rgyas kyi ye shes khong du chud la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
172a2(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid mthong bar gyis shig/ khyed lha'i rgyal po dag mdo sde 'di len cing yongs su 'dzin pa rnams kyis rtag tu dang ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ste/
172a3(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba mthong bar gyis shig/ de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa'i nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i mtshan zhes bya ba stan las langs te gos legs par
172a4(mdo sde): gyon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo zos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sogs pas skye bo mang
172a5(mdo sde): la ldan pa dang bde ba'i slad du gsol zhing zhu na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i mtshan la bka' stsal pa/
172a6(mdo sde): mos pa'i mtshan khyod kyis skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir nu ba zhus pa legs so legs so// khyod kyis ci dang ci nus pa nyon cig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o//
172a7(mdo sde): khyod kyis zhus pa yang dpag tu med pa'i skye bo la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i mtshan gyis 'di skad ces
172b1(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dran par sngon 'das pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das mtshan rin chen gtsug tor zhes 'gyi ba de'i mtshan lamacig tsam thos pas kyang ma
172b2(mdo sde): bathob bo// smad kyi yun mi ring ba zhig na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces pa'i khams yul dgon pa'i nags shig la/ lu ma chen po zhig mchis pa'i chab bskams te/ de'i nang na chab
172b3(mdo sde): nyastong phrag bcu zhig gdugs kyis gdungs nas 'gum du nyo ba zhig mchis pa la/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'beb zhes bgyi ba zhig gis chab nya de dag mthong ba dang / snying rje'i sems
172b4(mdo sde): skyes te/ chab dang zas kyi sbyin pa stsal nas dgung mang po mi thub cing 'tsho ba yun mi ring bar 'tshal te/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis bcom ldan 'das rin chen
172b5(mdo sde): gtsug tor gyi mtshan lan gsum brjod pas/ nya de rnams kyis thos pas/ tshe 'phos ma thug tu sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lhar skyes so// de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das
172b6(mdo sde): 'khor 'di dag dang ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la sman pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan bstan cing bsgrags par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan yang
172b7(mdo sde): thos na/ dpag tu ma mchis shing brjod du ma mchis pa'i skye bo la sman pa dang bde ba thob cing rtag tu mongs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang / dpag tu ma mchis pa'i/
173a1(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi gter rnyed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyin kyang mngon sum du rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du gsol pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
173a2(mdo sde): parnams shing / rgan mongs pas 'khrul pa'i sems can rnams yongs su thar par 'gyur pa'i slad du bstan pa macom/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chubs pas dpa'
173a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po mos pa'i mtshan la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gal te ngas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan rdzogs par bstan na/ bskal po khrig phrag brgya sngo
173a4(mdo sde): gi bar du bstan kyang rdzogs pa'i mtha' med do// chu thams cad kyi thigs pa'i grangs ni bzang ning shes par rung gi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mtshan ni brjod kyi shes/
173a5(mdo sde): par mi nus so// ri rab lhun po rnams kyang srang la gzhal zhing bgrang bar rung gi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mtshan ni brjod cing shes par mi nus so// 'jig rten/
173a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rdul thams cad ni bgrang zhing shes par rung gi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams kyi mtshan ni brjod cing shes par mi nus so// nam mkha'i mtshams dang mtha' ni
173a7(mdo sde): shes par rung gi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mtshan ni brjod cing shes par mi nus so// de bas na ngas khyod la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
173b1(mdo sde): mtshan mdo tsam zhig bstan te/ de gang zag la las rna bar lan cig tsam thos na/ mi de tshe 'phos ma thag tu lba'i gnas su skye'o// zos nas mos pa dang gus pa byas la/
173b2(mdo sde): ger bris sam/ mtshan nas brjod cing phyag 'a tshal na/ 'khor ba dpag tu med pa'i sdig lci ba kun byang ste/ bsod nams tshad med pa thos pas/ gang zag de dus zad nas
173b3(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yid la smon pa bzhin du skye ste/ nga yang mthong la/ ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas
173b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed la sogs pa rnams chos thob par 'don na/ tshul bzhin du gos legs par gyon la lus srang ste/ sems
173b5(mdo sde): mi g.yeng zhing dran pa mi g.yel bar shin tu yid la byos te/ sems rtse gcig tu bsdus la phyag tshol cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mar me'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo//
173b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal ba la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' las
173b7(mdo sde): gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
174a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa shAkya thub la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad bsdus shing 'dzin pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// dpag cing /
174a2(mdo sde): gzhal ba las 'das pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M dang dpe med pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// chos mu med pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// bsam dpag dka' ba la gus
174a3(mdo sde): par phyag 'tshal lo// stobs kyi stobs la gnas pa'i stobs la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsum na
174a4(mdo sde): btsun pa la gus pa phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad kyi lam ston pa chen po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gcod par mkhas pa la gus pa phyag 'tshal /
174a5(mdo sde): pha rol gyi mthar phyin pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten rnams las thar pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'chi 'pho'i lam dang yongs su bral ba la gus par phyag 'tshal lo//
174a6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba mngon du brnyes pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha' ltar ci la'ang mi gnas pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// mang po'i nang na chos kyi rgyal po chen
174a7(mdo sde): po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// bdud bzhi'i tshogs bcom la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// bu gcig pa'i pha ltar byams pa chen po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// tshe rabs gar byung
174b1(mdo sde): gar skyes kyang sangs rgyas thams cad mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin mngon par rtogs la/ mya ngan las 'dras pa chen po nyid du phyin par smin to// de ci'i phyir na//
174b2(mdo sde): rAlus can thams cad gang la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod pa'i phyir ro// 'khor mang po rnams sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te/ sems rtse gcig tu gus par mchod
174b3(mdo sde): cing legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig/ nga yis phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan brjod pas// mtshams med lnga po'i sdig las kyang // rnam
174b4(mdo sde): par grol ba sems skyed cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa'i mi// de yi phyir yang ngas bshad de// de yis rtogs par ma nus kyang // sa bon tshig par rang 'byung ngo // yang dag
174b5(mdo sde): bden pa baba' zhig yod// theg pa chung ngu'i mtshan bsal na// theg pa chen po de nyid yod// theg pa rnam gnyis bsal bas na// theg pa gcig po kho na yod// dge
174b6(mdo sde): pa'i rtsa ba med pa'i mis// tshig 'di thos par mi 'gyur te// sangs rgyas grangs med sngon mchod pas// da ltar bcom ldan mtshan thos so// len cing 'dzin pa'i gang zag
174b7(mdo sde): ni/ phyogs tsam las ni rnam grol te// rnam dag sa la'ang bde bar gnas// da ltar nga yi chos 'di la// len 'dzin klog cing bdon pa dang // bcom ldan mtshan la phyag
175a1(mdo sde): byas shing // sangs rgyas mdzad la bsgrubs pa yis// bdud tshogs las dang bral bar 'gyur// phas pham bzhi dang mtshams med lnga// 'dod chen po//
175a2(mdo sde): yang byang gyur nas// ma 'ongs dus na mi de dag/ byang chub 'tshang rgya gdon mi za// gang zhig mos par mi byed na// ngan song gsum du nges par lhung // phyag 'tshal brtson zhing
175a3(mdo sde): mos bskyed na// sangs rgyas grangs med mthong 'gyur bas// rtse gcig sems kyis phyag 'tshal rigs// sdig pa thams cad byang 'gyur te// de bas gus shing mos par gyis//
175a4(mdo sde): de nas 'khor mang po rnams thal mo sbyar te// lus dang sems nan tan du bsdus shing bsrangs nas/ mi g.yo zhing mi 'gyur bar lus kyi yan lag lngas la gtugs nas sems
175a5(mdo sde): rtse gcig gis shin tu legs par nyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan nas brjod de bka' stsal pa/ snga ma 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
175a6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med pa rnams la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi bla mar me snang stong phrag nyi shul gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
175a7(mdo sde): mar me mdzad stong phrag sum cu la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu rtogs chen ye shes rgyal ba la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bu
175b1(mdo sde): bcu drug la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa song ba'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngal gus par phyag pa rol lo// de
175b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dbyangs kyi rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dbang mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
175b3(mdo sde): pa dgongs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bod grangs med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i sku thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
175b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan nyi bla ltar dang zhing snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mon ma dag yongs su mkhyen pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
175b5(mdo sde): pa gtsang mas brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de
175b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'brug gi sprin dbyangs sngon gyi rgyal po ye shes pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shing sA la'i
175b7(mdo sde): rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mchog rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rnam dag rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
176a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i 'od 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'ong rgyang ring la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
176a2(mdo sde): panyi zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dri la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dge ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab lha'i/
176a3(mdo sde): dbu rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad ri rab lhun mnyam la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i mdog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yang
176a4(mdo sde): dag dgongs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med//
176a5(mdo sde): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba'i sa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUR+Ya pad+ma'i mchog la
176a6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser mdog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshal
176a7(mdo sde): lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
176b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i zla'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam grol pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong snang brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
176b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa blo gros rgya mtsho mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chu bod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsung chen la phyag 'tshal lo//
176b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dri ma bral la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa skyo yid spangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
176b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa gtsug mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtsal gyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab yon tan 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo//
176b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla bi 'od zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi bI DUR+Ya'i 'od bla na med pa la
176b6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub me tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang zla bod la phyag 'tshal lo//
176b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla bod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i mdog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chu zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
177a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa the tshom rmugs pa sel la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal spyod 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa rnam/
177a2(mdo sde): dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dge ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dgo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis rlobs
177a3(mdo sde): ma phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab chos la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kal bing ka'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal la// de bzhin gshegs pa song
177a4(mdo sde): sbal phyag 'tshal la// de bzhin gshegs pa bu'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na gzhugs pa la phyag tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dang
177a5(mdo sde): phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
177a6(mdo sde): thogs med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zla med la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'o dang phro rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
177a7(mdo sde): rnam dag 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab bod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
177b1(mdo sde): 'od mi gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpag med bod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal med po dal phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
177b2(mdo sde): nyi zla bod las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan bzang gser mdog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rang du snang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
177b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin chen snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsung dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi zo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
177b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa klu'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
177b5(mdo sde): pa dri ma med pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dam pa'i ril phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
177b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa mi'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bla med dam pa pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
177b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs klu dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i gzi brjid rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal/
178a1(mdo sde): lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sna la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal /
178a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pazangs mdog tsan dan dril phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan bsrung 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yid bzhin rgyal
178a3(mdo sde): mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog brtsegs rab dga'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus bla ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de
178a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa yid bzhin rgyal mtshan mar me'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab sgron ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od
178a5(mdo sde): snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sra bstan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od kun tu 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
178a6(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i brtson 'grus che la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu rtsa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
178a7(mdo sde): pa thugs rje'i stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i snying po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dpung rgyan rgyal po la
178b1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rgol phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i rgyal po la/
178b2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser ri rin chen gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi pad+ma'i 'o da' bar mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
178b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'od snang sgron chen la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bla res mkha' snang mnga' mdzad stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi pad+ma'i
178b4(mdo sde): khod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rin chen pad+ma'i bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUR+Ya bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
178b5(mdo sde): dazhin gshegs pa sku mdog kun tu bstan pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes bod mi g.yo ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi rgyal
178b6(mdo sde): rnams btul ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes bod stong la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa shes rab rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo//
178b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten rnam dag yod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa'i
179a1(mdo sde): 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab zhi zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog btsun ye shes rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
179a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bla re mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i gdung bla ma'i ye shes gtso bo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
179a3(mdo sde): nyi zla'i 'od la phyag 'tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla 'od 'phrol phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab bdan rgyal ba bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
179a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dri med snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang mtshan la phyag kha tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od 'phro snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo//
179a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa gser pod kun tu snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra dbyangs dbang phyug sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
179a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa rgyal ba gsung mchog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rtag rgya la mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spu na ras gzigs rgyal
179a7(mdo sde): thabs brnyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab rgyal thabs brnyes pa bi na bza' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi dgongs
179b1(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sum bcu'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me/
179b2(mdo sde): tog ut+pa la'i 'od la phyag 'a tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson pas rgyal ba stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag
179b3(mdo sde): batshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab dga' 'khrugs med khrod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsung dbyangs tshad med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
179b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa mkhas pa'i 'od la phyag 'a tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs gser gyi rgya mtsho'i 'od la phyag 'a tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab ri dbang rgya mtsho'i thogs med
179b5(mdo sde): rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen thogs med la phyag 'a tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad thogs med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
179b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rtag tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rmongs mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa 'di bzhin gshegs pa sprul
179b7(mdo sde): pa'i sku thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bcu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
180a1(mdo sde): byugs sa// na gshegs pa sa pa la ga m+b+ha sa//
180a2(mdo sde): ga rnasalapas sa
180a3(mdo sde): pa lasum thag bsul phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum zag brgya'i phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag stongs grags tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
180a4(mdo sde): pa' bum phrag khri la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag khrag khrig bye ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams la phyag 'a tshal lo//
180a5(mdo sde): rnams la phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas 'khor ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba mo lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro// gal te gang zag la las snga ma 'das pa dpag tu med cing bgrang
180a6(mdo sde): ba las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a das rnams kyi mtshan thos na/ mi de bskal pa khri phrag brgyad cu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung ngo // de bas na gus
180a7(mdo sde): par phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams la// gang zhig gus par phyag 'tshal na// sdig byang sems kyis rang bzhi ni 'thob// mi dge bcu dang mtshams
180b1(mdo sde): med lnga/ phyin chad 'di dag mi spyod de/ yang dag chos thos rgyun mi da/ theg pa chen po'i tshul khrims rdzogs// de bye da lhur grus phyag 'angs// gang zags sa/
180b2(mdo sde): nim gtogs te// gcig ni phyogs snyoms chos la kur// gnyis pa de ni 'dod chen pa// gal te la las sems dag na// de ni 'dod chen ma yin te// sangs rgyas
180b3(mdo sde): grangs med cartag tu mthong / la las rtsa ba bzhi nyams shing // mtshams med lnga por bcas pa dag/ mos pa rnam dag bya nus na// des na chos bzhin gnas par rung // kun
180b4(mdo sde): gyis gus par phyag byas pas// mi dge bcu yis las rnams bsal// de phyir da ltar gus phyag 'tshal// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi mtshan bstan
180b5(mdo sde): pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcus mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa sa sor thob bo// nyan thos brgyad brgyas kyang theg pa chen po'i sems cung zad skyes so// dge slong
180b6(mdo sde): lnga sdong gis dgra btsam pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// lha dang mi 'bum ni chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dgag/ da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal //
180b7(mdo sde): nin gas pa rgyam pa ldang ba sum thas bcurnamasas phyog la la// de bzhin gshegs parna ma dag sa phyi ma dgal byag rnams// debazhinas sems pa cad me/
181a1(mdo sde): sngang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'khor lo 'od snang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsung brtsegs la phyag 'tshul lo//
181a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i thong ka'i mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun 'od yon tan ri'i rgyab
