241a1(mdo sde): pa yin te/ de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'ang/
241a2(mdo sde): shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de'i tshe de'i rnam par shes pa nam mkha' mtha'
241a3(mdo sde): pas skye mched dang ldan pa yin te/ de rnam par shes pa mtha' las so snyam nasapa rnam shes mtha' yis skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las s+yA
241a4(mdo sde): dag par 'das nas/ ci yang med do snyam na ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min
241a5(mdo sde): skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de'i gong na gang sems kyi mtshan ma med pa'i rgyu ba thams cad 'gags pa sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba 'di ni 'gog pa zhes bya ste/ de ni shes pa
241a6(mdo sde): bya'o snyam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' snyoms par 'jug gi/ de la mngon par dga' ba'i rten gyi gnas mi bskyed do// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kho na med pa la 'gran zla med pa// gnod
241a7(mdo sde): pa med pa/ yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te/ khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so// gcig tu ji lta ba
241b1(mdo sde): de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa dang / de bzhin du bzhi pa dang / zla dang 'og dang thad kar rnam pa thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'dis/
241b2(mdo sde): byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa' 'aglan bla med pa/ gnod pa med pa yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas
241b3(mdo sde): nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa / 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs brgya
241b4(mdo sde): chen por gyur pa tshad med pa mi gnyis pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so// gcig tu ji lta ba bzhin du gnyis pa dang de/
241b5(mdo sde): bzhin du gsum pa dang // de bzhin du bzhi pa dang // tha dang / ga ga zad kar 'jig rten 'di thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di la btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems
241b6(mdo sde): kho na med pa// 'gran zla med pa gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas
241b7(mdo sde): so// de mngon par shes pa lnga skyed do// de la yang ma zhen pa yin to// gong du yang byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshogs rnams yongs su tshol lo// rigs kyi bu chos
242a1(mdo sde): bcu po do dag dang ldan nas byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub
242a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag med pa la mkhas pa rnams yin ka las kyi rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa rnams yin
242a3(mdo sde): 'dus byas la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'khor ba'i rgyun la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'khor ba'i ldog pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mkhas pa rnams yin//
242a4(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la mkhas pa rnams yin/ bdud kyi las yongs su spong ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ ma log pa'i shes rab can rnams yin/ mnyam pa med pa'i shes rab can rnams yin no// /
242a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdag med pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis gzugs la rtog/ tshor ba
242a6(mdo sde): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rtog ste/ de gzugs la rtog pa na/ gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs/ kun 'byung ba mi dmigs 'gog pa mi
242a7(mdo sde): dmigs so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs kun 'byung ba mi dmigs / 'gog pa mi dmigs so//
242b1(mdo sde): de'ang don dam par yin gyi/ tha smad kyi rang bzhin du ma yin te/ des don med pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / tha snyad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa'i rang bzhin de gnyis ka yang brjod pa'i rang
242b2(mdo sde): bzhin du mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir brtson 'grus kyang nyams par mi byed de/ mgo 'am gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du sems can rnams don du rtsol zhing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ rigs kyi
242b3(mdo sde): bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdag med pa la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' las kyi rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dngon/
242b4(mdo sde): de/ 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni gar gyi ltad mo dang 'dra ba/ dri za'i grong khyer lta bu rang bzhin gyis stong la/ sems can 'di dag kyang sems can ma yin na// 'on kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par/
242b5(mdo sde): zhen pas de dag de'i phyir lam khong du chud pa mi thob bo// de dag ni 'di snyam du gal te bdag gram/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba po 'am/ gso ba 'am/ skyes bu 'am gang zag
242b6(mdo sde): gam/ shed las skyes sam/ shed bu med na dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems mod kyi/ sems can med du zin kyang las kyi rnam par
242b7(mdo sde): smin pa'ang mngon no snyam ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' de ji ltar sems can de'ang med la/ ji ltar dge ba dang mi dge ba'i lam rnams kyi rnam par smin pa la yang mngon pa de yang dag pa'i
243a1(mdo sde): shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' las kyi rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems
243a2(mdo sde): dpa' 'dus byas la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas kyi chos rnams la yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rtog par byed cing 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dus byas
243a3(mdo sde): kyi chos 'di dag ni mi gnas pa/ mi g.yo ba/ zil pa'i thig pa lta buri bo'i 'bab chu lta bu yin na/ de la mkhas pa su zhig 'di lta bu'i chos rnams la zhen pa dang chags pa byed pa'am
243a4(mdo sde): de dag med par gyur pas/ mya ngan du byed snyam nasargyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des skyo ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa la sems gtong ste/ de ltar na byang chub
243a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'dus byas la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgyun la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod do// k+She me'o
243a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten na gnas pa 'di ni ma rig pas mdongs pa/ 'khor ba la phyogs pa/ sred pa'i zhags pas bcings pa ste/ len pa nye bar len to// de len pa'i rgyus dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i
243a7(mdo sde): las mngon par 'du byed de/ de dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa dang ldan pas/ srid pa'i nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur te/ de'i rgyu las skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba yod pas rga
243b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// za ba'i chos can ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro// 'chi ba las mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang ga 'khrug pa rgyun chags pa nyid du 'gyur te//
243b2(mdo sde): de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po de zo chun rgyud mo'i 'khor lo ltar 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyun du 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de'ang byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis
243b3(mdo sde): yang dag po ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgyun la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba ldog pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na
243b4(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/ ma rig pa med par gyur pas 'du byed la zhen par mi 'gyur/ 'du byed la zhen pa med par gyur pas rnam par shes par mi 'gyur/ rnam par shes
243b5(mdo sde): pamed par gyur pas/ ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang sred pa med par 'gyur ro// sred pa med par gyur pas len pa mi 'byung ste/ len
243b6(mdo sde): pa med pas srid pa'i nying mtshams sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro// srid pa'i nying mtshams sbyor ba med par gyur pas skye ba mi 'gyur/ skye ba med par gyur pas rga shi dang mya ngan dang sme
243b7(mdo sde): sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams rgyun chad par 'gyur te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag
244a1(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba ldog pa la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' can thos dang / rang
244a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/ chos 'dis ni rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur ro// 'dis ni lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur
244a3(mdo sde): 'dis ni phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur 'dis ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa srid pa'i kun tu sbyor ba chad pa nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par gzhol bar
244a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// chos 'dis ni rang sangs rgyas bse ru lta bur gcig pu spyod par 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu rtog par byed/
244a5(mdo sde): chos de dag mngon du yang mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de 'od snyam du sems te/ sems can gyi khams bdag gis bzung bdag gis seng ge'i sgra bsgrags te/ sems
244a6(mdo sde): can 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa na gnas pa thams cad bsgral lo zhes dam bcus la gcig pu 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas 'byung ba ni bdag gi mi cha'o snyam ste/ de ltar na byang
244a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems
244b1(mdo sde): dpa' bslab pa thams cad la yang slob la/ slob pa yang mi dmigs/ bslab pa yang mi dmigs gang slob pa de yang mi dmigs so// rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhi des
244b2(mdo sde): chad par lta bar yang mi ltung ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi las spang ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na
244b3(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' mi dge ba'i grogs po thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ mi ra ba'i yul la gnas pa dang / 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gsang tshig la rten cing
244b4(mdo sde): sgom pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / mchod pa dang rim grol che cher 'dzin pa thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su spong ngo // nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gzhan gang byang
244b5(mdo sde): chub kyi lam gyi bar chad du 'gyur ba de dag kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su spong zhing de dag gi gnyen po la yang ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi las yongs su
244b6(mdo sde): spang ba la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma log pa ni shes rab can yin zhe na 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten pa'i bstan bcos dang / gsang chog
244b7(mdo sde): dang / las dang / gzo'i gnas thams cad la shes rab stong ste/ de yang sems can na thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir te/ shes kyi khe 'dod pa dang / grags pa 'dod
245a1(mdo sde): bya/ pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i che ba nyid brjod pa'i phyir te/ de la yon tan du lta ba'i phyir ni ma yin
245a2(mdo sde): no// gzhan du na de 'dri snyam du sems te/ gsung rab 'di dam pa sdu/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba'o snyam nas ka de de la yon tan du skabs muM sngags can gzhan
245a3(mdo sde): gyi lta ba can du mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma log pa'i shes rab can yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa med pa'i shes rab can yin zhe na
245a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa skye dgu dge sbyong bram zer bcas pa'i lha dang / mi dang lha ma
245a5(mdo sde): yin du bcas pa'i nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par gang dang shes rab mnyam pa de lta bu'i sems can sems can gyi ris na
245a6(mdo sde): med de/ de ni 'jig rten lnga dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / skye dgu dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa lnga dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
245a7(mdo sde): pa'i nang na/ shes rab kyi bye brag gis zil gyis ma non pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa med pa'i shes rab can yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/
245b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no//
245b2(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yongs su sngo ba'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/ mu stegs can rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/ yul las rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas
245b3(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ 'gyod pa'i yid la gcags pa sel ba'i thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/ sems can la dpung gnyen byed pa'i thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin// sems can 'tsho
245b4(mdo sde): ba'i thabs nye bar spyod pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ len pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/ gnas nas gnas su spong ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /
245b5(mdo sde): yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par shin tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i thabs mkhas pa rnams
245b6(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su sngo ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di dag me tog gi rnam pa'am
245b7(mdo sde): 'bras bu'i rnam pa nga yi bya ba med pa yongs su bzung ba med pa de rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dbul lo// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang tha na/
246a1(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// de gang 'di dag bdug pa'i shing ngam/ spos kyi shing ngam/ rin po che'i shing ngam/ dpag bsam/
246a2(mdo sde): gyi shing ngam/ me tog gi shing ngam/ 'bras bu'i shing nga lir bya ba med pa yongs su gang ba med pa de dag kyang nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnams la
246a3(mdo sde): dbul lo// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// de mdo sde rnams las mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba gang 'di dag rgya chen po rgya che ba dag
246a4(mdo sde): nyan cing de dag snying thag pa nas lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su bsngo'o// gang phyogs bcu na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang
246a5(mdo sde): de ma yin pa'i sems can dag dge ba'i las rnams byed cing / byang chub kyi tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag la snying thug pa nas rjes su yi rang ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na
246a6(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs la me tog gam/ bdug pa 'am/ spos
246a7(mdo sde): gsol na/ sems can thams cad kyi 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dring bsal ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri thob par yongs su bsngo'o// de phyag bdar dang zhal
246b1(mdo sde): zhal byed na sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam mi sdug pa med par 'gyur ba dang / spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs par yongs su bsngo'o// de me tog gi gdugs gsol na/ sems
246b2(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// de gtsug lag khang ga nang du 'gro na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad mya
246b3(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du gzung ngo snyam du sems bskyed do// de phyir 'byung na 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i btson ra nas 'don to snyam du sems bskyed do//
246b4(mdo sde): gnas khang gi sgro 'byed na 'di ltar 'jig rten las 'das paM'i ye shes kyis bde 'gro thams cad kyi sgo dbye'o snyam du sems bskyed do// de sgo gcod na 'di ltar ngan 'gro thams cad kyi
246b5(mdo sde): rnams gcad do snyam du sems bskyed do// de 'dug na 'di ltar sems can thams cad byang chub kyi snying po la dgod do snyam du sems bskyed do// de glo g.yas pas chal na 'di ltar sems can
246b6(mdo sde): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam du sems bskyed do// de de nas ldang na 'di ltar sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang
246b7(mdo sde): rnams las bslang ngo snyam du sems bskyed do// de lus kyi tshod la 'gro na 'di ltar semams can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i 'gros su 'gro bar gyur cig snyam du sems bskyed do// de der
247a1(mdo sde): 'dug na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi zug rngu dbyung ngo snyam du sems bskyed do// de bkru bshal byed na 'di ltar
247a2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma'i skyon rnams bkru'o snyam du sems bskyed do// de lag pa bsngal na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dring ba rnams bsal lo/
247a3(mdo sde): snyam du sems bskyed do// de rkang pa 'khru na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul rnam pa sna tshogs bsal lo snyam du sems bskyed do// deso shing zan 'di ltar sems can
247a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi dri mi rnam pa sna tshogs bsal lo snyam du sems bskyed do// de la lus kyi g.yo ba thams cad sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar yongs su bsngo'o// de de bzhin
247a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshal na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar shog cig sngam sems bskyed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems
247a6(mdo sde): dpa' yongs su sngo ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mu stegs can rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste/
247a7(mdo sde): mu stegs can dpyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa'i mu stegs can gyis gnas de dang de dag tu 'phrul pa dag mngon par sprul te/ de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/
247b1(mdo sde): thabs byed cing de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di rnams nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non nas/ bdag gis sngar slob dpon gyis tshul gyis gdul bar ni mi nus kyi slob mar khas thang/
247b2(mdo sde): snyam ste/ de dag gi khrod du rab tu 'byung ngo // de rab tu byung nas ji ltar spyod pa dang / spyod yul dang / mang du thos pa dang / spyod pa dman tshegs kyis kyang mu stegs can gzhan de dag zil gyis
247b3(mdo sde): non pa de lta de lta bur rtsol lo// 'bad do// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// de dag gi nang ni slob dpon dang bla mo lta bur bkur bar 'gyur/ chog zung zhing ngag mi gcog par 'gyur tekakye sems
247b4(mdo sde): can de dag nye bar gyur pa'o snyam du shes nas grogs po dge 'di ni skyo ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam yin no zhes mu stegs can de dag gis bsngags pa ma yin/
247b5(mdo sde): pa rjod par 'gyur te/ des mu stegs can gzhan de dag gnas de rnams las bslang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la 'god do// de phyi rol gyi mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dag gi nang
247b6(mdo sde): du tshangs par spyad pa spyod do// de tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing rlos de thob par bya ba'i phyir spyod cing rtsol lo// 'bad do// de rtsol zhing 'bad pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang
247b7(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub te/ ci nas kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa gzhan de dag pas mes mchog tu 'gyur ba dang / ches 'bar bar 'gyur ba dang / slob dpon gyi mchog tu
248a1(mdo sde): gyu/ 'gyur ba dang / mkhas par bkur bar 'gyur ba de ltar bsgrub bo// des sems can de rnams yongs su smin pa'i dus dang tshod shes nas pa grogs po dag lam/
248a2(mdo sde): 'di ni skyo ba dang / 'dod tshogs dang bral ba dang / 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam mo yin no zhes bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa
248a3(mdo sde): brjod pa ma yin te shA des sems can de dag gnas de las bslangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'god de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mu stegs can
248a4(mdo sde): rnam par zlog pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul las rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe nag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems//
248a5(mdo sde): can gang rab tu 'dod chags can rab tu 'dod chags mang ba'i sems can mthong na des de dag 'dul ba'i thabs gzhan med do snyam nas/ des de dag gi drung du bud med sprul pa
248a6(mdo sde): bzang mo blta na sdug pa bud med thams cad kyi mchog dag sprul te/ sems can de rnams de dag la rab tu chags par rig nas sprul pa'i bud med de ga mal de nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byed du
248a7(mdo sde): 'jug go// de yang skad cig de nyid dang / yud tsam de nyid dang / thang cig de nyid la rul cing dring ba dang 'jig par 'gyur te/ de dag gis kyang de mthong nas/ sngangs skrag skyo bar red de/
248b1(mdo sde): bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i dring ba'i nang nas gang thar bar byed pa su zhig yod ces nyam thag par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems can de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste/ byang chub
248b2(mdo sde): gsum las gang yang rung ba'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba'i de ltar sems can de dag la chos skyon te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul las rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no//
248b3(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gyod pa'i yid la gcags pa sel ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can su mtshams med pa'i las byed pa 'am/
248b4(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i las byed pa mthong na de'i gan du song ste/ de skyes bu ci'i phyir yid mi bde zhing mi dga' bar gnas zhes de skad zer ro// des kyang smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis mtshams med
248b5(mdo sde): pa'i las byas pas/ de'i phyir bdag la yun ring por gnod pa dang / phan pa med pa dang / sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur grang zhes yid mi bde zhing mi dga' bar gnas so// de'i phyir de la byang
248b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i sdom pa 'dzin du 'jug go// nyes pa'ang 'chags su 'jug go// de la chos bstan pa zab mo zab mo yang byed do// de ste 'gyod pa mi gtong na de'i phyir de la byang chub sems
248b7(mdo sde): dpa' thog mar 'di lta ste/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ sems kun rjod pas/ yang dag par yid ches pa skyed do// de nas sems can de yang dag par yid ches pa bskyed nas/ byang chub sems
249a1(mdo sde): dpa' de la dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang rangs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// de dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs pa rnyed pas de chos bstan du rung bar 'gyur/
249a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dang 'thun par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' des de'i mdun du 'di lta ste/ pha mar sprul pa mngon par sprul te 'di skad zer ro// kye skyes bu
249a3(mdo sde): khyod ltos la 'gyod par ma byed cig/ nga yang khyod kyi grogs te las 'di lta bus su yang shin tu sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ don thams cad la nyams par 'gyur ba med do//
249a4(mdo sde): las de ye shes kyi bsal du mi nus pa yang ma yin no zhes de skad smras nas pha ma srog dang phral lo// srog dang phral nas kyang rdzu 'phrul de ston to// de nas sems can de 'di snyam du/
249a5(mdo sde): sems te/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas kyang pha ma srog dang bral na/ bdag 'dra ba lta zhig ci smos snyam mo// byang chub sems dpa' de yang de'i tshe/ sems can de la ci nas kyang de'i
249a6(mdo sde): las de sbrang ma'i 'dab 'dra bar 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i chos ston par byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gyod pa'i yid la gcags pa sel ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar
249a7(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems can la dpung gnyen byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang chos bstan par rung zhing nus//
249b1(mdo sde): padag mthong la de dag kyang shin tu mi dge ba'i las byed par 'gyur na/ de dag gdul ba'i thabs su byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul pa dag mngon par sprul te/ de la sems can gang
249b2(mdo sde): rnams rgyal pos 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la rgyal por sprul pa mngon par sprul par byed do// sems can gang rnams blon po chen pos 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la blon po chen por
249b3(mdo sde): sprul pa mngon par sprul par byed do// sems can gang rnams bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mis 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la/ bram ze dang
249b4(mdo sde): rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mir sprul pa dang / sems can gang rnams lhas 'dul ba de dag la ltar sprul pa dang / gang lag na rdo rjes 'dul ba de dag la
249b5(mdo sde): lag na rdo rjer sprul pa mngon par sprul par byed do// sems can gang rnams 'jigs pas 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la 'jigs pa ston// sems can gang rnams brdeg pa dang bsdigs/
249b6(mdo sde): pa dang / gsad pa dang / bcings pas 'dul ba de dag la de 'dra bar ston sems can gang rnams nges pas 'dul ba de dag la nges pas 'dul/ sems can gang rnams mtshams med pa
249b7(mdo sde): byed pa 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag la brgyad par 'dod pa de dag thabs sna tshogs kyis 'dog cing zil gyis gnon par byed phyogs gzhan du bkar bar byed do// mtshams
250a1(mdo sde): #med par 'gyur ba'i dngos po smras te/ de 'dra bar de'i mdun du sprul pa ston to// yang na sems can dmyal ba ston to// mngon par shes pa ma skyes pa'i byang chu/
250a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' tshe'i mtshan ma shes pa ni byed 'dod pa dang / gsod 'dod pa'i sems can de dag mthong nas/ snying rje chen po'i sems skyes te de yang 'di snyam du kye ma sems can
250a3(mdo sde): 'di rnams ni phung bar 'dod pa'o// kye ma sems can 'di rnams ni brlag par 'dod pa'o snyam du sems shing de dag nges lag mthil du skyu ru ra'i 'bru bzhag pa ltar mthong nas mi dga'
250a4(mdo sde): ba'i sems chen po bskyed do// de yang 'di snyam du sems so// bdag sems can gcig gi phyir yang sems can de phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su rab tu ma
250a5(mdo sde): gzhag gi bar du mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal bzar bar bzod na sems can 'di rnams kyang mi dge ba'i las byas te/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'dod pa thabs
250a6(mdo sde): gzhan gyis ni bzlog par mi nus te// sems can de rnams tshe yang thung / dad pa yang med pa dag cig la/ yul gzhan du bkar ba'am/ zil gyis mnan par bya ba de lta bu'i dbang ni bdag
250a7(mdo sde): la med na/ sems can 'di rnams mi dge ba'i las 'dis lus zhig nas/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar mi 'gyur grang zhes de'i phyir snying rje ba'i sems nye bar bzhag/
250b1(mdo sde): nas las bdag gir bya ba dang 'thun par byas nas sems can de rnams la byams pas khyab par byas te/ thabs gzhan gyis ni mi nus nas chad pa rab kyis 'chos te/ de ltar na byang
250b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems can la dpung gnyen byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can 'tshe ba'i thabs nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na/
250b3(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang rnams 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba shes par maM lcogs mi nus te/ zas dang gos lhur 'dzin cing de kho nas chog shes par rtse ba mthong na
250b4(mdo sde): de rnams la byang chub sems dpa' yi ge dang / bstan bcos dang / lag rtsis dang / grangs dang / shod thabs la sogs pa'i las dge ba dang ldan pa dag ston te/ mi dge ba
250b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa mi ston to// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can 'tsho ba'i thabs nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' len pa'i thabs mkhas pa
250b6(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i phung po ri ra ba tsam thob na yang len tekau dngos po ngan pa zhig thob na yang len to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de 'di ltar sems te/
250b7(mdo sde): sems can 'di dag ni ser sna can/ brkam pa/ chags pas zil gyis non pa 'dzums pa yin te/ rgyu de dang rkyen de dang / gzhi des chu'i phung po chen pos non pa
251a1(mdo sde): bzhin du 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub cing 'bying bar byed pa de dag la ka de ni yun ring por don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro snyam ste / de blangs nas bdag gi
251a2(mdo sde): mi byedapa chags pa'i sems mi skyed de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun drag la bya ba byed do// sems can sdug bsngal
251a3(mdo sde): ba'i rnams la phan par byed do// sbyin pa'i bdag po de yang yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par shin tu dga' bar byed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' len pa'i
251a4(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na'adi la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang bla na med pa yang
251a5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lcogs shing nus pa nig la/ de yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thob par rtsol zhing 'bad de/ brtson
251a6(mdo sde): 'grus rtsom pa mthong na/ de gnas de nas bslang ste tha na 'khor 'byed pa yang byas nas/ theg pa chen po la 'jog ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas nas gnas su slong
251a7(mdo sde): ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par shin tu dga' bar byed pa'i
251b1(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na ga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi sems skyed du 'jug/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i sems
251b2(mdo sde): can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba/ tshul khrims tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa dag ni brtson 'grus la 'jog/ sems can gang rnams bslab pa kun tu spyod pa phra mo las 'gal ba dag rgyu
251b3(mdo sde): de dang / rkyen de dang / gni des sems kun khengs shing 'khod de dga' mgu rangs par yang mi rnyed pa de dag la/ de ci nas kyang gnas de nas sdang ba de lta de lta bur chos ston par byed de//
251b4(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par gzengs stod pa dang / yang dag par shin tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// rigs
251b5(mdo sde): kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba 'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'byung bar
251b6(mdo sde): 'gyur te ka rnyed pa chung ngu yang chos kyi rnyed pas chog par 'dzin pa yin de dag gcig pu lkog tu song ste rab tu dben par gnas nas/ de 'di ltar sems te/ ma la bdag gis de
251b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba bsam mo snyam nas de de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sems he ga de ltar sems pa de'i pha
252a1(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa drug sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ de la gang mchod pa dang // rin/
252a2(mdo sde): gro bya ba mngon par byed pa 'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba de la gang sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i sems skye ba 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol
252a3(mdo sde): tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa dang rim gro bye ba de dag la gang sems mngon par mos shing dga' ba 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa dang rim gro bye ba de dag nyid la gang sems pa skyob
252a4(mdo sde): 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba de dag nyid la gang nye bar rtog pa 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba der
252a5(mdo sde): nyid la gang sna tshogs pa 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba'i thabs mkhas pa yir re/
252a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu ros bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam
252a7(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi dman pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ ma zhum pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson
252b1(mdo sde): pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin / bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ gzhan gyi dring pa/
252b2(mdo sde): mi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ mi skrag pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ yongs su mi skyo ba'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ legs
252b3(mdo sde): par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi dman pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i bde
252b4(mdo sde): ba'adod cing / smon lam mi 'debs te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi dman pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma zhum pa'i smon lam pa yin/
252b5(mdo sde): zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni khams gsum las skye ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog par smon lam mi 'debs te/ de lder na byang chub sems dpa' ma zhum pa'i sngon
252b6(mdo sde): lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems can gyi khams
252b7(mdo sde): ji snyed pa ma lus par de thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas nas/ bdag phyis sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bo zhes smon lam bdebs te
253a1(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag/
253a2(mdo sde): par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems ma skyes pa'i sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de thams cad byang chub kyi sems bskyed du bcug ste/
253a3(mdo sde): mthar gyis byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod du btsud nas/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa rnams la mchod pa dang bkur sti bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol ba gdab bo// yongs su rtsa
253a4(mdo sde): ngan las 'da' ba rnams kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir bzhugs su gsol lo zhes smon lam 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag/
253a5(mdo sde): par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di ltar
253a6(mdo sde): bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na ci nas kyang bdud kyi sgra 'am/ bdud kyi rigs kyi lha rnams 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis bya'o zhes smon lam
253a7(mdo sde): bde bas te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i smon lam
253b1(mdo sde): pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gyi dring la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam mi 'debs kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid kyis shes rab
253b2(mdo sde): kyis dpyad de/ sems can gyis khams sdug bsngal bal bltas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa
253b3(mdo sde): gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyis
253b4(mdo sde): tshogs rnams kyi phyogs 'ga' zhig bzung nas/ nyi tshe ba'i smon lam mi 'debs kyi byang chub sems dpa' ni bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ldang
253b5(mdo sde): sal btsugs te/ sems bskyed par byas nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bltas te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag phyogs bcun gnas pa dang / gang dag dka' ba spyod pa la gnas pa dang
253b6(mdo sde): gang dag byang chub kyi snying po la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas gang dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang dag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de rnams la snying thag pa nas
253b7(mdo sde): bsams te/ de dag gis chos bstan pa ji snyed pa de dag la mos par byed do// mos par gyur nas rjes su yi rang ngo // rjes su yi rangs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
254a1(mdo sde): / byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skrag pa'i smon lam pa
254a2(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las drang po pa yin yang ches zab mo zab mo rnams thos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba zab mo thos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par/
254a3(mdo sde): rol pa zab mo thos pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i tshul zab mo thos kyang mi skrag/ mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// de 'di snyam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing byang chub kyang mtha' yas//
254a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul yang mtha' yas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa yang mtha' yas te/ de ni bdag 'dra bas shes par mi
254a5(mdo sde): rus kyi/ sangs rgyas dag nyid kyis mkhyen gyi/ bdag gis mi shes so snyam du sems te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skrag pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang
254a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yongs su mi skyo ba'i smon lam pa yin zhe nu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dmu rgod sems can gdul dka' bar rigs te/ de rnams kyis yi chad
254a7(mdo sde): nas 'di lta bu'i dmu rgod 'di 'di lta bu'i gdul dka' ba'i sems can 'di dag gis rog go zhes te/ de'i phyir yongs su skyo zhing rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur te/ gang na sems
254b1(mdo sde): can 'di lta bu dag gi ming yang mi thos pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par smon lam mi 'debs so// sems can gyi don la ma phyogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni
254b2(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar yang mi 'gyur te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab can ni/ 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad na/ sems can
254b3(mdo sde): gang rnams ngan pa brtson 'grus rung ba blun po glen pa lug lhar lkugs pa'i rang bzhin can yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bya'i chos can sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'di las
254b4(mdo sde): bsdigs pa sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spangs par gyur pa yod pa de dag bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus par gyur la bdag gis
254b5(mdo sde): de dag byang chub kyi snying por 'dug tu bcug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ byang chub sems
254b6(mdo sde): dpa' de ltar sems bskyed pa re re la yang bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang rab tu g.yo'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyang de'i bsngags pa gsung bar 'gyur ro// de'i sangs
254b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems
255a1(mdo sde): dpa' yongs su mi skyo ba'i smon lam pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/
255a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ bdud kyi dpung gzhom pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
255a3(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya ba dang / yang de las 'das par smon lam mi 'debs pa 'di ni legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa zhes bya'o// 'di lnga ste/ dper na mar ram 'bru mar/
255a4(mdo sde): gyi snod kha rmad du gang ste/ lhag par rdul phra rab tsam gyi thigs pa yang mi shong na de'i phyir e ma'o snod gang ba e ma lo snod shin tu gang ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin du
255a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la smon lam legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ smon lam ma rdzogs pa rdul phra rab tsam yang med de// /
255a6(mdo sde): de bas na legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams
255a7(mdo sde): yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zi
255b1(mdo sde): gyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin
255b2(mdo sde): shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ dbang gi
255b3(mdo sde): stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin
255b4(mdo sde): bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/
255b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' pha rol rgol ba kun gyis mi non pa yin te/ de ltar na zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
255b6(mdo sde): mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de'i stobs la gang stobs kyis thub pa'o sems can de lta bu sems can gyi ris na med de/ de ltar na
255b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
256a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' ma bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs 'jig rten pa'ama'ajig rten las 'das pa de gang yang med de/ de ltar ra byang chub sems dpa'
256a2(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin
256a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i ye shes ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis mthong ba dang / mngon du ma byas pa dang / khong du ma chud pa de dag med de/
256a4(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
256a5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'khor tshul khrims nyams pa ma yin/ lta ba nyams pa ma yin/ cho ga nyams pa ma yin 'tsho ba nyams pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni ga byang chub
256a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' mtshungs par spyod pa rnams nyid yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul
256a7(mdo sde): gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thams cad dang gnyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi yul
256b1(mdo sde): thams cad zil gyis non te/ de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa mchog gi zil gyis gnon to// de 'dod na 'dzum bu'i gling gi sgra cag ma gcig gi rtse mo la 'jog go// de bzhin
256b2(mdo sde): du gling bzhi pa dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang de bzhin no// 'dod na gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
256b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab gcig la 'jog go// de bzhin du gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed khams dang / gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu
256b4(mdo sde): dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu nas brjod du med pa'i yang gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab gcig la 'jog kyang / rdul phra rab de la gang ba dang / bri bar
256b5(mdo sde): yang mi mngon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de rnams kyang phan tshun du 'das par mi 'gyur/ sems can de rnams la gnod par yang mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu
256b6(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod na/ stong gsum
256b7(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byin gyis rlob bo// de 'dod ni brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du rin po che rnam pa sna
257a1(mdo sde): tshogs kyis yongs su gang bar byin gyis rlob ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems/
257a2(mdo sde): dpa' gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na ga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom
257a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das ji snyed cig don tha dad pa dang / tshig dang yi ge tha dad pa dang / brjod pa tha dad pa dang / tshul tha dad pa'i chos bshad pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' skad cig yud tsam zang
257a4(mdo sde): cig gcig la thams cad 'dzin par byed/ khong du chud par byedabasgom par byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na/
257a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
257a6(mdo sde): rnams ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpas byin gyi rlabs byin du brlabs pa la gang rnam par 'khrugs par byed pa'i sems can de lta bu sems can gyi ris na med de/ de ltar na byang chub
257a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnam par mi'akhrug pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi spobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs
257b1(mdo sde): pa yin zhe na/ thabs mkhas pa ma gtogs par gang byang chub sems dpa'i bka' gcog pa'i sems can de lta bu sems can gyi ris nam mthong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byung /
257b2(mdo sde): rub sems dpa' bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// /
257b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu ros bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun
257b4(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyi
257b5(mdo sde): yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin// mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin / sems
257b6(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi
257b7(mdo sde): ye shes phun sum tsho gri rnams yin 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang zag la bdag med pa'i
258a1(mdo sde): ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpas phung po rnams skye ba yang yang dag par mthong 'jig pa dang 'gog pa
258a2(mdo sde): yang yang dag par mthong ngo // des phung po skye ba rnams snying po med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / gsog tu yang dag par mthong phung po 'gag pa rnams 'jig par yang dag par mthong /
258a3(mdo sde): ste de 'di snyam du sems phung po 'di dag ni bdag med pa sems cani med pa srog med pa gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa yin mod kyi 'on kyang byis pa so so'i
258a4(mdo sde): skye bo bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di dag ni/ 'di ltar bdag cag gi phung po rnams bdag go// bdag cag gi phung po rnams la bdag yod do// bdag cag gi bdag la bung //
258a5(mdo sde): po rnams yod do// bdag cag gi bdag ni phung po can no sum sde de dag bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pas/ de kho na nyid khong du mi chud do// de kho na nyid khong du ma chud pas
258a6(mdo sde): mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar 'khor ba na 'khyam mo snyam du sems shing / de thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
258a7(mdo sde): gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems
258b1(mdo sde): dpa' chos su skyob dogs pa dang / chos la skur pa yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de 'di snyam du glo bur du byung ba'i chos la kun brgyags pa'i ming gdags
258b2(mdo sde): chos de yang de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin/ yi ge de dag kyang de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin mod kyi/ 'di ni ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam du bya'o// 'di la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o// glo bur du zung ba'i
258b3(mdo sde): chos de yang thams cad kyi thams cad du med pa ma yin te/ gzhan gyi rkyen dang / gzhan gyi rkyen la sdod pa dang / gzhan gyi rkyen rnams kyis 'byung zhing rkyen dang bral na 'gag pa'i chos 'di
258b4(mdo sde): ni yod do zhes de thams cad byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no//
258b5(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpar nyi ba ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba'i ye shes skad cig gcig la 'jug cing skad cig gnyis pa la mi
258b6(mdo sde): 'jug pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes mthong ba ni/ skad cig thams cad la thogs pa med par 'jug ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i ye shes
258b7(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi ting nge
259a1(mdo sde): 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shesarang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes
259a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes so// des ting nge 'dzin gang dang ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la nyan thos spyod pa de dag yang rab tu shes de ting nge 'dzin
259a3(mdo sde): gang dang ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod sum gang sa rang sangs rgyas spyod pa de yang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gang dang ting nge 'dzin kyi spyod yul gang la byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa de yang rab tu shes
259a4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gang dang ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa de yang rab tu shes te/ de bzhin gshegs pas skabs phye nA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
259a5(mdo sde): rab tu shes kyi rnam par smin pas grub pas rang gi ye shes kyis ni ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin gcan rnams ni rnam par smin pas grub pa'i rang gi ye shes kyis rab tu shes te/
259a6(mdo sde): lngar ni byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yi man
259a7(mdo sde): bdi la byang chub sems dpas nyan thos kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes rang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes byang chub sems
259b1(mdo sde): dpa'i byir gyi rlabs kyang ji khu ba bzhin du rab tu shes na/ sems can de ma yin pa gzhan dag gi ldan smos te/ de ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum
259b2(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshegs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes ni mu stegs can thams cad
259b3(mdo sde): dang bdud thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun
259b4(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes
259b5(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa dang zhing rnyog pa med pas sems can gyi khams la rnam por lta ste/ des de na sems can la la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag dang / la la byang chub tu sems
259b6(mdo sde): ma bskyed pa dag dang / la la byang chub kyi sems bsgrubs pa dag dang / la la byang chub kyi sems ma bsgrubs pa dag dang / la las dang po la gnas pa dag dang / la las bcu
259b7(mdo sde): pa'i bair la gnas pa dag dang / la la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dag dang / la la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyis 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dag dang /
260a1(mdo sde): la la bya ba kun byas te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang la la nyan thos kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bdag dang la la rang sangs rgyas
260a2(mdo sde): kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang / la la bde 'gror skye ba dag dang / la la ngan 'gror skye ba dag mthong ngo // de ltar sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ste/
260a3(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lci ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum
260a4(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin ne na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'am/ 'greng ba'am/ 'dug pa'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba ni ldan gyis grub cing ye shes 'byung ste/ 'di lta ste
260a5(mdo sde): dper na miganyid kyis log pa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa dag lhun gyis grub cing 'byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes de yang de bzhin du blta'o// ye shes de yang
260a6(mdo sde): thams can du mi chags par 'jug / des can byang chub sems dpa' lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sumatshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na zung chu se sems dpa' ches thams cad /
260a7(mdo sde): mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yinanon/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad mtshan nyid mtshungs par yang rab tu shes/ mtshan chen gcig par yang ra
260b1(mdo sde): shes mtshan nyid du mar yang rab tu shes rgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang rab tu shes/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid du yang rab tu shes te/ de ltarar+yan kyang chu bas /
260b2(mdo sde): dpa' chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin cen/
260b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang zag pa med pa'i ye shes 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa dang ldan pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las
260b4(mdo sde): 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no//
260b5(mdo sde): dkon mchog sprin bam po gsum pa// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan nabyang chub sems dpa' sa dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta sa
260b6(mdo sde): yangs shing tshad med pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa rnams yin/ gnod pa dang lan du phana'i rigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyi sprin chen /
260b7(mdo sde): kun bzed pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa rnams yin dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa rnams yin/ rin po che'i snod du gyur pa rnams yin/
261a1(mdo sde): rtsi chen po'i snod du gyur pa rnams yin/ mi bskul ba rnams yin/ mi spangs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu des ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yangs
261a2(mdo sde): shing tshad med pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper nas chen po ni thams cad du yangs shing tshad med pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ bsod nams
261a3(mdo sde): dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis kun tu langs shing tshad med pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yangs shing tshad med pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams
261a4(mdo sde): cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin zhe na rigs kyi bu 'di lha ste/ dper na sa chen po ni 'di ltar yo byad rnam pa de dang de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi 'tshe bar gyur pa yin no// de bzhin du
261a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yang sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la sogs pa byang chub kyi tshogs rnams dang
261a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i yo byad rnam pa du ma de dang de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi batsho bar gyur pa yin no//
261a7(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnod pa dang / yar du pham 'dogs pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di lha lde/ rigs kyi bu dper nas chen po ni gnod pas kyang zhes 'gras par mi 'gyur
261b1(mdo sde): phan pas kyang rjes su chags par mi 'gyur te// de la gnyis su 'du shes pa mi 'byung ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang gnod pa dag gis kyang zhes 'gras par mi 'gyurapan
261b2(mdo sde): 'dogs pa dag gis kyang rjes su chags par mi 'gyur te/ don sems can de dgas chags pa dang / khang tho ba yang mi skye sa/ de sngar na byang chu ba sems dpa' gnod pa dang / yanang
261b3(mdo sde): phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sprin chen po kun bzed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lnga ste/ dper nas chen po ni sprin chen po las pa
261b4(mdo sde): ba'i chu'i klung chen po kun bzed de bzod cing kun 'dzin to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin chen po las chos kyi char pa chen po rab tu bab pa
261b5(mdo sde): kun bzed cing bzod le 'dzin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sprin chen po kun bzed pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa
261b6(mdo sde): yin ne na/ rigs kyi bu 'dis so/ dper na sa chen po ni sems can thams cad 'gro ba dang bong ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams
261b7(mdo sde): cad kyi bde 'gro dang mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems
262a1(mdo sde): dpa' dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa bon thams cad sa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa las skye'o// de bzhin du
262a2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i gzhir gyur pa las skye ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa yin no//
262a3(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i snod du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po ni rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snod yin te/ sa chen po la rin po che sna tshogs
262a4(mdo sde): kun snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yon tan rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snod du gyur pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' la yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kun snang ste
262a5(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i snod du gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi chen po'i snod du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rtsi chen po//
262a6(mdo sde): gang dag nad rnam pa sna tshogs zhi bar 'gyur ba dag kyang sa chen po la gnas te 'jig rten na snang ngo // de bzhin du gang dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nad rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams zhi bar 'gyur ba'i
262a7(mdo sde): chos kyi rtsi chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' la gnas shing 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi chen po'i snod du gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang
262b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mi bskul ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po ni 'di ltar sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sbrul gyis reg pa'i sdug bsngal/
262b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyis mi bskul ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad las byung ba'i phyir nang gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi bskul ba yin
262b3(mdo sde): tede ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi bskul ba yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi spangs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po ni glang po che'i
262b4(mdo sde): rgyal po 'am/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra thos kyang mi skrag/ mi dngang / dngang par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bdud dang mu stegs thams
262b5(mdo sde): cad kyi sgra thos na mi skrag/ mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi spangs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na
262b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chu dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no//
262b7(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba rnams yin/ dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed pa rnams yin/ dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gshed
263a1(mdo sde): pa can rnams yin / nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul ba rnams yin/ dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i yongs su/
263a2(mdo sde): gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa rnams yin/ 'dod pa la sred pa zlog pa rnams yin/ zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ mtho dman 'gengs pa rnams yin
263a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta
263a4(mdo sde): ste dper na chu ni gzhol bar 'gro ba dang gzhol bar rgyu ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos dge ba'i chos la gzhol zhing dge ba'i chos kyi phyir rgyu ba yin te/
263a5(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed pa yin zhe na rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
263a6(mdo sde): dper na chu ni rtse dang / shing gel ba dang / rtsi dang nags tshal thams cad skyed de/ skyes pa rnams kyang phyir zhing rgyas par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems
263a7(mdo sde): dpa' yang ting nge 'dzin gyi chus byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad rnam par bskyed do// skyes pa rnams kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing du gyur gyi bar du phyin zhing rgyas par
263b1(mdo sde): byed do// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing du gyur pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'bras bus rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can rnams 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang
263b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dkar po'i chos thams cad bskyed pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gshe can yin zhe na/ rigs
263b3(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na chu ni ngo bo nyid kyis gsher ba can yin te/ gzhan yang gsher bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ngo bo nyid kyis dga' ba dang
263b4(mdo sde): dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin te/ sems can gzhan yang dga' ba dang dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gsher can du byed do// de la dga' ba ni 'jig rten
263b5(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i chos tshol ba'o// dad pa ni sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun la rten pa'o// rangs pa ni gang sems dag pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
263b6(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
263b7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na chu ni shing gi rnam pa dang / rtsa'i rnam pa'i rtsa ba dag gi rgyun rnams srul lo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sgom pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi/
264a1(mdo sde): chus nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul te/ ji ltar nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun 'di dag gi ming yang mi shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i dring ba'i
264a2(mdo sde): bag chags kyang med par 'gyur ba de lta bur srul te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyuni thams cad srul ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dang
264a3(mdo sde): zhing rnyog pa med de gsal po yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na chu ni rang bzhin gyis dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal lo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang bzhin /
264a4(mdo sde): gyis dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal ba yin no// de la bag la nyal dang kun nas sdang ba dang bral bas na dang ba'o// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang bral bas na
264a5(mdo sde): rnyog pa med pa'o// dbang po rab tu dang bas na gsal ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon
264a6(mdo sde): mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na chu ni sa chen po dpyid kyi tshabs gdungs pa dang / de las gzhan yang sems can rnams
264a7(mdo sde): dpyid kyi tsha bas gdungs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pas gdungs pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad chos kyi chus rab tu zhi bar byed
264b1(mdo sde): de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdungs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la sred pa thog pa yin zhen/ rigs
264b2(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na chu ni skom pas nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi skom pa rnam par zlog go// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yul la sred pas nyen pa'i sems can
264b3(mdo sde): rten par gyur pa dag la gang gi sems can de dag gi yul la sred pa ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu chos kyi char mngon par 'bebs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la sred pa
264b4(mdo sde): zlog par byed do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lha ste/ dper na chu'i 'jing ni zab cing gting dpag dka'
264b5(mdo sde): ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yang dag par grub pa yang 'di lta ste/ bdud thams cad dang mu stegs thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' zhing
264b6(mdo sde): zab pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtho dman 'gengs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
264b7(mdo sde): dper na chu'i klung ni sa phyogs mtho dman bgengs so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu klung gis sems can gyi khams mtho dman 'gengs te/ ji ltar na
265a1(mdo sde): rus 'gengs pa ltar sems can la gnod par byed pa de lta bu byang chub sems dpa' ma yin gyi sems can de rnams la snying rtse ba'i phyir chos kyi ru klung //
265a2(mdo sde): 'bebs shing de dag la gnod par mi byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtho dam no tha geng sra ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams
265a3(mdo sde): cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ru ni sa'i phyogs skam zhing rdul 'thul ba thams cad snum par byed cing rdul de dag zhi bar byed do//
265a4(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can sems rtsub pa rnams 'di lha ste/ shes rab la gnas po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chus sems sdum par byed cing / sems can de/
265a5(mdo sde): dag gi nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de
265a6(mdo sde): dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chu dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' me dang mtshungs pa rnams yin/
265a7(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung thams cad kyang sreg par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ nyon mongs pa'i 'dam
265b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyang skam par byed/ me'i phung po dang 'dra ba rnams yin snang bar gyur pa rnams yin/ skrag par byed pa rnams yin/ dbugs 'byin pa rnams yin/ sems can
265b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa rnams yin/ mchod pa byed pa rnams yin/ mi brnyas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i phyag
265b3(mdo sde): dar khung thams cad sreg ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na me ri phyag dar khung dang / rtsa dang shing dang / gel ba dang / rtsi dang sdong po thams cad sreg go
265b4(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis bag la nyal dang / kun nas sdang ba dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ginyon mongs pa'i phyag dang khung thams
265b5(mdo sde): cad sreg ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung thams cad sreg pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par
265b6(mdo sde): byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na me ni lo tog dang / rtsi dang / sdong po'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su smin par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang /
265b7(mdo sde): shes rab kyis nang gi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par byed pa lang ji ltar 'jig par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su smin par byed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
266a1(mdo sde): kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'o// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad skam par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpe/
266a2(mdo sde): na me ni chu zan gyi 'dam thams cad skam par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis zag pa nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad skam par byed de/ de ltar na byang
266a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad skam par byed do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po dang 'dra ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper
266a4(mdo sde): ni sems can grang ba'i nad kyis nyen pa rnams kyi grang ba med par bya ba'i phyir/ mA'i phung po byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i grang ba'i nad kyis
266a5(mdo sde): btab pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i grang ba'i nad med par bya ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi sa rab tu dro bar byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po
266a6(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snang bar gyur pa yin zho na/ rigs kyi bu kha di lha ste dper na gangs kyi rtse mo' ma ri bin da'i rtse mo na me'i
266a7(mdo sde): phung po chen po 'bar ba des dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu snang bar byed/ dpag tshad gnyis kho ra khor yug dang / dpag tshad gsum kho ra khor yug tu yang snang bar byed do/
266b1(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dri pa la yang ye shes kyi snang bas dpag tshad brgyar yang khyab par byed/ dpag tshad stong du yang khyab par byed dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar yang khyab par
266b2(mdo sde): byed pa nas 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa grangs med pa'i bar du yang khyab par byas nas/ sems can thams cad la ye shes kyis snang bar byed de/ ye shes kyi snang ba
266b3(mdo sde): des mi shes pa'i mun pa mun gnag thams cad rnam par sel to// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snang bar gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skrag par byed pa
266b4(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na ri dgas khro bo 'am rigs kyi rgyal po khro bos me'i phung po chen po mthong na skrag/ rab tu skrag/ shin tu rab tu skrag par gyur cing /
266b5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ me'i 'jigs pas skrag pas gnas te de ring ba bas kyang shin tu ring bar spong ngo // de bzhin du bdud rnams sam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sem
266b6(mdo sde): dpa' mthong nas skrag/ rab tu skrag/ shin tu skrag par gyur cing / 'di lta ste/ gzi brjid chung ba'i phyir gang du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ming yang mi thos na / mtho
266b7(mdo sde): blta smos kyang mi smos par/ ring ba bes kyang shin tu ring bar sa'i phyogs de yongs su spong ngo // de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sgeg par byed pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems
267a1(mdo sde): dpa' dbugs 'byin pa yin zhe na ka rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na mi la la zhig 'brog dgon par 'khyams pa las me'i phung po chen po mthong ste/ re/
267a2(mdo sde): de logs su song ba dang / des ni grong ngam/ rdzi'u zang mthong nas de shugs byin te/ rab tu dbugs phyin nas/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du kyang
267a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par 'khyams pa'i sems can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong na ga 'azugs phyin par 'gyur/ rab tu dbugs phyin par 'gyur/
267a4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi thun
267a5(mdo sde): mong du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na me ni sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa ste/ ji ltar na rgyal po la phan par nye bar gnas pa ltar gdol bu la yang de bzhin
267a6(mdo sde): no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa yin te/ ji ltar na rgyal po la phan par nye bar gnas pa ltar gdol bu la yang de bzhin te
267a7(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na me/
267b1(mdo sde): la ni dam ze dang rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul 'khor gyi mi rnams kyis mchod do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin//
267b2(mdo sde): dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis ston par 'du shes pas mchod de// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya ba yin no// ji ltar na mi brnyas pa yin zhe na/ rigs
267b3(mdo sde): bu 'di lta sge dper na me stag chung ngu yang 'tshig pa'i bdag nyid yin pas na mi brnyas pa yin no// de bzhin du mos pas spyod pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mthu stobs ma
267b4(mdo sde): rnyed pa theg pa chen po la las dang po pa dang / lnga dang / mi dang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi brnyas pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang / klu dang
267b5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di ring por mi thogs par byang chub la 'dug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
267b6(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar khong du chud de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ma dang mtshungs
267b7(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas
268a1(mdo sde): med par spyad pa dang / spyod yul kun tu mu med pa dang / sems can nga rgyal gyis snyems pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing 'jig la rab tu snyil bar byed pa dang
268a2(mdo sde): chos kyi char sprin chen po kun skyed pa dang 'gro ba thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang sems can thams cad la chos dkar po lus 'thun par
268a3(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba dang / chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin pa dang chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gnal med khang chen po'i
268a4(mdo sde): bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su 'god pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag rnam
268a5(mdo sde): par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa dang bskal pa grangs med pa dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bsags pa ting nge 'dzin dang
268a6(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / 'od dang zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / khang pa dang
268a7(mdo sde): ba'i khor yug ri la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor na gdul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa bla na med cing lus med
268b1(mdo sde): par gnas 'pho bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas med par spyod pa yin zhe na
268b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni thams cad du thogs pa med cing gnas med nyon med de/ gzugs med kyang nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang /
268b3(mdo sde): ri rab dang / rgya mtsho la sogs pa thams cad la rang gi dgos pa byed par snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang chos thams cad la kun tu mi gnas pa yin
268b4(mdo sde): te/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang mig gi khams
268b5(mdo sde): dang gzugs kyi khams dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i
268b6(mdo sde): khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi
268b7(mdo sde): khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang
269a1(mdo sde): smig gi skye sa med dang / gzugs kyi sgyu ma med drung nuba'i skye mched da dzAk+sha'i skye mched da / rtswa'i sna ma dang / ts+tsha'i ste spyad
269a2(mdo sde): lce'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mchod dang / lus kyi skye mched dang / reg zla'i skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mnado dang / rlos skyem ched la mi gnas pa yin/ 'jig can pa
269a3(mdo sde): chos rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / 'khor lo sa sgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /
269a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong bdag tu 'gyur ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dag tu 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag tu 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams dang
269a5(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag la yang gnas par mi byed de/ de thams cad la mi gnas pas dngos po dang / dngos po med pa dang / gcig pa dang / tha dad pa dang / de bzhin
269a6(mdo sde): nyid la sogs par rlom sems kyi rnam pa du mas ma gyur cing dmigs pa med lnga rnam par thar pa'i sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jin
269a7(mdo sde): rten skyong ba la sogs pa yang byed la/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir// phyi ma'i
269b1(mdo sde): mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par thams cad du yang rgyu la chos kyi lus kyis mi snang ba yang yin zhing mi chog rnam par mi cog sde/ de skar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas med par spyod pa/
269b2(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul kun tu mu med pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu
269b3(mdo sde): med pa dag tu reg par byed de/ g.yob cing rgyu'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang / chos mu med pa dag kun rdzob dang / don dam par kun nas mthong
269b4(mdo sde): ning rgyas par byed/ reg par byed/ rnam par 'god cing ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag
269b5(mdo sde): dang 'khor ba thams cad kyi gnas dag tu yid kyi mgyogs pa dang ldan zhing phyogs bcu thams cad kyi mthar thug pa'i spyod yul bar gyur nas rgyu zhing 'gro ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar
269b6(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul kun tu mu med pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis snyoms pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing 'jig la rab tu sngam
269b7(mdo sde): par byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu bdi lha ste/ dper na rlung mar ni ri dang / khyim dang / nags tshal gyi rtse mo dag 'dud par byed/ rab tu snyil bar byed/ rnam par 'jig par
270a1(mdo sde): byed/ 'thor bar byed/ mi sdang bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang sems can nga rgyal dang / rlom sems dang / dregs pa
270a2(mdo sde): dang 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtse mos snyems pa rnams/ gzugs dang dar la bab pa dang / longs spyod dang / dbang dang / stobs dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang
270a3(mdo sde): 'tsho ba dang / bzo dang / zos pa dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / g.yog dang / smra mkhas pa dang / dpal che ba'i dregs pas myos pa dag dang / yang dag pa'i nan
270a4(mdo sde): tan gyis bdag sdod pa rnams la de dang khyad zhugs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa dang / chos bstan pas nga rgyal choms par byed cing dge ba dri ma med pa la sbyor bar byed de/ de ltar
270a5(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis snyems pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing 'jig la rab tu snyil bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char
270a6(mdo sde): sprin chen po kun nas skyed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni phyogs bzhi nas sprin gyi dkyil 'khor kha dog sna tshogs can dang / zab cing gsal sa
270a7(mdo sde): mnyen zhing 'jam pa'i 'brug sgra rgya mtsho'i dbyings can krung ro sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin cing yid du 'ong ba'i dbyings rjes su grag pa glog gi 'phreng ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa gang
270b1(mdo sde): dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya dag kun nas yongs su khebs par byas te/ 'gro ba thams cad dga' ba dang / lo tog nang sdong po yongs su bskyed pa'i
270b2(mdo sde): phyir/ char gyi rgyun rin po che rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'bebs pa'i sprin chen po kun nas slong ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang / lus sna tshogs kyi sprin
270b3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bar byed pa/ 'od zer kha dog mtha' yas pa'i glog gi 'phreng ba'i rgyun 'byu
270b4(mdo sde): ba yang dag pa de kho na nyid kyi chos kyi 'brug sgra yan lag stong phrag drug cu pas sgrog pa/ snying rje chen po'i rlung mar gyi yang dag par 'thor ba// chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i 'gro ba thams
