270b5(mdo sde): cad kyi nam mkha' khyab par byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun nas khebs par byas shing / ngan song dang / mi khom pa la sogs pa nas/ sems can rnams
270b6(mdo sde): rnam par bslang ste/ rnam pa thams cad du mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snang ba rnam par dag pa yang byin gyis rlabs te/ bkod pa thams cad kyi
270b7(mdo sde): rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag kyang byin gyis brlabs nas lha dang / mi dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa mchog tu gyur pa dga' ba dang / bde ba
271a1(mdo sde): mchog thob pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dkar po'i lo tog dang / rtsi chen po dang sdong po thams
271a2(mdo sde): cad rnam par bskyed pa dang / thams cad du skyid par chos kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / rgud pa/
271a3(mdo sde): rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi char chen po mngon par 'bebs te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin chen po kun nas skyed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji
271a4(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na rigs kyi bu 'a di lta ste/ dper ni rlung mar dri zhim po'i cher gyi rgyun
271a5(mdo sde): gyi snying po can ldang na sems can thams cad kyi gdung ba yongs su zhi bar byas shing lus shin tu sim pa dang bsil bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
271a6(mdo sde): rlung mar yang sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug dang / ngan gro dang ngan par lta ba dang / nyes byas dang / the tshom dang
271a7(mdo sde): longs pa mi bzad pa dang / yul la sred pa dang sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang bral zhing phrad pa dang nad rnams bcil nas dam pa ma yin pa'i chos la sred pa la sogs
271b1(mdo sde): pa'i gdung ba dag dam pa'i chos kyi char dang 'dres pa'i bla na med pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang smon lam dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / reg pa dang
271b2(mdo sde): 'grogs pa dang bstan pa don yod pa la sogs pas rab tu zhi bar byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed
271b3(mdo sde): cing nyon mongs pa med pa'i sa la 'god pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las 'thun par byung ba'i dbugs 'byung
271b4(mdo sde): ba dang rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta s+ye dper na dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngug pa'i rlung gi mthus sems can thams cad 'tsho'o// de ban
271b5(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpas mngon par bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bslabs pa'i chos dkon pa'i rlung mar ci bar spyad pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad skyed pas kyang sems
271b6(mdo sde): can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung myur ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'di lta sa/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams
271b7(mdo sde): dang khor yug ri dag dang / khor yug ri chen po rnams dang / gling chen po bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa'i gser gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang
272a1(mdo sde): bcas pa rnams dang / ri rab dang ri rab chen po dang / de ma yin pa rin po che'i ri dang gangs dang ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba dang grong rdal dang
272a2(mdo sde): nags tshal dang gzhal med khang dag dang / 'dzam bu'i gling dag dang gling chen po bzhi dag dang spong dag dang stong gnyis pa dag dang stong gsum gyi spong
272a3(mdo sde): chen po dag 'god pa rnam par bye ba sna tshogs pa mngon par sgrub bo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang phyogs bcu kun su sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung
272a4(mdo sde): po phun sum tshogs pa'i bar sgrub s+ho// skyed do// yongs sug zhog go/ des ji ltar grangs k+Shi ri phun sum tshogs pa de ltar 'jig cen pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa
272a5(mdo sde): rnams blta'o// ji ltar na gling chen po bani pa dang / ri rab phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni nyan thos kyi phun snam tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar stong gi 'jig chen gyi
272a6(mdo sde): khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni byang chub sems
272a7(mdo sde): dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar na srong gsum gyi spong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni/ 'jig rkyen thams cad las mngon par 'phags
272b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa shin tu rnam par dag par grags pa mchod pa la dmigs pa thams cad yang dag par gnas pa rnams
272b2(mdo sde): kyi thams cad mngon du byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// de la rgya
272b3(mdo sde): mtsho ltar ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho rnams blta'o// gling dang / bar gyi gling dang / ri gzhan dang / gling chen po bzhi la sogs pa ltar ni spyod ba dang / gzungs dang
272b4(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / slob pa'i dge 'dun la sogs pa blta'o// grong rdal dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang lhar ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing
272b5(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bkod pa rnams blta'o// dpag bsam gyi shing gi nags tshal rnams lhar ni/ sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang
272b6(mdo sde): gzungs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / ye shes snang ba dang / dbang dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs
272b7(mdo sde): dang mi 'jigs pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / thugs rje chen po la sogs pa dbang sgyur ba dam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i chos rnams blta'o// rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas
273a1(mdo sde): / bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na yongs su brtag pa gzung ste/ phyogs bcu'i/
273a2(mdo sde): phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed dag na sems can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad skyong gsum phrag bcu'i 'khor lo sgyur ba'i bsod nams/
273a3(mdo sde): kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur la de lta bu'i 'khor lo sgyur ba'i dngos po nyid dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa nyid bsdoms pa dang / 'khor los
273a4(mdo sde): sgyur ba chen po cig gcig ldan par gyur te/ rnam grangs des shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'das te/ de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems
273a5(mdo sde): can de snyed cig 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de 'dra ba nyid dang so sor ldan par gyur la/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas
273a6(mdo sde): gtugs pa dag na/ sems can yod de cog ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu sha stig dang so sor ldan par gyur te/ de bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis
273a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa de snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa'i brgya byin sha stag tu gyur la/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i
273b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i brgya byin rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung ba ji tsam pa de dang brgya byin cig gcig dang ldan par gyur te// de bzhin du
273b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha' mthas gtugs pa thams cad sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad brgya byin de dang 'dra ba sha stag tu gyur la/
273b3(mdo sde): bgrang ba de nyid kyis phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad tshangs pa chen por gyur la bsod nams de thams cad gcig
273b4(mdo sde): tu bsdoms pa dang / tshangs pa chen po cig gcig ldan par gyur la/ tshangs pa chen po ji lta bar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin du gyur te snga ma bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dag dang /
273b5(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po thob pa 'od zer gyi sprin chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba dbang bcu thob pa sha stag tu gyur te/ de ltar rigs kyi bu de
273b6(mdo sde): bu'i sems can thams cad phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang nam mkha'i khams su gtogs pa dus gsum pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa des
273b7(mdo sde): dus gsum gyi nam mkha'i khams su gtogs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab brgyar bsgyur bas de bzhin gshegs/
274a1(mdo sde): pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig mngon par 'grub bo// ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po brgya stong grangs med pa bcur bsgyur bas
274a2(mdo sde): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu las/ dpe byad bzang po re re mngon par 'grub bo// dpe byad bzang por gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de thams cad brjod du med pa bcur bsgyur bas
274a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa dgu las mtshan re re mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du med pa bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu zla ba/
274a4(mdo sde): ha ste/ dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor stong pas kyang lhag par mdzes pa'i 'od dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du med pa bye ba stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas de bzhin
274a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing bltar mi snang ba gtsug tor gyis yongs su brgyan pa mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du med pa'i yang
274a6(mdo sde): brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag stong phrag drug cu pa dmigs pa thams cad las gsung gi
274a7(mdo sde): sgra mtha' yas pa 'byung ba lhun gyis grub pas sems can thams cad bsam pa yongs su tshim par 'gyur ba 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du go bar byed pa mngon par 'grub ste/
274b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
274b2(mdo sde): tshogs mi zad pa dang ldan zhing kun tu rgyas par byed pa bkod pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu yongs su bcag pa bzung na gal te phyogs
274b3(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams bcu pa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa
274b4(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi rgyan 'chang ba dbang bcu la dbang sgyur ba sha stag tu gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig
274b5(mdo sde): tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i snod rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spras pa nam mkha'i tshad tsam gad+hA'i klung
274b6(mdo sde): gi bye ma sbed so so nas thogs te/ phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par yongs su bkang zhing skad cig skad cig tu blangs shing khyer yang spu'i khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod
274b7(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po de gang ba'am bri bar mi mngon te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de la sa bcu gnyis
275a1(mdo sde): gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i sa dang / rab tu dga' dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro na
275a2(mdo sde): dang / shin tu sbyang dka' dang / mngon du gyur dang / ring du song dang / ma~M g.yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin dang / sangs rgyas kyis kun tu 'o
275a3(mdo sde): des bcu gnyis po de dag go/ de la byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i sa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i byis pa'i spyod pa dang / log pa'i nan tan thams cad las
275a4(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das pa 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang khyad zhugs shing
275a5(mdo sde): 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa rnam pa thams cad du dpal dang ldan pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
275a6(mdo sde): mu med pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i spobs kyi shugs 'chang ba 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par skad cig ro rol 'gro zhing 'ong na
275a7(mdo sde): dri zhim po dang / 'od zer gyi za ba'i tshogs chen po gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig can gyi khams kun tu 'byung ba/ pad+mas rkang pa yongs su brtan pa spong gi 'jig can gyi khams kyi
275b1(mdo sde): mtha' dang mnyam pa'i sman gyi rgyan dang dran pa/ chos thams cad byin bu rnam par gnon pa'i lhas mthang rnam par byasgoms pas/ thogs pa med cing srid du 'ong ba'i dmabyas pa'i
275b2(mdo sde): mtshan mchen po bcul sogs pa grangs med pa'i lhas bzang ba mthong ba/ phyir mi ldeg pa phyogs kyi nags tshal thibs pa mtha' yas pa thams cad du 'od kyi drababs mgyis mi ldang par
275b3(mdo sde): tu 'gyed pas zhing dpag tu med pa'i rgyan byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi mnga' bdag dpag tu med pa snyed kyi bdag gi gzugs brnyan gyis dbang bskur ba
275b4(mdo sde): yang dag par gnod pa'i dbang dang byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rin po che char gyi snang ba'i sgo dpag tu med pa thams cad gtan pa med pa
275b5(mdo sde): kun tu rgyas par bgengs pa'i chos sbyin chen po'i sprin gtong ba lhur byed pa/ bltan bzang zhing yid du 'ong la mdzes shing dge la 'gro ba thams cad dang mi mthun pa med cing don yod par
275b6(mdo sde): bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par rab tu g.yo bar byed cing 'gro ba ngan 'gro la sogs pa la sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su
275b7(mdo sde): skyob pa mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang chos kyi sgo 'dzin nus pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi gzungs dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang rig pa
276a1(mdo sde): shA na sa du sus sa sa smra/
276a2(mdo sde): spun gyis 'grub pa'i dpa' gas kyi snang ba / bkas ba rje ba 'ag ga su stong bye 'dus dngag tu me pa ga sa rgyas pa'i sa
276a3(mdo sde): rdzogs lagazhan gyi don kyi nan ldan cher phyin pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi rtogs mngon par bsgrub pa ba pa'i ston gyi stong babargya stong ngan su tshogs pa'i la
276a4(mdo sde): po'i yang chen pos spyod pa'i chos nyid kyis sa dang po de ma thag tu thob par gang gnas pa'u di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i sa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di sgyu
276a5(mdo sde): dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni mi'i kha dog las ni 'dres la lha'i kha dog ni mthob pa yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa dang / nyan thos/
276a6(mdo sde): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las ni 'das pa yin/ don dam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni ma thob pa yin no// sangs rgyas kyis kun tu 'od ni mtha' dang
276a7(mdo sde): dpung med pa ma lus pa dri ma med pa'i chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba ste/ kun tu shin tu lta ba sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do//
276b1(mdo sde): de la ting nge 'dzin rnams gang zhen/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting 'dzin rnams te/ bcu gang zhen/ 'dis ste/ rin po che can po kun tu 'phags/
276b2(mdo sde): pa dang / shin tu gnas pa dang / mi bskul ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi brjid dang / don thams cad grub
276b3(mdo sde): pa dang / ye shes sgron ma dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams
276b4(mdo sde): kyi ting nge 'dzin ni mtha' las so// gzungs ni bcu gnyis te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang bskur ldan dang / ye shes ldan dang sgra dbyangs rnam
276b5(mdo sde): par dag pa dang / mi zad pa'i za ma tog dang / 'khyil ba mtha' las pa dang / rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya dang / pad+ma bkod pa dang / chags pa med pa'i sgor 'jug pa dang / sas
276b6(mdo sde): yang dag par rig pa rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas rgyun gyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog rdzogs pa mngon par
276b7(mdo sde): bsgrub pa'i gzungs te/ de dag la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du gyur ro// mngon par shes pa ni drug ste// drug gang zhen/ 'di lnga ste/ lha'i mig dang / lha'i na ba dang /
277a1(mdo sde): pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul mngon par shes pa'i shes pa dang / zag pa zad par shes pa'i
277a2(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa ste/ drug po de dag go// dbang ni bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe'i tshad bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par byin gyis rlob pas tshol dbang ba dang
277a3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i nges par rtag cing 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sems la da'ang ba dang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bkod pa'i rgyun du mas brgyan par byin gyis/
277a4(mdo sde): rlob pa ston pa'i tshul gyis yo byad la dbang ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa byin gyis rlob pa ston pas las la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba
277a5(mdo sde): ston pas skye ba la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gang bar ston pas mos pa la dbang ba dang / dus dang zhing gang du 'dod par mngon par
277a6(mdo sde): rdzogs par byang chub pa ston pas smon lam la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa ston pas rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba
277a7(mdo sde): dang chos kyi sgo snang ba mtha' dang dpung med pa yongs su ston pas chos la dbang ba dang / de bzhini gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / seM so yang dag
277b1(mdo sde): par rig pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad babang po dang / mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam pa dang / dus thams cad da gathogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bams
277b2(mdo sde): cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi grangs la sogs pa skad cig gcig la yongs su shes pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa
277b3(mdo sde): ston pas ye shes la dbang ba ste/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
277b4(mdo sde): bsam pa'i stobs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / sbyor ba'i stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang / spyod pa'i stobs dang
277b5(mdo sde): theg pa'i stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / byang chub kyi stobs dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i skabs te/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i
277b6(mdo sde): stobs rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyis thos pa 'dzin cing don bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / bdag
277b7(mdo sde): med pa khong du chud pas gzhan gyis gtse ba'i mtshan ma mi 'byung zhing rang bzhin gyis spyod lam smad du med pa'i las gsum yongs su dag pa'i gsung ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i mi
278a1(mdo sde): 'jigs pa dang / chos bzung ba kun ring du mi brjed pa dang thabs dang shes rab mthar smin pas sems can stsol zhing dang paston pa dang / dge ba'i
278a2(mdo sde): bar chad du mi 'gyur ba'i mi 'jigs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma nyams shing theg pa gzhan gyi mi 'byung bar dbang yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can
278a3(mdo sde): gyi don rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par thob par bya ba la mi 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos
278a4(mdo sde): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ma bstan pa'i sbyin pa can rnams yin ma bstan pa'i tshul khrims can rnams dang
278a5(mdo sde): ma bstan pa'i bzod pa can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i brtson pa grus can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i bsam gtan can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i shes rab can rnams
278a6(mdo sde): dang bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can thams cad sdud pa rnams dang / yongs su sngo ba'i cho ga shis pa rnams dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dbang
278a7(mdo sde): gis theg pa'o mchog gis 'byung ba ston pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po las ma nyams pa rnams dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo ston pa rnams dang zung dang
278b1(mdo sde): sme la zhi'i rgyud la mkhas pa rnams yin/ ye shes sngon du 'gro bas mngon par 'du mi byed cing kha na ma tho ba med par tshe rabs thams cad du mngon par zhugs pa rnams dang gsus/
278b2(mdo sde): dang ngag yid kyi las kyi mtha' dge ba bcu dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad bzod pa'i lus len pas sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba
278b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'gro ba thams cad mngon par ston pa rnams dang / byis pa sa so dang nyan thos mi bzad pa ji snyed cig gi nang na yang dge ba mang po'i rin po che'i shing dpag bsam ltar bcan
278b4(mdo sde): pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yongs su mnyams pa rnams dang / chos thams cad kyi thabs sbyin pas dbang bskur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal pa
278b5(mdo sde): bstan pa las mi ldog pa rnams te/ bco brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
278b6(mdo sde): gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi las kyi rgyu'i rnam par smin pa len pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna
278b7(mdo sde): tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams na tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thams cad du 'gro ba
279a1(mdo sde): las mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang
279a2(mdo sde): rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i spobs drang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i spobs dang / shib po dang skyeb mkhyen pa'i spobs dang /
279a3(mdo sde): pa zad par mkhyen pa'i stobs te/ bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhen 'di lta ste/ chos
279a4(mdo sde): thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / zag pa thams cad zad par shes pa la mi 'jigs pa dang bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur bar
279a5(mdo sde): nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni de bzhin
279a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gabazhi na/ 'di lnga ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang @
279a7(mdo sde): med pa dang / bsrel ba med pa dang sems mnyam par ma gzhag pa med pa dang / tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang / sa sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang
279b1(mdo sde): mos pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa da
279b2(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong
279b3(mdo sde): ba 'jug pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su bzang ba dang / ngag gi
279b4(mdo sde): las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'azang ba dang yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'azang ba ste/ bco brgyad pode
279b5(mdo sde): dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i rnam pa sum cu
279b6(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis dang ldan par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin du 'byung ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
279b7(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni bdag med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni bdag med par ma mos pas de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos
280a1(mdo sde): thams cad na sems can med pa zhin nu/ sems cananams na sam su ngan su nas sems can namasus 'i drug shegs pa thugs
280a2(mdo sde): rten pa ste'o// chos thams cad ni srog med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni srog tu smra go zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs
280a3(mdo sde): skye'o// chos thams cad ni gang zag med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni gang zag la gnas so zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po rgya'o// chos thams
280a4(mdo sde): cad ni med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni yod par brtsa'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni gnas med pa yin no//
280a5(mdo sde): sems can rnams ni gnas la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po smra'o// chos thams cad ni ga ni med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni
280a6(mdo sde): gzhi la dga' 'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni nga yir bya ba med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni nga yir bya ba la
280a7(mdo sde): rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa yin na sems can rnams ni yongs su gzung ba la brtson no zhes
280b1(mdo sde): sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni dngos po la rten to zhes sems can
280b2(mdo sde): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni skye ba la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin
280b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po spyi'o// chos thams cad ni la mi 'pho dang ma skyes po yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'chi 'pho dang skye bal chen to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin
280b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs so zhes sems can rnams la de ba ni na gshegs
280b5(mdo sde): pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'dod chags par byed do// zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin
280b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni zhe sdang dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni zhe sdang bar byed do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin
280b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni gti mug dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni gti mug par gyur to zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams pa de bzhin
281a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni 'ong ba med pa yin na/ sems can rnams mi 'ong ba la gnas pa'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams
281a2(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni 'gro ba med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'gro ba la gnas so zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin
281a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed me ma yinan/ sems can rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa la spyad de zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la
281a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rjenani pa sti'o// chos thams cad ni spros pa med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni spros pa la dga'a'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin/ shes
281a5(mdo sde): pa'i thugs rje chen po 'o// chos thams cad ni song ba yin na/ sems can rnams mi rtsa ba la yin po rjes rje'i rlung sems can rnams pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pa
281a6(mdo sde): / sems rnams sa na su na sems can rnams shegs par rdzos
281a7(mdo sde): sa tham ma nams ma dun ldan da kyi man na shems pa na
281b1(mdo sde): kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phan tshun rtsod pas yongs su zin cing gnod sems kyi za ba dang / zhe sdang la zhugs par gzigs nas de dag la gnod sems kyi thab dang / ne sdang
281b2(mdo sde): spang ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phyin ci log dang ldan ning nyam nga bar zhugs
281b3(mdo sde): pal ma gol ba la gnas pa yin gyis/ de dag yang dag pa'i lam du gzud par bya'o zhes sems can rnamasi la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye me 'jig rten gnas pa
281b4(mdo sde): 'di ni brkam zhing 'dod pa'i zil gyis non pa ste/ chog mi shes shing gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa yin gyis de dag 'a phags pa'i nor dad pa dang tshul khrims dang / thos pa
281b5(mdo sde): dang gtong ba dang / shes rab dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i nor la dgod do zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o//
281b6(mdo sde): kye ma sems can de dag ni bu smad dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'azul sred pas/ 'khor ba ste/ snying po med pa la snying por 'du shes pa yin gyis/ de dag la
281b7(mdo sde): shin tu mi rtag par bstan par bya'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can padi dag ni mi rigs pas 'tsho ba
282a1(mdo sde): gcig la gcig 'drid par gnas pa yin gyis/ de dag la 'tsho ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i/
282a2(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mchog mi shes pa ste/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshogs su bcad pa la spyod kyang bdag cag ni chog shes pa snyam du 'dzin
282a3(mdo sde): gyis de dag la gang 'di sdug bsngal shin tu ni zhing bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pas shin tu mchog par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o//
282a4(mdo sde): kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khyim gyi gnas sdug bsngal gyi snod shin tu nyon mongs pa la rtag tu dga' ba yin gyis/ de dag las byung zhing khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'das par bya ba'i
282a5(mdo sde): phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni rgyus nye bar 'gro ba bsgrubs pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na
282a6(mdo sde): de la sems can rnams ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba le lo byed kyis/ de dag la rnam par grol ba lhur blang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams par chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la
282a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// sems can rnams ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes dam pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'di btang zhing gang 'di nyan
282b1(mdo sde): thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dman pa tshol ba yin gyis/ de dag la gang 'dis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dmigs par bya ba'i phyir/ rgya chen po la blo mos par bya'o//
282b2(mdo sde): zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye ste/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis pa de dag dang ldan na sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
282b3(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po skye'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig sems can dag la rnam pa sum
282b4(mdo sde): cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po skye na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bsod nams kyi zhing gzi brjid chen pos rgyas pa phyir mi ldog pa sems can gyi
282b5(mdo sde): don la brtson par rig par bya'o// snying rje chen po'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'dri bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na/ srog chags stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par
282b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// srog chags brgyad spong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha'i bu stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig
282b7(mdo sde): rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// rigs kyi bu de ltar de dag la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang sgyur gyi chos
283a1(mdo sde): rnam par dgod pa ni dpag tu med grangs med de/ de dag phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs pas bstan kyang mtha' med na
283a2(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa bskyed pa'i phyir phyogs tsam zhig bstan te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos dkar po
283a3(mdo sde): las 'thun par 'jung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa kun
283a4(mdo sde): 'dzin nus pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lha ste/ dper na rlung mar ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor mu med cing rgya che la brtan zhing sra bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang 'byung ba char sprin
283a5(mdo sde): dang bcas pa rgya mtsho dang gling chen po bzhi par bcas pa/ ri rab dang ri btang bzung dang / ri btang bzung chen po dang gangs dang khor lug rI dang / khor yug/
283a6(mdo sde): ri chen po dang r-i spos kyi ngang ljang dang / grong rdal dang 'bab chu dang / nags tshal dang gzhal med khang gi rnam par bcas pa dag yongs su 'dzin to//
283a7(mdo sde): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang gzungs kyi rlung mar gyi dkyil 'khor bu med pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis phab pa'i gtan pa med pa'i
283b1(mdo sde): chos kyi rgyur gyi rgyun chen po thams cad yongs su 'dzin to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyags pa'i tshe/ skad du brjod pa'i ri rab dang rgya mtsho dang nga /
283b2(mdo sde): chen po ba ni padang ri btang bzung dang ri btang bzung chen po dang gangs dang khor yug ri dang khor lug chen po dang / ri spos kyi dngang ldang dang grong
283b3(mdo sde): rdal dang 'bab chu dang / nags tshal dang / gon la med khang gi rnam pa lta bu bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang / sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang
283b4(mdo sde): gzungs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / dbang dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / snying rje chen po
283b5(mdo sde): la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin to// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi phung po brgya
283b6(mdo sde): sdong mu med pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yongs su badzin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin nus pa
283b7(mdo sde): yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su 'god pa yin zhe na
284a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni gzhal med khang dgod pa'i rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs thams cad kun nas gzhog par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed//
284a2(mdo sde): de nags tshal dang shing dang / ya la ga dang / ba dab ma dang / ldum bu dang / myu gu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang / ldong po la sogs
284a3(mdo sde): pa dang sems can thams cad kyi yan lag dang nying lag rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs su rtag tu rgyun mi'ichad par yongs su gzhog cing rnam par 'byed degasal bar byed do/
284a4(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa'i ye shes ma thogs ma chags shing mtha' yas pas 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten
284a5(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sgo sna tshogs nas yongs su g.yog par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ snang bar byed/ yongs su ston par byed thob
284a6(mdo sde): par byed cing rnam pa 'di dag 'di lta ste/ chos 'di ni ngan song sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni bde 'gro sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni bdag por sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni sems can
284a7(mdo sde): dmyal ba sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni byol song gi skye gnas sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten sgrub pa'o// 'di dag no mir sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni b+har
284b1(mdo sde): sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni 'khor los sgyur bar sgrub pa'o// de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/ 'di dag ni brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba sgrub pa'o//
284b2(mdo sde): di dag ni gzugs dang g.yog dang/ yid gzhungs pa dang / dpal chen por sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni rig pa'o// 'di dag ni sgyu rtsal lo// 'di dag ni gzo'i
284b3(mdo sde): gnas so// 'di dag ni bstan bcos sna tshogs la rnam pa thams cad du mkhas pa'o// 'a de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa ste/ nyan thos su 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi
284b4(mdo sde): theg pa ste/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni theg pa chen po ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bdag dang gzhan gyi don yang dag par thob par byed pa kun tu bzang po
284b5(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen nyid du 'gyur ba'o// de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/ 'di dag ni sa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / rig pa rnams
284b6(mdo sde): dang dbang rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
284b7(mdo sde): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang ma 'dres pa rnams so zhes rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag la sogs pa rnam pa tshad med pas/ gzungs pad+ma bkod pa la
285a1(mdo sde): sogs pa la mkhas pas chos bkod pa rnam par bkod pa dag byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa/
285a2(mdo sde): rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su 'god pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam
285a3(mdo sde): yang dag par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni dpag bsam shing gi nags tshal
285a4(mdo sde): dag las gang gis lha dang mi rnams shin tu dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ mya ngan med par rnam par rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par kha dog
285a5(mdo sde): dang stobs dang / mthu dang / yid bde ba las yongs su mi nyams pa de lta bu'i spos dang / me tog dang / rgyan dang / gos dang / som snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra
285a6(mdo sde): la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i char mngon par 'bebs yongs su spyod cing 'byin par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi/
285a7(mdo sde): khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas sems can dag la gang nas sems can de dag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos kyi dga' ba la
285b1(mdo sde): mos shing 'dun pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / yongs su skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha dang mi'i thun/
285b2(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa thams cad nyams su myo bar byed pa dang / mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyis snang bar gyur pas rtag tu khyad par gyi rnam par 'dong bar 'gyur ba'i
285b3(mdo sde): mdo sde dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rtogs
285b4(mdo sde): pa brjod pa'i sde dang / 'di lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang / gtan la bab par bstan pa'i
285b5(mdo sde): sde dag dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos rin po che'i me tog la sogs pa'i char mngon par 'bebs so// rjes su 'thun pa dang / rjes su mi mthun pa dang / snrel zhi dang / spyi'u
285b6(mdo sde): tshugs kyi rgyud la sogs pa'i gtam rnam par gdon mi za ba nye bar sgrub bo// tha snyad kyi dmigs pa thams cad la bdag med pa ni zhing rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid rjod cing ston la
285b7(mdo sde): rnam par byang bar byed do// chos thams cad sgo kun tu yang dag par gzhol ba yongs su ston to// sgyu ma'i rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa nye bar sbyor ro// ye shes sgyu ma rnam
286a1(mdo sde): par rgyas par byed do// chos thams cad la dga' bar rtse ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams kyis sems can rnams yongs su rgyas par byed do// 'dri ba thams ca/
286a2(mdo sde): kyi lung bstan pas tshim par byed do// mtha' dang dpung med pa'i rdzu 'phrul la mkhas pa skyed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i
286a3(mdo sde): chos kyi gtam yang dag par rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyi
286a4(mdo sde): 'khor yongs su bsags pa ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / 'od dang / zla ba dang nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul
286a5(mdo sde): dang nags tshal dang / khang pa dang dge ba'i khor yug gi ri la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nA/ gdul ba yongs su smin pa mang
286a6(mdo sde): po yang dag par gnas pa bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin zhe na / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/
286a7(mdo sde): rlung mar ni bskal pa'i mthar thug ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus na gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang /
286b1(mdo sde): ri rab dang 'khor yug ri dang rgya mtsho la sogs par bcas pa kun nas 'jig cing rnam par 'thor ba dang / rmes med par byed cing nam mkha'i rang bzhin du byed pa de sa zur spobs/
286b2(mdo sde): kyi shugs thogs pa med par ldang ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i chung mar yang bskal pa mang por tshogs bsags pa'i sems can bsod nams dang ye shes sna tshogs rnam
286b3(mdo sde): bar bkod pa'i ri mthon po dang ldan pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongs su bstan pa dang / chos kyi
286b4(mdo sde): 'khor lo thogs pa med par rab tu bskor ba'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pas/ chos kyi phung po'i rlung mar gyi dkyil 'khor gang gis 'dul ba chos snang ba'i lhag mthong dam pa dang ldan
286b5(mdo sde): pa bzod par mi nus pa'i 'du byed kyi stobs thams cad mnyam par gzhog pa tshul bzhin yid la byas nas yang dag par sems canang du gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa la brten te srid pa
286b6(mdo sde): dang phung po dang khams dang / skye mched kyi 'du byed kyi lus thams cad bshig cing rnam par btogs te lus med par byas nas yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa rnam par
286b7(mdo sde): ba shig ste/ 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su 'das pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing gzugs med pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dang gzugs thams cad longs/
287a1(mdo sde): su san pa rnam par c-igapas gnas gyur pa rnam par dag pa khyi ma'i mngal sung ju par gnas pargyu mas cadas ca da na mas ba
287a2(mdo sde): de wa du bu ma nas rab tu gto rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par dkara' ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su byasags pati nga bzhin dang
287a3(mdo sde): thar ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang rab dang / 'od dang zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / bang pa
287a4(mdo sde): dge ba'i khor yug ril sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dul ba dang yongs su smin pa mang ba yang dag par gnas pa bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas
287a5(mdo sde): 'gyur bar ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar lta bu yin no// de nas bcom ldan
287a6(mdo sde): 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// a la la de sar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan zhing /
287a7(mdo sde): sems can rlabs po che rnams yongs su tshim par 'gyur ba'i chos bcu po 'di bstan pa bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das lha dang
287b1(mdo sde): mi gang lal chos 'di dgas mos shing nan tan bgyid na de dag thams cad ji skad du gsungs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bde ba dang bcas pa / yid bde pa dang bcas par thob pa dum/
287b2(mdo sde): te/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa zhig bgyid na yang / gzhan gyi don la gzhol zhing tshe 'di dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa
287b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sems can gang de lta bu'i chos rnams la nan tan du
287b4(mdo sde): byed pa de dag ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / kun tu rnam par bltas pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spangs pa dang / dge ba'i chos
287b5(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa dang 'jig rten thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ro// gang spong ba'i skyes bu glen pa de dag ni mun pa nas mun par gzhol ba ste/ sdug bsngam thams cad la sen
287b6(mdo sde): pa'o// dang mi dang / snga ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba'o// dkon mchog sprin bam po bzhi pa/
287b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dri ma med pa rnams yin
288a1(mdo sde): / chags pa rnams yin/ zhi ba rnams yin/ shes rab mtha' yas pa rnams yin sa sa ma ma shes mtha' yas pa rnams smin+da/ chos kyi /
288a2(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid rjes su song ba rnams yin/ chos thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings bo cad du mos pa rnams yin/ so so ma rten pa rnams yin/ mtshan ma'i spyod lum las 'dus/
288a3(mdo sde): bla rnams yin/ chog ge'i spyod yum las 'das pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po'i dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa nam mkha' dang mdus pa rnams yin no//
288a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu ga na na/ 'di lta ste/ yid du 'ong ba dang
288a5(mdo sde): du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs rnams la chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra rnams dang dri rnams dang
288a6(mdo sde): rnams dang reg rnams dang / yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / red ba dang / ma rnyed pa dang /
288a7(mdo sde): bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang grags pa dang ma grags pa dang bsod pa dang spad pas chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba ste/
288b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu pa de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'/
288b2(mdo sde): zla ba lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa dang mthong na dga' ba rnams dang / chos dkar
288b3(mdo sde): bo rnams skye bar byed pa dang / chos nag po rnams 'bri bar byed pa dang / rab tu bsngags pa rnams yin/ lus yongs su dag pa rnams yin bzhon pa mchog la zhon pa
288b4(mdo sde): rnams yin/ rtag tu brgyan pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa rnams yin 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na
288b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa nas/ ji ltar na 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lnga sde/ dper na zla
288b6(mdo sde): pa shar na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi lus bsil ba dang / yid du 'ong bar rab tu sim par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shwar na'ang 'di lta ste/ nyon mong/
288b7(mdo sde): pa'i gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa dang / yid du 'ong bas sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed do// rigs kyi bu
289a1(mdo sde): / 'di sa ste/ dper na tha ba shAr nu 'dig stezhi ba dang / dang bdang / sems shin tu dga' par byed pas sems can thams cad mthong na dga' pa yin no//
289a2(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zlab shar na'ang 'di lnga ste/ dbang po rnam par gsal ba dang / sems kyi rgyud dang ba dang / spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang yon tan phun sum
289a3(mdo sde): tshogs pas sems can thams cad mthong na dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lha ste/ dper na zla ba yar gyi ngol zla ba ste/ rnam pa thams cad du rgyas par gyur gyi be du
289a4(mdo sde): ti ma re re zhing 'phel lo// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang thog ma sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du
289a5(mdo sde): nyi ma re re zhing chos dkar po rnams 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar de na rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di/
289a6(mdo sde): lha ste/ dper na zla ba mar gyi ngol bab pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kha dog dang / snang ba dang / chu zheng yang yongs su 'bri sri/ bco lnga la ji ltar rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi
289a7(mdo sde): mngon pa de ltar 'bri'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang nam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes thob par gyur pa de ni/ de'i mi dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du rab tu/
289b1(mdo sde): babri ste/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi snying po la thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ba de ltar rab tu bcu'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper nu zla ba shar na bram ze dang / rgyus rigs
289b2(mdo sde): dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi skyes pa dang bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par byed pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar na yang
289b3(mdo sde): lnga dang / mi dang lA ma yin dang dri zar bcus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu bsngags par bya ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba'i lus 'di ltar rang gi
289b4(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi las rnam par smin pas grub pa ni yongs su dag pa ste/ rnyog pa med cing dang ba dang gsal ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i lus kyang 'di lta ste
289b5(mdo sde): chos nyid kyis mngon par grub pa rdzus te skyes pa pha ma'i brtsog pa dang mer mer po las byung ba ma yin te/ yongs su dag la rnyog pa med cing dang ba dang gsal ba yin no// rigs kyi bu
289b6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni bzhon pa mchog la zhon te gling bzhir snang bar byed de/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa mchog la non ce
289b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyis khams mtha' yas mu med par snang bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu brgyan cing rgyan ma brnyings pa yin no// de bzhin du/
290a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang 'di ltar yon tan gyi rgyan rnams kyis rtag tu brgyan pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu rgyun mi
290a2(mdo sde): 'chad par lha'i 'dod pa'i dga' ba la mos pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa yin gyi 'dod pas
290a3(mdo sde): dga' ba la dga' ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni 'phrul che zhing mthun pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang 'di lta ste
290a4(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po dang ye shes chen pos 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa nas
290a5(mdo sde): 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang 'dra ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
290a6(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyim lnga murnams yin no// bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ mi rig pa'i mun pa sel ba rnams yin/ 'dul ba'i sems can
290a7(mdo sde): rnam par byed par byed pa rnams yin/ phyogs thams cad du man mer byed pa rnams zin dge 'a'i mas mngon par yang rnams yin/ de dag gi dag 'i nu par gyur pa nas
290b1(mdo sde): yin snang bar byed pa rnams yin/ mu stegs can ngan pa'i sras rnams zil gyis mnan te 'dug pa rnams sbyin+da ma ma dang mi mnyam bdun smon pa rnams yin/ ros
290b2(mdo sde): dkar po'i las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung bar byed pa rnams yin/ skye bo dge ba la dga' ba rnam sa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i mun pasam
290b3(mdo sde): banas ji ltar skye bo dge ba la dga' ba'i bar du yin zhe na rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na mun pa mun nag thams cad rnam par sel to// de bzhin du byang chub
290b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' nyi ma shar na'ang ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na pad+ma rnam par 'byed par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub
290b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' nyi ma shar ba na yang 'dul ba'i sems can gyi pad+ma rnam par 'byed par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lnga ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na phyogs bcu thams cad du lhan ner byed do//
290b6(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na lang phyogs bcu thams cad du shes rab kyi gzi brjid dang ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis rab tu ldan ner byed kyang sems can rnams la gnod par/
290b7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma'i 'od zer dag rnam snang ba de'i tshen shar ces bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i ye shes
291a1(mdo sde): kyi 'od zer rnams na ma snang ba de'i tshe na dge ba'i chos rnams shar ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma'i snang ba nam med//
291a2(mdo sde): par gyur pa de'i tshe na nub ces bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i nyon mongs pa rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du nam med par gyur pa de'i tshe na zag pa zad ces bya'o//
291a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na badzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la snang bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang sems can thams cad la ye she
291a4(mdo sde): kyi snang bar byed cing gti mug gi mun pa'i rab rib kyis khebs pa rnams sel to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na 'od thams cad kyi 'od med par byed kyang / ma
291a5(mdo sde): nings pod mi snang bar bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od med par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang mu stegs can ngan pa'i
291a6(mdo sde): mod dang / mu stegs can ngan pa'i lus thams cad po dri med par bgyur mod kyi byang chub sems dpa' nyim nings pade dag pod med par byam snyam du mi sems / 'on kyang mas /
291a7(mdo sde): thos pas pod med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'dis ste/ dbatshan gyim gangan mdzam ze'i grong gi mi rnams la mnyamapa dang mi mtsham pa legs par ston to// de 'dzin du kyang chu
291b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang bas mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa legs par ston to// rigs kyi bu mnyam pa zhes bya ba bdi ni 'phags pa'i lam/
291b2(mdo sde): gyi tshig tu dgas sa/ rigs kyi bu mi mtsham pa zhes bya ba bdi ni la mngon pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu 'di sa ste/ dper na ni ma shar na jo bo dri las kyi mtha' thangs
291b3(mdo sde): 'byung ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang dge ba'i chos kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na skye bo dag pa ni
291b4(mdo sde): dgeb bar 'gyur la/ mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can drag mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang skye bo dge ba rnams dang / mkhas pa
291b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / shes rab kyi rang bzhin can rnams ni dga' bar 'gyuraro// lamangon par zhugs pa rnams dang / mi srun pa'i ring bzhin can rnams dang byis pa'i
291b6(mdo sde): rang bzhin can rnams dang / shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa las phyir phyogs pa'i rnams
291b7(mdo sde): ni mi dga' bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba nas/ skye bo dge ba dga' ba'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po
292a1(mdo sde): dag dang ldan nu byang chub sems dpa' rnams bu rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu da na / rlung chungasams dpa' da /
292a2(mdo sde): ge lnga bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ brag mi tsha ba rnams yin mi dab pa rnams yin/ mi rdzogs pa rnams yin/ seng pa'i sgo bsgrags pa rnams
292a3(mdo sde): yin mi 'jigs pa rnams yin/ nags tshal dang nags kyi mdang na rgyu ba rnams yin/ ri'i phug na gnas pa rnams yin len pa med pa rnams yin bdag gis
292a4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde rab tu 'dzem pa rnams yin dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog srung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na
292a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bag mi tsha ba nas/ dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog srung ba'i bar du yin zhen rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni gar 'gro yang bdag dang 'dra ba med
292a6(mdo sde): pabar mthong bas bag mi tsha zhing mi skrag par 'gro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bdag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas gar 'gro yang bag mi tsha zhing mi skrag par 'gre'o//
292a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni wa thams cad kyi sgras mi rtab pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge phrang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis brtsa dpas
292b1(mdo sde): brgal kyang mi rtab cing rgod pa dang zhum par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na seng ge ni bskugs na phyir mi ldog pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge/
292b2(mdo sde): yang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis bsnyugs na mi zlog cing mi zhum par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lce ste/ dper na srung ge ni sgra gang gis ri dgas phra mo thams cad dang
292b3(mdo sde): wa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu sgrog ge/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ga yang bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra gang gis bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par senapa/
292b4(mdo sde): gzhan mu stegs can gyi ri dgas rnams dang / gzhan mu stegs can gyi wa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu sgrog ste/ cung chub sems dpa' seng ge ni bdag tu
292b5(mdo sde): 'dzin pa las bzlog par bya ba dang sems can gsan dag 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma gtogs par de dag la gnad par bya ba'i phyir bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra mi ldog go/ rigs kyi
292b6(mdo sde): bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni kun tu lnga yang mi 'jigs pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' se ge yang spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i nan tan le sna yang mi 'jigs pa
292b7(mdo sde): chen no// rigs kyi bu 'dis / dper mi seng ge ni rang bzhin gyis nags tshul dang nags kyi mdapa na rgya la yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge yang rang bzhin
293a1(mdo sde): gyis dben pa la mngon du phyogs shing nags tshal dang / nags kyi mdaban spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi su 'dis ste/ dbar na seng ge ni ri ruH
293a2(mdo sde): na gnas pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang ye shes kyi brag gi ri 'ug na gnas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta sa/ dper na seng ge ni mi len par
293a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang nyon mongs pa'i khur thams cad po ning len pa med par 'gro ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lnga sa/ dper nas
293a4(mdo sde): ge ni gcig pu gnyis su med pa bdag gi brtson 'grus dang stobs dang mthu thob pas pha rol gyi sde 'jom mo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang gcig pu
293a5(mdo sde): gnyis su med par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas bdag gi brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas bsdud kyi sde 'dzem mo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/
293a6(mdo sde): grong gi mdab dag na seng gi rgyu ba der ri dgas phra mo dag gis lo tog rnams chud mi gson to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na 'dug pa der
293a7(mdo sde): mu stegs can gyi ri dgas phra mo dag gis dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog rlung mi gzon to// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bag mi tsha ba nas dge ba'i chos kyi ma chog srung ba'i
293b1(mdo sde): bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan nA/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge lta bu rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na / byang chub sems
293b2(mdo sde): dpa' 'dul ba rnams yin no// lung gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems brtan pa rnams yin/ byang chub kyi sems kyi byi dor shin tu byas pa rnams yin/ dbang po
293b3(mdo sde): bsdams pa rnams yin no// lam du zhugs pa rnams yin/ khun chen po khyer ba rnams yin/ sems can gyi don rnams la yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin/ yang dag pas 'tshob
293b4(mdo sde): rnams yin/ tshul bcos pa dang / kha gsag gi rnyed pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo sgyu dang bral ba rnams yin/ drang ba'i rang bzhin can pas drang ba rnams yin te
293b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chom bcu pa de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ma shes
293b6(mdo sde): ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di sgyu sa song ba cing la sgom pa mang bas nas 'byor spyod pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa med cing kun nes snang ba thams cad deng thal bas lam rnam
293b7(mdo sde): chad pa rnams yin de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' mi gcog pas bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yin/ chos dbyings kyi tshul rtogs pas chos thams cad kyi tshul mnyam panyid khong du chud
294a1(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ dma' ba dma' ba'i yid kyis gdol bu lta bur 'jig can+dan spyod pa rnams yin/ nag rgyun mi 'chad par bsod pa snyoms blang bar 'du shes/
294a2(mdo sde): bar gzhag pas nga rgyal ba dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di ltar de mngon sum du shes pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nem nur
294a3(mdo sde): med pa rnams yin/ chos rang gis rig pa'i phyir the tsom med pa rnams yin rang gi lam mthong bas gzhan gyi mi bkri zhing pha rol gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin rab tu zhugs
294a4(mdo sde): pas 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa rnams yin no// rig
294a5(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma gos pa rnams yin/ sdig pa rlung ngu dang yang lhan cig
294a6(mdo sde): mi gnas pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims kyi dri nim pa rnams yin/ gtsang ba rnams yin/ bzhin 'dzum pa rnams yin/ mi rtsub pa rnams yin mthong na bkra shis pa
294a7(mdo sde): rnams yin/ bro rnam par bye ba rnams yin/ bro yongs su smin pa rnams yin/ shin tu yongs su bzung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems
294b1(mdo sde): dpa' mgos pa yin pa nas ji ltar na shin tu yongs su bzung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma ni chu'i nang nas 'byung yang mi chags par skye'o//
294b2(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chu las 'byung yang mi chags par skye'o// gde ci'i phyir zhe na
294b3(mdo sde): 'di ltar de'i thabs dang shes rab kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni 'khor ba na spyod kyang 'khor ba'i nyes pa dag gis mi gos te/ de'i
294b4(mdo sde): thabs de ni shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma la chu'i thig pa chung ngu yang mi chags so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
294b5(mdo sde): la sdig pa chung ngu yang mi chags so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa'i phyogs gang du pad+ma skyes par gyur pa'i sa phyogs de dris khyab par 'dug go// de bzhin du yul
294b6(mdo sde): dang yul gyi phyogs gang na byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa de thams cad tshul khrims kyi dris khyab par 'dug go// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma ni sa'i phyogs par
294b7(mdo sde): skyes pa'i sa phyogs de gtsang zhing bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang grong ba dang / yul gyi mi thams cad kyang 'du ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'agar/
295a1(mdo sde): skyes kyang rung 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang / gtsang sbra kun spyod pas gtsang ba yin te/ da / klu dang / spyod sbyin dang
295a2(mdo sde): bri ba dang / sgyum yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'amatsho dang / khro rtse chen po dang ma dang / mi ma yin pa rnams 'du ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
295a3(mdo sde): rnams kyis dgongs pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta se/ dper na bad+ha ni kha rkyen 'di lta s+t+wa~M/ sems can rnams
295a4(mdo sde): kyi yid du 'ong bas 'dzum pa lta buran snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang khro gcer med cing dbang po shin tu dang bas bzhin rtag tu 'dzum pa yin no// rigs kyi bu
295a5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing mi rtsub pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing dal gyis smra ba yin/ mi brlang
295a6(mdo sde): ning mu cor mi smra ba'i rang bzhin can yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma ni rmi lam dang / lhas dang yud tsam dag la mthong na yang 'di lta ste/ don
295a7(mdo sde): 'grub pa'i phyir bkra shis shing rab tu bsngags pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba yang 'dis ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba la dus
295b1(mdo sde): thams cad du yang bkra shis shing rab tu bsngags pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma ni nam rgyas pa de ni rnam par bye ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub
295b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnam shes rab dang byang chub kyi yan lag gi metog rgyas bden tho rnam par bye ba zhes byar// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na pad+ma ni na ma yangs su smin pa
295b3(mdo sde): gyur pa de ni/ bltas na mig gi dbang po tshim par byed/ mnyanan rna ba'i dbang po tshim par byed/ bsnams na lnga'i dbang po tshim par byed myangs na lce'i dbang po rnam par
295b4(mdo sde): byed/ reg na lus kyi dbang po tshim par byed/ sems rab tu dga' bas yid kyi dbang po tshim par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam shes rab kyi snang ba
295b5(mdo sde): yongs su smin par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bltas na mig gi dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ tshul khrims dang yon tan gyi
295b6(mdo sde): bsnams na snang ba'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ myangs pa na lce'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ reg pa dang bsnyen bkur byed na lus kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed
295b7(mdo sde): yan tan brjod pa rnam par bsams pas yid kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma ni skye ba'i tshe 'di lta ste/ mi dang mi ma yin pa dag
296a1(mdo sde): bya// gis shin tu yongs su bzung ba yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang
296a2(mdo sde): ma yin pa gzhan brgya byin drang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong bdag gis shin tu yongs su bzung ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpar mgos pa nas
296a3(mdo sde): shin tu yongs su bzung ba'i bar du yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma lta bu rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos
296a4(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya che ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yang dag par bsgrub bo zhes sems rgya cher skyed de/
296a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// sems can thams cad gdul lo zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos
296a6(mdo sde): thams cad byang chub kyi snying por 'dug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes sems rgya tshor skyed do// mngon par rdzogs
296a7(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten du dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang chos dang ldan par sngon ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
296b1(mdo sde): ro zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par song ste/ sems can gyi dor bya ba'i dngos po de dang de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don bya'o zhes
296b2(mdo sde): sems rgya cher skyed do// shes rab kyi gru sbyar te/ sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las pha rol tu bsgral lo zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// mgon med pa dang / skyabs med pa
296b3(mdo sde): dang gnas med pa dang / rten med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dang / rtsa lag med pa'i sems can rnams kyi rtsa lag bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// lba dang bcas
296b4(mdo sde): bdud dang bcas/ tshangs par bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang du sangs rgyas kyi khyu
296b5(mdo sde): mchog nyid bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i sgra sgrog go// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pas rnam par rtse'o// glang po che'i lha stangs kyis blta bar bya'o zhes sems rgya cher
296b6(mdo sde): bar skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi che bas sems can rnams gdul bar bya'i/ spyod pa 'dapas ma yin/ dka' ba spyod pas ma yin/ nan pa'i spyod pas ma yin/ zhum pa'i
296b7(mdo sde): spyod pas ma yin no zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no// / rigs kyi
297a1(mdo sde): bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dgu pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste/ bsam pa mi g.yo bas bas/
297a2(mdo sde): pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa la sgyu med pas bsam pa shin tu gnas pa rnams yin 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi byang chub yid la byed pa mi
297a3(mdo sde): skyed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / brtson 'grus chung ba'i yid la byed pa mi skyed pas tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnams
297a4(mdo sde): yin 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral bas dri ma thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ spu'i spyod lam dang bral bsA lus kyi tshul 'chos dang bral ba
297a5(mdo sde): rnams yin/ 'di lha ste/ yang dag pa'i don kun ston pas ngag gi tshul 'chos dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta / lus kyis 'du 'dzi med pa dang / ngag gis 'dod pa
297a6(mdo sde): chung ba dang / sems kyis smon pa med pa'i phyir/ sems kyi tshul 'i chos dpa dang bral ba rnams yin/ cung zad byas pa yang chud mi gson na mang po lta ci smos te/ byas pa
297a7(mdo sde): gzo ba rnams yin/ byas pa tshor ba rnams yin te/ dgos pa byas pa la mi smod/ mi sbyang/ yon tan ma yin par mi lta ste/ gzhan du na cung zad byas pa yang tshor zhing de
297b1(mdo sde): la ston par byed gzengs bstod par byed/ yang dag par dgab bar byed/ rab tu bsngags par byed/ de la yon tan du lta ba yin no// ji ltar lta ba de ltar byed pa rnams yin te//
297b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis snyan par ston cing sems kyis mi mthun par sems pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis ston cing sems kyis ngan du bya ba'i
297b3(mdo sde): sbyor ba mi byed/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis 'jam par smra zhing sems kyis zhel non te shar gnyer ba ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis nges pa ston cing
297b4(mdo sde): sems 'khon gyi mdud par 'dzin pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis ri mor bya ba ston cing sems kyis bsdus par byed pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
297b5(mdo sde): tshul mi 'chos kha gsag mi byed/ ser sna dang phrag dog gis kun tu blugs pa ma yin/ sgyu dang g.yos mi spyod/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'thab sman mi byed
297b6(mdo sde): phan tshun du dpa' ba 'jug pa ma yin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis kyang rim skyed pa yin/ ngag gis kyang yang dag pa'i don smra/ las su yang sgrub bo//
297b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa me btab pa yin no// wi
298a1(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa ma btab pa yin ne na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
298a2(mdo sde): bskyed do// skra dang kha spu breg te gos ngur smrig dag gon nas/ yang dag par dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsdan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo // de rab tu 'byung ba na rgyal pos mnar/
298a3(mdo sde): ba med par rab tu 'byung / rkun pos 'tshe ba med pa dang / bu lon gyis 'tshe ba med pa dang / 'jigs pas 'tshe ba med pa dang / 'tshe ba med pa'i 'jigs pas skrag pa med par
298a4(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung ngo // de dang de rab tu byung nas dge ba ci yin zhes tshol ba yin te/ de dge ba ci yin zhes tshol bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la sten par byed/ ston par byed/
298a5(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byed do// de dag las chos kyang nyan to// thos nas kyang nan tan du byed/ nga rgyal gyi zil gyis ma non pa yin te/ deng rgyal dang bral bas ma log par 'dzin pa yin//
298a6(mdo sde): ma log par 'dzin pas lam shin tu rtogs pa thob bo// de lam shin tu rtogs pas chos nyid thob bo// chos nyid thob pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par
298a7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa ma btab pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag
298b1(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems nem nur med pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste
298b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba dang / byang chub sems
298b3(mdo sde): dpa' yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang / theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa dang / tshul sna tshogs bstan pa dang / de bzhin
298b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo dang / sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad do// rigs kyi bu de lta ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i
298b5(mdo sde): sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad pa nas/ ji ltar sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems
298b6(mdo sde): dpa' 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang / zhi ba'i sku dang / mi mnyam pa'i sku dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam po'i sku dang /
298b7(mdo sde): tshad med pa'i sku dang / phal la med pa'i sku dang / rdo rje sku zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nu
299a1(mdo sde): med/ the tsom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de
299a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di sum du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa mngon
299a3(mdo sde): du lung ston pa dang / gsung ste lung smon pa dang / ldem po dag gis kyang sems can rnams la lung skyon mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa 'am / ca co med de
299a4(mdo sde): de'i phyir de la brdzun du smra ba'i nyes par mi'abyung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni skyon thams cad spangs pa/ dri ma thams cad spangs pa rdul
299a5(mdo sde): thams cad spangs pa/ yongs su gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ zhi ba dang ba yongs su dag pa/ rnyog pa/
299a6(mdo sde): med pa rnam par gsal ba ste/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'khrul pa'am/ ca co 'byung ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med do zhes thos pa de ni yang dag pa
299a7(mdo sde): 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med/ the tsom med/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba la mngon par dad do//
299b1(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang bar/
299b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas ci dgongs pa'i don gang sems dang grogs pa sems la gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gyur pa ma gtogs par nyan thos dang //
299b3(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad da / sems can thams cad kyi shes par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de
299b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba/ brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul lus shin tu 'das pa/ dpag tu med pa/ rgya che ba
299b5(mdo sde): langs pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa/ cog ge thams cad kyi yul las 'das par thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam
299b6(mdo sde): sde/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med pa yin te/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
299b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di byang chub kyi rgyu/ byang chub kyi ka ni/ byang chub kyi phyir/ byang chub
300a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag sems can gyi don la mngon du phyogs pa dang / sems can gyi bya ba dang / sems can gyi byed pa dang / yongs su mi skyo ba dang //
300a2(mdo sde): mi skrag pa dang / khur chen po khyer ba dang / mthu bstan pa dang / brtul ba brtan pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mthar
300a3(mdo sde): gyis yang dag par sgrub pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i blo dang / mtha' yas pa'i blo dang / mi mnyam pa'i blo dang / phal la med pa'i blo dang brtson 'grus brtan pa
300a4(mdo sde): dang cho ga brtan pa dang / dam bcas pa las mi g.yo ba dang / dam bcas pa phal la med pa de dag thams cad rim gyis 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par yongs
300a5(mdo sde): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med de
300a6(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par sgrub pa la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad ce na
300a7(mdo sde): de 'di snyam du sems so// gang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas lha'i mig chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa sgrib pa med pa thob bo// lha'i rna ba
300b1(mdo sde): dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa dang / dus gsum
300b2(mdo sde): bskad cig gcig pa dang ldan pas shes pa/ chags pa med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ sgrib po med pa thob bo// de'i phyir sems can gyi khams la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
300b3(mdo sde): lha ste/ sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs
300b4(mdo sde): pa log par lta ba rnams te/ log par lci ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangasra pa'i phyir/ rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan
300b5(mdo sde): 'gro log par lhung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o// sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa
300b6(mdo sde): yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba rnams te/ yang dag par lta ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir
300b7(mdo sde): rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha'i nang du skye'o snyam nas de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams la bltas
301a1(mdo sde): te/ sems can gyi khams de nyid dge ba'i dang mi dge ba'i las rnams la rnam par lta'o// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon bdag byang chub sems dpa'i/
301a2(mdo sde): spyad pa spyod pas gang 'di ltar bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas nas gzhan yang rnam par sangs rgyas par bya'o zhes dam bcas pa'i bdag gi smon lam de yongs su rdzogs so// bdag
301a3(mdo sde): go brnag pa de yongs su rdzogs so snyam mo zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med do//
301a4(mdo sde): gang la byang chub sems dpa' de rnam par sangs rgyas pa de ni byang chub ces bya'o// bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas pas des na rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub
301a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' byang chub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di
301a6(mdo sde): snyam du sems so// gang 'di theg pa ni gcig kho na 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'o zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o//
301a7(mdo sde): 'di ni de bzhin no// ma nor ba'o// gnan ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa gzhan rnams kyang 'di las 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na
301b1(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling na gang gling yod pa rnams ming gis tha dad par shes mod kyi 'on kyang de dag ni 'dzam bu'i gling du 'du'o// 'dzam bu'i gling la rngon to// 'dzam bu'i gling gi grangs
301b2(mdo sde): su 'gro'o// de'i phyir na gling gcig kho na ste/ 'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling ngo // de bzhin du theg pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg par du'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
301b3(mdo sde): theg pa la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa las byung ngo // de'i phyir theg pa ni gcig pa kho na ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di
