301b4(mdo sde): ma de ne ma nur med the tsom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa la mngon par dad // ji ltar na tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon par dad cen/
301b5(mdo sde): de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di mdo sde de dang de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul sna tshogs bshad pa thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba/
301b6(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston to snya ma ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med
301b7(mdo sde): the tsom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo
302a1(mdo sde): la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni/
302a2(mdo sde): de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyi dbyangs kyang zab cing snyan pa yin na/ bskal pa brgya stong du mar dge ba'i rtsa
302a3(mdo sde): babasgrubs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lta ci smos sam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med the tsom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i
302a4(mdo sde): gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo la mngon par dad do// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad ce na de 'di snyam
302a5(mdo sde): du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pa dang bag la nyal mkhyen te/ sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang / 'dul ba tha dad pa rnams la gsung sgra'i dbyangs
302a6(mdo sde): gcig brjod pas the tsom gcod cing yongs su smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams 'dul lo// sems can rnams kyang so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la
302a7(mdo sde): chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos ston to snyam byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di/
302b1(mdo sde): ni khon 'o// 'don mi smra ba'osasasu gnas 'di la denyim nung med tsho ma med du/ rigs kyi bud bangs cang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi bsam pa jis bya ba ma/
302b2(mdo sde): du 'dul ba la mngon par dad de// rigs kyi bu chos bcu pa de dag dong ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems chem nur mid pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bus
302b3(mdo sde): cu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho dang 'drab rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'dis / rin pa che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa rnams yin
302b4(mdo sde): cing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ rgya che zhing tshad med pa rnams yin/ bags kyis gzhol ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i ro dang lhan cog mi 'dug pa rnams yin
302b5(mdo sde): ro gcig pa rnams yin/ nu bo kun bzod pa rnams yin/ dus las mi g.yo d+ha rnams yin/ 'byung po mang po'i gnas su gyur pa rnams yin/ mi zad pa rnams yin no/
302b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po na'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin pa nas ji ltar na mi zad pa'i bar du yin chen/ rigs kyi bu 'di la ste/ @
302b7(mdo sde): nargya ma mtsham ma na chen po ma thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin no/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi thams cad kyis rin pa che blang bas mi 'ang // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
303a1(mdo sde): yang yon tan rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ sems can thams cad kyis yon tan rin po che thang bas mi zad do// rigs kyi bu /
303a2(mdo sde): lha s+ho/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yang dag par grub pa yang zab cing sems can thams cad kyis
303a3(mdo sde): gting dpag dka' ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di lnga sa/ nu tshad med pas na yangs shing rgya che ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems
303a4(mdo sde): dpa' yang 'di lta sde/ blo tshad med pas na yangs shing rgyan pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di nam+bi/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni bags kyis gzhol/ pags kyis 'bab/ pags
303a5(mdo sde): kyis bab bo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bab bo// rigs kyi
303a6(mdo sde): bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig tu mi 'dug go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chos nyid do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
303a7(mdo sde): ring tsan mongs pa'i ro dang mi dge ba'i grogs po rnams dang ldan cig mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhen de ni byang chubasems dpa'i chos nyid do// rigs kyi bu 'dis
303b1(mdo sde): dper na rgya mtsho chen por chu bo ji sbed 'bab pa de thams cad kyang ro gcig pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ lanA tshwa'i re'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos dkar po rnams d+d+hi/
303b2(mdo sde): sring srung ba de thams cad ro gcig pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu bo tshad med pa kun bded kyang de la rdzi
303b3(mdo sde): ba'am/ gang bar yang mi mngon no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu bo tshad med pa kun bzed kyang de la dri ba 'am gang bar mi mngon no// rigs kyi bu 'di la
303b4(mdo sde): skye dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las mi yol lo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'dul bar bya ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus las mi yol lo//
303b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni 'byung po mang po'i gnas so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad dang / chos dkar po thams cad
303b6(mdo sde): kyi gnas so// rigs kyi 'di ltas/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can thams cad kyis chu bcus kyang mi zad pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can
303b7(mdo sde): thams cad la chos ston pa mi zad pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa nas mi zad pa'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi
304a1(mdo sde): bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na//
304a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' blo zhim pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa rnams yin / chos thams cad brtag pa la mkhas pa rnams
304a3(mdo sde): yin/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad yongs su shes pa la
304a4(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' ba la mkhas pa rnams yin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas pa rnams yin
304a5(mdo sde): smras pa'i don shes pa rnams yin/ don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa rnams yin de kho na la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub
304a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'byung ba stsol ba la mkhas pa yin pa nas/ ji ltar na de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar spyod de/ kye ma'o
304a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi mas kun tu 'bar ro// rab tu 'bar ro// kun tu rab tu 'bar ro// kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di
304b1(mdo sde): lha ste/ ne sdang gi du ba 'khrigs pa'i du ba 'tshubs pas rnam par rmongs so// kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa ni 'di lta ste/ gti mug gi mun pas mun nag tu gyur to snyam mo//
304b2(mdo sde): de na 'di lta ste/ sems can 'di dag ni ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur snyam sems te/ de dag gi 'byung ba yongs su tshol zhing chos thams cad la rtog go// chos thams cad la
304b3(mdo sde): cortog pas chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba
304b4(mdo sde): bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos rnams sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
304b5(mdo sde): chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo la rnam par sems so// de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo la rnam par sems
304b6(mdo sde): pas las bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par rtog ste/ de 'di snyam du dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la/ las sna tshogs snang ba ni ngo mtshar to snyam du sems so// de ltar de
304b7(mdo sde): blo zhib mo dang ldan pas sangs rgyas rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsungs pa tsam gyis don shes so// des don shes pas don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
305a1(mdo sde): rtogs so// don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pas de kho na mthong ngo // des de kho na mthong bas sems can rnams 'khor ba'i brtson ra nas thar bar
305a2(mdo sde): byed de rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa nas de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na
305a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' blo zhib pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// bcu
305a4(mdo sde): gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bdag med par 'jog go/ chos thams cad sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang gang zag
305a5(mdo sde): med pa dang byed pa po dang tshor ba po med pa dang / shes pa po med pa dang / mthong ba po med pa dang / gsog gso pa ste dbang phyug med pa dang stong pa yang /
305a6(mdo sde): dag pa ma yin pa kun bcags pa dang rkyen las 'byung bar 'jog ste/ rigs kyi bu de la chos thams cad bdag med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rig pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun
305a7(mdo sde): pa'o// chos thams cad sems can med pe srog med pa zhes bya ba ni rigs pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad gso ba med
305b1(mdo sde): pa dang gang zag med pa dang / byed pa po dang tshor ba po med pa dang shes pa po med pa dang mthong ba po med pa dang gsog gsob ste dbang phyug med
305b2(mdo sde): pa dang stong pa yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa dang rkyen las byung ba'o zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o// rigs kyi bu
305b3(mdo sde): gang chos nyid dang 'thun pa de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid las mi 'khrul pa de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid la 'bab/
305b4(mdo sde): pa de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid stong pa de ni rigs pa'o// de yang de dag la spobs pas na de'i phyir rigs pas spobs pa rnams zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag
305b5(mdo sde): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' grol ba'i spobs
305b6(mdo sde): pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi zad pa rnams yin/ spobs pa rgyun chags pa rnams
305b7(mdo sde): yin spobs pa mi btabs pa rnams yin/ spobs pa ma zhum pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi skrag pa rnams yin/ spobs pa phal la med pa rnams yin
306a1(mdo sde): spobs pa zil gyis mnon pa pa rnams yin spobs pa mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'i spobs pa can rnams
306a2(mdo sde): yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub
306a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lbu ste/ 'dar 'dar ba med pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ mi 'khrul pa'i tshung
306a4(mdo sde): pa can rnams yin/ mi gzhan pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ yang yeng po med pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ de dag gi spobs pa don dang bral ba ma yin/ tshig/
306a5(mdo sde): 'bru dang bral ba ma yin/ sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin/ dus dang bral ba ma yin/ rtsub pa ma yin mi gsal ba'i spobs pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub
306a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa 'dar 'dar po ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na 'khor gyi 'jigs pa'i bag tsha ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa
306a7(mdo sde): ni 'khrul pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thobartan ning mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni mi nan pa rnams yin no// de ci'i phyir
306b1(mdo sde): na 'jugs pa med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu myang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor gyi nang du phyin na mi 'jigs mi skrags seng ge sngar 'jigs pa med song ma skrag mi dngang ba min mo//
306b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbubs pa lang yong ba med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe re/ nyon mongs pa dang thal ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu chen mongs pa dang bcas pa'i
306b3(mdo sde): spobs pa ni yang leng por 'gyur ba yin te/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni don dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
306b4(mdo sde): na chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu chos nyid mthob pa rnams kyi don dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ chos nyid thob pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa
306b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi spobs pa ni rnyog 'bru dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu bstan bcos kyi phyogs 'ga'
306b6(mdo sde): shes pa rnams kyi ni tshig 'bru dang bral bar 'gyur gyi bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni sbyor bad
306b7(mdo sde): bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu sbyor ba la mi mkhas pa rnams kyi ni sbyor ba dang brel bar 'gyur gyi
307a1(mdo sde): sbyor ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs ni gang myis smra bar bya ba de ni sngar smra ba 'amagang sngar
307a2(mdo sde): smra bar bya ba de phyis smra ba lta bur dus dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dus shes pa yin/ tshod shes pa yin dus shes pa
307a3(mdo sde): yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba mi snyan pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngag gi gnas ngan len dang bral ba'i phyir te
307a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gnas ngan len dang bcas pa rnams kyi spobs pa ni rtsub pa yin gyi/ gnas ngan len dang bral ba rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa/
307a5(mdo sde): ni mi gsal ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbang po rno ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dbang po rtul ba rnams kyi spobs pa ni mi gsal ba yin gyi dbang po rnon
307a6(mdo sde): po rnams kyi ni ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// // rigs
307a7(mdo sde): kyi su chama'i chu dang rnams cung chub sems dpa'i sems can thams cad mgu par byed pa'i spangs pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang shen 'dis 'jas /
307b1(mdo sde): smra ba rnams yin bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams yin/ don du smra ba rnams yin chos su smra ba rnams yin/ mtshungs par smra ba rnams yin/ mi
307b2(mdo sde): ngom pa rnams yin/ brnyas pa dang bral ba rnams yin nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med pa rnams yin/ 'khrugs pa med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa sna tshogs pa rnams yin
307b3(mdo sde): no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jam par smra ba ni 'jam par smra ba sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' ni bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gter med pa
307b4(mdo sde): yin te/ mdangs bzang pos sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' don du smra ba ni tshig ran pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub
307b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos su smra ba na phan par smra bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs par smra ba ni sems can thams cad la mtshungs par
307b6(mdo sde): chos ston pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' mi ngom pa ni nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags pa dang bral zhing spyod pa mtshungs pas
307b7(mdo sde): sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' brnyas pa dang bral ba ni ri mor byas gang chos bstan pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems
308a1(mdo sde): dpa' nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med pa ni ngang tshul nges pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' 'khrugs pa med pa ni
308a2(mdo sde): bzod pa mang bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa sna tshogs can ni dga' ba'i tshig sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// rimra
308a3(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan
308a4(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' tshig bzung ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos mi ston
308a5(mdo sde): te zhe 'gras pa rnams la ma yin/ klan ka tshol ba rnams la ma yin/ mu stegs can rnams la ma yin/ ri mo med pa rnams la me yin/ ma dad pa mang ba rnams la ma yin/
308a6(mdo sde): g.yo dang sgyus glags pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba'i bsam pa can rnams la ma yin/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang phrag dog dang ser snas glags pa rnams pa ma yin//
308a7(mdo sde): sems canaglen pa mongs pa lug lhar lkugs pa'i rang bzhin can rnams la chos mi ston to// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser
308b1(mdo sde): yang med/ chos la slob dpon 'chab pa yang med/ sems can rnams la ri mor mi byed pa yang med/ sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs pa yang med mod kyi sems can
308b2(mdo sde): 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba'i snod du ma gyur pa'o zhes btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol/
308b3(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na sems can ci 'dra ba rnams la sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
308b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu sems can dad pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston to// sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa rnams dang / snod
308b5(mdo sde): du gyur pa rnams dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams dang / g.yo med pa rnams dang / sgyu med pa rnams dang / spyod lam mi 'chos pa rnams dang / rnyed pa dang
308b6(mdo sde): bkur sti la chags pa dang bral ba rnams dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa rnams dang / tshul bzang po dang ldan pa/
308b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / legs par ston nus pa rnams dang / dbang po rno ba gang bshad pa'i don rig par 'gyur ba de thob par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsam pa de bzhin gshegs
309a1(mdo sde): pas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin byed par 'gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu dag la rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'
309a2(mdo sde): rnams chos ston to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan no byang chub sems dpa' tshig gzung ba rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/
309a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang sangs rgyas kyi
309a4(mdo sde): chos rnams dang yang dag par bsgrubs pa yang mi dmigs so// pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa yang mi
309a5(mdo sde): dmigs so// byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa yang mi dmigs so// nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston kyang nyon mongs pa
309a6(mdo sde): spang ba yang mi dmigs so// skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa'i phyir chos ston kyang skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ba gog pa yang mi dmigs so// rgyun du
309a7(mdo sde): zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir tshes ston kyang rgyun du zhugs pa yang mi dmigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /
309b1(mdo sde): phyir mi 'ong ba yang mi dmigs phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang mi dmigs so// dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos sngon kyang dgra bcom pa dang dgra bcom pa'i
309b2(mdo sde): 'azas bu yang mi dmigs so// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos skyon kyang rang sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yang mi dmigs so// bdag tu 'dzin pa
309b3(mdo sde): la mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir chos skyon kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa yang mi dmigs lus kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'jog mod kyi/ las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa yang mi dmigs so//
309b4(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag 'dri snyam du sems te/ chos gang ming gang gis brjod pa de ming des yod pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid ni yi ge'i rang bzhin ma yin/ yin
309b5(mdo sde): rnams ni chos nyid kyi rang bzhin ma yin mod kyi/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten tha snyad la brten brtags pa de la brten te/ ming med pa'i chos rnams la ming du 'jog ste
309b6(mdo sde): ming de yang gsob bo// gsog go// gang gso ba dang gsog de la don dam pa med do// gang la don dam pa med pa de brdzun te/ slu ba'i chos so// gang brdzun zhing slu ba'i
309b7(mdo sde): chos de ni byis pa'i skye bo slu ba'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams yin no// dkon mchog
310a1(mdo sde): / smin pa ma blolnga pa/ rigs kyi chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'jung ba rnams yin no// ban+d+ha
310a2(mdo sde): zhe na 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la/ gzugs las kyang mi 'byung // chos kyi rjes su yang 'azang la tshor ba
310a3(mdo sde): dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ 'dod pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi
310a4(mdo sde): rjes su yang 'azang la gzugs kyi khams las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la gzugs med pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung chos kyi rjes su
310a5(mdo sde): yang 'brang la chos las kyang mi 'byung chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ chos las 'das par yang mi 'gyur/ chos kyi rjes su yang bzang la sems can gyi phyir
310a6(mdo sde): yang mi 'brang / chos kyi rjes su yang 'azang la/ chad par lta ba'i phyir yang mi 'brangachos kyi rjes su yang 'azang la// lam las kyang mi 'byung ste/ de ni thabs mkhas pa
310a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi phyir ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu
310b1(mdo sde): chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab can rnams yin/ dge ba'i bshes
310b2(mdo sde): gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ shin tu yongs su dag pa rnams yin
310b3(mdo sde): gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pa rnams yin/ stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ dmigs par lta ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ lam du zhugs pa rnams yin
310b4(mdo sde): kho na mthong ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen tshol te/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong nas dga' zhing rangs
310b5(mdo sde): de la ston par 'du shes skyed cing de la brten te gnas so// de dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pas na/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos
310b6(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no// brtson 'grus brtsams pas na sgrib pa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa med cing
310b7(mdo sde): lam gyi rgyun ma chad pas shin tu yongs su dag cing lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de shin tu yongs su dag pas gdam ngag la ri mo dang
311a1(mdo sde): bcas pa yin no// de gdams gal ri mo dang bcas pas stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang ba yin no// stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas dmigs pa'i lta bar mi
311a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de dmigs pa'i lta ba dang bral bas lam du 'jug go// de lam du zhugs pas de kho na mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/
311a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de kho na zhes bgyi ba de ci lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu Shadi lha ste/ de kho na zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i don gyi tshig bla dgas so// /
311a4(mdo sde): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu gang mi slu ba de ni yang dag pa'o// gsol pa
311a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das mi slu ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de ni de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
311a6(mdo sde): nyid do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ci lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu 'di ni so so rang gis rig pa yin
311a7(mdo sde): 'di ni yi ge dag gis gdams par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di ni yi ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa smra ba thams cad pas yang dag par 'das pa
311b1(mdo sde): tshig gi spyod yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa ngag gi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa spros pa thams cad dang bral ba blang ba dang dor ba thams cad
311b2(mdo sde): dang bral ba/ phye ba dang btsum pa thams cad dang bral ba/ rtog ge thams cad dang bral ba/ brtag par bya ba ma yin pa rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa rtog ge'i spyod
311b3(mdo sde): yul las yang dag par 'das pa mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma dang bral ba/ mtshan ma'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa byis pa'i yul las 'das pa byis pa'i
311b4(mdo sde): spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa bdud thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'das po/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa rnam
311b5(mdo sde): par shes pa'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa gnas pa ma yin pa mi gnas pa zhi ba 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul te/ de dag nyid kyi so so
311b6(mdo sde): rang gis rig pa/ dri ma med pa ma gos pa dang / rnam par dag pa gya nom pa/ mchog dam pa/ phul rtag pa dang brtan pa zor zug mi 'jig pa'i chos can yin te//
311b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / chos kyi dbyings 'di ni 'dug pa kho na'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid thos nas/
312a1(mdo sde): sems can dag kyang chos nyid 'di kho na la rab tu dgod do snyam ste/ don gang gi phyir 'bad cing rtsol ba dang brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang bka' ba
312a2(mdo sde): brgya dag byed pa rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// /
312a3(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zhes bya'o// gnyis su med pa'i dbyings zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa bcom ldan
312a4(mdo sde): 'das chos 'di ji ltar mngon du bgyi/ ji ltar khong du chud par bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis mngon du
312a5(mdo sde): bya'o// rang gis rig par khong du chud par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyis mngon du bgyi ba de//
312a6(mdo sde): rang gis rig pa khong du chud pa nyid ma legs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyis ni chos rnams pang
312a7(mdo sde): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ngo // lus kyis ni mngon du byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sem bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi
312b1(mdo sde): bu gang dag gis thos pa las byung ba 'am/ bsam pa las byung ba'i shes pas khong du chud par gyur pa de rang gis rig pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
312b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu ma yin te/ thos pa tsam mam/ bsam pa tsam gyis ni rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di
312b3(mdo sde): lha ste/ dper na 'brog chen por sos ka'i zla ba thal mi la la zhig shar phyogs nas nub phyogs su bgrol de nas mi gzhan zhig nub phyogs nas shar phyogs su 'ong ste de yang
312b4(mdo sde): sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs par gyur nas skom gyis nyen pa de/ shar phyogs nas 'ong ba'i mi de la 'di skad ces smras pa/ kye skyes bu kho bo sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs
312b5(mdo sde): te skom mis nyen nu/ gang na mtsho 'am/ lteng ka 'am rdzing gang nu bsil ba dang rnyog pa med pa gsal bas gang ba yod de/ gang du bdag tsha ba dang skom pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i mam bdag
312b6(mdo sde): la ston cig ces zer ma shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i mi de yang lam shes pa/ lam la mkhas pa lam mthong ba/ lam gyi mtshan ma mthong ba zhig yin te/ des na nu'i
312b7(mdo sde): nyes pa dang bral ba'i chu sngan chad mthong la sngon myangs shing sngon yang zhugs pa yin te/ des mi de la 'di skad du kye grogs po lam 'di na sa lam kha brag mthong gi bar du song
313a1(mdo sde): lagyi skyes bu khyod kyis g.yon gyi la mkhor te/ g.yas kyi lam nas nags tshal sngon po dang nags tshal de'i dbus na mtsho'am/ ldeng ka 'am/
313a2(mdo sde): rdzing nu bsil zhing dang brnyog pa med pa gsal bas gang ba mthong gi bar du song la der skyes bu khyod skom pa dang / tsha ba med par byos shig ces zer na rigs kyi bu khyod
313a3(mdo sde): ji snyam du sems sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs te/ skom gyis nyen pa'i mi des/ chu thos ma thag pa dang / bsams pa tsam gyis tsha ba med par 'gyur ram
313a4(mdo sde): sgom pa dang bral bar 'gyur ram chu de'i bsil ba yang rang gis rig par 'gyur ram gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das mi de nam der byin
313a5(mdo sde): nas des chu der zhugs te 'tshal bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ mi de tshe ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro// skom pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro// des bsil ba yang rang gis rig par 'gyur ro//
313a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lnga pa/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu zos pa tsam dang / bsams pa tsam gyis rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus so// de la rigs
313a7(mdo sde): kyi bu 'brog ces bya ba de ni 'khor ba'i 'brog gi tshig bla dgas so// mi sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs shing skom gyis nyen pa zhes bya ba de ni nyon mongs pa'i gdung bas yongs su
313b1(mdo sde): gdungs shing yul gyi sred bsterten pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshig bla dgas so// lam shes pa'i mi zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lams
313b2(mdo sde): mkhas pa chos myong ba chos rang gis rig pa rnams kyi tshig bla dgas so// chu bsil zhing dang la rnyog pa med pa gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di ni don dam pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so//
313b3(mdo sde): yang rigs kyi bu dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i tshad bskal par bzhugs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi mdun du 'di
313b4(mdo sde): lnga ste/ lha'i bdud rtsi dri zhim pa dang / gtsang ba dang / gya nom pa dang / shin tu zhim pa dang / reg na bde ba las brtsams te bsngags par brjod na rigs kyi bu de ji snyam
313b5(mdo sde): du sems ci sems can de dag gis lha'i bdud rtsi de'i bsngags par rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
313b6(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bas na khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam mam/ bsams pa tsam gyis rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus par rig par
313b7(mdo sde): bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhig shing thog gi rnam par sngon sems can sus kyang ma myangs pa zhig myangs pa 'gyur la/ des mi
314a1(mdo sde): gzhan zhig gi mdun du shing thog gi rnam pa de'i bsngags pa 'di lta ste kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa dang / dri zhim pa las
314a2(mdo sde): brtsams te brjod na rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems ci mi des shing thog gi ro de rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan
314a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam mam bsams pa tsam gyis so so rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi
314a4(mdo sde): nus par rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das legs par gsungs so// bde bar gshegs pa
314a5(mdo sde): shin tu legs par gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi tshul 'di su dag gi rnar thos par 'gyur pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag gi chos 'di khong du chud pa nyid du rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i
314a6(mdo sde): smad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu de dag gi chos 'di thob par bgyi ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// bcom ldan pa das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs
314a7(mdo sde): kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di thob par bya ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan
314b1(mdo sde): na drang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' spong pa nyid spyod sum pa rnams mim/
314b2(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta skye/ stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ mi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i sdong po nyid kyang rab tu shes
314b3(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes shes rab kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ rnam par grol
314b4(mdo sde): be'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ stong pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ don
314b5(mdo sde): dam pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes te/ de'i rgyu dang de'i rkyen de dang / gzhi des stong pa nyid du dmigs pa dang / stong pa nyid du 'dzin pa dngastong pa
314b6(mdo sde): nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid la gnas pa'ang mi dmigs rgyu dang rkyen de dang / gni des med par yang mi ltung ngo // rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang
314b7(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul ba rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu mos bcu dang ldan no/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa
315a1(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyi rol gyi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin nang gi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/
315a2(mdo sde): spros pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo ba thams cad dang /
315a3(mdo sde): bral ba rnams yinasgru ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ dmigs par bya ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa rnams rin
315a4(mdo sde): rnam par byung ba'i dngos po mi dmigs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams yin
315a5(mdo sde): no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
315a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi mtshan ma ma mchis pa la gnas pa yang de 'dran de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ci 'dra bar blta bar bgyi bcom lda ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
315a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de ci'i phyir zhen bsam pa'i yul dang bral ba'i phyir ci rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjes su ba#
315b1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad mos par 'gyur gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos sri kyi dos lam tshu rol mthong bar mi 'gyur/ mi dmigs te tha mar na dub pa'i rnal
315b2(mdo sde): bcan du 'gyur ro// ci'i gyur na ni rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni zab cing gting dpag dka' la 'i sam gyis mi khyab pa dpag tu med pa
315b3(mdo sde): rgya nam mkha' dang 'dra ba rtog ge ba thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa/ dmigs pa can thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa ste/ de ni brtag pa'am/
315b4(mdo sde): bsam pa 'am gzhal ba 'am tshad gzung bar mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ gal te nus nas zhu b.lu
315b5(mdo sde): bskrun pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phyen bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs de'i sangs rgyas
315b6(mdo sde): maphyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phyes khyod kyis dris shig/ byang
315b7(mdo sde): nub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa bdag stong na ni bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa'i chos su gsungs na de ji ltar chos kyi rje
316a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyid yang dag la bstod pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyis/
316a2(mdo sde): dri ba tshul bzhin du dris so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes byang chub sems da/
316a3(mdo sde): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems
316a4(mdo sde): ce na 'di dag pa ci nas kyang phan pa dang bde ba dang / chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag sdod pa ma gtogs par/ nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pa dang / rnyed pa'i zil gyis non
316a5(mdo sde): pa dang bkur sti'i zil gyis non pa dang grags pa 'dod pa dang / shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i phyir tshul 'a mos pa'am/ kha gsag med cing yang dag pa ma yin par bdag
316a6(mdo sde): bstod pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba dang/ dad pa dang rangs pa nye bar bzhags pas chos bstan
316a7(mdo sde): pa'i skal ba yod par 'gyur/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyi snod du gyur te/ de yang de dag la yun ring por don dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
316b1(mdo sde): dpar sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsos pa bcom ldan 'dus ci lags sems can 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ma 'tshal tam bcom ldan
316b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu mi shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyis bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sems can rnams ni rgyu chung ngul mos pa
316b3(mdo sde): dman tshegs la mos pa shes rab chung ba dad pa chung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus brtan pa dag ste/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba mi shes
316b4(mdo sde): pas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag nyid bdag gi yon tan gyi bsngags par brjod pa mdzad de/ de'ang nan gyis sgrub bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sman pa mkhas
316b5(mdo sde): pa zhig yod la sems can rnams kyang nad kyis nyen par gyur/ sa'i phyogs de na'ang sman pa de gcig pur zad de/ gnyis su med la de'i yon tan gyi che ba
316b6(mdo sde): sus kyang mi shes pa dang de nas sman pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni sdug bsngal ba nad kyis nyen pa sman la mi mkhas pa
316b7(mdo sde): gnod pa la sten pa yin gyis bdag gis de dag gso bar bya'o snyam nas sman pa des sems can de dag gi mdun du kye sems can dag bdag ni sman pa ste nad
317a1(mdo sde): la mkhas pa'o// nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa'o// sman la mkhas pa'o zhes bdag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa bdag nyid kyis brjod pa dang / sems
317a2(mdo sde): can de dag 'di ni sman pa'o zhes bya bar shes shing yid mos par gyur nas sman pa de la rten to// de nas sman pa de sems can de dag gso zhing nad de zhi bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu
317a3(mdo sde): de ji snyam du sems sman pa de bdag la stod par 'gyur ram gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
317a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yang sman pa'i rgyal po chen po bla ni med pa ste/ nyon mongs pa'i nang la mkhas pa nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i nad gso
317a5(mdo sde): ba la mkhas pa rnams chos kyi sman pa chen po stobs pa yin kyang nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis na bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis mi shes te/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad
317a6(mdo sde): par gyur pa'i sems can rnams gzigs nas de dag gi mdun du bdag gi yon tan dang bsngags pa bdag nyid brjod de/ de nas nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par 'gyur
317a7(mdo sde): ba'i sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa'i che ba thos nas yid ches par gyur pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa la rten to// de nas de dag la
317b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyirgyal po chen pos chos kyi sman de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar mdzad de/ chos kyi sman chen po de dag kyang gang sen 'di sasam jug
317b2(mdo sde): pa dang / byams pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung la sogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas bdag la bdag nyid rtsod
317b3(mdo sde): pa mdzad do// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan nabyang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba yin no// bcu gang zhe na
317b4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa la smon kyang sbyin pa la mi gnas pa rnams yin/ de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsem gtan dang
317b5(mdo sde): shes rab dang / khams gsum pa dang byang chub dang lam dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la smon kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa rnams yin te
317b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas thams cad dang bral ba ste mi gnas par 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par spyod do// rigs kyi bu chos ba
317b7(mdo sde): po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub
318a1(mdo sde): / sem sa / jug 'gyu da su pa smra
318a2(mdo sde): pa'i rgyams pa dang na pa rnams med rjes kyi thams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ nges par rtog pa'i tshangs pa dang dran panamasnam/ pa 'du ba'i rnams pa
318a3(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ len pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin sems can rnams cadas snyoms pa'i thams pa dang rngan pa rnams yin nod sems med pa'i rnams pa da
318a4(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams yin/ phyogs bcu kun tu khyab pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams min / rigs kyi bu chos bcu
318a5(mdo sde): de dag dang rngan na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i ba /
318a6(mdo sde): ched can rnams yin no// bcug zhen/ 'dis su/ sems can sdug bsam pa dang / skyabs med pa mug ni med pa dang na med pa dang /
318a7(mdo sde): gnyen med pa dag mthong na byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub tu sems bskyed/ chos cing thob par bya ba'i phyir 'bad rtsol/ brtson 'grus tsam sa/ dka
318b1(mdo sde): bar spyod pa brgyad dag kyang byed do// de dag chos thob nas sems can rnams la phan par byed do// 'dis ste/ sems can ser sna can nams sbyin pa la gzhog par byed
318b2(mdo sde): tshul khrims ngan pa can rnams tshul khrims la/ gnod sems can rnams bzod pa la le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la sems 'khrug pa rnams bsam gtam
318b3(mdo sde): sems can shes rab 'tshal ba rnams mthong nas shes rab la gzhol bar byed kyang sems can gyi sdug bsngal mi bamad pa cu ba bai tsha ba dag gis nyen cing
318b4(mdo sde): nub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu
318b5(mdo sde): tshes bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag ni 'khor ba'i brtson ra rab tu'abar ba nas byung ba'o/
318b6(mdo sde): nes rab tu dpa' bskyed do// bdag gis 'khor ba'i dpyang thag yun ring po nas thogs pa chod do zhes dga' bskyed do// bdag ni rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs mang po'i chu srin gyis
318b7(mdo sde): dkrug pa'i 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsal to zhes rab tu dga' bskyed do// bdag gis yun ring po nas bsgreng po'i nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bstsal lo zhes rab tu dga' bskyed do//
319a1(mdo sde): bdag gis nyon mongs pa'i ri rnams ye shes rdo rjes bcom ste/ ji ltar rdul kyang mi snang ba de ltar bcom mo zhes rab tu dga' bskyed do// bdag nyid ni dbugs
319a2(mdo sde): phyin pa yin gyis da ni gzhan yang dbugs dbyung bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag nyid ni 'jig rten gnas pa yun ring po nas gnyid la sred pa'i sdom pas yongs su
319a3(mdo sde): zin pa gti mug gis yongs su bsgribs pa'i nang nas sad pa yin gyi/ da ni gzhan yang rnam par sad par bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag nyid ni ngan 'gro dang
319a4(mdo sde): ngan song dang / log par lhung ba thams cad las rnam par grol ba yin gyis da ni gzhan yang ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang / log par lhung ba thams cad las rnam par
319a5(mdo sde): grol bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' bskyed do// bdag 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par yun ring po nas 'khyam sre/ grogs med cing gnyis su med par gar yang 'khyam zhing lam la mkhas
319a6(mdo sde): pa lam mi shes shing yul mi shes pas lam stor ba rnyed do zhes rab tu dga' bskyed do// bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer dang nye bar gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed
319a7(mdo sde): do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub
319b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa
319b2(mdo sde): nams yin te/ mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams kyis smras par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma byung bar mi 'gyur ba rnams dang / de bzhin
319b3(mdo sde): du na bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang snas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang lus kyis rnam par
319b4(mdo sde): shes par bya ba'i reg zla rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos
319b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis sbas par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngam gyi sdug bsngal dang 'gyur ba'i
319b6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis smras par mi
319b7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bya ba byas pa'i sems can rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ de dag la dga' ba dang dad
320a1(mdo sde): Sh+ya/ pa dang rangs pa skyed cing de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bsgral bar bya ba de dag nyid brgal bar gyur te zhes btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams/
320a2(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na
320a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ shi 'pho'ang ston skye ba'ang ston/ btsas pa dang / byis
320a4(mdo sde): pa'i spyod pa dang / slas kyi nang na rtse ba'ang ston mngon par byung ba yang ston dkan ba spyod pa'ang ston/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'ang ston bdud 'dul ba'ang ston/
320a5(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang sngon chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'ang ston yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'ang ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
320a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas/
320a7(mdo sde): shing po ston pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das rten po'i bar du ston pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas/
320b1(mdo sde): sems can gang dag rtag par 'du shes pa yod pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad las khyad zhugs pa 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par
320b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa 'jig rten kun gyi phul du byung ba mi nyams pa/ 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyis mgos ma chags pa shi 'pho bar mthong na rtag pa'i 'du shes ldog
320b3(mdo sde): cing mi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'byung ste/ mi rtog pa'i 'du shes la gnas pas bag yod pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho zang dam pa na sems
320b4(mdo sde): can gang dag bag med par spyod pa yod pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba yod dad pa yod/ rangs pa yod kyang yul la mngon par zhen pas byang chub sems dpa'i
320b5(mdo sde): drung du mi 'dod mi ste/ bsnyen bkur mi byed cing de dag 'a di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' yang bzhugs la bdag cag kyang 'khod de dus kyang ring du
320b6(mdo sde): yid kyis 'dong bar bya'o snyam du sems pa de dag gi bag med pa zlog pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' 'chi 'pho ston te/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' shi 'pho mthong nas//
320b7(mdo sde): skyo ba la gnas par 'gyur zhing de dag skyo bar gyur nas bag med pa mi byed de bag yod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
321a1(mdo sde): sems can gang dag skye bas 'dul ba yod pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug pa'i mthu mthong na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar 'gyur
321a2(mdo sde): te de dag ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur pa de lta de lhor byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug bzhin du chos ston to// rigs
321a3(mdo sde): kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang / sngas kyi nang na 'dug pas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba
321a4(mdo sde): dang dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams bsrung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang / sras kyi nang na 'dug pa ston to//
321a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba dang / rab tu 'byung bas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
321a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba ston cing rab tu 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
321a7(mdo sde): yin la sogs pa spyod pa dman pa la mos pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba'i spyod pas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang / mu
321b1(mdo sde): stegs can gzhan tshar gsad pa'i myur/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag gis sun ring po nas bdag cug gis rlu
321b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i tshe/ mchod pa'i lus la brtson par bya'o zhes smon lam btab pa yod pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba
321b3(mdo sde): ston la/ de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba la so so'i tshul bzhin du mchod pa byed do// de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas pas/ bla na med pa yang
321b4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dgang rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas rlom pa yod de/ de dag de las bzlog
321b5(mdo sde): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing / bdud btul bstan to// sems can gang zhi ba la gnas pa de dag las gong du khyad par thob par bya ba'i
321b6(mdo sde): phyir byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ston to// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
321b7(mdo sde): gyi khams na sgra sna tshogs dang / ci co sna tshogs gang yod pa de dag thams cad med cing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang zhi bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis
322a1(mdo sde): mthu de mthong nas bdag cag kyang de ltar byang chub kyi snying po la 'khod do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
322a2(mdo sde): bya'o zhes smon lam 'debs so// rigs kyi bu sems can gang ston par bkur ba dang / ston par khas 'che la de dag gis 'byung ba dang / phyi ma'i chos mngon par
322a3(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa yod pa de dag tshar gcod pa dang / sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin cing snod du gyur pa rnams la lam bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
322a4(mdo sde): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ka shi ka'i grong rdul du song nas lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi bakhor lo skor ro// rigs kyi bu
322a5(mdo sde): sems can gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas 'dul ba yod de/ de dag 'a dul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ston te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni rgyu
322a6(mdo sde): 'di ni rkyen te/ des byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas shing po ston cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du ston to// rigs kyi bu chos
322a7(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi
322b1(mdo sde): khom pa brkyang rnam par spangs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta sde mi dge ba'i chos las phyir log pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa
322b2(mdo sde): bcas pa las mi 'da' ba rnams yin/ ser sna dang bral ba rnams yin/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams yin/ bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin/ shes
322b3(mdo sde): rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/ smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin skyo ba mang ba rnams yin brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams
322b4(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye zhing de dag tu skyes nas kyang / tshor ba mi bzad pa/
322b5(mdo sde): rtsub pa/ tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur pa 'am yun ring por gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la gnod pa'i sems skyed par 'gyur/
322b6(mdo sde): bo de lta bur mi 'gyur gyi byang chub sems dpa'i ni rang bzhin gyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa yin te/ de ltar na de ni sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi
322b7(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa las mi 'da' ba gang gis dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur pa'am de dag tu skyes nas kyang dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal mi
323a1(mdo sde): bzad pa myong bar 'gyur ba med do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni gang ser snar 'gyur ba'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des yi dgas kyi nang du skye zhing
323a2(mdo sde): de dag tu skyes nas kyang yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa myong bar 'gyur ba medade/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gang du skyes pas dge ba'i bshes gcen dang 'grogs pa thob pa'i rkyen dang bral bar
323a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i log par lta ba'i rigs su mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe nabyang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sngon spyad pa ste/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa yin pas de dag yang dag par lta ba'i rigs
323a4(mdo sde): su skye ba yin te/ de dag tu skyes nas kyang rkyen phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing rkyen de dag de bas kyang 'a phel ba dang rgyas pa dang / rangs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
323a5(mdo sde): ni dbang po ma tshang ba'i rnam po gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du mi rung bar 'gyur bar dbang po dang mi ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' ni bsod nams bya ba la
323a6(mdo sde): brtson zhing bsod nams kyis brtan pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchode rten nam/ chos sam dge 'dun la bya ba gang byas shing bsnyen pa dang bsten pa dang
323a7(mdo sde): bsgoms pa dang / mang du byas pas dbang po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i bya ba de dang de dag byed cing / dbang po phur sum tshogs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du
323b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams mtha' 'khob kyi yul gang na sems can thun pa rmongs pa lug ltar lkugs pa'i ngang tshul can la ba myed pa legs par
323b2(mdo sde): bshad pa dang nyen par bshad pa'i don shes par bya ba'i mthu med pa sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa/ mar mi 'dzin pa par mi 'dzin pa dge sbyong du mi
323b3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pabadag gi nang du mi skye'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus kyi yul gang na sems can dbang po rno ba dbang po gsal ba mkhas pa mkhas
323b4(mdo sde): par bkur ba skal ba yod pa legs par byi shad pa dang ces par bshad pa'i don yongs su shes par bya ba'i mthu yod cing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa
323b5(mdo sde): mar 'dzin pa/ phar 'dzin pa dge sbyong du 'dzin pa bram zer 'dzin pa dag gi nang du skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon gyi shes rab dang ye shes kyi stobs kyi mthu dang ldan
323b6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rlobs ni gang na gnas pas sangs rgyas skyes pa du ma'i bras bu med par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi don 'grib par 'gyur ba lha tshe ra
323b7(mdo sde): po'i nang du mi skye'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams nyid du gang na sems can gdul bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas skyes pa mnyes par byar yod pa skye'o//
324a1(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang na sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa dang / chos mi thos pa dang
324a2(mdo sde): dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byur med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu mi skye'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dkon mchog gsum phun sum tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu skye'o//
324a3(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na de ni sngon gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams gnas de lta bu dag thos kyang skyo ba mi mang ba dang dmu rgod kyi ngang tshul can ma
324a4(mdo sde): yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gnas 'di lta bu dag thos ma thag tu skyo bar gyur nas mi dge ba'i chos 'di dag spang ba'i phyir dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams pa
324a5(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na
324a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ g.yo dang sgyu med de drang zhing gya gyu med la sems dang ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas
324a7(mdo sde): kyi chos rnams dang / de 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la yid gnyis dang / nem nur dang / the tsom med pa rnams yin/ chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud dang bral ba rnams yin
324b1(mdo sde): chos kyi sar sna dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur pa'i las kyi mtha' dang bral ba rnams yin/ ji skad du smras pa de lta bur byed de mi slu ba rnams yin/ theg pa chen po
324b2(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin/ de yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la chos dang mtshungs pa'i 'du shes kyis zhes dang rim dang bcas pa rnams yin/ theg pa chen po la gzhol
324b3(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la 'bab theg pa pa chen po la bab pa rnams yin/ chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston par 'du shes pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed pa rnams yin/
324b4(mdo sde): te rigs kyi bu mo sa bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub
324b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' tshe rabs dran pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa rnams yin/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams
324b6(mdo sde): yin tshul khrims yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ 'gyod pa med pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa med pa rnams yin dga' ba mang ba rnams yin/ sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/
324b7(mdo sde): sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams yin/ rdzus te skye ba rnams yin rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i
325a1(mdo sde): rgyang chung sangs dpa' ni dpang 'a gas pa da pa bu gyi yod du mi / dam pa nas yongs smra na pa'i klung pa garnams sa rim ma yod cing san/
325a2(mdo sde): sI yod pa yin te/ rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang gzhi des mu sa dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing bamang ngo // klog go// kun chub par byed do// gzhan
325a3(mdo sde): la yang rgya cher ston to// de dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson pas 'di lta ste/ lus dang / ngag dang sems kyi tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yin/ tshul khrims
325a4(mdo sde): yongs su dag pas 'gyod pa med pa yin te/ de yang rim gro med pa ma yin gyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro// 'gyord pa med pas sgrib pa med pa yin/ sgrib pa med pas
325a5(mdo sde): dga' ba mang ba yin/ dga' ba mang bas sgom pa mang ba yin/ sgom pa mang bas sems mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// sems mnyam par bzhag pas 'gro ba yongs su
325a6(mdo sde): dag par 'gyur/ 'gro ba yongs su dag pas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ rdzus te skyes pas rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa yin no// rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa'i phyir tshe rabs dran pa
325a7(mdo sde): yin te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran no// gnyis dang / gsum dang bzhi dang / lnga dang bcu dang nyi shu dang sum bcu dang bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu
325b1(mdo sde): nas 'tshe rabs brgya stong du ma'i bar du rjes su dran no// rigs kyi bu nos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs dran pa rnams yin no// / rigs
325b2(mdo sde): kyi ngu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma jal ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / zos pa
325b3(mdo sde): dang / dran pa dang mabral ba rnams yin chos mnyan pa dang ma thal ba rnams yin dge 'dun mchod cing bsnyen bkur dang ma bral ba rnams yin sangs rgyas dang byang chub
325b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams la gus par smra ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / ldang ba dang thal mo sbyar ba dang / 'dud pa'i las dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ mang du thos pa'i gang zag tshes smra
325b5(mdo sde): ba rnams dang ma bral ba rnams yin pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa dang ma dral ba rnams yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs chos mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum
325b6(mdo sde): mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos/
325b7(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i
326a1(mdo sde): grags pa yongs su smras pa rnams sa dug na 'du gyu/ na rjes khams pa'i gang na pa sa su mas ba zugs pa smos pa/
326a2(mdo sde): spangs par rig par ju'o// lta ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / chog nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'tsho ba rnams pa'i gang zag rnam par sbas pa dang
326a3(mdo sde): 'du 'dzil dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / le lo can gyi gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'khor ba la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang byang chub la rgyud kyis
326a4(mdo sde): phyogs pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / khyim pa dang sten pa rnam par spangs pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pas sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs par rig par bya'o//
326a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' des gnas 'di dag rnam par spangs pa'i tshe/ gang zag de dag la zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par mi bya'o// khong khro ba'i sems dang / brnyas pa/
326a6(mdo sde): sems bskyed par mi bya'i/ des 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sems can rnams ni khams so sor ston to// sten par gyur nas chud za bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' sbrul gyis
326a7(mdo sde): de bas na bdag gis ston pa yongs su spangs par sems nye bar gzhag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su
326b1(mdo sde): smras pa rnams yin no// rims kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan nA byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra'i mas nyid tho par 'gyur ro// bcu gang rten
326b2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ lus mnyam pa rnams yin/ lus yongs su dge pa rnams yin/ lus ma med pa rnams yin/ lus legs par sgrub pa rnams yin/ chos kyi lus rnams yin/
326b3(mdo sde): lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams yin/ lus zhi ba rnams yon// lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin/
326b4(mdo sde): ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub
326b5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid thob par
326b6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bus dang pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus mnyam pa nyid 'thoba'o// de ci'i phyir na n+te/ lus kyi
326b7(mdo sde): mam pa thams cad dang thal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur ba'i phyir ro// sa gnyis pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims 'ongs su dag pa'i phyir
327a1(mdo sde): sus yongs su dag pa 'thob bo// sa gsum pa la byang chub sems dpa' thob dang gnod sems thams cad dang bral ba'i phyim lus mya me pa thong 'o// /
327a2(mdo sde): pal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir lus legs par grub pa thob bo// sa lnga pa la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir chos kyi
327a3(mdo sde): lus 'thob bo// sa drug pa la brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba'i chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba 'thob bo// sa bdun
327a4(mdo sde): ba la sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa dang thabs mkhas pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob bo// sa brgyad pa la spros pa thams cad dang bral ba
327a5(mdo sde): dang nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir lus zhi ba 'thob bo// sa dgu pa la lus tshad med pas khyab pa'i phyir lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'thob bo// sa bcu pa la byang chub sems dpa' ye
327a6(mdo sde): shes kyi lus 'thob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes par bya ba thams cad yang dag par grub pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sem bas gsol pa
327a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid dang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi chos nyid la tha dad du bgyi ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
327b1(mdo sde): pa/ rigs kyi bu lus tha dad pas tha dad du byang med de/ yon tan gyi mthus ni tha dang du bya ba yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par ses pas sol pa//
327b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das ji ltar lus tha dad pas tha dad du bgyi ba ma mchis la/ yon tan gyi mthus tha dad du bgyi ba mchis pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ rigs kyi bu
327b3(mdo sde): lus lus zhes bya ba 'di ni tha dad pa med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus lus su brjod pa mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro// yon tan mthu'i mtshan nyid tha dad par blta'o//
327b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang lta bur yon tan gyi mthu'i mtshan nyid tha dad du blta bar bgyi/ bcum
327b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu de bas na don 'di nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dperan gyi dor ma byas pa'i nor/
327b6(mdo sde): bu rin po che dang byi dor byas pa'i nor bu rin po che ni 'di lta ste/ nor bu rin po che nor bu rin po che zhes bya ba nor bu rin po che'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi ji ltar byi ngor byas pa'i
327b7(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che mthu dang yid du 'ong bas khyab par byed pa ltar ni byi dor ma byas pa me yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus nir bu rin pa che yang de bzhin
328a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i su nor bu rin po che dang bcas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid kyi grangs su 'gro med kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin /
328a2(mdo sde): ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che'i drung du yongs su dag pa zhes mi brjod do// de rje'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po chen sems can gyi
328a3(mdo sde): khams tshad med pa dang nam mkha'i khams tshad med pa'i 'od kyis khyab par byas te gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe nu/ de ni shin tu yongs su drag pa dang dri ma thams cad dang bral
328a4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che ni/ de tsam du khyad par byed pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de ltar dri ma'i lhag ma las pa'i phyir ro//
328a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ni zla ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba nas/ zla ba nya'i bar gyi zla ba yang zla ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ tshes gnyis
328a6(mdo sde): kyis zlab ci 'dra ba de lta bur zlab chab ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ni de ltar chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang /
328a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bcas te/ lus kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i drung na lham mer mi 'gyur/ ldan ner mi 'gyur/
328b1(mdo sde): glang nger mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi du 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba nya dwa'i drung na tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ji lta de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyang /
328b2(mdo sde): lus su brjod pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid gcig mod kyi/ yon tan gyi mthu'i mtshan nyid kyis ni ma yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan+dan/ byang chub sems
328b3(mdo sde): dpa' lus rdo rje lta bur sra ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ khro ba dang
328b4(mdo sde): gnod sems kyi thab dang / dri ma dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang lta ba'i phyin ci log dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po dag
328b5(mdo sde): gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin// sems can gyi sdug bsngal gyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ skye ba dang
328b6(mdo sde): rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ mu stegs can dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ bdud thams
328b7(mdo sde): cad dang / bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ 'dod pa la spyod pa thams
329a1(mdo sde): cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje rasra pa rnams yin no//
329a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan da byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bkur ba rnams ldan/ mchod nga bros pa rnams yin/ byin
329a3(mdo sde): par byed pa rnams yin/ brten par bya ba rnams yin// nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba rnams yin/ brgyags shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tshogs shin tu bsags pa rnams
329a4(mdo sde): yin mi ngoms pa rnams yin/ thog mar 'gro ba rnams yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas par bya ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji/
329a5(mdo sde): lngaltar na byang chub sems dpa' bkur ba yin pa nas ji ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
329a6(mdo sde): dper na ded dpon chen po ni rgyal po dang rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag gis bkur ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas/
329a7(mdo sde): kyinyan thos rnams kyis bkur ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpe ngan ded dpon chen po ni bram zing / rgyam rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis mchod papa
329b1(mdo sde): 'os pa nams yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpom chen po dang slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / gzhan ljang sgru nga / klu dang / nod sbyin drung / dri ba dang //
329b2(mdo sde): lA ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dag gis mchod par 'os pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpe ron ded dpon chen po ni 'brog dgon par
329b3(mdo sde): 'gron po mang po 'phyan pas gtses pa dag legs par bde zhing yongs su mi skyo bar phyin par byed pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa 'ded dngango na chen po yang 'khor dwa'i 'dreb
329b4(mdo sde): dgon pa chen de'i nang na/ sems can 'gron po mang po nyon mongs pa'i'i phyin pas gtses pa legs par bde zhing yongs su mi skyo bar phyin pa byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta
329b5(mdo sde): ste dper na ded dpon chen po la brten na/ sdug bsngal ba dang / 'phongs pa dga' brog dgon pa nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po la
329b6(mdo sde): brten na/ mu stegs can gzhan spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa rnams 'brog dgon po chen po nis 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper
329b7(mdo sde): na ded dpon chen po ni rgyal po dang las byed pa'i mi dang no shas 'tshe ba dang / de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhani rnams che bar 'tsho ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems
330a1(mdo sde): dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'khor la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can nams la 'tsho ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta skye/ dper na da dpon can
330a2(mdo sde): po ni nam phyogs su 'gro bar chas te/ 'gron po mang po dang lhan cig tu grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba'i phyir 'brog dgon par zhugs pa de'i tshe grong khyer chen por myin gyi bar du
330a3(mdo sde): brgyags phun sum tshogs pas 'azog dgon pa de nas legs par bde zhing yongs su skyo ba med par 'byung bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang nam
330a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis rten pa'i phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod cing sems can 'gron po mang po ded de/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen por 'jug par 'dod la thams cad mkhyen
330a5(mdo sde): pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya bar 'dod pa de'i tshe/ bsod nams kyi brgyags kyi tshogs shin tu phun sum tshogs par 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na dred dpon
330a6(mdo sde): chen po ni 'tshe ba'i yo byad 'di lta ste/ gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang bai DUr+ya dang dung dang man shes dang d+ha rul sogs pa mang po bsags shing phyogs
330a7(mdo sde): su 'gro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang nam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por mngon par zhugs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi tshogs shin tu bsags
330b1(mdo sde): shing 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'dis ste/ dpe na ded da pan can phran nor bsags pas chog mi shes pa yin no// de bzhin du cung chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po
330b2(mdo sde): kyi nor bsags pas chog mi shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di sa skye/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni 'di wA ste/ nor phun sum tshogs padang/ gtso bo dang / dbang po
330b3(mdo sde): dang ngag mnyan pas blon po mang po thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'di lta ste/ yon tan phur sum
330b4(mdo sde): tshogs pa dang / yongs kyi gtso bo dang / chos la dbang ba dang / ma log par smra bas sems can 'gron pa mang po thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin no// rigs kyi bu
330b5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na ded dpon chen po ni grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
330b6(mdo sde): grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bkur ba yin pa nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zong khyer chen por phyin par
330b7(mdo sde): zla ba la mkhas pa'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yin no//
331a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldanan/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu grang zhe na/ 'di sa ste/ lam mnyam pa yang ras
331a2(mdo sde): shes/ lam nyam nga ba yang rab tu shes lam bde ba yang rab tu shes 'jam pa'i lam yang rab tu shes lam chu che ba dang chu med pa yang rab tu shes lam gyi dgongs
331a3(mdo sde): mal dag kyang rab tu shes lam gyi tshugs dag kyang rab tu shes lam 'khyog pa dag kyang rab tu shes lam drang po dag kyang rab tu shes lam 'byung ba yang rab tu
331a4(mdo sde): shes so// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang
331a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' lam ma log par ston pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i lam ston gyi
331a6(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi lam mi ston to// nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi lam ston gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lom mi ston to// thams cad mkhyen pas
331a7(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ston gyi rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mi ston to// rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang
331b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi lam ston gyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi la ma mi ston to// bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams dang / chos su 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen/
331b2(mdo sde): pa rnams la bdag med pa'i lam dang stong pa nyid kyi lam ston gyi bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso bA dang / skyes bu dang gang zag gril ma mi ston to//
331b3(mdo sde): mtha' gnyis la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i lam ston gyi/ mtha' gnyis la gnas pa mi ston to// sems g.yengs pa'i sems can rnams la
331b4(mdo sde): zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam ston gyi/ g.yeng ba'i lam mi ston to// spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin nyid kyi lam ston gyibyis pa spros
331b5(mdo sde): pa la dga' ba'i lam mi ston to// 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam ston gyi/ 'khor ba'i lam mi ston to// lam grol
331b6(mdo sde): par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la lam srol ma dod pa ma yin pa dang / tsher ma med pa'i lam ston gyi nyon mongs pa'i tshe rams gang ba'i lam mi ston to// rigs
331b7(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam ma log par ston pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
332a1(mdo sde): dpa' rtag tu rgyan mi 'chad par sems mnyam par gnag pa rnams yin no// bcu shwe/ 'dis sa// lus sa rgyan pa shis kyi gas /
332a2(mdo sde): gnas so// tshor ba rnams dang sems rnams dang chos rnams dang / yum rnams dang dgon pa rnams dang / grong dang / grong rdam dang / ljongs da /
332a3(mdo sde): yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pas
332a4(mdo sde): bslab pa bcas pa rnams dang // nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so//
332a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas she na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang lus dang ldan pa'i sdig pa mi dge
332a6(mdo sde): ba'i chos de dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu brtags shing yongs su spong ngo // de'i 'og gi rkang pa'i mthil nas brtsamos te yar na klad pa'i bar du lus kyi nyes pa la rtog go/
332a7(mdo sde): lus la bdag med par yang rtog go// lus mi brtan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / chu rgyus kyi klags pa dang / dri mi zhim pa dang / dri nga ba dang / kha dog mi sdug par rtog ste
332b1(mdo sde): dri de ltar rtog pa'i \u0f7f/ gang lus la lus su 'dod pa dang / lus su 'dod chags pa dang / lus la dga' ba dang / lus la bdag gir 'dzin pa dang / sus la zhe bdag gi 'drung
332b2(mdo sde): skyergyu de dang rkyen de dang / gzhi des lus dang ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du na lus dang ldan pa'i chos rnams de nyid kyi dbang du 'gyur te/
332b3(mdo sde): de ltar na lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas pa'o// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub
332b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ tshor ba gang ji snyed pa de thams cad sdug bsngal na/ byis pa phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba rnams ni bde bar 'dzin to/ byis
332b5(mdo sde): pa rmongs pa rnams sdug bsngal la bde ba zhes bya ba 'dzin gyi/ 'phags pa rnams kyis ni thams cad sdug bsngal bar thugs su chud snyam nas de spang ba'i phyir nan tan du mdzad la/
332b6(mdo sde): sems can gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'god kyis/ bdag gis kyang de dag gi rjes su bslab par bya'o snyam ste/ de de ltar rtogs pas tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu
332b7(mdo sde): bar gzhag cing gnas so// de tshor ba dag la chags pa yang med khong khro ba yang med cing de dag spong ba'i phyir rab tu zhugs pa yin no// gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de
333a1(mdo sde): nyid la 'god de/ de ltar na tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems la dran pa shin tu/
333a2(mdo sde): nye bar gzhag cing gnas she na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems 'di ni mi rtag pa la rtag par mngon par dga' ba'o// sdug bsngal la bde bar mngon par dga' ba'o//
333a3(mdo sde): bdag med pa la bdag tu mngon par dga' ba'o// mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar mngon par dga' ba'o// g.yo zhing mi brtan la myur du 'gyur ba'o// nyon mongs pa rnams kyi
333a4(mdo sde): rtsa ba'o// ngan song rnams kyi sgo'o// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gzhi'o// bde 'gro rnams chud gsod pa'o// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams
333a5(mdo sde): kyi rkyen du 'gyur ba'o// chos thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa'o// chos thams cad ni sems thog mar 'gro ste/ sems yongs su shes na/ chos thams cad kyang yongs su
333a6(mdo sde): shes par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'jig rten sems kyis bris pa ste/ mi ltar sems ni sems kyis mi mthong ngo // dge ba 'am yang na mi dge ba'i las ni sems kyis
