363b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pas brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin// sems mi g.yeng ba dang ldan pas bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ shes rab 'chal pa'i bzhin can ma yin pas mang du
363b6(mdo sde): thos pa rnams yin/ shes rab rnobs dbang po mi rtul ba rnams yin/ gnod sems dang ldan pas byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa tham
363b7(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dis rgya chos de dag tshogs pas skye bar 'gyur ras 'on nyel lam tshang yang skye bar 'gyurabacom ldan 'das kyil bka
364a1(mdo sde): sprul pa rigs kyi bu chos tshogs pa de dag las gang gi chos cig gcig skyon med pangs 'asu / ma ma med de/ seMs m+b+ha myos
364a2(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de la/ rigs kyi bu chos de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ rigs kyi bu 'i phyir chos de batshogs pa tsug mtshogs pas ni ma yin
364a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na
364a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs byed pa dang / mchod rten zhig pa bcos pa
364a5(mdo sde): dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la spos kyi byug pa 'bul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dag la khrus kyi spos chu 'bul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
364a6(mdo sde): rten dag la phyag bdar dang skyang nul bya ba 'bul ba dang / pha ma dag la lus kyi rim gro byed pa dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon dag la lus kyi rim gro byed pa dang / tshangs pa
364a7(mdo sde): mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la lus kyi rim gro byed cing / de yang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis te/ zang ming dang bcas pas ma yin la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'di ltar dge
364b1(mdo sde): rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad mngal gyi drims ma gos par skye bar gyur cig ces yongs su sngo rnying de yang bsam pa thag pa nas sems pa ste rigs kyi bu chos bcu'o/
364b2(mdo sde): de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngal gyi dri mas mgos por d+he'i/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon pa
364b3(mdo sde): byung ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltaH/ le 'ur len pa med pa rnams yin/ 'du'adzi med par spyod pa rnams yin/ yul la rgyu kyis phyogs pa rnams yin
364b4(mdo sde): dril la sred pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ yul gyi nyes pas mi gos pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims bcas pa la rim zo byed cing brtson pa dang shin
364b5(mdo sde): bslabs pa rnams yin/ gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal changan ngon dang / rna ba'i gsos spyan dang / yo byad ngan don dag gis rtog shes pa rnams yin/ lhung
364b6(mdo sde): ma gos dang / ma byung la sogs pa dang bral ba rnams san/ rtag par 'jigs pa'i yid drung cing sul rnams las b+h+yo bArnam pa y-i/ dben pa lnga ga na
364b7(mdo sde): mas tshar rdza pa 'a mam gyi mas cu ba da da na/ byang chub sem ma dpa ma gyi na pa sa byung ba mas kyi
365a1(mdo sde): ldanan/ byang chub sems dpa' 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa rnams yin no// cug zhen 'dzin tshul 'chos pa dang lags ba d+hA
365a2(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ gzhogs slongs kyi rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ thob kyis 'jal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ mi rigs pa 'tshal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin//
365a3(mdo sde): chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin rnyed pa la zhen pa med pa rnams yin/ rnyed pa la chags pa med
365a4(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ yongs su yi chad pa'i rang bzhin med pa rnams yin/ chos kyi rnyed pas chog shes pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul
365a5(mdo sde): 'chos pa dang kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir/ lus kyi tshul 'chos pa mi byedangag gi
365a6(mdo sde): tshul 'chos pa mi byed/ sems kyi tshul 'chos pa mi byed do// ji ltar na lus kyi tshul 'chos mi byed po yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ni sbyin po byed pa dang
365a7(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i bdag po ma thong na spyod lam mi 'chos so// ji ltar na spo lam mi 'chos shen/ gnyi shing gang tsam du lta po dang / skyo bar lta ba dang / sgrib pa med/
365b1(mdo sde): par ltabs gos pa sngags kyis ngam nas 'ja nar 'deg pa sa yin derdzu lus kyi chu 'chos par mi byed do// ji ltar nangag gi tshul 'as pami byungs/ nga /
365b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir gcom bsgyangs shing smra ba ma yin/ 'jam por smra ba ma yin/ dka' bar smra ba ma yin/ rjes su 'brang ba'i tshig brjod pa ma yin te/
365b3(mdo sde): de ltar na ngag gi tshul 'chos po mi byed do// ji ltar na sems kyi tshul 'chos pa mi byed ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa'am/ sbyin pa'i bdag po'i rnyed pas ba
365b4(mdo sde): na tshig 'dod pa chung bar ston cing sems kyi 'dod pa skyed pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ tshig gis 'dod pa chud la/ sems kyis rnyed pa 'dod pa 'di ni nang gi gdung ba yi
365b5(mdo sde): de ltar na sems kyis tshul 'chos pa mi byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na gzhogs slongs kyi
365b6(mdo sde): rnyed pa dang bral ba yin ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa'am/ sbyin bdag mthong na/ bdag gos kyis 'phongs so// bdag lhung bzed kyis 'phongs so
365b7(mdo sde): 'dagan pa'i gsos ldan gyis 'bangs so zhes gnogs rmongs mi byed cing sbyin pa byed pa'am sbyin pa'i bdag pol mi myong zhing cheg tu mi brjod do/ de ltar byang chub sems sa/
366a1(mdo sde): gzhogs skyong gi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// de ltar du za kyis 'jal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral bsnyen na/ nga rgya sa sa dpa spyod rnyed byu nga /
366a2(mdo sde): sbyin bdag mthong na/ bdag sbyin pa'i bdag po che ge mo zhig gis ngos po che ge mo zhig byin te/ de la bdag gis kyang phan pa che ge mo zhig byas so zhes des kyang bdag la tshul khrims
366a3(mdo sde): dang ldan par rig ste/ mang du thos pa'o// 'dod pa chung ba zhes 'di dang 'di byin no// bdag gis kyang de la 'di snying rje ba'i sems che bar bzhag ste blangs so zhes de skad kyi tshig mi brjod de/
366a4(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thob kyis 'jal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rigs par 'tshal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
366a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni lus la rma byung ba dang / sems la rma byung bar rnyed pa tshol ba ma yin no// de la lus kyi rma ni 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir rgyug pa dang / kun tu rgyug/
366a6(mdo sde): pa dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims la spyod pa'o// sems kyi rma ni 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa la smon pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan gyis rnyed pa dag la gnod sems
366a7(mdo sde): mang ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rig par 'tshal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos mi yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs/
366b1(mdo sde): gyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' srang la sgyu med pa dang / brtsal ba la rgyu med pa dang / yid brgyan pa la gnod par byed pa med pa dang / g.yos rnyed pa mi sgrub pa // de ltar/
366b2(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
366b3(mdo sde): gang mchod rten gyi dang 'dres pa 'am/ chos kyi dang 'dres pa'am/ dge 'dun gyi dang 'dres pa 'am/ ma byin par ma gnang ba de dag mi len cing bdag gir mi byed/ chags
366b4(mdo sde): pa'i sems mi skyed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa la zhen pa med pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi
366b5(mdo sde): bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa maud kyang / bdag gi mi b+hed/ nor du miHtshogs su mi byed cing / dus nus su dge sbyong dang zam me da / @
366b6(mdo sde): shes dang / ga mtshatshas dag gang shing dus dus su bdag kyang yongs su lam su sto 'i rnags mye par
366b7(mdo sde): zin pa med par mangs su myong ngo // rnyed pa ma rnyed dang blo ba'i sems mi skyed cing yongs su mom 'chang ngo/ sbyin pa byed pa dang / sbyin bdas rnams lam dang por mi 'dzin pa'i
367a1(mdo sde): de chos dang 'thun par rnye pa/ dge 'dun gyi rag dugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa/ byang chud sems lus ma smra ba
367a2(mdo sde): lhas bstod pa/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pas mi dpyas pa chog shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa rnams
367a3(mdo sde): yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' yid yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi
367a4(mdo sde): rgyu sems can gyi phyir 'khor ba na gnas pas yongs su mi skyo'o// sems can gyi rgyu sems can gyi phyir 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis yongs su mi skyo'o// sems can gyi don rnams la
367a5(mdo sde): yongs su mi skyo'o// sems can gyi dgos pa rnams la yongs su mi skyo'o// sems can gyi bya ba rnams la yongs su mo skyo'o// gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams la lam ston pas
367a6(mdo sde): yongs su mi b+h+yo'o// de dag la dad pa mi byed do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yongs su bsgrubs kyang yongs su mi rgyu'o// byang chub kyi phyogs tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya bas
367a7(mdo sde): yongs su mi skyo'o// bsam pa mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang / mya ngan las 'das pi la mngon du mi ston du mi lha'i/ byang chub la gzhol byang chub la 'ba'/ byang chub la/
367b1(mdo sde): bab pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' yin yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcud/
367b2(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bag med pa thams cad dang bral zhing /
367b3(mdo sde): bag yod par spyod pa rnams yin/ lus kyi shin tu bsnams shing lus kyi ngan du spyad pa mi spyod pa rnams yin/ ngag gi shin tu bsdams shing / ngag gingan du spyod pa mi spyod pa
367b4(mdo sde): rnams yin yid kyi shin tu 'artsams shing / yid kyi ngan du spya pa me stong+ge ma rims mnan// 'jig rten pa rol gyi 'jigs shing mi drim pa'i chos thams cad rnam par
367b5(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ rigs par zhing mi rigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos su smra/ zhing chos ma yin pa la spyod pa rnams yin/ smad pa'i las rnam par
367b6(mdo sde): na marnams sbyinas smra byung ba rnams na/ dbazhin ga shegs pa'i bstan pa la san me rnams paN+Di pa'i yul thams cad pa bral ba rnam pa
367b7(mdo sde): 'i mang shing rdzog pa mau na mal rnams ma rdzing ba mam yin no// gros kri ba das pa / rgyab ma#
368a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' basbyin du byed pa rnams sa// gas kyi bu rlos cu dang nan/ rlung chu sems dpa na
368a2(mdo sde): 'dzum zhing khro ga nyer med pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen/ 'di / dbang po shin tu drad pa rnams pa'o// dbang po mis su nges pa rnam pa na dang thugs
368a3(mdo sde): rnams yin/ dbang po dri ma med pa rnams yin/ dbang yongs su byang ba rnams yin/ gnod sems dang bral ba rnams yin/ bag la nyal ba dang bral ba rnams yin/
368a4(mdo sde): nas sdang ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ tha ba dang mdud par 'dzin pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ khong khro ba dang bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/
368a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
368a6(mdo sde): pa'i don ji lta bu lags pa bdag gis 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang po yongs su dag pas na/ bzhin 'dzum pa lags nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral byas
368a7(mdo sde): nakhro gnyer ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bud de de bzhin no// de de bzhi te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang po yongs
368b1(mdo sde): su ngas pas na bzhin 'dzum pa yin/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bas na khro gnyer med pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldanan
368b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba ni 'dod chags kyi mes rab tu 'bar ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
368b3(mdo sde): tu shes so// zhe sdang gi mos rab tu 'bar ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gti mug gi mes rab tu dkrugs pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ra
368b4(mdo sde): shes so// 'dus byas ni mi rtag pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
368b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten ni stong bapa'i zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o zhes yi dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'jig rten ni smos pa
368b6(mdo sde): mngon par dgra' ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad ni sbyin las byung ba'o zhes yang dag pa nges ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mya ngan las 'angs
368b7(mdo sde): pani ni ba'o zhes yang dag pa'i sna bzhin durab tu shes so// de yang thos pa dang bsam pa dang / 'i rnam pas shes kyi/ slar brjod pa mi phyis ni ma yin te/ degyur shes nas
369a1(mdo sde): snying rje ba'i sems spyan banye bar bzhug/ sems can rnam te blo du rtsol zhing 'ab pa brtson 'grus rtsom mo// N+ya du
369a2(mdo sde): de dag dang ldan nA/ byang chub sems dpa' mdu thos pa rnams sbyin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang da/ byang chub sems dpa dam pa'i chom mo
369a3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig cing bstan pa 'khrug par gyur pa dang
369a4(mdo sde): sems can rnams lam ngan par zhugs pa dang ye shes kyi skyon ma mya ngan las 'das te/ son pa med pa'i tshe/ mdo sde rgya chen po rgya chen po don che zhing mthu che ba/ dam pa'i chos
369a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi ma mo dang 'dra ba dag 'dzin cing klog la kha ton byed cing kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher brjod cing ston la yang dag par ston cing / gsal bar
369a6(mdo sde): byed pa dang / de la zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs par byed cing / de dag la phan 'dogs pa dang / zang zing med pa'i sems kyis dam
369a7(mdo sde): pa'i chos nyan pa dang / chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston par 'du shes skyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos la bdud rtsir 'du shes skyed pa dang / bcud kyis len du 'du shes skyed pa dang /
369b1(mdo sde): rtsi'i 'du shes myed pa dang / lus dang srog la myi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba dang brtul nas kyang nan tan gyis sgrub pa'o// rigs kyi chos bcu ba dag dang rgyun
369b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams yin
369b3(mdo sde): no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus mtshan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin/ lus dpe byad bzang po'i me tog rgyas pa rnams yin/ dbang po rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
369b4(mdo sde): dang ldan zhing shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i gnas la rjes su rten pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhud pa'i lam rjes su
369b5(mdo sde): thob par byed pa rnams yin de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa'i chos rnams khong du chud par byed pa rnams min/ 'jig rten sdug bsngal ba yongs su myong ba rnam
369b6(mdo sde): yid 'phags pa'i tshul la shin tu bslabs pa rnams yin tshang ba'i gnas rnams la nin tu mthar phyin pa rnams smin/ de bzhin ga shegs pa bzhugs pa'i tham cud
369b7(mdo sde): khyen pa nid kyi po zangan gnas pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chom bcu por dag dang ldananabyang chub sems dpa tshas kyi rgyal pa'i mas rnam pa yi no//
370a1(mdo sde): thams da rdzunad+hA masems dpa byin drung / sa pa dang / 'disaste/ spyod smras rnams / phyu na
370a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa rnams yin/ bdud thams cad kyis mi bskul pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las mi gtso ba rnams yin/
370a3(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi tshul la zhugs pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa'i'adi khong du chub pa rnams min/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams so//
370a4(mdo sde): shin tu rtog pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par
370a5(mdo sde): 'pham pa rnams yin/ mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin dang / tshangs pa
370a6(mdo sde): dang 'jig rten skyong bas bsu ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba shes pa rnams min/
370a7(mdo sde): no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can 'dod chags kyi bsam pa can yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang gi bsam pa can dang / gti mug gi
370b1(mdo sde): bsam pa can dang / dam pa'i bsam pa can dang bar ma'i bsam pa can dang / zhan pa'i bsam pa na dang / dge badribasam pacan dang / na/
370b2(mdo sde): bsam pa can dang / yun ring por bsam pa can dang / sems can gtum pa'i bsam pa can yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing de yang sems can gcig par
370b3(mdo sde): ltar shes pa bzhin du sems can gyi khams kun la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang
370b4(mdo sde): bag la nyal ba shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan nA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshig shes pa rnams men/
370b5(mdo sde): no/ bcu ga zhen 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugapa 'i bar ston to// byang chub sems
370b6(mdo sde): dpa' gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ rang sangs rgyas
370b7(mdo sde): kyi gzugs nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi gzugs brgya byin gyi gzugs kyi mi 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la brgya gyi
371a1(mdo sde): kyi gzugs dadud kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bdud kyi gzugs / nangs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba ma
371a2(mdo sde): can rnams la/ tshangs pa'i gzugs/ bram ze'i gzugs kyis 'dul sems can rnams la/ bram ze'i gzugs rgyal rigs kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams pa
371a3(mdo sde): rgyal rigs kyi gzugs/ khyim bdag gi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ khyim bdag gi gzugs nye bar ston to// rigs kyi bu de ltar rnam pa gang gis sems can rnams
371a4(mdo sde): 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i rnams pa de dang de byang chub sems dpa' rnams nye bar ston to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya
371a5(mdo sde): ba'i chog shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nges pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ drang ba rnam
371a6(mdo sde): yin/ 'jam pa'i rnams yin/ gya gyu med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams
371a7(mdo sde): yin rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ mi badrang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ rtsub pa spangs pa rnams yin/ bzod pa mang ba rnams mi/
371b1(mdo sde): nges pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nges pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
371b2(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lta ba yongs su dag pas lta bdun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tshul zhim
371b3(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ chos yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ tshul dang cha 'thun pa'i spyod yul du spyod pa rnams yin/ gan nas nyon mongs pa med par spyod pa rnams yin
371b4(mdo sde): yangs pa rnams min/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la rjed pa rnams yin/ skal bya mnyam pa rnams ma lam gcig tu zhugs pa rnams min/ ston pa gzhan med pa rnams/
371b5(mdo sde): yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub
371b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcug shen/ 'di skyes/ phan pa'i sbyin pas sems can rnams drung // bde ba'i sbyin pa dang
371b7(mdo sde): pa'i nan par smra ba dang / bdu sub chos sa / rimam par / du bya ba dang mi gis po 'du po dang / #
372a1(mdo sde): sa spro na pas mas spya nas / jug+sas pa sa smra na Sh+TA
372a2(mdo sde): mi meng pa'i sbyin pa ni gang lam gyi sang sbyin gyi'o// phan pa d+hA ni gang ga pa'i dra ba thangs pa'o// don du r+m+ma TI ga dag gyu ban pag su rnaMg 'in
372a3(mdo sde): pa'i bstan pa dang 'thun par bstan pa'o// rigs par sru ba ni gang don yang dag par chud mi gson pa'o// den bya ba ni gang mi dge ba'i gnas nas bslang ste/ dge pa'i gnas su
372a4(mdo sde): pa'o// yang zing gi don 'thun pa ni gang bza' ba dang bca' ba dang bldag pa dang ltung ba dang gzhib pa dang gos la sogs pa thun mong du yongs su spyod pago/
372a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyi don 'thun pa ni gang ser dang / nor bu dang mu tig dang / bai nUn+da dang / dung dang / man shel dang / bya ru dang / sau la
372a6(mdo sde): sngam dang / dngul dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / bzhon pa thun mong du spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub
372a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan no/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul shes pa rnams yin no// bcu ga na/
372b1(mdo sde): na'adi lta ste spyod la ma rab tu zhi ba rnams yin/ spyod lam sgyu med pa rnams yin spyod lam yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ bldan dag ba rnams yin bstan da
372b2(mdo sde): pa rnams yin blta bas chog mi shes pa rnams yin/ bzhin yid du 'ong ba rnams yin bltan sems can thams cad khong khro ba med par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ bstan
372b3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad sems tshim par 'gyur ba rnams yin blta na sems can thams cad kyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang
372b4(mdo sde): ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshul shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas bca' ba rnams yin na/
372b5(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad non mongs pa'i 'jigs pa dag las yongs su srung ba yin/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas 'don pa rnams len
372b6(mdo sde): dang ba'i rgya mtsholas sgrol ba rnams yin dpon med pa rnams lha gnyen du gyur pa rnams yin/ nyon mengs pa'i nad kyis nud par gyur pa rnams la snun par gyur pa rnams pan
372b7(mdo sde): med pa dag la rten rnams yin gnas med pa dag la gnas rnams yin byings med pa dag la rgyabs rnams yin/ gling med pa dag la gling rnams min/ dpung gnyen med dpas
373a1(mdo sde): dpung gnyen rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' branas bca' ba rnams yin no//
373a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rtsi'i rgyal po'i
373a3(mdo sde): shing chen po blta na bzang zhes bya ba de ni rtsa bas kyang sems can nad pa rnams nye bar 'tsho'o// sdong po dang / yal ka rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang me tog rnams dang
373a4(mdo sde): 'bras bu rnams dang / mthong ba dang bsnams pa dang / reg pas myangs pa dang / reg pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang
373a5(mdo sde): sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi nad kyis nang par gyur pa'i sems can rnams sbyin pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang
373a6(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / yon tan gyi ro myangs pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya bas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin
373a7(mdo sde): no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub
373b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog gsum la ci nus su bya ba byed pa dang / sems can nad pa rnams la/
373b2(mdo sde): rtsi sbyar ba dang / sems can bkres pa dang skom pas nyen pa rnams la zas dang / skom gyi sbyin pa dang / rlung dang / lhags pa dang / nyi mas nyen pa'i sems can rnams la dgapa
373b3(mdo sde): bskyon pa rang mkhan po dang slob dpon rnams la gus par rim gro byed pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la gus par smra/ phyag 'tshal/ ltung thal
373b4(mdo sde): sbyor zhing 'dud par byed pa dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang dang skyed mos tshal bya ba dang / dus dus su nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang ba
373b5(mdo sde): ba gtong ba dang bran pho dang bran mo dang / las mi dang zho shas 'tsho ba la bgo bshes yongs su skyong ba dang / dus dus su tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong
373b6(mdo sde): dang bram ze la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi
373b7(mdo sde): bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yol sangs/
374a1(mdo sde): #/ rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yongs su 'dri'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang
374a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos nyan to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing brnyan bkur
374a3(mdo sde): byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo//
374a4(mdo sde): la sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams la rim gro byed/ bkur sti byed/ bsti stang byed/ mchod pa byed pa yin no// /
374a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la sangs rgyas
374a6(mdo sde): kyi zhing du mar yang bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ro//
374a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs
374b1(mdo sde): rgyam b+hA shing dum yang sems can 'dul ba snyed kyi sbrul bu byed kyang dedag su par byed pa'i rtsa/ rtog pa med ni rnams par rdzog pa med pa 'in s+ho kyang chu
374b2(mdo sde): dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang lci bu byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa 'gyed na mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa lags
374b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu de'i phyir dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper ninyam dang zla ba ni gling bzhi snang bar byed cing sems
374b4(mdo sde): can rnams la phan 'dogs pa yin kyang nyi ma dang zla ba ni bdag cag gi snang bar byed do// bdag ni sems can la phan 'dogs pa'o zhes mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon gyi las
374b5(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa'i mngon par 'du shes pas zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis kyi bya ba de lta bu 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sprul pa 'gyed na mi rtog rnam par mi rtog
374b6(mdo sde): ste sgrim pa dang mngon par 'du bya ba mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gyi las rnam par smin pas mngon par 'du bya ba rnams mngon par 'grub pa'i phyir te/ sngor byang chub
374b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe de ci nas kyang rnam par rtog pa med par yang sprul pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar smon lam btab/ de lta de ltar mngon
375a1(mdo sde): par 'du byas pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sprul bal mkhas pa rnams yin no//
375a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na / byang chub sems dpa myur du bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa'i rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams yin no// bcu gang na
375a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims shin tu grub cing tshul khrims kyi phung po skyon med pa dang / ma 'dzes par
375a4(mdo sde): sra sre med pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa dang / yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba dang ldan pas tshul khrims shin tu phun sum tshogs
375a5(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ bzod pa shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / brtson 'grus shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / bsam gtan shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams
375a6(mdo sde): dang shes rab shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / thabs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / smon lam shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / stobs shin
375a7(mdo sde): tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / ye shes shin tu grub cing thun mong ma yin pa'i ye shes nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub
375b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' yan chad sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bar gyi ye shes las 'das pa dang ldan pas ye shes shin tu rdzogs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu
375b2(mdo sde): chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis cho
375b3(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu 'gul te/ rab tu g.yos par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
375b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab dag gam ri btang bzung ngam ri btang bzung chen po dag gam khor yug giri 'am khor yug ga ri chen po dag
375b5(mdo sde): gam de ma yin pa rin po che'i dri dang / ri nag po dag thams cad kyang / yul g.yag la bdud ga ya mgo rigal ba dri logs su bcom ldan 'das la chos kyis
375b6(mdo sde): dgab pa bya ba'i phyir 'dud par gyur to// gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni me tog gi shing ngam 'bras bu'i shing ngam/ smos kyi shing ci yod pa de
375b7(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das ma chos kyi dbab pa bya ba'i phyir g.yam tho ro ga la ba de logs su 'dud par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das lachos kyi dgab pa 'bul
376a1(mdo sde): ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang na bza' dang rgyan gyi bye brag sna tshogs kyi phung po ri rab tsam byas par gyur to// brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang
376a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba brgya stong du ma'ang mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing thal mo sbyar ba byas te/ 'dud cing bcom ldan 'das la me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dag 'thor bar gyur to// lha'i bu
376a3(mdo sde): brgya stong du ma'ang nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas te gos g.yob cing ca co dang gzha brgya stong byed par gyur to// lha'i me tog gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor bar gyur cing kye ma'o dang
376a4(mdo sde): ni 'jig rten du sangs rgyas gnyis skyes par gyur to// kye ma'o chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor to// sems can gang dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grags par 'gyur ba de dag
376a5(mdo sde): kyang bsod nams dang ldan zhing dge ba'i las byed pa ste/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pa yin no// gang 'di la dad pa rnyed pa
376a6(mdo sde): dag lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes de skad du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// lto 'phye chen po brgya stong du ma'ang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir/ 'brug ltar
376a7(mdo sde): sgra'ur 'ur 'byin sgrog par byed/ shin sgrog par byed cing / spos kyi sprin sna tshogs mngon par sprul te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / ga ya
376b1(mdo sde): mgo'i ri la spos chu'i char mngon par 'bebs kyang sems can rnams la gnod par mi snang ngo // lha'i bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar glu'i nga ro'i sgra 'byin pa
376b2(mdo sde): gyur to// dri za'am mi 'am ci brgya stong du ma'ang snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis rgyu len cing g.ya mgo'i ri dang stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khoms la skor bar byung bar gyur
376b3(mdo sde): to/ gnod sbyin bye ba brgya stong du ma'ang pad+ma'i char mngon par 'bebs par gyur to// bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang yul gyi mi brgya stong du ma 'angam
376b4(mdo sde): tog dang bo dug spos dang sos dang 'phreng ba dang byug pa dang bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dag gis
376b5(mdo sde): bcom 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma dag nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi dgab par bya ba'i phyir/ so so'i smin mtsham
376b6(mdo sde): kyi mdzod spu dag nas 'od zer mang po bkye bar gyur to// 'od zer de dag kyang kha dog sna tshogs gzugs sna tshogs snang ba sna tshogs can sha stag ste/ de 'di lta ste/ sngon
376b7(mdo sde): po dang ser po dang dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog te/ de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
377a1(mdo sde): 'di la sor bar byed cing munA pa thams cad rnams par sel bar gyur te/ 'khor nas grwa ma mgo'i ril bskor ba zlas de bzhin
377a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa la'ang bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// rlung yang bde bar langs par gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa dang / mchod
377a3(mdo sde): dpa mngon par 'du bya ba byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'ang chos
377a4(mdo sde): rnams la rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba chos kyi mig rnam par dag go// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kyang sngan chad ma skyed pa las byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas
377a5(mdo sde): yang ga ya mgo'i ri la gnas pa'i lha mo mi 'chi ba zhes bya ba dpung dang bcas 'khor dang bcas te/ 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug 'dug pa las de stan las langs
377a6(mdo sde): nas bdag gi gnas su song te bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa blangs nas phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir byas btsun pa
377a7(mdo sde): mchod pa dang / bsti stang dang
377a8(mdo sde): byas ri mor byas mchod par byas bsti stang byas rim gror byas so// bkur sti dang / btsun pa dang / ri mo dang
377b1(mdo sde): ris zor byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tsher rabs gzhan de dang de dag la ga mamame du 'dicid du chos kyi rnamagrangs 'dis nas dzang/
377b2(mdo sde): phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis dor 'di cing dag dang / tshul 'di nyid dag dang / tshig dang yi ge 'di nyid dag gis bstan pa bdag gis mngon par dran no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
377b3(mdo sde): mi 'tshe ba de ltar khyod kyis dkon mchog 'byung ba de lta bu thos par gyur pa ni khyod kyis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo// de nas 'khor der tshogs pa'i nang na lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems pa
377b4(mdo sde): gyur to// lha mo 'dis de srid cig nas chos kyi rnams grangs 'di thos la/ de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mang po la bsnyen bkur byas kyang 'dis bud med kyi lus las ma bsgyur snyam pa dang /
377b5(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas / bcom ldan
377b6(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar lha mo mi 'chi ba 'dis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che thob la de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed du mang ba zhig
377b7(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bgyis na bud med kyi lus ma bsgyur ba'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la sems ca
378a1(mdo sde): don ni rgyu'o// sems can gyi don ni rkyen no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu lha mo mi 'chi ba ni rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa
378a2(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba ste/ rigs kyi bu lha mo mi 'chi bas gang yang dag par len du btsud pa dang / gzengs bstod pa dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las yongs su mya ngan las/
378a3(mdo sde): 'das pa'i sangs rgyas ni bgrang ba las 'das pa zhig ngas mngon par shes te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na lha mo mi 'chi ba ni rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba ste/ rigs kyi bu lha mo mi
378a4(mdo sde): 'chi ba 'di ni bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mngon par rdzogs
378a5(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas nas kyang / mi 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha na//
378a6(mdo sde): mi 'chi ba la bka' stsal pa/ mi 'chi ba khyod kyis rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston cig/ de nas lha mo mi 'chi ba gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
378a7(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs par gyur te/ lha po mi 'tsho ba gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigs rten gyi 'am/
378b1(mdo sde): 'di lag mthil lta zur mnyam zhing be nurba'i gzhir rdung bar gyur te/ ri nag po med cing shing thamal pa med la/ gnas gnas dag na'ang dpag pasam ny+dzu shing shA s+t+rag sa
378b2(mdo sde): bar gyur to// gnas gnas dag na chu mig dang / mtshe ru dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang bdug snang bar gyur to// mi phal
378b3(mdo sde): med par snang bar gyur to// de na bud med kyi sgra yang mi grag par gyur to// gnas dang gnas dag na pad+ma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam dag snang bar gyur to// pad+ma de dag la'ang byang chub
378b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' gzugs skyil mo krung du 'khod pa sha stag snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'chi ba de'ang byang
378b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston par snang ste/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'
378b6(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas mdun du 'dar ta/ 'di ltar chos nyid 'di kho nA las brtsams nas chos ston par snang bar gyur to// de nas lha mo mo 'chi ba'ang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/
378b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam pa
379a1(mdo sde): sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grAngs 'di na tu/ 'dzin
379a2(mdo sde): 'chang ngam/ klog gam kun chub par bgyid dam/ kha ton bgyid dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston par bgyid na/ de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skye
379a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i
379a4(mdo sde): sems can rnams la sbyin pa lhug par byin te/ de ltar sbyin pas bskal pa brgya stong mang por byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri
379a5(mdo sde): leg par bris/ legs par zhus te/ sems dad pas sems dad pa la byin na/ de bas kyang 'di bsod nams mang du skyed do// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zang zing gi sbyin
379a6(mdo sde): niphran tshegs te/ chos kyi sbyin pa ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i sems can rnams kyis zang zing ni rnam pa du mar myed gi/ 'jog
379a7(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i chos kyi ro ni nam yong ma myong na/ 'jig rten pa ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu gang laM las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can
379b1(mdo sde): rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la bkod pa bas gang gis chos kyi rnamagrangs 'di nyan tam 'dzin tama'achang ngam klog gam kun chub par byed dum
379b2(mdo sde): gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston na/ de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams ni 'di las byung ngo // rigs kyi bu gang
379b3(mdo sde): la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra
379b4(mdo sde): bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu la bkod pa bas gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam gzhan la'ang rgya
379b5(mdo sde): stor na de bas kyang 'di bsod nams mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos nyid 'di la rten na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// chos nyid /
379b6(mdo sde): 'dil rten na byang chub sems dpa' rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// ches nyid 'di la brten na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi
379b7(mdo sde): rnams grangs 'di bzung ba dang bklags pa dang stsal ba dang kha ton byas pas mdo sde thams cad bzung ba dang sem pa dang / kha toran byas par 'gyur ro/
380a1(mdo sde): ga de ci'i phying na rigs kyi bu 'dzin chos thams cad kyim mon/ gas kyi bu chos nyid 'di mthob par chos nyid na chen bathod pa yi gyur te//
380a2(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dul ba'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' chen po de tha thams cad gan las langs te/ zla bor zug sa sa thab /
380a3(mdo sde): pus me g.yas pa'i lhang sal btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal me sbyor ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
380a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos nyid 'di thos pas skye ba'i 'khor ba chen po bas par bgyis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dge slong dag de de bzhin
380a5(mdo sde): no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po de dag la bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu dag sa phyogs gang
380a6(mdo sde): du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa dang ston pa'i sa phyogs de byang chub kyi snying por gzung bar bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gzung bar bya'o// mchod rten chen por gzung
380a7(mdo sde): bar bya'o// bdag cag gi ston pa gnas 'di na bzhugs so gzung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid ni byang chub bo// chos nyid 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor
380b1(mdo sde): ba'o// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku ste/ rigs kyi bu dag chos mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod par 'gyur ro// sa phyogs gang na chos smra ba de/
380b2(mdo sde): gnas pa de la'ang mchod rten du 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ chos smra ba de la'ang bla mar 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes ga nyen du 'du shes bskyed par bya/
380b3(mdo sde): lam ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// chos smra ba de mthong na dga' ba dang / dad pa dang rangs pa bskyed par bya'o// rim gro byas te stan la ba ngar bar bya'o// chos smra ba de'i
380b4(mdo sde): bsngags pa bskyed par bya'o// legs so zhes brjod pa mang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag ngas bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos smra ba de'i bsngags pa brjod kyang chos
380b5(mdo sde): smra ba de la cung zid kyang phan par byas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/ bkur stir bya ba dang btsun par bya ba dang bsngags pa brjod pa ni gyin
380b6(mdo sde): cung zad zad // rigs kyi bu dag gal te chos 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis chos smra ba de 'ong ba'i lam rang gi khrag gis chag chag byas kyang chos smra ba
380b7(mdo sde): la phan pa cung zad kyang byas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul bzung ba 'di ni dka'o// rigs kyi bu dag chos smram
381a1(mdo sde): des kyangachos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa dang / bstun pa dang yang dag par ston pa'i tshe/ 'jigs pa med par bya'o// ma zhum pa dang
381a2(mdo sde): snga ma gong ba dang / zhe ma 'gras pa'i sems dang / gos gtsang ma bgos te dang ba skyed par bya'o// bdag gis bsngags brjod kyang mi snyems pa dang / nga rgyal du mi gzung ba/
381a3(mdo sde): bya ste/ bdag mi stod gzhan mi smod cing des zang zing med pa'i sems kyis ri mor byas te chos ston par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin/
381a4(mdo sde): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dog sa'i phyogs gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa 'am/ bstan par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang /
381a5(mdo sde): chos smra ba de la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag dpung dang bcas 'khor dang bcas te mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ko'u shi ka legs so
381a6(mdo sde): legs so// khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid yongs su bsrung bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
381a7(mdo sde): dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis
381b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyi rno kyis rnam grangs 'di dkon mchog sprin+da ces bya bar zung zhig/ yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi le'u zhes bya bar yang zung zhig ye
381b2(mdo sde): shes sgron ma zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa
381b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang
381b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu la sogs pa lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dgra dang de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang klu dang
381b5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po brgyad stong dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
381b6(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+te de ro tsa na rak+Shi ta dang /
381b7(mdo sde): d+harma tA sha~M las zhus te gtan la phab pa skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos lags so// @rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dz+nyA na ka sU tra bu
382a1(mdo sde): bya/ a ba dA na bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa shes ldan gyi mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
382a2(mdo sde): lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yum gyi don du lha rnams kyi gnas sum cu rtsa gsum na/ shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi drung na la ba dkar po lta
382a3(mdo sde): bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs so// der lha'i bu zhig la snga ltas ngan pa lnga byung ste/ 'phreng rgyan brnyings pa dang / gos brnyings pa dang lus dring bar gyur pa dang / mchan khrang nas
382a4(mdo sde): rdul 'dzag pa dang / rang gi stan la dga' ba med par gyur to// skye ba'ang mthong ste/ yangs pa'i phag gi mngal du skye ba mthong ngo // des de mthong nas mya ngan gyis thebs ste
382a5(mdo sde): sngags 'don/ zang rdung zhing ngu la/ shin tu med mong por gyur to// de nas lha'i bu gzhan zhig lha'i bu de ga la bo der song song ste 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu khyod
382a6(mdo sde): 'chibs 'jigs sam/ smras pa/ lha'i bu bdag 'chi bas 'jigs so// lha'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag lha rnams kyi nang du sum cu rtsa gsum 'dir lha'i za ba ni zos
382a7(mdo sde): lha'i btung ba ni 'thungs lha'i bgo ba ni bgos na/ de nas phyir yangs pa'i phag gi mngal du skye ba mthong ste/ der bdag bshang ba za zhing 'chi bar 'gyur te/ lha'i bu de lta ba
382b1(mdo sde): bas na bdag 'chi bas 'jigs so// smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod 'chi bas ma 'jigs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
382b2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de yum gyi don du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas 'di na/ shing yongs 'dus brdol gyi drung na/ la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la
382b3(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ ci ste lnga'i bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la phyag tshol dang / bcom ldan 'das de 'dir gshegs te/ des khyod ngan song rnams las grol bar mdzad do// de ci'i
382b4(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen pos sems can yongs su ma btang ba yin no// de nas lnga'i bu de stan las langs te/ bla gos zag pa gcig tu
382b5(mdo sde): gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nge sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas ched du brjod pa 'di lan gsum brjod do// bcom ldan
382b6(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de 'dir gshegs
382b7(mdo sde): su gsol/ bdag ngan song du skye ba rnams las grol bar mdzad du gsol/ de ras bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas lha'i bu de dag ga la ba der
383a1(mdo sde): gshegs te gdun bshams pa de la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
383a2(mdo sde): lha'i bu khyod 'chi bas 'jigs sam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag 'gum pas 'jigs lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na yangs pa'i phag gi mngal mi sdug par
383a3(mdo sde): skye ba mthong lags te der bdag skyes nas bshang ba 'tshal zhing mtshon gyis 'gum par 'gyur lags te bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag 'gum pas 'jigs lags so//
383a4(mdo sde): de nanas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lnga'i bu khyod 'chi bas ma 'jigs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu sa'i khams dang /
383a5(mdo sde): chu'i khams mi 'gro mi 'ong gi/ bdag nyid kyi las kyis 'ong zhing 'gro ste/ lha'i bu khyod tshur shog/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song zhig/ chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song
383a6(mdo sde): zhig de nas lha'i bu de stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo// bdag sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o//
383a7(mdo sde): chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa gang zhig sangs rgyas la ni skyabs song ba// de ni ngan 'gro/
383b1(mdo sde): 'dir ni mi 'gro ste// lha'i bdag nyid dngos pa spangs nas su/ mi yi bdag nyid dngos po len par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang
383b2(mdo sde): dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod yang dag par rab tu dga' ba'i bar du mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te bzhud do// bcom ldan
383b3(mdo sde): 'das bzhud nas ring po ma lon par lha'i bu de 'chi ba'i dus byas so// dus byas nas de ma thag tu langs pa der tshong dpon zhig gi chung ma dam pa'i mngal du skyes so// de zla ba dgu 'das nas
383b4(mdo sde): khye'u gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas par gyur to// de bcos ma thag tu tshig 'di skad ces sangs
383b5(mdo sde): rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod do// de nas de'i pha dang ma 'di snyam du sems te khye'u 'di ni sangs rgyas shes
383b6(mdo sde): chos shes dge 'dun shes te/ 'di ni shes pa dang ldan no snyam du 'du shes skyes so// de nas khye'u shes ldan gang gi tshe lo brgyad lon pa lta bur gyur pa de'i
383b7(mdo sde): li tsa byi gzhon nu rab tu mang po rnams kyis lhan cig tu mdun du bdar nas/ skyed mo so tshal gyi bzhi mdo nas byung ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yangs pa'i tshal chen po na khang pa
384a1(mdo sde): brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe smad g.yogs dang chos gos gsol lhung bzer bsnams te
384a2(mdo sde): yangs par bsod snyoms la phyir gshegs so// bcom ldan 'das de mdzes pa nas 'od dang ldan pa'i bar du gyur pa khye'u shes ldan gyis mthong ngo // mthong nas de bcom
384a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das la sems rab tu dga' bar gyur to// sems dga' nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
384a4(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khye'u shes ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
384a5(mdo sde): bcad de gsol pa dag gis sngon gyi tshe dran te// sdug bsngal rnams las rab bkrol zhing // ngan song ltung ba las ni bdag/ 'jig rten mgon gyis grol bar mdzad/
384a6(mdo sde): mchog thugs ni brtser dgongs te// bsod snyoms 'di ni bzhes par mdzad// bdag gi gdugs chod 'di dag ni// grol bar mdzad nas deng bzhengs la// sang ni ngag gi sa ma yi// rnam
384a7(mdo sde): par 'dren pas brtser dgongs te/ dge slong kun dang thabs cig tu/ gdugs chod dag ni gsol bar mdzad// bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pas/ khye'u shes ldan gyis/
384b1(mdo sde): gsol ba gnang ngo // de nas khye'u shes ldan bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas pa mgul ba der song ste pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so// la
384b2(mdo sde): yum bdag gis ni bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms phul lags te/ sang yang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so// de nas khye'u shes ldan gyi pha ma mgu zhing dga' la yi rangs
384b3(mdo sde): shing rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas de'i mtshan mo bza' ba dang bca' ba ro dang ldan pa zhim pa mang po mngon par bshams nas yangs pa'i
384b4(mdo sde): grong khyer chen po thams cad phyag bdar byas te dor gyi lnga ldi btags pog phor nas spos kyis bdugs spos chus chag chag btab me trog gis mdzes par bkram ste/
384b5(mdo sde): de'i mtshan mo 'das nas dus la bab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod la ba ba ste gdugs tshed sbyar lags so zhes gsol
384b6(mdo sde): to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i snga dro spang g.yogs dang chos gos gsol lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis mdun du bdar cing dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs
384b7(mdo sde): su bskor te shes ldan gyi pha ma'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs nas gdan bshams pa de la bzhugs so// de nas khye'u shes ldan bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang gdan la
385a1(mdo sde): bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag gis bza' ba dang bca' ba ro dang ldan pa zhim zhing mang ba dag legs brims legs par gsol to// bcom ldan
385a2(mdo sde): 'das gdugs tshod gsol bar rig nas so so so so la ras bcos bu zung dang / so so la lham zung dag phul lo// bcom ldan 'das la chos gos gsar pa gsum dang
385a3(mdo sde): chags gsar pa zung dag gsol to// gser gyi me tog dang dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis gtor to// gang mngon par gtor ba de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das kyi/
385a4(mdo sde): spyi gtsug gi thad kar khang pa brtsegs pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa gru bzhi pa gnas bzhi dang ldan zhig 'dug par gyur to// khang pa brtsegs pa der de bzhin gshegs
385a5(mdo sde): ba'i sku skyil mo krung bcas te chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa des mthong ngo // de nas khye'u shes ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul
385a6(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa de 'dra ba mthong nas/ mgu zhing dga' ba nas/ yid 'de ba skyes pa'i bar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
385a7(mdo sde): 'das bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des na/ bdag da ltar gyi bcom ldan 'das bzhin du sangs rgyas su
385b1(mdo sde): gyur cig chos ston par yang byar cig dge 'dun yongs su stong bar yang gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u shes ldan gyi lhag pa'i byas ma bzugs su chud de/ 'dzum
385b2(mdo sde): ba mdzad pa nas spyi gtsug gi nang du nub pa'i bar du mdzad pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong ste don med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do snyam pa'i bar du'o// de nas bcom
385b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyisatshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar shes ldan gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod
385b4(mdo sde): pa nas// bskal pa bye ba dgu bcu dag tu log par ltung bar mi 'gyur la// de nas de ma thag tu rnam par 'dren par nye bar skye 'gyur te// mtshan ni mkhyen brtso rgyal po zhes bya
385b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi ni rtogs pa brjod pas mkhas rnams yang drag dga' byed cing / mi yi mkhas pa gang gis thos nas dge ba mang po byed 'gyur
385b6(mdo sde): te/ rgya mtsho mthas gtugs dpag med lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas la// rab tu dang bas yon rnams phul ba'i 'bras bu chung bar mi 'gyur ro//
385b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas khye'u shes ldan dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
386a1(mdo sde): bya/ gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa shes ldan gyi mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan
386a2(mdo sde): po bid+ya ka ra sing ha dang / sarba dzA de wa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he dpal brtsegs kyi sa bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa// /
386a3(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du shrI se na a ba dA nAM/ bod skad du dpal gyi sde'i rtogs pa brjod pa dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na ste
386a4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa dge slong dag gal te ji ltar na ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang shes la sbyin pa'i mgo ba sha'i 'bras
386a5(mdo sde): du rnam par smin pa'ang shes bzhin du sems can rnams kyis kyang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang shes la sbyin pa'i bgo ba sha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang shes su zin na ni
386a6(mdo sde): de lta na kham gyi tha ma dang kham gyi 'jug lus bgang yin pa de las kyang gal te yon gnas len pa po rnyed na de la ma byin num bgo bsha' ma byas
386a7(mdo sde): kyi bar du za bar mi byed la de dag gi sems kyang ser sna skyes pas kun nas dkris shing 'dug par mi 'gyur ba zhig na ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang shes
386b1(mdo sde): la sbyin pa'i bgo ba sha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang shes bzhin du sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang mi shes la sbyin pa'i bgo ba sha'i 'bras bu
386b2(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa'ang mi shes pas ni de'i phyir de dag ni kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyis ma byin pa 'am bgo bsha'am byas par za bar byed la de dag gi sems kyang seras
386b3(mdo sde): skyes pas kun tu dkris shing 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis de sad ces bka' stsal to/ bde bar gshegs pa su de skad du gsungs nas gzhan yang smon pas 'a
386b4(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to// bge ba sha' dag gi rnam par smin// ji ltar don chen gyur pa de// drang srong che rnams gsungs pa bzhin// sems can rnams kyis shes na ni/ ma byin
386b5(mdo sde): bar du mi za zhing // ser sna can du mi 'gyur la// de dag kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems// nams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur na// gang phyir byis pa gti mug gis/ bsgribs pa rnams kyis
386b6(mdo sde): mi shes pas// de phyir kun tu 'dzin sems kyis// rtag tu ma byin za bar byed/ de dag ser sna skyes nas kyang // sems ni kun nas dkris shing 'dug/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan
386b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis mdo sde 'ang bshad pa de'i tshe sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku las 'od zer rnams byung bar gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams kyis
387a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu mthong ba na ngo mtshar skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa
387a2(mdo sde): btsun pa rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'di lta bu'i rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul ston par
387a3(mdo sde): mdzad na/ btsun pa 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul gyi rgyu gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag cho 'phrul 'di 'byung ba'i rgyu mnyan par 'dod dam
387a4(mdo sde): btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo// dge slong dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad par bya'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus
387a5(mdo sde): nargyal po'i pho zang a ri shwA zhes bya ba 'byor pa rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/ chung dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du
387a6(mdo sde): dpag tshad bdun pa gru bzhi pa rnam par 'byes pa gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rta babs bsgreng ba byung bar gyur te/ rgyal po'i pho zang der rgyal
387a7(mdo sde): po dpal gyi sde zhes bya ba stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa/ gachog dang ldan pa/ rang bzhin gyi skye ba dran//
387b1(mdo sde): chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po chos kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbang phyug gi bdag po byed pa zhig byung bar gyur to// rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i mthus shing rnams cag tu/
387b2(mdo sde): me tog dang 'bras bur ldan zhing lha rnams dus dus su char yang dag par 'bebs la lo tog shin tu phun sum tshogs par gyur to// sems can rnams kyang nad med pa
387b3(mdo sde): gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyang phan pa dang byams pa'i sems kyis gnas so// rgyal po de'i btsun mo dam pargyal ba'i 'od ces bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa
387b4(mdo sde): lha na sdug pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad tshang ba yul gyi bzang mo rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang / sdug pa dang / 'phangs pa zhig byung bar/
387b5(mdo sde): gyur to// dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad la dpya dang / sho gam dang / grub tsas med de/ zhing ga 'byor pa dang ldan pa skye bo rnams
387b6(mdo sde): zhi ba khyim bya rnams dang ldan pa'i yul dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang byung bar gyur to// dge slong dag rgyal po dpal bya
387b7(mdo sde): sde byang chub sems dpa' gyur te/ thams cad ster ba/ thams cad yongs su gtong ba/ chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba dang / gtong ba chen po la zhugs nas tha na rang
388a1(mdo sde): gI sha'ang gtong ste/ des ma byin pa dang yongs sum gtang bci'ang med do// dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i rgyal po'i bo za sa ri shwA'i shar
388a2(mdo sde): phyogs kyi grong khyer gyi mthar sbyin gtong gi gnas byas te/ sbyin pa ni gtong / bsod nams ni byed do// lho dang / nub dang / byang gi grong khyer gyi sgor sbyin pa ni gtong
388a3(mdo sde): bsod nams ni byed do// sum mdo'i dbus na'ang sbyin pa ni gtong / bsod nams ni byed do// 'di ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom
388a4(mdo sde): bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / mar medang / 'phreng ba dang / dri dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / mal rgya dang / stan dang / rtsu brten dang
388a5(mdo sde): gnas dang / gzugs rnams dag shing rta dang / glang po dang rta dang / rgyan rnams dang / gser gyi snod dngul gyi phye mas yongs su gang ba rnams dang / dngul gyi snod gser
388a6(mdo sde): gyi phye mas yongs su gang ba rnams dang / ba lang gser gyi ro dang / dngul gyi rmig pa btags pa/ 'khar ba'i bano snod dang / ras zung gis bkab pa rnams dang / gzhon
388a7(mdo sde): nu ma rnams dang / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas/ sbyin pa ni gtong / bsod nams ni byed do// dge slong dag ji tsam du rgyal po dpal gyi sdes ji tsam gyis 'dzam bu
388b1(mdo sde): gling ba'i mi thams cad phyug pa dang / nor mang ba dang longs spyod che bar gyur pa de tsam du sbyin pa rnams sbyin no// yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang A ri shA'i grong khyer na byed
388b2(mdo sde): zag dgu bcu rtsa drug gi mi rnams gnas te/ rgyal po dpal gyi sde de dag thams cad kyis sdug pa dang yod du 'ong bar gyur to// gzhan yang 'di skyes pa deng bud med rnams
388b3(mdo sde): kyis mthong ba na/ ngoms par mi 'gyur ba'i dga' ba thob bo// dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i blon po stong phrag bcu gnyis yod de/ blon po de rnams kyi mchog blo gro chen po
388b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba mkhas pa/ gsal ba blo dang ldan pa/ thams cad la dbang byed pa/ rgyal po yongs su skyob par byed pa/ rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i sdug pa dang
388b5(mdo sde): du 'ong ba dang / 'phangs par gyur pa zhig byung bar gyur to// des 'di'i gzugs dang / kha dogs dang / rtags dang / dbyibs mthong ba na ngoms pa med de/ skad/
388b6(mdo sde): cig kyang 'di dang mi 'bral lo// dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sdes 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par sbyar te/ shes ldan dag 'dzam
388b7(mdo sde): bu'i gling gi mi rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la rten cig/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di rnams yang dag par zung zhig ces dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par
389a1(mdo sde): sbyor te/ dge slong rag rgyal po dpal gyi skyes del bu'i gdams pang / rjes saston par gyur to/ 'din te'akhor lo dU ba'i rgyal po da'i rdus du/
389a2(mdo sde): gang 'dzam bu'i gling ba'i mi gang lal dus byas te/ was zhig nas de lha'i ris drug tu skyes par gyur to// gang pal cher ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su skyes so// yang de'i tshe bur
389a3(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba lha'i tshogs kyis kun tu gang ngo // de nas der go skabs med par gyur pa dang brtan thug gi phyi rol yongs 'du
389a4(mdo sde): rang shing rta sna tshogs can dang / dga' ba'i tshal la sogs pa'i skyed mos tshal rnams su gnas par gyur to// de nas sngon skyes pa'i sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i tshogs
389a5(mdo sde): kyis yang dag pa'i 'byor pa de mthong ste/ rab tu dga' nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shing ka gang du ro'i rgyal po ri rab de nyid lha'i bu de dag gis gang
389a6(mdo sde): stelha'i tshogs ni 'phel bar gyur lha ma yin gyi tshogs ni 'grib par 'gyur ba'i ngo mtshar 'di dag gzigs so// de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu rnams las thos nas
389a7(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad la bal bar bsams pa dang ji tsam na ri'i rgyal po'i ri rab lha'i tshogs rnams kyis kun nas gang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du
389b1(mdo sde): sems te/ chu gang dang rkyen gang gis sems can 'di snyed cig 'dir skyes par gyur snyam nas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar brtsams pa dung ji tsa na rgyal po
389b2(mdo sde): dpal gyi sde'i mthu yin par mthong ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sams rab tu dga' bas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lce rnams la smras pa grogs po dag khyed rnams nyon cig
389b3(mdo sde): 'dzam gling dbang phyug rgyal po yin// dpal gyi sde zhes rnam grags pa// rtag tu chos la gzhol ba dang // rgyal po chen po chos la gnas// thog ma bar dang mthar dge ning
389b4(mdo sde): sems can kun la phan par dga'// gtso bo mi rnams dga' ba la// rtag tu yang dab sbyor bar byed// rtag tu snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ phyi rol dngos po rab gtong zhing // de mi
389b5(mdo sde): sha yang skyong ba la// rjes su brtse ba nyid kyis ster// nang dum yang na phyi rol la// de ni yongs su 'dzin med par// rjes brtse nyid kyis gtong byed cing // byang chub mthar dbyang
389b6(mdo sde): bral brtson// des ni rnam dag gser bzhin du/ 'gro ba thams cad rab bsgrubasapas// rgyal por mi mthu mas ni/ thams cad mad+mo sA la gsol 'byor/
389b7(mdo sde): bo rje phreng che yi/ mthu yis su yang dmyal ba dang / mi dgas dang ni dung 'bri yis/ skye gnas rnams su myi mi 'gyur// de yi gzi brjid mthu yis so// thams cadas
390a1(mdo sde): par yo dab sbyin dang rgal khrim su gar 'byung bar/ das nga tshal nadasa' bab kye// da pa myi stepa rjem skye ga
390a2(mdo sde): bcas par gyur pa 'di// lha yi 'jig rten nyams dbu' bar// de yang dpa' ba rnam par snang // de nus sumacu rtsa gsum g+ni lha de rnams kyis tshig thos pa dang / ming dgar ba
390a3(mdo sde): dang sems rangs par gyur te/ dga' ba'i sems su gyur cing 'di skad ces kyang smras so// gang rgyal po 'di yan lag dang nying lag kyang sbyin par gtod 'dod
390a4(mdo sde): par rtsol ba ni ngo mtshar che'o// 'on kyang 'di ltar yan lag dang nying lag ster ba 'di ni dka' ba ste/ bdag dang mnyam par 'phangs pa gzhan med pas de
390a5(mdo sde): ltar na bdag nyid chen po 'di rang gi lus kyi sdug bsngal ba la mi sems par yan lag dang nying lag sbyin par gtong bar gyur te/ de ni rjes su dpag par nus pa ma yin no//
390a6(mdo sde): brgya byin gyis smras pa grogs po dag khyed rnams de skad ma smra zhig/ rgyal po 'di ni mthu che ste/ rdzu 'phrul che ba snying rje che bas tha na rang gi shwa'ang gtong ste
390a7(mdo sde): la yongs su ma gtang ba ci'ang med do// ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig gi tshe/ btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od stan chen po la nyal ba na tho rangs kyi dus su rmi lam 'ani rmas
390b1(mdo sde): dpal gyi stan las bdag nyid phab nas slar yang bteg par mthong ba dang / rang gi mig phyung ste/ slar yang skyes par mthong ba dang bdag nyid kyi dpung ba g.yas pa 'di bcang
390b2(mdo sde): de phul lhung ba yang skyes par mthong ba dang / mi ma yin pa dngul gyi rdo bcag pa'i mdog 'dra bzhig gis rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i dpung pa g.yon pa mod la phyung ste/ thogs nas snga
390b3(mdo sde): yang skyes par rmis so btid sang pa dang 'jigs par gyur smra bing zhes byed de ngo'am stsal sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig 'byung bar mi 'gyur mang zhes bsas
390b4(mdo sde): ngas rgyal po dngal gyi snre la smrab so// dmigs largyud rje yin pas 'odi snyam du sems/ 'das kyil d+hAn na mthong ba las na/ ma rdzogs par chu mdzadas
390b5(mdo sde): nga du 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam sa smras pa ma rims yig smraseMs bya'i tshul sa sems pas kyi / dang sa snres nal bdag nyid garnam par nyid ga
390b6(mdo sde): khyod kyis ga ni rnams pa bsnyen du 'dug pa dang / byed ky-i byung ga su de bzhin du mdze du sa shA nas sa pa
390b7(mdo sde): sa ma cid brjod ma rdzo ma pos byam mams sum #
391a1(mdo sde): las byas pa'i khang bzangs mod la zhig pa dang rin po che de rnams sha za mthong na 'jigs su rung ba rnams kyis phan tshun khyer ba dang slar yang khang
391a2(mdo sde): bzangs so sor sbyar bar rmis so// sad pa dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / yi mug ste/ spu zing zhes byed pa dang / bsams pa/ sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin
391a3(mdo sde): ba dang lho dpal gyi sde'i sku lus slong bar mi 'gyur grang lha'ang thams cad stsol ba/ thams cad yongs su gtong ba/ chags pa med par gtong ste/ 'di lta ste
391a4(mdo sde): dman pa dang long ba dang / bkres pa dang / sdug 'phongs pa rnams la 'di yongs su mi gtong ba ci'ang med do// rgyal po dpal gyi de la ni zhu bar mi bya ste/ shin tu sprob skye
391a5(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur zang de nas des gsang ste mtshan mkhan pos nas/ dam pasgo ste zhes smras pa/ shes ldan ngas 'di lta bu'i rmi lam rmis pa'i 'bras bu ji lta bur gyur pa khyod kyis lca
391a6(mdo sde): spyon cig/ mtshan mkhan gyis smras pa rmi lam ci 'dra ba 'di las ring po mi thogs par lha'i sku lus slong ba 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rmi lam bstan pa 'di lta bu de thos pa dang / blon
391a7(mdo sde): po chen po blo gros chen po sdug bsngal drag po sa gdungs shing mig mchi mas gang ba dang lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de/ sems khongs su chud pas gnas nas dpal gyi sde byams/
391b1(mdo sde): pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa yon tan du ma dang ldan pa la mi rtag pa'i stobs nye bar gnas pa ni ha cang myur ches so// de nas
391b2(mdo sde): nub gsum pa la blon po stong phrag bcu gnyis la rmi lam rmis te/ khri yis rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i gdugs dang cod pan phrogs te slar yang byin pa dang skye bo thams cad kyi mgo bcad nas
391b3(mdo sde): slar yang byung ba dang / rgyal po dpal gyi 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyi mig phyung nas slar yang skyes bya dang 'dzam bu gling gi ma thams cad kyi rkang pa dang lag pa rnams bcad nus
391b4(mdo sde): slar yang skyes pa dang / rgyal po dpal gyi sde seng ge'i khri las babs nas slar yang 'jog par rtsom par rmis pa dang / 'jigs shing skrag la yi mub nas/ rgyal po
391b5(mdo sde): dpal gyi spos chen po skyong bar mdzad pa/ byams pa'i bdag nyid can snying rje che ba/ sems can thams cad la gnyis gshin pa la mi rtag pa'i stobs nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur/
391b6(mdo sde): grang bdag cag rnams lha dang lhan cig gnas pa las tha dad par gyur pa dang / so so ba dang bral ba dang bye bar mi 'gyur grang / 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i skyabs dang dpung
391b7(mdo sde): gnyen med par mi 'gyur grangade rnams kyis mtshan mkhan rnams bos nas smras pa dang // de rnams kyis ji tsam na thams cad 'di bzhin du 'gyur zhes lung bstan to// 'di
392a1(mdo sde): lta bu'i rmi lam bstan pa thos pa dang / grong khyer a ri shAn gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams nyam thag pa'i dngos du bar ba rnams so// thos pa gcig tu
392a2(mdo sde): brgyud pas 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi thams cad mya ngan drag po'i sdug bsngal gyis bcom nas/ shin tu smre sngags 'don par gyur to// de ltar gyur pa de rgyal po dpal gyi sdes
392a3(mdo sde): zhes so// thos nas kyang yang bsams pa nga'i lus slong ba'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems rab tu dga' ba dang / mgu bar gyur to// shes ldan dag 'dzam bu'i
392a4(mdo sde): gling gi mi khyed rnams bde ba dang / phebs pas dge ba la zhol bar gyis shig/ khyed rnams sgyu ma lta bu'i rmi lam la sems pas ci zhig bya zhes 'dzam bu gling ba thams cad
392a5(mdo sde): du dril bsgrags so// de nas rgyal po dpal gyi sdes dril bsgrags pa de thos pa dang / 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi thams cad dbugs byin par gyur to// yang de'i tshe de'i dus na
392a6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho zang a ri sh+ma'i byang phyogs rgyang grags tsam gyi phyogs na ri bo zhig yod de de nas drang srong lnga brgya tsam gnas so// ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig gi tshe de rnams
392a7(mdo sde): kyi don du 'jug pa drang srong cig don gyi bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir/ rgyal po'i pho brang a ri shUN+Da 'ongs so// yang dus de'i tshe rgyal po dpal gyi sde lha mo rgyal ba'i 'od dang ldan
392b1(mdo sde): cig tu nang du zhugs nas skyed tshal gyi sar song ngo // drang srong des rgyal ba dang tshe ring ba'i brjod pa byas pa dang / drang srong des lha mo rgyal ba'i 'od rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mthod
392b2(mdo sde): ste/ 'di ltar de'i skye ba snga ma'i chung mar gyur pa'ang yin pas/ sngon gyi chags pa dang 'brel ba'i dbang gis tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa skyes par gyur te/ de yid
392b3(mdo sde): la sems shing de nas song ste lam de nas 'das pa dang / ji tsam na drang srong de rgyal po'i pho zang zong khyer a ri shAr bya ba'am/ byed pa thams cad byas te/ yongs su rdzog
392b4(mdo sde): ba dang bsti gnas su song ngo // ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig gi tshe drang srong des bram ze'i khye'u gcig rig byed 'don pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mkhan po'i rkang pa la gtug
392b5(mdo sde): nas smras pa/ mkhan po la nor ji lta bu dbul bar bgyi/ mkhan pos bka' stsol cig/ drang srong gis smras pa/ de bas na bu rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i btsun mo'i mchog
392b6(mdo sde): btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od slongs la nga'i bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / mkhan po la mkhan po'i nor dang / bla ma la mchod par bya ba'i phyir byin cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bram ze'i//
392b7(mdo sde): khye'u de gnang du bsnun pa'i ri dgas bzhin du sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs te/ mchog tu yi mug pa dang bsams pa/ gnas 'di ni 'byung bar dka' ba dang / rnyed par dka
393a1(mdo sde): nAng ltang mang rnam patshon mongs padag brgyal po la brgyan po sgyul ba'i blod 'dubyin cig di lta byu dus/ 'di sang bslang ba byu ma min pa mas
393a2(mdo sde): 'di la kun tu sbyor ba gang ba yin pa des na/ mkhan po nges par bdag la dmod pa byed par 'dod pa yin no// de nas drang srong des de'i bzhin rnam par 'gyur bas nang gi bsam pa rtogs nas spras pa
393a3(mdo sde): bu ma 'jigs shig/ ji ltar na sems 'di ltar khongs su chud rgyal po 'di ni bdag nyid che ba thams cad ster ba/ thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / chags pa med par
393a4(mdo sde): gtong bas tha na rang gi sha'ang gtong ste/ 'di la yongs su ma btang ba ci'ang med do// bu des na rgyal pos btsun mo'i mchog ster bar 'gyur gyis/ yi mug par yi mug pa
393a5(mdo sde): ma byed cig/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te ma song na ni/ gang dmod pa byed pa'i gnas de yod pas 'gro snyam nas de dmod pas 'jigs pas smras pa/ mkhan po gal
393a6(mdo sde): te de ltar na mchi'o zhes ros ngo'i rkang pa la gtugs nas song ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang a ri shwar phyin to// de bzhin du shing shun gyi gos gyon zhing dbyig pa dang ril ba lag na thogs la/
393a7(mdo sde): sa rdul gyis lus la gos pa dang / rgyal po dpal gyi sde ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po dpal gyi sA la rgyal ba dang tshe spel bar byas nas bsams pa
393b1(mdo sde): ci bsrang ngam 'on te mi blangs ster bar 'gyur ram mi ster bar 'gyur/ nga'i yid la re ba 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ram 'bras bu med par 'gyur
393b2(mdo sde): snyam nas bdag nyid spong bzhin du rgyal po'i mdun na dman pa'i bzhin gyis cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas rgyal po dpal gyi sdes bsams pa 'di ni dul slong du 'ongs
393b3(mdo sde): so snyam nas bram ze'i khye'u de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze khyod kyi dgongs pa gang yin pa smos de ring khyod kyi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// de skad
393b4(mdo sde): ces smras pa dang bram ze'i khye'u de mi 'jigs pa skyes nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa de legs lha rig ge mo na bdag gi mkhan po zang srong 'don du
393b5(mdo sde): 'jug pa 'khor lnga brgya dang gnas te de las bdag gis rig byed 'don pa yongs su rdzogs pas rgyal po chen po dathugs brje bas btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od bdag la stsol
393b6(mdo sde): mkhan po la mkhan po'i nor dung bla ma la mchod pa'i phyir bdag gis mkhan po lha dbul bar bgyi'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po dpal
393b7(mdo sde): brtse ba bangags ming ma pa dang dgyur te/ btsun mo rgyal ba'i'ang 'di dang thal daji sang rlog 'dzin par smos 'khor darig thams cad kyang rgya mo bam ma
394a1(mdo sde): mig steng dang gang du bathun pa bzhin du brdzug mas smras smras sgrubab tu zhes smrasan sa sa
394a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpas skad cig cang mi smra bar gnas te/ bsams pa bri nga chung ma la sogs pa byin pa med pas ni bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par mi
394a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de'i phyir bram ze 'di la dga' bas chung ma 'di sbyin par bya'o snyam du bsams nas gnyen sdug pa dung bral bas zhum pa'i sems yang dag par blangs te/ 'phrul
394a4(mdo sde): du seng ge'i khri las babs nas byang chub smon pa'i sems kyis btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od lha'i bu mo bzhin du rnam par mdzes pa khyo dang bral ba'i gdung bas shin tu dbugs ring po byung ste/
394a5(mdo sde): mchi mas gang ba'i mig dang / mun par g.yang sa chen por lhung ba bzhin du/ mchog tu sdug bsngal bas gdong phab pa/ lag pa g.yon pas bzung ste/ lag pa g.yas pas
394a6(mdo sde): gser gyi bum pa thogs nas bram ze'i khye'u de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze chen po tshur shog tshur shog/ bram ze'i dam pa gzugs bzang ba// sdug pa'i chung ma
394a7(mdo sde): 'di long zhig/ sbyin pa 'di yis myur du ni// byang chub dam pa thob par shog/ ces smras nas/ byang chub sems dpas bram ze de'i lag par chu'i rgyun thugs so// de nas yang
394b1(mdo sde): dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi skyes chu'i rgyun blugs pa'i rjes thogs nyid la de'i tshe 'phral dus rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byung ngu ma
394b2(mdo sde): dba'i gtong ba dang gtong ba las kyang shin tu gtong ba shin tu dka' ba de mthong ba dang mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so// nam mkha'i ngos na gnas pa'i lnga brgyad stong
394b3(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang ca co'i sgra ba ton to// de ma thag tu'ang skar mda' ltung ba dang phyogs 'bar ba dang bar snang gi lha yang rnga brdung bar gyur to// de nas tham
394b4(mdo sde): be'i lce'u de rgyal po 'gyod par ma gyur zad snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par bstod de/ bde legs su gyur cig ces smras nas/ btsun mo rgyal na
394b5(mdo sde): 'od khyer te/ rings pa rings par bsti gnas su song ste mkhan pa la byin pa dang / btsun mo rtul ba'i 'od na tshu las brtson pa bzhin du rtsub pa dang bral pa'i thug bsngal dzas/
394b6(mdo sde): 'ardungs shing mthub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyid la mngon par sems shing 'gro ba thams cad dran pa sun+ta nag tu myu po bzhin du shes rnying /
394b7(mdo sde): na sa tshob tu brdung ba'i rnams dang 'as ca la la bzhugs so// sa g.yos pa des 'acu bye gyi ga rnam pa mas pa 'o// tshe nyid kyis riras kyi shes
395a1(mdo sde): mthong ba 'jug gi/ gong du ni ma yin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa shin tu thabs par sa g.yes pa// mtshan man du'i/
395a2(mdo sde): many+dzu mim/ gang gi mthunani ci 'dra ba// shin tu gsal bar 'di shes bya// 'jam bu gling thams cad la blta bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu
395a3(mdo sde): mchog tu dka bya'i las byed pa mthong ngo // mthong nus kyang mchog tu man+dAr skyes te/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lnga rnams la sbas pa/ thogs 'i dag khyed cag rnams rgyas
395a4(mdo sde): bo pal gyi sde'i ngo mtshar dang smad du byung ba'i las la ltos gang zhig 'di ltar sdug pa dang / 'di ltar ying du 'ong ba dang / 'di ltar 'phangs pa'i chung ma la mi sems
395a5(mdo sde): rtswa bzhin du yongs su gtong ngo // grogs po dag rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar shes par bya sa/ bdag nyid chen po 'di rang gi yan lag rang nying lag rnams kyang
395a6(mdo sde): 'phangs pa med par btong ba yin no// lha rnams kyis smras pa ko'u shi ka bu dang bu mo ni de bas yongs su gtong bar bye kyi 'di lta ste yan lag dang nying lag ster ba
